am: ናይጄሪያዊው ኦሉሴይ አኪንዴንዴ በብሎክቼይን ላይ የተመሰረተ የማረጋገጫ ሥርዓት የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት ማረጋገጫ አግኝቷል።
en: Nigerian, Oluseyi Akindeinde, Secures Patent for Blockchain-driven Authentication System
ha: Ɗan Nijeriya,Oluseyi Akindeinde ya sami sahalewar hukuma bisa tsarin tabbacin adana bayanai kai-tsaye.
sw: Mnijeria, Oluseyi akindeinde, hulinda hatimiliki kwa mfumo wa uthibitishaji unaoendeshwa na Blockchain
yo: Ọmọ Nàìjíríà kan, Olúṣèyí Akíndèìndé, gba ohun tí kò ní mú ẹlòmíràn lo ohun ìfaṣẹsí Blockchain láì ṣe pé wọ́n gba àṣẹ.
zu: U-Oluseyi Akindeinde waseNigeria, Uvikela Ilungelo Lobunikazi Kuhlelo Lokuqinisekisa Oluqhutshwa yi-Blockchain

am: ሃይፐርስፔስ ቴክኖሎጅስ ሊሚትድ በብሎክቼይን ቴክኖሎጂ ላይ የተመሰረተ ባለብዙ-ደረጃ ማረጋገጫ( MFA) የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት ማረጋገጫ አግኝቷል።
en: Hyperspace Technologies Limited has secured a patent for Blockchain technology-driven Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
ha: Kamfanin Hyperspace Technologies ya samu sahalewar Tsarin Samar da Tsarong Sirrikan Masu Amfani da intanet.
sw: Hyperspace Technologies Limited imepata hatimiliki ya uthibitishaji wa Mult-Factor (MFA) unaoendeshwa na teknolojia ya Blockchain.
yo: Ilé-Iṣẹ́ Ajẹmọ́-ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Hyperspace ti gba àṣẹ láti máa jẹ́ kí ẹni tí kò gbà àṣẹ lo ohun èlò ayélujára àti ohun ìfaṣẹsí àká-dátà-àkósódù lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀.
zu: I-Hyperspace Technologies Limited ithole ilungelo lobunikazi le-Blockchain Technology Driven Multi-Factor Authentication (iMFA).

am: በሀይፐርስፔስ ቴክኖሎጂዎች ምርምር እና ልማት (R&D) መምሪያ ውስጥ በበለጸገ cipherKEY tap2sign™ ኤምኤፍኤ(MFA) የቀጣዩ ትውልድ የደህንነት ሲስተም ብሎክ ቼይን ተፈጥሮ ማዕከላዊነት ባለማስቀረት ከፍተኛ ህዝባዊ/የግል ቁልፍ ክሪፕቶግራፊ ለመስራት ዲዛይን የተደረገ ኤንኤፍሲ (ለመስክ የቀረበ ግንኙነት)ቴክኖሎጂ ስርቆት፣ ስለላ እና ማህበራዊ ኢንጂነሪንግ ጥቃቶች ከፍተኛ ጥበቃ ያደርጋል።
en: Developed within the Hyperspace Technologies’ research and development (R&D) division, cipherKEY tap2sign™ MFA is a next-generation security system designed to leverage the decentralized nature of blockchain, the robustness of public/ private key cryptography, and the convenience of NFC (Near Field Communication) technology to provide an unprecedented level of security against identity theft, phishing, and social engineering attacks
ha: Tsarin da aka samar ƙarƙashin sashen bincike da ci gaba na Kamfanin Hyperspace Technologies, wato cipherKEY tap2sign™, MFA sabon tsari ne da aka samar da shi da zai samar da tsaro ga masu amfani da intanet da kiyaye saƙonni na mutate da kuma sauƙin Fasahar Sadarwa ta Kusa wacce ba ta wuce mita 4 ba, domin samar da matakin tsaro na musamman na yin sojan gona da damfara ta intanet.
sw: Imetengenezwa ndani ya kitengo cha utafiti na maendeleo cha Hyperspace Technologies(R&D), cipherKEY tap2sign MFA ni mfumo wa kiusalama wa kizazi kijacho ulioundwa ili kuimarisha hali ya ugatuzi wa blockchain, uthabiti wa kielelezo muhimu cha umma/binafsi, na urahisi wa teknolojia ya NFC (NearField Communication) ili kutoa kiwango ambacho hakijawahi kushuhudiwa cha usalama dhidi ya wizi wa utambulisho, ulaghai, na mashambulizi ya uhandisi wa kijamii
yo: Tí a ṣẹ̀dá rẹ̀ láàárín ẹ̀ka ìwádìí àti ìdàgbàsókè ti Ilé-Iṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Hyperspace, CipherKEY tap2sign™ MFA tí ó jẹ́ ohun ìdábòbò fún ìran tó ń bọ̀ tí a ṣe fún ìlò ni àgbò pípín agbára tí ó jẹ́ àdámọ́ Blockchain, ẹ̀ka ìjọba àti ti aládàníi tí ó dára fún kíkọ́-kóòdù àti ìrọ̀rùn ti NFC (Near Field Communication ) ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ láti pèsè ìdáàbò tí a kò gbọ́rí tí ó lòdì sí ohùn tí a dámọ̀ bí i olè jíjà, àti ìkọlù ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ titi àwùjọ.
zu: Isungulwe phakathi kwesigaba socwaningo nokuthuthukiswa kweHyperspace Technologies (iR&D), icipherKEY TAP2sign™ MFA iwuhlelo lokuphepha lwesizukulwane esilandelayo oludizayinelwe ukusiza uhlobo oluhlukanisiwe lweblockchain, ukuba namandla kwe-cryptography emqoka yomphakathi/ yangasese, kanye nokusebenziseka kalula kobuchwepheshe beNFC (Near Field Communication) ukuhlinzeka ngezinga elingakaze libonwe lokuphepha ngokumelene nokwebiwa kukamazisi, ukukhwabanisa, nokuhlaselwa kobunjiniyela bezenhlalo

am: ዶ/ር ኦሉሴይ አኪንዲንዴ የተጠቃሚውን ማንነት ለማረጋገጥ ከገለልተኛ የማረጋገጫ ምድቦች ከአንድ በላይ የማረጋገጫ ዘዴን የሚጠይቅ የደህንነት ስርዓትን ለማሻሻል የተዘጋጀው ይህ ኤምኤፍኤ(MFA) ፈጥሯል።
en: Dr. Oluseyi Akindeinde has been credited as the inventor of this MFA that is poised to enhance a security system that requires more than one method of authentication from independent categories of credentials to verify the user's identity.
ha: An jinjina wa Dr. Oluseyi Akindeinde a matsayin wanda ya ƙirƙiro manhajar MFA don inganta tsarin tsaro wanda yake buƙatar hanya fiye da ɗaya don tabbatar da ainahin mai amfani da intanet.
sw: Dkt. Oluseyi Akindeinde ametajwa kuwa mvumbuzi wa hii MFA ambayo ipo tayari kuimarisha mfumo wa usalama ambao unahitaji zaidi mbinu moja ya uthibitishaji kutoka vitengo huru vya vitambulisho ili kuthibitisha utambulisho wa mtumiaji.
yo: Wọ́n ti gbóríyìn fún Dókítà Oluseyi Akindeinde gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tó dá MFA tó gbogun tì, láti rú ọ̀nà ìdábòbò tó nílò jú ọgbọ́n kan ṣoṣo lọ láti dára nínú ipile òmìnira láti fi ontẹ̀ lé ìdánimọ̀ ẹni tó n lò ó.
zu: UDkt. Oluseyi Akindeinde waziswe njengomsunguli waleMFA ekulungele ukuthuthukisa uhlelo lokuphepha oludinga izindlela ezingaphezu kweyodwa zokuqinisekisa ezigabeni ezizimele zamakhredithi ukuqinisekisa uqobo lomsebenzisi.

am: የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት ማመልከቻው በይፋ የገባው ሰኔ 22 ቀን 2023 ሲሆን በሪፖርተራችን የታየው የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት ሰርተፍኬት እ.ኤ.አ በነሐሴ 28 ቀን 2023 መሰጠቱን ይጠቁማል።
en: The patent application was officially filed on June 22, 2023, and the patent certificate, sighted by our reporter, indicates that it was granted on August 28, 2023.
ha: Takardar neman mallakar an rubuta ta ne a hukumance ranar 22 ga watan Yuni 2023 kuma mai rahonmu ya hango satifiket din mallakar, wanda ya nuna cewa an ba da shi ne ranar 28 ga watan Ogustan 2023.
sw: Ombi la hatimiliki liliwasilishwa rasmi mnamo Juni 22, 2023, na cheti cha hatimiliki, kilichoonekana na mwandishi wetu, kinaonyesha kuwa kilikubaliwa mnamo Agosti 28, 2023.
yo: Àṣẹ náà láti máa jẹ́ kí ẹnikẹ́ni lo iṣẹ́ ẹni láì jẹ́ wí pé ó gba àṣẹ jẹ́ èyí tí ó dímímọ̀ ní 22 Oṣù Kẹfà, ọdún 2023, ìwé ẹ̀rí àṣẹ náà jẹ́ èyí tí aṣẹ̀ròyìn wa fojú gánní, èyí túmọ̀ sí wí pé wọ́n gbà á ní 28 Oṣù Kẹjọ, ọdún 2023.
zu: Isicelo selungelo lobunikazi safakwa ngokusemthethweni ngoNhlangulana 22, 2023, futhi isitifiketi selungelo lobunikazi, esabonwa yintatheli yethu, sibonisa ukuthi sakhishwa ngoNcwaba 28, 2023.

am: በዲጂታል ሽግግር እድሜ ደህንነት ወሳኝ ነው፡፡
en: In the age of digital transformation, security is paramount.
ha: A wannan zamani na fasahar sadarwa, tsaro yana da mahimmanci.
sw: Katika enzi ya mabadiliko ya kidigitali, usalama ni muhimu.
yo: Ní ayé tí gbogbo nnkan n yí padà yìí, ìdábòbò pọn dandan.
zu: Enkathini yoshintsho lwedijithali, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuvikeleka.

am: እንደ ግለሰብ ቢዝነስ እና አገር ከባንኪንግ እስከ ማህበራዊ አውታር ስራዎች እያንዳንዱ ነገር ዲጂታል መዋቅር ላይ ስለሚመሰረት ብቁ የደህንነት እርምጃዎች ፈጽሞ በጣም ወሳኝ ናቸው፡፡
en: As individuals, businesses and nations increasingly rely on digital platforms for everything from banking to social networking, the need for robust security measures has never been more critical.
ha: A matsayin ɗaiɗaikun mutane, kasuwanci da ƙasashe suna ƙara dogaro ga kafofin intanet domin kowane abu ya shafi harkar banki da zamantakewar al'umma, inda buƙatun inganta matakan tsaro ba su kasance tsaurara ba.
sw: Kwa watu binafsi, biashara na mataifa yanazidi kutegemea majukwaaa ya kidigitali kwa kila kitu kutoka benki hadi mitandao ya kijamii, hitaji la hatua thabiti za usalama halijawahi kuwa muhimu zaidi.
yo: Ní ẹnikọ̀ọ̀kan, okòwò àti orílẹ̀-èdè ń gbèrú látàrí gbígbé ara lé àwọn ìkànnì ayélujára fún gbogbo nǹkan láti ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó jẹmọ́ ilé ìfowópamọ́ sí ṣíṣe ohun tí ó jẹmọ́ orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára, ìlò fún ètò àbò tí ó dára kò tí ì tó èyí tí ó yẹ kí ó le jù báyìí lọ.
zu: Njengoba abantu, amabhizinisi namazwe bencika ngokwengeziwe ezinkundleni zedijithali kukho konke kusukela ebhange kuya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, isidingo sezinyathelo zokuphepha ezinamandla asikaze sibaluleke ukudlula manje.

am: የዚህ አይነት እርምጃ የበርካታ -ፋክተር ህጋዊነት ማረጋገጫ /ኤምኤፍኤም/ የደህንነት ሲስተም ለነጻ ምድብ የትምህርት ደረጃዎች የተጠቃሚዎችን ማንነት ለመለየት ከአንድ በላይ የህጋዊነት ማረጋገጫ ዘዴ ያስፈልገዋል፡፡
en: One such measure is Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), a security system that requires more than one method of authentication from independent categories of credentials to verify the user's identity.
ha: Ɗaya daga cikin matakan shi ne hanyar samar da tsaro ta intanet wacce take buƙatar hanya fiye da ɗaya don tabbatarwa da nagartar bayanai na ainahin mai amfani da intanet.
sw: Moja wapo ya hatua hizo ni uthibitishaji wa vipengele vingi (MFA), mfumo wa usalama ambao unahitaji zaidi ya mbinu moja ya uthibitishaji kutoka vitengo huru vya vitambulisho ili kuthibitisha utambulisho wa watumiaji.
yo: ìlànà ìdábòbò tó nílò ju ọgbọ́n kan lọ láti dára ni ọ̀nà tí ó máa gbà dá wà nípa àwọn nnkan láti fi òntẹ̀ lé ìdánimọ̀ ẹni tó n lò ó.
zu: Esinye isinyathelo esinjalo siyi-Multi-Factor Authentication (iMFA), uhlelo lokuphepha oludinga izindlela ezingaphezu kweyodwa zokuqinisekisa ezigabeni ezizimele zemininingwane yomuntu ukuze kuqinisekiswe uqobo lomsebenzisi.

am: ዛሬ፣ ሃይፐርስፔስ ሊሚትድ cipherKEYtap2sign™ አስተዋውቋል፣የህዝብ/የግል ቁልፎችን፣ብሎክቼይንን፣ዌብ3 ቴክኖሎጂን እና ንክኪ የለሽ Near Field Communication (NFC) ካርዶችን ደህንነት የሚጠቅም እጅግ አስደናቂ MFA ቴክኖሎጂ ነው።
en: Today, Hyperspace Limited has introduced cipherKEYtap2sign™, a groundbreaking MFA technology that leverages the security of public/private keys, blockchain, Web3 technology, and contactless Near Field Communication (NFC) cards.
ha: A yanzu, Kamfanin Hyperspace ya samar da 'chiperKeytap2sign', wato ɗaya daga cikin hanyoyin samar da tsaro, wanda yake tabbatar da kariya ga bayanan masu amfani da intanet, ta hanyar adana bayanan da sabuwar fasahar shafin intanet da kuma fasahar amfani da kati ta NFC.
sw: Leo, Hyperspace Limited imeanzisha cipherKEYtap2sign™, teknolojia ya msingi ya MFA ambayo huongeza usalama wa mambo ya umma/kibinafsi, blockchain, teknolojia ya Web3, na kadi za kielektroniki za Near Field communication (NFC).
yo: Lónìí, Hyperspace Limited tí jẹ́ kí CipherKEYtap2sign™ di mímọ̀, ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ MFA tí ó ń lo anfààní ìdábòbò ti ìjọba àti ti aládàníi, blockchain, Web3 technology, káàdì tí kò ṣe é súnmọ́ ti Near Field Communication (NFC).
zu: Namuhla, iHyperspace Limited yethule icipherKEYtap2sign™, ubuchwepheshe beMFA obuyisisekelo obusebenzisa ukuphepha kwezikhiye zomphakathi/zangasese, iblockchain, ubuchwepheshe beWeb3, namakhadi eNear Field Communication (iNFC) angathintiswa.

am: እሱም "የይዞታ ማረጋገጫ" ጽንሰ-ሐሳብ እና የማረጋገጫ አራተኛው ምክንያት - "የምትሠራው ነገር" ነው።
en: It utilizes the concept of "proof of possession" and a fourth factor of authentication - "something you do".
ha: Ana amfani da da kalmar "proof of procession" wato tabbacin mallaka da kuma abu na huɗu na gaskatawa " wani abu da kake".
sw: Inatumia dhana ya "uthibitisho wa kumiliki" na sababu ya nne ya uthibitishaji, "kitu unachofanya".
yo: Ó ń lo ohun tí a mọ̀ sí "ṣíṣe àfihàn ohun ìní rẹ " àti ohun kẹrin tí ó wà fún ìfaṣẹsí -"ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe ".
zu: Isebenzisa umqondo "wobufakazi bokuba nokuthile" kanye nesici sesine sokuqinisekisa - "into oyenzayo".

am: በcipherKEY tap2sign™ ላይ፣ " ያለህ ነገር" የ cipherKEY NFC ካርድ ነው፣ እና "የምታደርገው ነገር" የ cipherKEY NFC ካርድ በስልክህ ላይ የመንካት ተግባር ነው።
en: In the case of cipherKEY tap2sign™, "something you have" is the cipherKEY NFC card, and "something you do" is the action of tapping the cipherKEY NFC card against your phone.
ha: Dangane da cipherKEY tap2sign™ " wani abu da kake da shi'' ne cipher KEY NFC card da kuma "abun da kake yi" shi ne aikin danna katin cipherKEY NFC a wayar hannunka.
sw: Kwa upande wa cipherKEY tap2sign™, "kitu ilichonacho" ni kadi ya cipherKEY NFC, na "jambo unalofanya" ni kitendo cha kugusa kadi ya cipherKEY NFC kwenye simu yako.
yo: Nípa cipherkEY tap2sign, nnkan to ní ni káàdì cipherKEY NFC àti nnkan tó ṣe ni ìgbésẹ̀ títẹ káàdì cipherKEY NFC lòdì sí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀.
zu: Endabeni yecipherKEY TAP2sign™, "into onayo" yikhadi lecipherKEY NFC, futhi "into oyenzayo" isenzo sokuthepha ikhadi lecipherKEY NFC ocingweni lwakho.

am: ይህ ልዩ ቅልቅል ነጥብ ታፕ 2 ምልክትን ሲስተም ላይ በከፍተኛ ደረጃ ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ እና ተጠቃሚ ተግባቢ ያደርገዋል፡፡
en: This unique combination of factors makes thetap2sign™ system incredibly secure and user-friendly.
ha: Waɗannan gamin gambizar na abubuwa su suka sa tsarin tap2sign ya zama amintacce kuma mai sauƙin amfani ga masu amfani da intanet.
sw: Mchanganyiko huu wa kipekee wa vipengele hufanya mfumo wa tap2sign kuwa salama sana na hufaa kwa watumiaji.
yo: Àkọ́pọ̀ àwọn ohun tí ó dára tí ó ṣe ètò tap2sign™ mú u kí ó ní àbò, ó sì fa àwọn tí ń lò ó mọ́ra.
zu: Le nhlanganisela yezici eziyingqayizivele yenza uhlelo lwetap2sign™ luphephe ngendlela emangalisayo futhi lusebenziseke kalula.

am: ፓተንቱን ከማግኘቱ በፊት ብሎክ ቼን ቴክኖሎጂ -መር ኤምኤፍኤ ቀጣይ የሆነ ክለሳ እና ምርመራዎች ነበሩት፡፡
en: Before securing the patent, the Blockchain technology-driven MFA was subjected to rigorous reviews and tests.
ha: Kafin samun sahhalewa, sai da tsarin fasahar adana bayanai ta bi matakan sauye-sauye da gwaji.
sw: Kabla ua kupata hatimiliki, MFA inayoendeshwa na teknolojia ya blockchain ilifanyiwa ukaguzi na majaribio makali.
yo: Kí a tó gba àṣẹ tí kì í mú ẹlòmíràn lo iṣẹ́ ẹni láì jẹ́ wí pé ó gba àṣẹ, ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ Blockchain MFA jẹ́ èyí tí ó wà lábẹ́ àyẹ̀wò àti ìdáranwò tí ó le.
zu: Ngaphambi kokuvikela ilungelo lobunikazi, i-MFA eqhutshwa ubuchwepheshe beBlockchain yayibhekane nokubuyekezwa kanye nokuhlolwa ngamandla.

am: ዶ/ር አኪንዲንዲ ይህን ኤምኤፍኤ የመፍጠር መነሳሳት ለብሎክ ቼ ቴክኖሎጂ - መር ህጋዊነት ማረጋገጫ ሂደት ቅስቀሳው የመነጨ ነው፡፡
en: Dr. Akindeinde’s inspiration for creating this MFA stemmed from his advocacies for blockchain technology-driven authentication processes.
ha: Abin da ya sa Dakta Akinlade ya ƙirƙirar wannan manhaja ta MFA ya samo asali ne daga goyon bayan da yake yi wa tsarin fasahar tabbatar da matakan adana bayanai kai-tsaye.
sw: Msukumo wa Dkt. Akindeinde wa kuunda hii MFA uluotokana na utetzi wake kwa michakato ya uthibitishaji inayoendeshwa na teknolojia ya blockchain.
yo: Ìmísí Dókítà Akíndèìndé fún ṣíṣẹ̀dá MFA wá láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn álàgbáwi rẹ̀ fún blockchain tí ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ń wá àwọn ìlànà ìfaṣẹsí rẹ̀.
zu: Ugqozi lukaDkt. Akindeinde lokusungula leMFA luvela ekumeleni kwakhe izinqubo zokuqinisekisa eziqhutshwa ubuchwepheshe beblockchain.

am: የእኛ ዲጂታል ማንነት በከፍተኛ ደረጃ እንደ ስጋት እየጨመረ ባለበት አለም አንድ ትክክለኛ ያልሆነ እርምጃ የእርስዎን አጠቃላይ አውታር ጥያቄ ውሰጥ በመጣል እያንዳንዱ የምንፈጽመው ግብይት ያልተጋለጥን የሚያደርግ ሲሆን የእርስዎን አቋም እንረዳለን፡፡
en: “In a world where our digital identities are increasingly under threat, where a single misstep can compromise your entire network, where every transaction we make leaves us vulnerable, we understand your concern.
ha: A duniyar da tsarin fayyace sahihan bayananmu ta intanet na ci gaba da fuskantar barazana,inda kuskure ɗaya kan dagula gaba ɗayan lissafin haɗakar intanet, wanda duk wata hada-hadar kuɗin da muka yi kan bar mu cikin taraddadi, mun fahimci damuwarka.
sw: "Katika ulimwengu ambapo utambulisho wetu na kidigitali unazidi kutishiwa, ambapo hatua moja mbaya inaweza kuathiri mtandao wao wote, ambapo kila muamala tunaofanya hutuacha hatarini, tunaelewa wasiwasi wako.
yo: "Ayé tí ìdánimọ̀ wa lori ayélujára ti wà lábẹ́ ìdúkokò mọ́, tí ìṣiṣẹ̀ gbé kan yóò mú.
zu: “Ezweni lapho omazisi bethu bedijithali besenkingeni enkulu, lapho okungahambi kahle okukodwa kungafaka engozini yonke inethiwekhi yakho, lapho konke ukuthengiselana esikwenzayo kusishiya sisengozini, siyakuqonda ukukhathazeka kwakho.

am: እንቅልፍ አልባ ምሽቶችን እንረዳለን
en: We understand the sleepless nights.
ha: Mun fahimci rashin barci.
sw: Tunaelewa usiku usio na usingi.
yo: Òye yé wa lórí àwọn ọjọ́ àìsùn.
zu: Siyaqonda ukungakwazi ukulala.

am: እና ለዚያም ነው cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA - ለደህንነት ስጋቶች የእርስዎን አይረንክላድ መፍትሄ በማዘጋጀት አመታትን ያሳለፍነው።
en: And that's why we've spent years developing cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA - your ironclad solution to security threats.
ha: Kuma hakan ne ya sa muka shafe shekaru da yawa muna ƙoƙarin samar da cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA- wadda ingantacciyar hanya ce ta samar da tsaro.
sw: Na ndiyo maana tumetumia miaka mingi kuitengeneza cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA, suluhu yako ya matishio ya usalama.
yo: Ìdí dẹ̀ nìyẹn tí a fi lo ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọdún láti ṣe cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA - irin ojútùú rẹ fún ìdúkokò mọ́ ààbò.
zu: Futhi yingakho sichithe iminyaka sithuthukisa i-cipherKEYtap2sign™ MFA - isixazululo sakho se-ironclad sezinsongo zokuphepha.

am: አንድን ግድግዳ አስበው
en: “Imagine a wall.
ha: Ɗauki misalin katanga.
sw: Fikiria uzio.
yo: Ẹ wòye odi.
zu: “Cabanga ngodonga.

am: በጣም ከፍ ያለ እና በጣም ጠንካራ የሆነ ግድግዳ፣ምንም ያልተፈቀደ ነገር ፣ በእሱ ስር ወይም በእሱ በኩል ሊያልፍ አይችልም።
en: A wall so high and so robust, nothing unauthorized can get over it, under it, or through it.
ha: Katanga mai tsayi da kauri sosai, babu wani abu da ba na ƙa'ida ba da zai iya tsallake ta, ko ya bi ta ƙasanta ko kuma ya ratsa ta cikinta.
sw: Ukuta mrefu sana na imara, hakuna kitu kisichoidhinishwa kinachoweza kupita, au kupitia.
yo: Odi èyí tí ó ga, ohunkóhun tí a kò fún láṣẹ kó lè kọjá rẹ̀, gba abẹ́ rẹ̀, tàbí inú rẹ̀.
zu: Udonga oluphakeme kakhulu nolunamandla, akukho lutho olungagunyaziwe olungadlula kulo, ngaphansi kwalo, noma ngalo.

am: ያ ግድግዳ የ cipherKEY tap2sign™ MFA ነው፣ እና ለእርስዎ በጣም አስፈላጊ የሆኑትን - የእርስዎን ማንነት፣ ውሂብ፣ የአእምሮ ሰላም ለመጠበቅ ነው የነደፍነው” ሲል ተናግሯል።
en: That wall is the cipherKEY tap2sign™ MFA, and we've designed it to protect what matters most to you - your identity, your data, your peace of mind”, he said.
ha: Ya ce, Wannan katangar ita ce cipher KEY tap2sign™ MFA, kuma mun tsara ta domin ba ka kariya - mabayyanarka da bayananka da kwanciyar hankalinka.".
sw: Ukuta huo ni cipherKEYtapesign™ MFA, na tumeuunda ili kulinda kile amabcho ni muhimu zaidi kwako, utambulisho wako, taarifa zako, amani yako ya akili" alisema.
yo: Odi náà ni cipherKEY tap2sign™ MFA, tí a ti ṣètò láti dáàbò bo ohun tí ó bá ṣe pàtàkì si ìwọ jùlọ-ìdánimọ̀ rẹ, dátà rẹ, ìfòkànbalẹ̀ rẹ ", ló sọ.
zu: Lolo donga luyicipherKEY TAP2sign™ MFA, futhi siluhlelele ukuvikela okubaluleke kakhulu kuwe - uqobo lwakho, imininingo yakho, ukuthula kwengqondo yakho ”, kusho yena.

am: ጠላፊወች 691ሺህ ዶላር ለመስረቅ የኢተርየም መስራችን የኤክስ(X) መለያን ይጠቀማሉ።
en: Hackers use Ethereum founder's X account to steal $691k
ha: Masu kutse a cikin bayanan mutane a internet sun yi amfani da shafin Ethereum Founder na don su saci Dala 691.
sw: Wadukuzi hutumia akaunti ya X ya mwanzilishi wa Ethereum kuiba $691k
yo: Àwọn ọlọ́ṣà lo ojú-òpó X ti olùdásílẹ̀ Ethereum láti jí $691k
zu: Abaduni basebenzisa i-akhawunti yeX yomsunguli we-Ethereum ukweba izigidi ezingu-$691

am: ሰላም ጓዶች፣ የዛሬው የቴክፖይንት ዳይጀስት አቅራቢያችሁ እኔ ቦሉ ነኝ፣ ምክኒያቱም የዘወትር አቅራቢያችሁ ቪክቶሪያ ፣ ትንሽ ህመም ስላጋጠማት ነው።
en: Hello guys, today's Techpoint Digest will be coming from me, Bolu, as your usual host, Victoria, is under the weather.
ha: Sannunku jama'a, a yau bayanan Techpoint za su zo ne daga gareni, Bolu, a matsayin mai gabatarwa na koyaushe, Victoria kuma ba ta jin daɗi .
sw: Humjambo, Techpoint Digest ya leo itakuwa kutoka kwangu, Bolu, kwani menyekiti wenu wa kawaida, Victor, amepata changamoto.
yo: Ẹ kú déédé ìwòyí ẹ̀yin ènìyàn, àlàyé Techpoint tòní yóò máa wáyé láti ọwọ́ mi, Bólú, olùdarí-ètò yín tí ẹ ti mọ̀ bí ẹni mowó ojú ọjọ́ ń ṣe ìdíwọ́ fún Victoria.
zu: Sanibonani bakwethu, iTechpoint Digest yanamuhla izobe ivela kimina, uBolu, njengoba ovame ukusingatha uhlelo, uVictoria, engazizwa kahle empilweni.

am: የቲኤፍኤክስ መውደቅ 32 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ክሪፕቶ ልውውጥ አንዱ በጣም መጥፎ የሆነ ክስተት ነው፡፡
en: The fall of FTX, a $32 billion crypto exchange, was one of the worst things to happen to crypto.
ha: Da rushewar tsarin FTX, tsarin canjin kuɗin Kirifto na Dala biliyan 32 shi ne abu mafi muni da ya faru ga hada-hadar Kuɗin Kirifto.
sw: Kuanguka kwa FTX, ubadilishanaji wa crypto wa bilioni $32, ilikuwa moja ya mambo mabaya zaidi kutokea kwa crypto.
yo: Ìsubú FTX, tí ó jẹ́ pàsípààrọ̀ owó kíríbò(crypto) bílíọ̀nù lọ́gbọ̀n ọgbọ̀n owó dọ́là ilẹ̀-okèèrè, jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú ohun tí ó burú jù lọ tií ó láti ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ìsòwò owó-ayélujára(Crypto).
zu: Ukuwa kweFTX, ukushintshwa kwe-crypto okuyizigidigidi ezingu-$32, kwakungenye yezinto ezimbi kakhulu ezenzeka kucrypto.

am: ለኤፍቲኤክስ(FTX) ውድቀት ተጠያቂው ሰው - ሳም ባንክማን-ፍሪድ - እሱ ያለበት የፌዴራል እስር ቤት ኢንተርኔት መጥፎ ነው ሲል ከእስር ቤት መውጣት ይፈልጋል።
en: The man responsible for FTX's fall — Sam Bankman-Fried — wants to get out of jail because he says the Internet in the federal jail he is in is bad.
ha: Mutumin da yake da alhakin rashewar FTX shi ne Sam Bankman-Fried --- wanda ke son ya fito daga gidan yari saboda ya ce intanet ɗin gidan yarin tarayya ba shi da kyau.
sw: Mtu aliyehusika na anguko la FTX, Sam Bankmao Fried, anataka kutolewa jela kwa sababu anasema intaneti katika jela hiyo aliyomo ni changamoto.
yo: Ọkùnrin tí ó ṣe okùnfà ìsubú FTX— Sam Bankman-Fried — fẹ́ jáde kúrò lẹ́wọ̀n nítorí pé ó ṣọ pé ìtàkùn ayélujára ní olú-ìlú ni kò dára tó.
zu: Indoda eyimbangela yokuwa kweFTX — uSam Bankman-Fried — ufuna ukuphuma ejele ngoba uthi i-inthanethi ayisebenzi kahle ejele likahulumeni.

am: የእሱ ጠበቆች እንደሚሉት ችሎት ከመቅረቡ በፊት መለቀቅ አለበት ምክንያቱም ለእሱ ጥሩ መከላከያ ለማዘጋጀት ፈጣን የኢንተርኔት ግንኙነት ያስፈልጋቸዋል።
en: His lawyers say he needs a pre-trial release because they need a fast Internet connection to prepare a good defence for him.
ha: Lauyoyinsa sun ce yana buƙatar sakin talala saboda suna buƙatar haɗakar yanar gizo mai sauri domin shirya masa matakan kariya ƙwarara.
sw: Mawakili wake wanasema anahitaji kuachiliwa kabla ya kesi kwa sababu wanahitaji muunganisho wa intaneti wa haraka ili kuandaa utetezi mzuri kwa ajili yake.
yo: Àwọn agbẹjọ́rò rẹ̀ ṣàlàyé pé ó nílò ìtúsílẹ̀ sáájú ìwádìí nítorí pé wọ́n nílò ìtàkùn ayélujárá tí ó jáfáfá láti ṣètò ààbò tí ó dárá fún-un.
zu: Abameli bakhe bathi udinga ukukhululwa ngaphambi kokuqulwa kwecala ngoba badinga uxhumano lwe-inthanethi olusheshayo ukuze balungiselele ukumvikela kahle.

am: በየሳምንቱ ከጡዋቱ 2 ሰአት እስከ ቀኑ 11 ሰአት ድረስ ላፕቶፕ እንደሚያገኝ ቃል ተገብቶለትለት የነበረ ሲሆን በቢሊዮን የሚቆጠር ዶላር የሚገመት የደንበኞችን ገንዘብ በመገበያየት እና በማጣት ላይ ያለ ሰው ነው።
en: Turns out he was promised access to a laptop every weekday from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., a man responsible for traded and lost customer funds worth billions of dollars.
ha: Bayanan da suka fito an alƙawarta masa samun kwamfuta ta kan cinya a kowane sati daga ƙarfe 8 na safe zuwa 7 na yamma, mutumin da ya janyo harƙalla da ɓatan kuɗin abokin harka da suka kai biliyoyin Daloli.
sw: Ilibainika kuwa aliahidiwa kupata tanakirishi mpakato kila siku ya juma kuanzia saa 8am hadi 7pm, mtu aliyehusika na biashara na kupoteza fedha wa wateja zenye thamani ya mamilioni ya dola.
yo: Yípadà pwé ó ti ṣe ìlérí láti ní àǹfààní sí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàsá ní gbogbo ọjọ́ láti aago mẹ́jọ òwúrọ̀ sí méje alẹ́, ọkùnrin kan tí ó ṣe okòòwò àti ṣíṣe okùnfa bí owó àwọn oníbàárà ṣe pàdánù èyí tí ó tó ọ̀kẹ́-àìmọye bílíọ̀nú dọ́là.
zu: Kuvela ukuthi wathenjiswa ukwazi ukusebenzisa ilaptop njalo phakathi nesonto kusukela ngo-8 ekuseni kuya ku-7 ntambama, indoda enesibopho sokuhweba nokulahlekelwa izimali kwamakhasimende okubiza ama-billion ama-dollar.

am: ጠላፊዎች እንዴት $691k በ ኢተርየም መስራች X መለያ ሰረቁ።
en: How hackers stole $691k with Ethereum founder's X account.
ha: Yadda 'yan dandatsa suka sace Dala 691 daga shafin X na Ethereum founder.
sw: Jinsi wadukuzi walivyoiba $691k kwa kutumia akaunti ya X ya mwanzilishi wa Ethereum.
yo: Bí àwọn ọlọ́sà ṣe jí $691k pẹ̀lú ojú-òpó X ti olùdásílẹ̀ Ethereum.
zu: Indlela abaduni abantshontsha ngayo izigidi ezingu-$691 nge-akhawunti yeX yomsunguli we-Ethereum.

am: ኢንተርስዊች አሁን ጎግልፔይ ይደግፋል፡፡
en: Interswitch now supports Google Pay.
ha: Interswitch (Kanfanin kasuwanci da biyan kuɗi ta yanar gizo da ya ke da hedkwata a Legas) yana yi da Google Pay (Hanyar biyan da kuma aikawa da kuɗi ta Gwagul).
sw: Interswitch sasa inaisaidia Google Pay.
yo: Ẹ̀rọ Interswitch báyìí ti ń bá ẹ̀rọ Google Pay ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: I-Interswitch isekela iGoogle Pay manje.

am: ፍሉተዌቭ የናይጄሪያን ኤፍኤክስ ችግሮች መፍታት ይፈልጋል፡፡
en: Flutterwave wants to solve Nigeria's FX problems.
ha: Kanfanin Flutterwave yana son magance matsalolin 'yan Nageriya na hadahadar Kiripto.
sw: Flutterwave inataka kutatua matatizo ya FX ya Nigeria.
yo: Flutterwave fẹ lati yanju awọn iṣoro FX ti Nigeria.
zu: IFlutterwave ifuna ukuxazulula izinkinga zeFX yaseNigeria.

am: ሀከሮች በኢትሪየም መስራቾች ኤክስ አካውንት 691,000 ዶላር ሰረቁ፡፡
en: Hackers steal $691k with Ethereum founder's X account
ha: Masu kutse a cikin bayanan mutane a intanet sun saci Dala dubu 691 daga shafin Ethereum Founder na X.
sw: Wadukuzi waliiba $691k wakitumia akaunti ya X ya mwanzilishi wa Ethereum
yo: Àwọn ọlọ́sà jí $691k pẹ̀lú ojú òpó X ti olùdásílẹ̀ Ethereum
zu: Abaduni bantshontsha izigidi ezingu-$691 nge-akhawunti ye-X yomsunguli we-Ethereum.

am: ሪታሊክ ቡትሪን የብሎክ ቼን ኔትዎርክ መስራች ኢትሪየም የማህበራዊ መገናኛ ተጠቂ ሲሆን ይህም 691,000 ዶላር ስርቆት አስከትሏል፡፡
en: Vitalik Buterin, the founder of blockchain network, Ethereum was a victim of a social media hack that led to the theft of $691,000.
ha: Vitalik Buterin, Wanda ya samar da fasahar adana bayanan kwamfuta kai tsaye, Ethereum wanda ya sha wahala ne a hannun masu satar bayanai na intanet a dandalin sada zumunta wanda ya haddasa satar kuɗi har Dala 691,000.
sw: Vitalik Buterio, mwanzilishi wa mtandao wa blockchain, Ethereum ilikuwa muathirika wa udukuzi wa mitandao ya kijamii ambao ulisababisha wizi wa $691,000.
yo: Vitalik Buterin, olùdásílẹ̀ blockchain Network, Ethereum jẹ́ olùfaragbá ìjàm̀bá ayélujára èyí tí ó sokùnfa jíjí owó dọ́là $ 691, 000.
zu: UVitalik Buterin, umsunguli wenethiwekhi yeblockchain, i-Ethereum ube yisisulu sokudunwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okuholele ekuntshontshweni kuka-$691,000.

am: ሀከሮች ቅዳሜ እ.ኤ.አ 2023፣ መስከረም 9፣ የ X (የቀድሞ ትዊተር) መለያውን ማግኘት ችለዋል ፣ እና በ4.9 ሚሊዮን ተከታዮቹ የታዩ የፊሽንግ ሊንኮችን ለጥፈዋል።
en: Hackers gained access to his X (formerly Twitter) account, on Saturday, September 9, 2023, and posted phishing links seen by his 4.9 million followers.
ha: Masu kutse a bayanan mutane a internet sun samu nasarar shiga kanfaninsa me suna X ( wanda a da ake kiran sa da Twitter), ranar Asabar, a watan tara a shekara ta alif dubu biyu da ashirin da uku kuma suka watsa mahaɗar adreshin shafin yanar gizo na damfara wanda mabiyansa miliyan huɗu da ɗigo tara suka gani.
sw: Wadukuzi walipata ufikiaji wa akaunti yake ya X (zamani Twitter), Jumamosi, Septemba 9, 2023, na kuchapisha viungo vya kuhadaa ili kupata maelezo ya kibinafsi vilivyoonwa na wafuasi wake milioni 4.9.
yo: Àwọn ọlọ́sà tí ní àǹfààní sí ojú-òpó X rẹ̀ (Twitter tẹ́lẹ̀) ní Sátidé, oṣù kẹsàn-án ọdún 2023, tí wọ́n sì fi ojú-òpó aṣebi ránṣẹ́ èyí àwọn olólùfẹ́ mílíọ̀nù mẹ́sàn-án àti ìdá mẹ́sàn-án rí.
zu: Abaduni bakwazi ukungena ku-akhawunti yakhe yeX (eyayiyiTwitter), ngoMgqibelo, ngoMandulo 9, wezi-2023, futhi bathumela amalinki okulutha (phishing) abonwa abalandeli bakhe abayizigidi ezingu-4.9.

am: እንደ አለመታደል ሆኖ፣ አንዳንድ ሰዎች ነፃ ልዩ እና ሊተካ የማይችል (NFT) የሚመስለውን ሊንክ ነክተውታል።
en: Unfortunately, some people clicked the link that was disguised as a free non-fungible token (NTF).
ha: A rashin sa'a, wasu mutane sun samar wata mahaɗa wadda ke sojan gona a matsayin samun kyautar halastaccen ɗan kuɗin taɓawa.
sw: Kwa bahati mbaya, baadhi ya watu walibofya kiungo ambacho kilifichwa kama tokeni isiyolipishwa isiyoweza kuvu (NTF).
yo: Ó ṣeni láànú pé ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn ni ó tọwọ́ bọ ìkànì tí ó dẹmọ bí ẹ̀rọ aṣèdámọ̀-owó.
zu: Ngeshwa, abanye abantu bachofoza ilinki eyayifihlwe njenge-non-fungible token yamahhala (iNTF).

am: የኪስ ቦርሳቸውን ከኤንኤፍቲ ጋር ሲያገናኙ የእነርሱ ክሪፕቶ ባላንስ ተወስዷል።
en: When they connected their wallets to mint the NFT, their crypto balance was drained.
ha: Yayin da suka haɗa lalitarsu domin sanya kuɗin na NTF, balas ɗinsu na kirifto sai ya ƙaru.
sw: Walipounganisha waleti zao ili kutengeneza NTF, salio lao la kripto liliisha.
yo: Nigba ti wọn ba so awọn apamọwọ wọn pọ si mint NFT, iwọntunwọnsi crypto wọn ti bajẹ.
zu: Lapho bexhuma izikhwama zabo zemali ukuze bathole iNFT, ikwakhishwa imali yakho eyayisele yecrypto.

am: ጠላፊዎች ክሪፕቶ ለመስረቅ ታዋቂ የX መለያዎችን ሲጠቀሙ ይህ የመጀመሪያው አይደለም።
en: This isn't the first time hackers are using popular X accounts to steal crypto.
ha: Wannan ba shi ne karo na farko da masu kutsen na'ura suke amfani da asusun X ba na shahararrun mutane domin yin satar kirifto.
sw: Hiisi mara ya kwanza kwa wadukuzi kutumia akaunti maarufu za X kuiba crypto.
yo: Eyi kii ṣe igba akọkọ ti awọn olosa nlo awọn ojú-òpó X olokiki lati ji crypto.
zu: Akukhona okokuqala abaduni besebenzisa ama-akhawunti anedumela eX ukuze bantshontshe icrypto.

am: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2020 ፣ የ18 ዓመቱ ወጣት እንደ ቀድሞው የአሜሪካ ፕሬዝዳንት ፣ ባራክ ኦባማ ፣ ቴስላ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ፣ ኢሎን ማስክ እና የማይክሮሶፍት መስራች ቢል ጌትስ ያሉ ታዋቂ ሰዎችን የ X መለያ መዝረፍ ችሏል።
en: In 2020, an 18-year old was able to hack the X accounts of prominent figures like former US President, Barack Obama, Tesla CEO, Elon Musk and, Microsoft Founder, Bill Gates.
ha: a shekarar 2020, ɗan shekara 18 ya iya yin kutsen asusun mashahuran mutane kamar tsohon shugaban ƙasar Amurka Barack Obama da shugaban kamfanin Telsa da Elon Musk da kuma shugaban kamfanin makirosoft Bill Gates.
sw: Mnamo 2020, mtoto wa miaka 18 aliweza kudukua akaunti X za watu mashuhuri kama vile Rais wa zamani wa Marekani, Barack Obama, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Tesla, Elon Musk na, mwanzilishi wa Microsaft, Bill Gates.
yo: Ni ọdún 2020, ọmọ ọdún 18 ní àǹfàaní láti dorí ojú-òpó X àwọn olókìíkí èèyàn bí i Alákòóso Amẹ́ríkà tẹ́lẹ̀, Barrack Obama, aláṣẹ àti olùdarí (CEO) Tesla, Elon Musk àti, Olùdásílẹ̀ Microsoft, Bill Gates rú.
zu: Ngo-2020, oneminyaka eyi-18 yobudala wakwazi ukugenca kuma-akhawunti eX abantu abavelele abanjengowayenguMongameli wase-US, uBarack Obama, iTesla CEO, u-Elon Musk noMsunguli weMicrosoft, uBill Gates.

am: ጠላፊው የላኩትን በእጥፍ ለማሳደግ ቃል በመግባት ከህዝቡ ገንዘብ ጠይቋል።
en: The hacker solicited funds from the public, promising to double whatever they sent.
ha: Mai kutsen ya samu kuɗi daga mutane yana mai alƙawarin zai ruɓanya har sau biyu duk abun da suka tura masa.
sw: Mdukuzi huyo aliomba pesa kutoka kwa umma, na kuahidi kuongeza mara dufu kila watachotuma.
yo: Ọlọ́sà náà bèèrè owó láti ọ̀dọ̀ gbogbo ènìyàn, ó ṣe ìlérí láti ṣe ìlọ́po méjì ohunkóhun tí wọ́n fi ránṣẹ́.
zu: Lo mduni wacela izimali emphakathini, ethembisa ukuphinda kabili noma yini abayithumele.

am: እሱ ሆኖም ተይዞ 3 አመት እስራት ተፈርዶበታል፡፡
en: He was, however, caught and sentenced to three years in jail.
ha: kodayake, an kama shi kuma aka yanke masa hukuncin zaman gidan yari na shekara uku.
sw: Hata hivyo, alikamatwa na kuhukumiwa kifungo cha miaka mitatu jela.
yo: Àmọ́, wọ́n mú un, wọ́n sì rán an lọ sẹ́wọ̀n ọdún mẹ́ta.
zu: Nokho, wabanjwa futhi wagwetshwa iminyaka emithathu ebhadla ejele.

am: ኢነተርስዊች አሁን ጎግል ፔይን ይደግፋል፡፡
en: Interswitch now supports Google Pay
ha: Kamfanin Interswitch yanzu yana tallafawa Google Pay.
sw: Interswitch sasa inaisaidia Google Pay
yo: Interswitch báyìí ń ṣe àtìlẹyìn Google Pay
zu: I-Interswitch isekela iGoogle Pay manje.

am: ጎግል ፔይ አሁን በኢንተርስዊች ክፍያ ጌትዌይ (IPG) ላይ የክፍያ አማራጭ ነው።
en: Google Pay is now a payment option on the Interswitch Payment Gateway (IPG).
ha: Google Pay ( Hanyar Biyan da Kuma Aikawa da Kuɗi ta Gwagul) yanzu ta zama zaɓi a kanfanin kasuwanci da biyan kuɗi na Interswitch Payment Gateway(IPG).
sw: Google Pay sasa ni chaguo la malipo kwenye Interswitch Payment Gateway (IPG).
yo: Google Pay jẹ̀ àṣàyàn ìsanwó ni báyìí lórí Ọ̀nà Ìsanwó Interswitch (IPG).
zu: IGoogle Pay manje isiyindlela yokukhokha ku-Interswitch Payment Gateway (i-IPG).

am: ኢንተርስዊች ዛሬ በመስከረም 11/2023 እ.ኤ.አ በሰጠው መግለጫ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ቢዝነሶች እና ግለሰቦች ቀላል ከሆነው እና ቁጥር የለሸ ክፍያዎች እና የዲጂታል ማከማቻ ተጠቃሚ ይሆናሉ፡፡
en: Interswitch made the announcement today, September 11, 2023, saying businesses and individuals in Nigeria will benefit from the "simplicity and security of contactless payments and digital storage."
ha: IntersWitch ya bada sanarwa yau, 11 ga watan Satumba, shekara ta alif dubu biyu da ashirin da uku, yana faɗar cewa harkokin kasuwanci da mutane za su anfana a Najeriya daga "sauƙin tare da aminci na biyan kuɗi da kuma ajye su a internet.
sw: Interswitch imetoa tangazo hilo leo, Septemba 11, 2023, ikisema biashara na watu binafsi nchini Nigeria watafaidika kutokana na "usahili na usalama wa malipo ya kielektroniki na hifanya ya kidigitali".
yo: Interswitch ṣe ìkéde náà lónìí, 11 Oṣù Kẹsàn-án, Ọdún 2023, pé àwọn ìṣòwò àti àwọn ènìyàn kọ̀ọ̀kan ní Nàìjíríà yóò ní àǹfààní láti “ní ìrọ̀rùn àti ààbò tí àwọn ìsanwó tí kò ní olùbásọ̀rọ̀ àti ibi ìpamọ́ oní-nọ́ńbà.”
zu: I-Interswitch yenze lesi simemezelo namhlanje, ngoMandulo 11, wezi-2023, ithi amabhizinisi kanye nabantu baseNigeria bazozuza "ekubeni lula nasekuphepheni kokukhokha ngaphandle kokuxhumana kanye nokokugcina kwedijithali."

am: ይህ ምን ማለትነው?
en: What does this mean?
ha: Me wannan yake nufi?
sw: Hii ina maana gani?
yo: Kí ni eléyìí túmọ̀ sí?
zu: Ngabe kusho ukuthini lokhu?

am: ይህ ማለት የእርስዎን ኤቲኤም ካርድ ዝርዝሮች መጽሀፍ ሳያስፈልግዎ በአይፒጂ የኢንተርኔት ክፍያ ሲፈልጉ መጻፍ አይጠበቅብዎትም፡፡
en: This means you don't have to go through the hassle of typing your ATM card details whenever you want to make an online payment through IPG.
ha: Wannan yana nufin ba lalle ba ne sai ka yi ta wahalar rubuta bayanan katin ka na ATM ba duk lokacin da ka ke so ka yi harkar biyan kuɗi ta IPG ba.
sw: Hii ina maana kwamba hauhitaji kupitia tabu ya kuandika maelezo ya kadi yako ya ATM wakati wowote unapotaka kufanya malipo ya mtandaoni kupitia IPG.
yo: Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé o kò ní láti lọ nípasẹ̀ wàhálà ti títẹ àwọn àlàyé káàdì ATM rẹ nígbàkúùgbà tí o bá fẹ́ sanwó orí ayélujára nípasẹ̀ IPG.
zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi akudingeki ubhekane nobunzima bokuthayipha imininingwane yekhadi lakho le-ATM noma nini lapho ufuna ukukhokha ku-inthanethi nge-IPG.

am: እንዴት ይሰራል?
en: How does it work?
ha: To, yaya ya ke aiki?
sw: Inafanyaje kazi?
yo: Báwo ni o ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́?
zu: Isebenza kanjani?

am: ጎግል ፔይ በመሰረቱ የእርስዎን የካርድ ዝርዝር ሴቭ በማድረግ የኢንተርኔት ግብይትዎን ህጋዊ ላድረግ ቀላል መንገድ ይሆናል፡፡
en: Google Pay basically saves your card details and provides an easy way for you to authenticate online transactions.
ha: Hanyar Biya da aikawa da kuɗi ta Gwagul ta ainahin kare bayanaka na katinka na ATM kuma tana samar maka da hanya me sauƙi ta tabbatar da sahihancin harkokin kuɗi na internet.
sw: Google Pay kimsingi inahifadhi maelezo ya kadi yako na kukupa njia raihisi kuthibitisha miamala ya mtandaoni.
yo: Google Pay pilẹ̀ máa ń ṣàfipamọ́ àwọn àlàyé káàdì rẹ láti pèsè ọ̀nà tí ó rọrùn fún ọ láti jẹ́rìí àwọn ìṣòwò orí ayélujára.
zu: IGoogle Pay empeleni igcina imininingwane yekhadi lakho futhi inikeza indlela elula yokuba uqinisekise ukuthengiselana ku-inthanethi.

am: ለምሳሌ ጎግልፔይ ላይ የካርድ ዝርዝሮቼ አለኝ በማንኛውም ወቅት ለስራ ስጠራ ለአዲስ ሽጉጥ መክፈት ስፈልግ በታት አሻራዬ ብቻ ክፍያውን አረጋግታለሁ፡፡
en: For example, I already have my card details on Google Pay, so anytime I need to pay for a new gun on Call of Duty, I just confirm payment with my fingerprint.
ha: Misali, tuni ina da bayanan katina na ATM a cikin tsarin biyan da aikawa da kuɗi na Gwagul, don haka duk lokacin da na ke da buƙatar biyan kuɗin sabuwar bidiga don aikin na gaggawa, kawai zan tabbatar da biyan kuɗin ne ta hanyar yin anfani da zanen tafin hannuna.
sw: Kwa mfano, tayari nina maelezo ya kadi yangu kwenye Google Pay, kwa hiyo wakati wowote ninahitaji kulipia bunduki mpya kwenye Call of Duty, ninathibitisha tu malipo kwa kutumia alama yangu ya kidole.
yo: Fún àpẹẹrẹ, mo tin í àlàyé káàdì mi tẹ́lẹ̀ lórí Google Pay, nítorí náà nígbàkúùgbà tí mo nílò láti sanwó fún ìbọn tuntun kan látàrí ìpè sí ojúṣe, mo kàn máa jẹ́rìí sí ìsanwó pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀ka mi ni.
zu: Isibonelo, sengivele nginemininingwane yekhadi lami kuGoogle Pay, ngakho-ke nganoma yisiphi isikhathi lapho ngidinga ukukhokhela isibhamu esisha kuCall of Duty, ngivele ngiqinisekise ukukhokha ngomnyatheliso womunwe wami.

am: ይበልጡን የተራቀቀ ይሆናል፡፡
en: It gets even more advanced.
ha: hakan yana nuna cigaba.
sw: Inapata maendeleo zaidi.
yo: Ó máa ń gbèrú sí i.
zu: Kuya ngokuthuthuka nakakhulu.

am: በአንዳንድ አገሮች ለነገሮች ክፍያ ለመክፈል ስልክዎን (Google Wallet ያለው) ወይም ስማርት ተለባሽ መሣሪያን በአቅራቢያው ካለው የመስክ ግንኙነት (NFC) PoS ጋር ነካ(tap) ማድረግ ይችላሉ።
en: In some countries, you can simply tap your phone (which has Google Wallets) or smart wearable device against a near field communication (NFC) PoS to pay for things.
ha: A wasu ƙasashen, kawai kana ɗan taɓa wayar hannunka wadda take da lalitar Google ko kuma wayayyen na'ura da ake sanyawa a kusa da ɓangaren sadarwa (NFC) POS domin biyan kuɗin abubuwa.
sw: Katika baadhi ya nchi, unaweza kugusa kwa urahisi simu yako (iliyo na waleti ya Google) au kifaa mahiri kinachovaliwa dhidi ya PoS ya mawasiliano ya karibu (NFC) ili kulipia vitu.
yo: Ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè kan, o lè tẹ fóònù rẹ nírọ̀rùn (èyí tí ó ní àwọn Wọ́lẹ̀tì Google) tàbí ohun-èlò tó ṣe é wọ̀ yàtọ̀ sí ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀ asúnmọ́-ibùdó (NFC) PoS láti sanwó fún àwọn nǹkan.
zu: Kwamanye amazwe, ungavele uthephe iselula yakho (enama-Google Wallet) noma idivayisi egqokekayo esmart kunear field communication (i-NFC) PoS ukuze ukhokhele izinto.

am: ኢንተርስዊች ይህንን ለመፈጸም የመጀመሪያው ኤደለም
en: Interswitch isn't the first to do this.
ha: Interswitch ba shi ne na farko ba game da yin hakan.
sw: Interswitch sio ya kwanza kufanya hivi.
yo: Interswitch kì í ṣe ilé-iṣẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ láti ṣe èyí.
zu: I-Interswitch akuyona eyokuqala ukwenza lokhu.

am: ፔይስታክ በ2021 እ.ኤ.አ አፕል ፔይባግ ያስተዋወቀ ሲሆን ይህም አይፎን ተጠቃሚዎች በፊት መለያቸው መክፈል ያስችላለቸዋል፡
en: Paystack also introduced pay with Apple Pay back in 2021, which allows iPhone users to pay conveniently with Face ID.
ha: Paystack ma ya gabatar da tsarin biya da dandamalin Apple Pay tun shekarar 2021, wadda ke bayar da dama ga masu amfani da wayar iphone da su biya kuɗi cikin daɗin rai da shaidar fuska.
sw: Paystack pia ilianzisha malipo kwa kutumia Apple Pay mnamo 2021, ambayo inaruhusu watumiaji wa iPhone kulipa kwa urahisi na kitambulisho cha uso.
yo: Paystack tún ṣàfihàn ìsanwó pẹ̀lú Apple Pay padà ní 2021, èyí tí ń gba àwọn olùmúlò láàyè láti sanwó ní ìrọ̀rùn pẹ̀lú Ìdánimọ̀ Aláwò-ojú.
zu: IPaystack nayo yayethule ukukhokha nge-Apple Pay ngo-2021, okuvumela abasebenzisi be-iPhone ukuthi bakhokhe kalula ngeFace ID.

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ መፍትሔ ለናይጄሪያ ኤፍኤክስ ችግሮች
en: Flutterwave's solution to Nigeria's FX problems
ha: Waraka daga kamfanin Flutterwave ga 'yan Najeriya dangane da matsalolin hada hadar canjin kuɗin waje FX.
sw: Suluhisho la Flutterwave kwa matatizo ya FX ya Nigeria
yo: Ojútùú Flutterwave sí àwọn ìṣòro FX ti Nàìjíríà.
zu: Isixazululo seFlutterwave ngokuphathelene nezinkinga zeFX zaseNigeria.

am: ፍሉተር ዌቭ ስዋፕ ማስጀመር ለናይጄሪያ ኤፍኤክስ ችግሮች መልስ ነው
en: Flutterwave has launched Swap, its answer to Nigeria's FX problems.
ha: kamfanin Flutterwave ya ƙaddamar da tsarin Swap, wanda zai magance matsalolin musayar kuɗi a Najeriya.
sw: Flutterwave imezindua Swap, jibu lake kwa matatizo ya FX ya Nigeria.
yo: Flutterwave ti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Swap, ìdáhùn rẹ̀ sí àwọn ìṣòro FX ti Nàìjíríà.
zu: IFlutterwave yethule i-Swap, impendulo yayo ngokuphathelene nezinkinga zeFX zaseNigeria.

am: ስዋፕ በመስከረም 4/2023 እ.ኤ.አ ተጀመር
en: Swap was launched on September 4, 2023.
ha: An ƙaddamar da tsarin Swap a ranar 4 ga watan Satumba 2023.
sw: Swap ilizinduliwa mnamo Septemba 4, 2023.
yo: A ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ swap ni 4 Oṣù Kẹsàn-án, ọdún 2023.
zu: ISwap yethulwa ngoMandulo 4, wezi-2023.

am: የናይጄሪያ ማዕከላዊ ባንክ /ሲቢኤን/ በዲጂታል መዋቅር ናይጄሪያውያን ፉክክር ባለው የምንዛሬ ተመን የውጭ ምንዛሬ ወዲያውኑ ማግኘት ይችላሉ፡፡
en: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) is backing it as the digital platform where Nigerians can have immediate access to foreign currency at competitive exchange rates.
ha: Babban bankin Najeriya (CBN) na taimakawa tsarin kamar yadda a dandamalin na na'ura inda 'yan Najeriya za su iya samun musayar kuɗin wajen cikin sauri kan farashin gasa.
sw: Benki kuu ya Nigeria (CBN) imeunga mkono kama jukwaa la kidigitali ambapo wanaijeria wanaweza kupata pesa za kigeni mara moja kwa viwango kubadilishwa ushindani.
yo: Báńkì àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ń ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìkànì àgbáté níbi tí àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà yóò ti máa ní àǹfàaní sí ọwọ́ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè ní òsùwọ̀n tí ó gbẹ́nulérawọn.
zu: ICentral Bank of Nigeria (iCBN) iyisekela njengepulatifomu yedijithali lapho abantu baseNigeria bengakwazi ukuthola khona imali yakwamanye amazwe ngokushesha ngamanani okushintsha imali aphansi.

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ ምርቱን ከዊማ ባንክ ጋር በመተባበር ያስጀመረ ሲሆን ሌላም ብሩምዱ ቼንች /ቢዲሲ/ ካድባራ ተብሎ ከሚቀስ ጋር ተባብሮ አስጀምሮአል፡
en: Flutterwave launched the product in partnership with Wema Bank and a Bureau de Change (BDC) called Kadavra.
ha: Kamfanin Flutterwave ya ƙaddamar da tsarin haɗin guiwa da Bankin Wema da kuma kamfanin canji da ake kira Kadavra.
sw: Flutterwave ilizindua bidhaa hiyo kwa ushirikiano na benki ya Wema na nyumba za kubadilisha fedha (BDC) iitwayo Kadavra.
yo: Flutterwave ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ọjà náà ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-ìfowópamọ́ Wema àti Àjọ abániṣẹ́wó tí à ń pè ní Kadavra.
zu: IFlutterwave yethule umkhiqizo ngokubambisana ne-Wema Bank neBureau de Change (iBDC) ebizwa ngokuthi iKadavra.

am: እነዚህ አጋሮች ሊኪዩዲቲ ያለው የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ያቀርባሉ።
en: These partners will provide the tech company with liquidity.
ha: Waɗannan abokan kasuwancin za su samar wa da Kanfanin tech Jari Me ƙarfi.
sw: Washirika hawa watatoa kampuni ya teknolojia na ukwasi.
yo: Àwọn alábàáṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ wọ̀nyí yóò pèsè ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó ní agbára ìṣeé-sọ-dowó.
zu: Laba balingani bazohlinzeka inkampani yezobuchwepheshe ngekhonakukhokha.

am: ስዋፕ በተጨማሪም ናይጄሪያውያን የግል ጉዞ አበል እና የቢዝነስ ጉዞ አበል በፍትነት የሚያገኙ ካርዶች እንዲጠቀሙ ያስችላል፡፡
en: Swap will also start rolling out cards that can be used by Nigerians who need quick access to personal travel allowance and business travel allowance.
ha: Kamfanin SWAP zai fara ba da katuna da 'yan Nijeriya za su yi amfani da shi wajen samun alawus na tafiya da kum ana kasuwanci.
sw: Pia Swap itatangaza usambazaji wa kadi ambazo zinaweza kutumiwa na wanaijeria ambao wanahitaji ufikiaji wa haraka wa posho ya kibinafsi ya kusafiri na posho ya kusafiri kwa biashara.
yo: Àjọ Swap yóò tún bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí fi káàdì léde èyí tí àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà lè lọ láti ṣáré ní àǹfààní kíákíá sí ààyè rírìnrìn àjò àti ìyọ̀ǹda ìrìn àjọ ajẹmọ́ okòòwò.
zu: ISwap izoqala nokukhipha amakhadi angasetshenziswa abantu baseNigeria abadinga ukufinyelela okusheshayo emalini yothatha uhambo yomuntu uqobo kanye nemali yokuthatha uhambo oluphathelene nebhizinisi.

am: ለናይጄሪያውያን በዚህ አመት ጥቅምት ጀምሮ ከ10 ሚሊዮን በላይ ካርዶች ለማዘጋጀት አቅዶአል፡፡
en: It said it plans to distribute more than 10 million cards to Nigerians starting October this year.
ha: Kanfani ya ce ya yi shirin raba fiye da katuna miliyan goma ga 'yan Najeriya wanda zai fara a wannan watan na Oktoba.
sw: Ilisema inapanga kusambaza kadi zaidi ya milioni 10 kwa wanaijeria kuanzia Oktoba mwaka huu.
yo: Ó sọ pé ó ń gbèrò láti pín àwọn káàdì tó tó mílíọ́nù 10 káàkiri fún àwọn ọmọ Nàìjíríà tí ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní oṣù Kẹwàá ọdún yìí.
zu: Ithe ihlela ukukhiphela amakhadi angaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-10 abantu baseNigeria kusukela ngoMfumfu kulo nyaka.

am: ፕላትኖቫ የህግ ባለሙያዎችን ለማጠናከር ከኢንፊዩዥን ጠበቆች ጋር ስልታዊ አጋርነት መፍጠሩን አስታወቀ።
en: Platnova Announces Strategic Partnership with Infusion Lawyers to Fortify Legal Expertise
ha: Kamfanin Platnova ya sanar da dabara haɗin gwaiwa tare da sanya Lauyoyi a cikin harkar don ƙarfafa sha'anin sanin shari'a
sw: Platnova inatangaza ushirikiano wa kimkakati na wanasheria wa Infusion ili kuimarisha utaalamu wa kisheria.
yo: Platnova kéde ìbáṣepọ̀ olófin pẹ̀lú àwọn agbẹjọ́rò ìgbàlódé-gbogbo láti mú òfin lágbára si.
zu: IPlatnova Imemezela Ubambiswano Lwamasu Nabammeli Be-infusion Ukuze Baqinise Ubungcweti Bezomthetho

am: አለምአቀፍ እና የብዝሃ-ምንዛሪ ዝውውሮችን የሚያቃልል ፈር ቀዳጅ የሆነው የፊንቴክ ኩባንያ ፕላትኖቫ፣ ለእውቀት ምጣኔ ሀብት እና ለዲጂታል ዘመን የተበጀ በአእምሮአዊ ንብረት እና ቴክኖሎጂ ላይ የተካነ ታዋቂው የቨርቹዋል ህግ ኩባንያ ከ ኢንፊዩዥን(Infusion) ጠበቆች ጋር ጉልህ ትብብር ማድረጉን በማሳወቁ ተደስቷል።
en: Platnova, the pioneering fintech company simplifying international and multi-currency transfers, is delighted to announce a significant collaboration with Infusion Lawyers, a distinguished virtual law firm specializing in intellectual property and technology, tailored for the knowledge economy and the digital age.
ha: Platnova kamfani ne da ya ƙirƙiro fasahar sauƙaƙa aikawa ko turawa da kuɗi a duniya ta hanyoyi da yawa, yana farin cikin sanar da haɗin gwaiwa mai ƙarfi da lauyoyi Infusion, wadda fitacciyar cambar lauyiyi ce da ta ƙware wajen kula da kadara da fasaha da take amfani dailimin tattalin arziki fasahar sadarwa.
sw: Platnova, ni kampuni ya nmwanzoni ya fintech inayorahisisha uhamishaji wa kimkakati na wa fedha nyingi, ina furaha kutangaza ushirikiano muhimu na wanasheria wa Infusion, kampuni ya sheria pepe inayobeba katika mali miliki na teknolojia.
yo: Platnova, ilé-iṣẹ́ fintech aṣáájú-ọnà tí ń ṣe ìrọ̀rùn òkèèrè àti àwọn ìfi-owó-ránṣẹ́, fi ìdùnnú kéde ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pàtàkì pẹ̀lú àwọn agbẹjọ́rò orí-afẹ́fẹ́, ilé-iṣẹ́ òfin tí ó yàtọ̀ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ ogún àti ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ èyí tí a gbé kalẹ̀ fún ìmọ̀ ọrọ̀-ajé àti ohun tí ó ń lọ ní àgbáyé.
zu: IPlatnova, inkampani yezobuchwepheshe bezezimali eyivulandlela eyenza kube lula ukudluliselwa kwemali kwamazwe omhlaba kanye nemali yamazwe amaningi, ithokozela ukumemezela ukubambisana okubalulekile nabammeli be-infusion, inkampani yezomthetho eku-inthanethi evelele egxile empahleni yobuhlakani (interlectual property) kanye nobuchwepheshe, eyenzelwe umnotho wolwazi kanye nenkathi yedijithali.

am: ይህ ስልታዊ አጋርነት የፕላትኖቫን ህጋዊ መሰረቶች በማጠናከር ለቁጥጥር መከበር፣ አእምሮቸዊ ንብረት ጥበቃ እና ለመረጃ ሚስጢራዊነት ቁርጠኝነቱን ያጎላዋል፡፡
en: This strategic partnership is poised to reinforce Platnova's legal foundations and amplify its dedication to regulatory compliance, intellectual property safeguarding, and robust data privacy.
ha: Dabarar haɗin gwaiwar an daidadita ta ne don ta ƙarfafa ƙarfin kanfanin Paltnova na doka da kuma ƙarfafa sadaukar da kai ga bin doka, da kuma kiyaye basira da fasaha da kuma kare siirin bayanai.
sw: Ushirikiano huu wa kimakakati upo tayari kuimarisha misingi ya kisheria ya Platnova na kukuza kujitolea kwakekwa utiifu wa udhibiti, ulinzi wa mali miliki na faragha thabiti ya data.
yo: Àjọṣepọ̀ ìlànà yìí ti múra láti fi agbára mú àwọn ìpìlẹ̀ òfin Platnova àti ìmúdára ìyàsọ́tọ̀ rẹ̀ sí ìbámu ìlànà, ààbò ohun-ìní, àti àṣírí dátà tó lágbára.
zu: Lokhu kubambisana kwamasu kulungele ukuqinisa izisekelo ezingokomthetho zePlatnova futhi kukhulise ukuzinikela kwayo ekulandeleni imithetho elawulayo, ukuvikelwa kwempahla yengqondo (intellectual property), kanye nobumfihlo bemininingo obuqinile.

am: ኢንፊዩዥን ጠበቃዎች የንግድ ምልክት ፣ የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት እና የዲዛይን ምዝገባ ፣ የንግድ ህግ ዲፓርትመንት ፣ የኢንዱስትሪ ፣ ንግድ እና ኢንቨስትመንት ሚኒስቴር በአቡጃ ኤፍሲቲ(FTC) ፣ ናይጄሪያ እና የኮርፖሬት ጉዳዮች ኮሚሽን (CAC) እውቅና ያላቸው ወኪል በመሆናቸው ሀብትን ወደ ግንባር ያመጣሉ ።
en: Infusion Lawyers, recognized as an accredited agent of the Trademark, Patents, and Designs Registry, the Commercial Law Department, the Ministry of Industry, Trade, and Investment in Abuja FCT, Nigeria, and the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC), brings a wealth of legal expertise to the forefront.
ha: Lauyoyin Cambar Infusion an aminta da su a matsayin amintattun wakilai na kamfanoni da iyaye da kuma tsarin tambarin rijista da kasuwanci a Abuja da ke Nijeriya da kuma Hukuma yi wa Kamfanoni rijista ya ƙara inganta harkar shari'a.
sw: Wanasheria wa Infusion, wanaotambuliwa kama wakala aliyeidhinishwa wa rejesta ya alama za biashara,leseni, na miundo, idara ya sheria ya biashara, wizara ya viwanda, biashara na uwekezaji huko abuja FCT, Nigeria, na tume ya masuala ya biashara (CAC), hulrta ukwasi wa utaalamu wa sheria kwa mstari wa mbele.
yo: Àwọn agbẹjọ́rọ̀ orí-afẹ́fẹ́ tí a mọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí aṣojú tí ó gbàṣẹgbọ̀ǹtẹ̀ fún ilé-iṣẹ́ àjọ asọhundítẹni(Trademark) àjọ aṣàyẹ̀wò ìtọ́sí, àti ẹ̀ka ìforúkọsílẹ̀ àwọn àṣà, Ẹka òfin ìsòwò, ẹ̀ka tí ó ń mójú tó ilé-iṣẹ́, ìsòwò, àti ìdókòwò ní Àbújá, tí ó jẹ́ olú-ìlú, orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, àti ìgbìmọ̀ abániforúkọ iléeṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ (CAC), tẹ́ pẹpẹ ọrọ̀ òfin síwájú.
zu: Abammeli be-Infusion, abaziswa njenge-ejenti egunyaziwe ye-Trademark, ama-Patent, nama-Designs Registry, uMnyango Wezomthetho Wezohwebo, uMnyango Wezimboni, Wezohwebo, kanye Nokutshalwa Kwezimali e-Abuja FCT, eNigeria, kanye ne-Corporate Affairs Commission (i-CAC), baletha ingcebo yobungcweti bezomthetho phambili.

am: አገልግሎታቸው ለፊንቴክ ኢንዱስትሪ ተለዋዋጭ የመሬት ገጽታ ወሳኝ በሆኑ የቁጥጥር እና ተገዢነት ጉዳዮች ፕላትኖቫን ለመምራት አጋዥ ይሆናል።
en: Their services will be instrumental in steering Platnova through the intricacies of regulatory and compliance matters, crucial to the fintech industry's dynamic landscape.
ha: Ayyukansu za su zama masu mahimmanci wajen gudanar da kamfanin Platnova dangane da matsalolin bin doka da ƙa'idoji, da suka shafi tsarin sauye-sauyen fasahar hada-hadar kuɗi na masana'anta.
sw: Huduma zao zitakuwa muhimu katika kutekeleza Platnova kupitia ugumu wa masuala ya udhibiti na utii, muhimu kwa mazingira ya tasnia ya fintech.
yo: Àwọn iṣẹ́ wọn yóò jẹ́ ohun-èlò ìdarí Platnova nípasẹ̀ àwọn ìnira tí ìlànà àti àwọn ọ̀ràn ìbámu, pàtàkì sí àlà-ilẹ̀ agbára ilé-iṣẹ́ fintech.
zu: Izinsiza zabo zizobaluleka ngokuphathelene nokuqondisa iPlatnova ezindabeni eziyinkimbinkimbi zokulawula nokuhambisana nemithetho, ezibalulekile esimweni esishintshashintshayo somkhakha wezobuchwepheshe bezezimali.

am: የዚህ ትብብር ዋነኛው አላማ አእምሮአዊ ንብረት ጥበቃ እና ስልጣዊ መጠቀም ነው፡፡
en: A pivotal objective of this collaboration is the protection and strategic utilization of intellectual property.
ha: Muhimmin hadafin wannan gamayyar shi ne kariya da tsara yin amfani da basira.
sw: Lengo kuu la ushirikiano huu ni ulinzi na utumiaji wa kimkakati wa mali miliki.
yo: ìdí pàtàkì tí ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ yìí fi wáyé ni fún ààbò àti ṣíṣàmúlò ìlànà ẹ̀rọ̀ àti ọgbọ́n inú ẹni.
zu: Inhloso ebalulekile yalokhu kubambisana ukuvikelwa nokusetshenziswa kwempahla yobuhlakani.

am: የኢንፊዩዥን(Infusion) ጠበቆች የቅጂ መብቶችን፣ የኢንዱስትሪ ዲዛይኖችን፣ የባለቤትነት መብቶችን፣ የአገልግሎት ምልክቶችን እና የንግድ ምልክቶችን በማካተት የተለያዩ የአዕምሮ-ንብረት መብቶችን በመመዝገብ እና በማጠናከር ለፕላትኖቫ በዋጋ ሊተመን የማይችል ድጋፍ ይሰጣሉ።
en: Infusion Lawyers will provide invaluable support to Platnova in registering and fortifying various intellectual-property rights, encompassing copyrights, industrial designs, patents, service marks, and trademarks.
ha: Lauyoyi Cmbar Infusion za su tallafa wa Kamfanin Platnova wajen rijistar damar mallakar basira iri-iri, wadda ta haɗa da haƙƙin mallaka da zayyanar masana'antu da shaidar kamfani.
sw: Wanasheria wa Infusion watoa usaidizi muhimu kwa Platnova katika kusajili na kuimarisha haki mkbalimbali za mali miliki, zinazojumuisha haki miliki, miundo ya viwanda, hati miliki, alama za huduma, na alama za biashara.
yo: Àwọn adájọ́ orí-afẹ́fẹ́ máa pèsè àtilẹyìn tí kò níye lórí fún Platnova nípa fífi orúkọ sílẹ̀ àti ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún onírúurú ìgbàṣẹ-gbòhùntẹ̀ ogbọ́n inú-ẹni pẹ̀lú aṣẹ èmi ni mo ní(copyright) àgbékalẹ̀ ilééṣẹ́ ofin ìṣàyẹ̀wò, iṣẹ́ fífún ní ní òǹtẹ̀, àti àṣẹ ìgbàṣẹgbòhùntẹ̀.
zu: Abammeli be-Infusion bazohlinzeka ngosizo oluyigugu kuPlatnova ekubhaliseni nasekuqiniseni amalungelo ahlukahlukene obuhlakani, ahlanganisa amalungelo okushicilela, imiklamo yezimboni, amalungelo obunikazi, izimpawu zezinsiza, kanye nezimpawu zokuhweba (trademarks).

am: ይህ የነቃ አቋም የፕላትኖቫ ፈጠራ መፍትሄዎች ከጥሰት ደህንነታቸው የተጠበቀ እና በተወዳዳሪው የፊንቴክ መድረክ ውስጥ ለስልታዊ እድገት መዘጋጀታቸውን ያረጋግጣል።
en: This proactive stance ensures that Platnova's innovative solutions remain secure from infringement and are poised for strategic growth in the competitive fintech arena.
ha: Wannan mataki zai tabbatar da matsayar Kamfanin Platnova na samar da mafita ta ƙirƙira domin ci gaban fasahar hada-hadar kuɗi.
sw: Msimamo huu makini unahakikisha kwamba masuluhisho bunifu ya Platnova yanasalia salama kutokana na ukuaji na yapo tayari kwa ukuaji wa kimkakati katika ulingo wa ushindani wa fintech.
yo: Ìgbéṣẹ̀ ìpinu yìí ń ṣe ìdánilójú pé àwọn ojútùú sí àwọn ọgbọ́n-inú àti àrà-ọ̀tun ti Platnova wà ní ìdáàbòbò lọ́wọ́ àjílò àti pé ó ṣetán fún ìdàgbàsókè nínú ìgbọ́ni ìlànà ìmọ̀-ajẹmọ́rọ̀ ajé.
zu: Lesi simo esisebenzayo siqinisekisa ukuthi izixazululo ezintsha ze-Platnova zihlale zivikelekile ekwephulweni komthetho futhi zilungele ukukhula kwamasu kupulatifomu yokuncintisana yezobuchwepheshe bezezimali.

am: ስለአጋርነት ስንነጋገር የፕላትኖቫ ሲኢኦ ቤንጃሚን ኦልሞላን አጋርነቱን ከልማት መነጠሉን ይገልጻሉ፡፡
en: Speaking about the partnership, the CEO of Platnova, Benjamin Oyemolan described the partnership as “a break from the norm”.
ha: Da yake magana game da haɗin gwiwar, CEO na kamfanin Platnova, Benjamin Oyemolan bayyana haɗin gwiwar a matsayin"sauyawa daga daɗaɗɗiyar Al'ada".
sw: Akizungumzia kuhusu ushirikiano huo, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Platnova, Benjamin Oyemolan alielezea ushirikiano huo kama "Kuacha mazoea".
yo: Nígbà tí ó ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àjọṣepọ̀, alákoso Platnova, Benjamin Oyemolan ṣe àpéjúwe àjọṣepọ̀ náà gẹ́gẹ́ bí "dídá àṣà dúró".
zu: Ekhuluma ngobambiswano, iCEO ye-Platnova, uBenjamin Oyemolan wachaza ubambiswano ngokuthi "ukuyeka okujwayelekile".

am: መረጃ ጥበቃ እና ሚስጢራዊነት ከፍ ባለበት ዘመን ከኢንፉዩሽን ጠበቆች ጋር አጋር በመሆን ፕላት ኖቫ የመረጃ ሀብቶች ለማስጠበቅ ያለውን ከፍተና ቁርጠኝነት ያሳያል፡፡
en: “In an era characterized by heightened concerns surrounding data protection and privacy, the partnership with Infusion Lawyers underscores Platnova's unwavering commitment to safeguarding data assets.
ha: "A zamanin da aka damu da tsaron bayanai da sirri matsananciyar damuwa da ya tattara da kare bayanai da sirri, haɗin gwiwar da lauyiyin Cambar Infusion ya nuna ƙudirin Kamfanin Platnova wajen kadarori.
sw: "Katika enzi iliyo nma wasiwasi mkubwa unaohusu ulinzi wa data na faragha, ushirikiano nja wanmasheria wa Infusion unasisitiza dhamira thabiti ya Platnova ya kulinga rasilimali za data.
yo: “Ní àkókò tí ó ní ìjúwe nípasẹ̀ àwọn ìfiyèsí tí ó pọ̀ sí agbègbè ààbò dátà àti àṣírí, àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn agbẹjọ́rò orí-afẹ́fẹ́ tẹnumọ́ ìfaramọ́ àìlágbára Platnova sí ààbò àwọn ohun-ìní dátà.
zu: “Enkathini ebonakala ngokukhathazeka okwandile okuphathelene nokuvikelwa kwemininingo nobumfihlo, ukubambisana nabaMmeli be-Infusion kugcizelela ukuzibophezela okungaguquguquki kukaPlatnova ngokuphathelene nokuvikela izimpahla zezemininingo.

am: ይህ ትብብር ፕላት ኖቫ የመረጃ ደህንነት እና ሚስጢራዊነት ማስጠበቅ ለተጠቃሚዎቹ አመኔታ እንደሚገነባ ገልጸዋል፡፡
en: This collaboration firmly establishes Platnova as a frontrunner in upholding rigorous data security and privacy practices, further fostering trust with its valued users”, he concluded.
ha: Wannan haɗakar tabbas ta tabbatar jagora wajen riƙe muhimman tsaron bayanai da ayyukan sirri, dake ƙara bunƙasa aminci ga muhimman masu amfani" ya kammala.
sw: Ushirikiano huuunaimarisha Platnova kama mtangulizi katika kudumisha usalama wa data na desturi za faragha, na hiyo kukuza uaminifu kwa watumiaji wake wanaothaminiwa", alihitimisha.
yo: Ó kádìí ọ̀rọ̀ nílẹ̀ báyìí pé "Ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ yìí fi ìdí Platnova múlẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùsáàjú ní títọ́jú ààbò dátà líle àti àwọn iṣẹ́ àṣírí, ìmúdára ìgbẹ́kẹ̀lé síwájú pẹ̀lú àwọn olùmúlò tí ó ní iye lórí’’.
zu: Lokhu kubambisana kumisa ngokuqinile iPlatnova njengevulandlela ekulondolozeni ukuphepha kwemininingo eqinile nemikhuba yobumfihlo, ekhuthaza ngokwengeziwe ukwethembana nabasebenzisi bayo abayigugu”, kuphetha yena.

am: የፕላትኖቫ እና የኢንፌሽን ጠበቆች ልዩ ጥንካሬዎቻቸውን በማጣመር በፈጠራ እና በመተባበር ከጊዜ ወደ ጊዜ እያደገ በሚመጣው የፊንቴክ ዘርፍ ውስጥ አሸናፊ ለመሆን ለሚያደርጉት የትብብር ጉዟቸው ጓጉተዋል።
en: Platnova and Infusion Lawyers are enthusiastic about this collaborative venture, combining their unique strengths to champion innovation and compliance in the ever-evolving fintech sector.
ha: Kamfanin Platnova da kuma Lauyoyi Cambar Infusion, sun zaƙu game da wannan haɗin gwiwa ta haɗa ƙarfi don kare ƙirƙira da kuma bin doka harkarfasahar hada-hadar kuɗi.
sw: Platnova na wanasheria wa Infusion wanashauku kuhusu mradi huu shirikishi, wakichanganya uwezo wao wa kipekee ili kutetea uvumbuzi na utiifu katika tasnia ya fintech inayoendelea.
yo: Platnova àti agbẹjọ́rò afẹ́fẹ́ múra sí ọ̀rọ̀ níní àjọṣepọ̀ nípa pípa agbára wọn pọ̀ láti fí ṣẹ̀dà ohun ọ̀tun ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ẹ̀ka àti ìgbọ́ni ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ajẹ́mọ́rọ̀-ajé.
zu: IPlatnova kanye nabaMmeli be-Infusion bayayishisekela le nkampani yokubambisana, bahlanganisa amandla abo ahlukile ekusunguleni izinto ezintsha nasekuhambisaneni nemithetho emkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe bezezimali obuguquguqukayo.

am: ለበለጠ ጥያቄዎች እና ስለ ፕላት ኖቫ ተጨማሪ መረጃ support@platnova.com ላይ ከችኛ ግር ግንኙነት ያድርጉ፡፡
en: For more inquiries and further information about Platnova please contact us at Support@platnova.com
ha: Don tambayoyi da neman ƙarin bayani game da kanfanin Platnova sai a ɗan neme mu ta wannan adreshin Support@platnova.com
sw: Kwa maswali na taarifa zaidi kuhusu Platnova tafadhali wasiliana nasi kupitia support@platnova.com
yo: Fún àwọn ìbéèrè díẹ̀ sí àti ṣe àlàyé síwájú sí I nipa Platnova, jọ̀wọ́ kàn sí wa ní Support@platnova.com
zu: Ukuze ubuze imibuzo eyengeziwe futhi uthole nolwazi oluthe xaxa mayelana ne-Platnova sicela uxhumane nathi ku-Support@platnova.com

am: በርካታ የክፍያ መፍትሔዎች እና ቢዝነሶች በአለም ዙሪያ ላሉ እናቀርባለን፡፡
en: We provide a wide range of payment solutions to individuals and businesses worldwide.
ha: Mun tanadi mabambanta hanyoyin biya da dama ga ɗaidaikun mutane da kuma harkoki a faɗin duniya.
sw: Tunatoa anwai za suluhisho za malipo kwa watu binafsi na biashara ulimwenguni kote.
yo: A pèsè ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀nà-àbáyọ ìsanwó sí àwọn ẹnì-kọ̀ọ̀kan àti àwọn ìṣòwò ní káríayé.
zu: Sihlinzeka izixazululo eziningi zokukhokha kubantu kanye nakumabhizinisi emhlabeni wonke.

am: አገልግሎታችን የሚያጠቃልለው፡ በዓለም ዙሪያ ገንዘብ መላክ እና መቀበል፣ ምናባዊ ካርዶችን መፍጠር እና የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ማድረግ፣ የቢል ክፍያዎች፣ የስጦታ ካርዶች፣ የአየር ሰዓት እና የውሂብ መሙላትን ያጠቃልላል።
en: Our services include: Sending and receiving money across the globe, Creating and funding virtual cards, Bill payments, Gift cards, Airtime and Data top-up.
ha: Ayyukanmu sun haɗa da; turawa da karɓar kuɗi a ko'ina a duniya, da samar da katukan kuɗi da biyan kuɗaɗen bil da katukan kyauta da katin kiran waya da kuma sanya data.
sw: Huduma zetu ni pamoja na: kutuma na kupokea pesa kote ulimwenguni, kuunda na kufadhili barua pepe, malipo ya bili, kadi za zawadi, muda wa maongezi na uongozaji wa data.
yo: Lára àwọn iṣẹ́ wa ni: fífi owó ránṣẹ́ àti gbígbowó káàkiri àgbáyé, ṣíṣẹ̀dá káàdì ayélujára àti fífi owó sínú rẹ̀, bíbánisánwó níná, káàdì-ajẹmẹ́bùn, owó-ìpè, bíbáni ra dátà.
zu: Izinsiza zethu zihlanganisa: Ukuthumela nokuthola imali emhlabeni wonke, Ukusungula kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali amakhadi a-virtual, Ukukhokhela Izikweletu, Amakhadi esipho, i-Airtime neData.

am: በኢንተርኔት ላይ ግሮሰሪዎችን ለመሸጥ ልምዱን ያቆመውን የቀድሞ የህክምና ዶክተር ኦሉሚድ ኦሉሳንያንን ያግኙ።
en: Meet Olumide Olusanya, a former medical doctor who quit the practice to sell groceries online
ha: Ga Olumide Olusanya, tsahon likita da ya bar aikinsa domin domin sayarda kayan masarufi a yanar gizo
sw: Kutana na Olumide Olusanya, daktari wa zaqmani ambaye aliacha shughuli na kuuza mboga mtandaoni
yo: Mọ Olúmìdé Olúsànyà, dókítà onímọ̀ ìṣègùn tẹ́lẹ rí tí ó fi iṣẹ́ tí ó ń ṣe ṣílẹ̀ látí lè ta oúnjẹ lórí ayélujára.
zu: Lona ngu-Olumide Olusanya, owayengudokotela wezokwelapha owayeka ukudayisa igrosa ku-inthanethi

am: ኦሉሚድ ኦሉሳንያ በሌጎስ ወይም ስፓርታ ላይ የተመሰረተ ፈር ቀዳጅ የኢንተርኔት ላይ የግሮሰሪ ንግድ Gloo.ng ላይ ዋና 'ግሎቲያን' ነው፣ ይህም እርስዎ ለማየት በመረጡት ላይ የተመሰረተ ነው።
en: Olumide Olusanya is Chief 'Glootian' at Gloo.ng, a pioneering online grocery business based in Lagos or Sparta, depending on how you choose to see it.
ha: Olumide Olusanya shi ne babba a kamfanin Gloo.ng wanda ya samar da kasuwancin kayan abinci ta intanet a Jihar Legas ko Sparta, ya danganta da zaɓinka.
sw: Olumide Olusanya ni Chief 'Glootian' katika Gloo.ng, biashara tangulizi ya mboga mtandaoni iliyopo Lagos au spartas, kulingana na jinsiunavyochagua kuina.
yo: Olumide Olusanya ni Olu-ọba 'Glootian' ni Gloo.ng, Olùdásílẹ̀ ọjà oúnjẹ ayélujára tí ó kalẹ̀ sí ìlú Èkó tàbí Sparta, ó wà lọ́wọ́ bí ó bí ó bá ṣe wù ọ́ láti ri.
zu: U-Olumide Olusanya uyi-Chief 'Glootian' eGloo.ng, ibhizinisi lokudla eliku-inthanethi elaliyivulandlela eLagos noma eSparta, kuye ngokuthi ukhetha ukulibona kanjani.

am: በሌጎስ ደሴት፣ ሌኪ በሚገኘው የግሎ.ኤንጂ(gloo.ng) ቢሮ ዙሪያ የስፓርታ ስልታዊ ማጣቀሻዎች በሙሉ ሊያመልጡዎት አይችሉም።
en: You can hardly miss all the references to Sparta strategically placed all around the Gloo.ng office in Lekki, Lagos Island.
ha: Zai yi wuya ka kuskure wa wurin da Kamfanin Sparta a ofisoshin Gloo.ng a Lekki kuma Legos Island.
sw: Huwezi kukosa marejeo yote ya sparta iliyowekwa kimkakati karibu na kwenye ofisi ya Gloo.ng huko Lekki, kisiwa cha Lagos.
yo: Ó sòro kí o tó lè pàdánù àwọn ìlànà ìtọ́kasí Sparta tí a gbé yípo ọ́fíìsì Sparta tí ó wà ní Lẹ́kki ní ìlú Èkó.
zu: Ngeke neze ukwazi ukuphuthelwa yizo zonke izinkomba zeSparta ezibekwe kahle zazungeza ihhovisi leGloo.ng eLekki, eLagos Island.

am: አንድ ልዩ ጽሑፍ እንዲህ ይላል።
en: One particular inscription reads:
ha: Wani rubutu na musamman yana cewa:
sw: Maandishi fulani yanasomeka:
yo: Àkọsílẹ̀ kan sọ pé:
zu: Omunye umbhalo othile ufundeka kanje:

am: ራሳችሁን ዝቅ አድርጉ፣ ጫጫታውን ችላ በሉት።
en: Heads down; Ignore the noise.
ha: A sunkuyar da kawuna; a yi kurum (ayi shiru).
sw: Vichwa chini; kupuuza kelele.
yo: Yín wá sílẹ̀; fojú fo ariwo.
zu: Bheka phansi; Ungawunaki umsindo.

am: ይራቡ ፣ ትኩረት ይስጡ ።
en: Stay hungry, stay focused.
ha: Ka zama cikin zaƙuwa, ka zama me lura.
sw: Kuwa na shauku, weka umakini.
yo: Máa pòhùgbẹ; kí ó sì ní ìgbájúmọ́.
zu: Hlala ulambele impumelelo, hlala ugxile kokwenzayo.

am: ማጓጓዙን ይቀጥሉ።
en: Keep shipping.
ha: Ci gaba da kawo kaya ta ruwa.
sw: Endelea kusafirisha.
yo: Túbọ̀ máá gbé ọjà wọlé jáde.
zu: Qhubeka nokuthumela.

am: ይህ ስፓርታ ነው!!!
en: THIS ... IS ... SPARTA!!!
ha: NAN SPARTA NE!!!
sw: HII ... NI ... SPARTA!!!
yo: Èyí ni SPARTA!!!
zu: LE ... YI ...SPARTA!!!

am: ኦሉሳንያ ኩባንያውን የሚያስተዳድርበት የፍልስፍና መንገድ ግልፅ ነው --ግሎ.ኤንጂ(gloo.ng) ምናልባት ከዚህ በፊት ሰምተህ የማታውቀው በናይጄሪያ ኢ-ኮሜርስ ፈር ቀዳጅ ነው ።
en: The philosophy is evident in the way Olusanya runs his company -- Gloo.ng is the pioneer in Nigerian eCommerce you probably never heard about before now.
ha: Falsafa shaida ce a yadda Olusanya yake tafiyar da kamfaninsa -- Gloo.ng shi ne a kan gaba a tsarin kasuwancin intanet na Najeriya da mai yiwuwa baka taɓa ji ba.
sw: Falsafa hii inaonekana katika jinsi Olusanya anaendesha kampuni yake, Gloo.ng ndiye mwanzilishi katika biashara ya mtandaoni ya Nigeria ambayo huenda hukuwahi kusikia kuihusu hapo kabla.
yo: Wíwòye sí jẹ́ ẹ̀rí ọ̀nà tí Olúsàǹyà gbà máa tukọ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ rẹ̀--Gloo.ng jẹ́ èèkàn kùùgbù nínú okòòwò orí àtẹ ayélujára tí ó ṣe é ṣe kí o má à tí ì gbọ́ rí.
zu: Ifilosofi ibonakala endleleni u-Olusanya aphatha ngayo inkampani yakhe -- iGloo.ng njengevulandlela le-eCommerce yaseNigeria okungenzeka awukaze uzwe ngayo ngaphambilini.

am: ድምጽ አንፈጥርም ኦሊሳኒ ይገልጻሉ፡፡ ምርት ላይ እና ደንበኛ ላይ ይበልጡን እናተኩራለን፡፡
en: "We don't make noise" Olusanya tells us, "we focus more on the product and the customer".
ha: "Ba ma surutu" Olasanya ya gaya mana, "Mu na mai da hankali sosai akan kayanmu (da muka samar) da kuma abokin huɗɗarmu".
sw: "Hatupigi mayowe" Olusanya anatuambia, "tunazingatia zaidi bidhaa na mteja:.
yo: Olúsànyà sọ fún wa pé àwọn kìí pariwo, àti pé ohun tí àwọn máa ń gbájúmọ́ jù lọ ni ọjà àti àwọn oníbàárà.
zu: "Asibangi umsindo, kusho u-Olusanya kuthina, "sigxila kakhulu kumkhiqizo nekhasimende".

am: ቀጥሎ ያለው ኦሉሳንያ በህክምና ውስጥ የነበረውን ተስፋ ሰጪ ስራ እንዴት እንዳቆመ እና በመጨረሻም የናይጄሪያ የመጀመሪያ እና ምናልባትም ብቸኛው ቴክኒካል ኢ-ኮሜርስ መስራች የሆነበት አስደናቂ ታሪክ ነው።
en: What follows is an amazing story of how Olusanya quit a promising career in Medicine to eventually become Nigeria's first, and probably only, technical eCommerce Founder.
ha: Abun da zai biyo wani labari ne me ban mamaki na yadda Olusanya ya bar sana'a me tsoka ta harkar magungunan bature ya zamo ɗan Najeriya na farko, kuma ga dukkan alamu shi ne mutum ɗaya tilo da ya zama ƙwararen wanda ya samar da harkar kasuwanci ta internet.
sw: Ifuatayo ni simulizi ya kustaajabisha ya jisi Olusanya aliyeacha kazi ya kuahidi katika utabibu na hatimae kuwa mwanzilishi wa kwanza wa biashara ya kielektroniki nchini Nigeria na pengine pekee.
yo: Ohun tí ó tẹ̀le ní ìtàn ìyàlẹ́nú bí Olúsànyà ṣe fí àlá rẹ̀ nínú ìmọ̀ ìṣègùn sílẹ̀ tí láti di ẹni àkọ́kọ́ tàbí bóyá ẹni àkọ́kọ́ tí ó kọ́kọ́ di olùdásílẹ̀ okòwò orí-àtẹ ayélujára.
zu: Okulandelayo kuyindaba emangalisayo yokuthi u-Olusanya wayeka kanjani umsebenzi othembisayo wokuba uDokotela ukuze ekugcineni abe uMsunguli we-eCommerce yokuqala yaseNigeria, futhi mhlawumbe nguye kuphela, Umsunguli we-eCommerce yezobuchwepheshe.

am: የቴክፖይን አፍሪካ ሙዪዋ ማቱሉኮ (ኤምኤም)፡ ሙሉ በሙሉ ህክምና የሚሰራ ዶክተር ወደ ቴክኖሎጂ እንዴት ሊገባ ቻለ?
en: Múyìwá Mátùlúkò of Techpoint Africa (MM): How did a fully practising Medical Doctor end up in tech?
ha: Múyìwá Mátùlúkò na Kamfanin Techpoint Africa (MM) :Ta yaya cikakken Likita mai ba da magani ya ɓuge zama ƙwararren Injiniya?
sw: Muyiwa Matuluko wa Techpoint Africa (MM): je, daktari anafanya matibabu aliishiaje katika teknolojia?
yo: Múyìwá Mátùlúkò ti Techpoint Adúláwọ̀ (MM): Báwo ni dókítà oníṣègùn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ṣe padà bá ara rẹ̀ ní ìdí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ?
zu: UMúyìwá Mátùlúkò weTechpoint Africa (MM): Udokotela Wezokwelapha osebenza ngokugcwele ugcine kanjani kwezobuchwepheshe?

am: ኦሉማይዲ "ዲ.ኦ"የግሎ.ኤንጂ(Gloo.ng) ኦሉሳኒያ (ዲኦ)፡ በ1993 ከ ሌጎስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ (UNILAG) የሕክምና ኮሌጅ ተመረኩ።
en: Olumide "D.O" Olusanya of Gloo.ng (DO): I graduated from the College of Medicine, University of Lagos (UNILAG) in 1993.
ha: Olumide "D.O" Olusanya na Gloo.ng (DO): Na sami Takardar digiri daga kwalejin koyar da ilimin magunguna daga Jami'ar Lega (UNILAG) a 1993.
sw: Olumide "D.O" Olusanya wa Gloo.ng (DO): Nilihitimu kutoka chuo kikuu cha tiba, chuo kikuu cha Lagos (UNILAG) mnamo 1993.
yo: Olumide "D.O" Olusanya ti ìtàkùn Gloo.ng(DO): Mo jáde ní ẹ̀ka tí wọ́n ti ń kọ́ni ní ìmọ̀ ìṣègùn òyìnbó ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga fásitì Èkó ní ọdún 1993.
zu: U-Olumide u-"D.O" Olusanya weGloo.ng (DO): Ngaphothula iziqu eCollege of Medicine, University of Lagos (i-UNILAG) ngo-1993.

am: ህክምና ማጥናት ፈጽሞ አልፈለኩም አባቴ አስተደደኝ፡፡
en: I never wanted to study medicine - my dad forced me.
ha: Ban taɓa jin son in karani ilimin magunguna ba- baba na ne ya tilasta min.
sw: Sikutaka kusomea udaktari, baba yangu alinilazimisha.
yo: N ò fẹ́ kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa ìmọ̀ ìṣègùn òyìnbó - baba mi ni ó fi agídí mú mi.
zu: Ngangingafuni ukufundela ubudokotela - ngaphoqwa ubaba.

am: ስለዚህ ሁልጊዜ ከፍላጎቴ ጋር የተያያዘ አንድ ነገር እንዴት እንደምሰራ እፈልግ ነበር ፣ ይህም ቴክኖሎጂ ነው።
en: So I was always looking for how to do something relating to my passion, which is technology.
ha: Don haka a kodayaushe ina neman abun da zanyi da ya dace da son rai na, wanda shi ne ilimin fasaha.
sw: Kwa hiyo kila mara nilikuwa nikitafuta jinsi ya kufanya kitu kinachohusiana na mapenzi yangu, ambacho ni teknolojia.
yo: Nítorí náà ni mo ṣé fẹ́ máa ń ṣe ohun tíó ní ṣe pẹ̀lú ohun tí mo fẹ́ràn jù èyí tí ó jẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Ngakho-ke bengihlala ngifuna indlela yokwenza okuthile okuhlobene nentshisekelo yami, okuwubuchwepheshe.

am: የጉዳት ዶ/ር ሀኪም ስሆን ሌጎስ የግዛት ድንገተኛ ህክምና አገልግሎት ውስጥ ሰርቻለሁ፡፡
en: I practised as a Trauma Doctor at the Lagos State Emergency Medical Services.
ha: Na yi aiki a matsayin Likitan (Magance) Damuwa a sashen agajin gaggawa na Asibitin Legas.
sw: Nilifanya shughuli kama daktari wa Trauma katika huduma ya matibabu ya dharura ya jimbo la Lagos.
yo: Mo ti ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí dọ́kítà alárùn ọpọlọ ní ilé-ìwòsàn ìtọ́jú pàjáwìrì ní ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó.
zu: Ngangisebenza njengoDokotela Wegumbi Lezimo Eziphuthumayo eLagos State Emergency Medical Services.

am: አንድ ጊዜ የግሌዶራ መጽፍት ሱቅ ባለቤት ወንድ ልጆች አንዱ ልጁን ለማምጣት ወደ ሆስፒታል መጣ፡፡
en: Once, one of the sons to the owner of Glendora Bookshop, came to the hospital to deliver his baby.
ha: sau ɗaya, ɗaya daga cikin 'ya'yan mamallakin Glendora Bookshop, ya zo asibiti don haihuwar jaririyarsa.
sw: Maja moja, mmoja wa watoto wa mmliki wa duka la vitabu la Glendora, alikuja hospitalini kujifungua.
yo: Nígbà kan rí Ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ọmọ tí olùdásílẹ̀ Glendora Bookshop, wá sí ìlé ìwòsàn lati bí ọmọ rẹ̀.
zu: Ngelinye ilanga, omunye wamadodana kamnikazi weGlendora Bookshop, weza esibhedlela ngesikhathi kuzozalwa ingane yakhe.

am: በቴክኖሎጂ ውስጥ መሆኑን ለማወቅ ችያለሁ፣ ስለዚህ ነፃ ስሆን ወደ እሱ መጥቼ መማር እንደምችል ጠየቅኩት።
en: I got to find out he was into tech, so I asked him if I could come over and learn from him whenever I was free.
ha: Lalle in gano cewa yana cikin sana'ar fasaha,don haka sai na tambaye shi in zan iya zuwa in yi koyo daga gare shi duk sa'adda bana komai.
sw: Nilijua kuwa anajishughulisha na teknolojia, hivyo nili,uomba kama ningeweza kuja na kujifunza kutoka kwake wakati nilipukwa na mapumziko.
yo: Mo ri pé ó nímọ̀ nípa ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, nítorí náà mo bí léèrè bóyá mo lè wá sí ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ̀ láti wá kó iṣẹ́ nígbà tí mí ò bá ṣe nǹkankan.
zu: Ngathola ukuthi usebenza kwezobuchwepheshe, ngakho ngambuza ukuthi ngingafika yini ngifunde kuye noma nini lapho nginesikhathi engingenzi lutho ngaso.

am: የግንኙነት መረጃ ቋት ጽንሰ ሀሳብ ላውቅ የቻልኩት እዛ ነው፡፡
en: That's where I got familiar with the concept of relational databases.
ha: A can ne na saba da sha'anin kudin adana bayanai.
sw: hapo ndipo nilifahamu dhana ya hifadhi data za uhusiano.
yo: Níbẹ̀ ni mo ti ní ìfaramọlé pẹ̀lú àwọn èròǹgbà ìpìlẹ̀ àtòjọ iṣẹ́ tí ó farakọ́ra.
zu: Yilapho engajwayela khona umqondo wedathabheyisi yobudlelwane.

am: ማይክሮ ሶፍት አክሰስ ባገኝም ስማር ኦራክል ተመራጭ መሆኑን አውቄ የኦራክል መረጃ ቋት አስተዳዳሪ ለመሆን ወሰንኩ፡፡
en: Microsoft Access was readily available to me then but, when I learnt Oracle was the best, I decided I wanted to be an Oracle Database Administrator.
ha: Na iya Manhajar Microsoft Access a lokacin amma, yayin da na gano manhajar Oricle ya fi, sai na yanke shawara ina son in zama Me Iya Sarrafa Manhajar Rumbun Adana Bayanai Ta Oricle.
sw: Microsaft Access ilikuwa inapatikana kwangu wakati huo lakini, nilipojifunza Oracle ilikuwa bora zaidi niliamua nilitaka msimamizi wa hifadhi data wa Oracle.
yo: Microsoft Access ti sí suílẹ̀ fún mi nígbà náà ṣùgbọ́n mo mọ̀ pé Oracle ni ó dárá jù lọ, mo pinu pé mó fẹ́ láti jẹ́ alákoso ọpọlọ ibi tí Oracle fi ń ṣe ọgbọ́n.
zu: IMicrosoft Access yayitholakala kalula kimi ngaleso sikhathi kodwa, lapho ngifunda ukuthi i-Oracle yayingcono kakhulu, nganquma ukuthi ngifuna ukuba Umphathi Wedatha ye-Oracle.

am: መጽሀፍቶች አግኝቼ እራሴ አጠናሁ፡፡
en: I got books and studied by myself.
ha: Na sami littattafai na karanta da kaina.
sw: Nilipata vitabu na kujisomea.
yo: Mo ra ìwé tí mo sì kàá fúnra mi.
zu: Ngathola izincwadi futhi ngazitadisha ngedwa.

am: የሰርተፍኬት ፈተናዎቼን ሙሉ በሙሉ አሸነፍኩ፡፡
en: I totally smashed my certification exams.
ha: Na warwatsa takardun jarabawoyina gaba ɗaya.
sw: Kiujumla nilifaulu mitihani yangu ya kuhitimu.
yo: Mo yege pátápátá nínú ìdánwò oní ìwé-ẹ̀rí mi.
zu: Ngiziphumelela ngamalengiso izivivinyo zami zokugunyazwa ngesitifiketi.

am: ይሄ አንዱ የእኔ ስጦታነው፡፡ ማንኛንምነገር ላነብ እችላለሁ መጽሀፍት ውስጥ የተጻደ ማንኛውም እውቀት እና የመረዳት ጥልቀት ደረጃ ከዛ የማገኘው ከጻፈወ ግለሰብ ይልቅ የተሸለ ነው፡፡
en: That's one of the gifts I have — I can read anything, any knowledge that is written in a book, and the level of depth of understanding I get from it would be better than the person that wrote it.
ha: Waccar daya daga cikin baiwoyi da na ke da su ke nan--zan iya karanta komai, dukkan ilimin da aka rubuta a littafi kuma zurfin matakin fahimtar na ke samu daga gare shi yafi fahimtar da wanda ya rubuta littafin yai masa.
sw: Hiyo ni moja wapo ya karama zilizo nazo, naweza kusoma chochote, ujuzi wowote ulioandikwa katika kitabu, na kiwango cha ufahamu wa kina ninaoupata kutoka humo kingekuwa bora zaidi kuliko mtu aliyekiandika.
yo: Ìyẹn jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára ẹ̀bùn tí mo ní- Kò sí ohun tí mi ò lè kà, i9`mọ̀ kí ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n bá kọ sínú ìwé pẹ̀lú ìwọ̀nba àgbọ́yé tí mo bá rí nínú rẹ̀ yóò dára ju tí ẹni tí ó kọ ìwé lọ.
zu: Leso ngesinye sezipho enginaso — ngingafunda noma yini, noma yiluphi ulwazi olubhalwe encwadini, futhi izinga lokuqonda engilithola kulo lingaba ngcono kunomuntu olubhalile.

am: ማረጋገጫ ካገኘሁ በኃላ ጓደኛዬ ዶ/ር ኦጂ ከሌጎስ ዩንቨርስቲ ኮምፒዩተር ሳይንስ ዲፓርትመንት የማይከፈልበት ኢንተርንሺፕ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ በወቅቱ አንዱ የበላይ ኦራክል የተረጋገጠ አጋሮች ጋር እንዲገናኘኝ አደረኩ፡፡
en: After I got my certification, I got a friend of mine, Dr. Ojo of the Computer Science department in UNILAG , to connect me to an unpaid internship at one of the top Oracle certified partners in the country at the time.
ha: Bayan na sami sakamakona, sai na sami abokina, Dr. Ojo na Tsangayar Ilimin Fannin Kimiyyar Kwamfuta a Jami'ar Legas, domin ya haɗa ni da kamfanin ke ba da horo ba biya daga cikin abokan hulɗar Oricle a wannan ƙasa a lokacin.
sw: Baada ya kupata cheti changu, nilipata rafiki, Dr. Ojo wa idara ya sayansi ya tanakirishi huko UNILAG, ili kuniunganisha na mafunzo ya kazi ya kujitolea katika mmoja wa washirika wakuu walioidhinishwa na Oracle nchini kote.
yo: Lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí mo gba ìwé ẹ̀rí mi tán, mo ní ọ̀rẹ́ kan tí orúkọ rẹ̀ ń jẹ́ Dr. Ojo tí ó wà ní ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ ṣáyẹ́ǹsì kọ̀m̀pútà ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga fásitì Èkó láti ṣe alátọ̀nà mi sí ìfojúṣíṣẹ́ aláìlówó nínú ọ̀kan lárá ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó jẹ́ ọ̀gá jù lọ nínú ìmọ̀ Oracle ní orílẹ̀-èdè nígbà náà.
zu: Ngemva kokuthola isitifiketi sami, ngathola umngane wami, uDkt. Ojo womnyango weComputer Science e-UNILAG, ukuba angixhumanise nomsebenzi wokufunda umsebenzi ongakhokhelwa komunye wabalingani abaphezulu abagunyaziwe be-Oracle ezweni wangaleso sikhathi.

am: በምሽት ዶ/ር ልሆን የቻልኩበት እና በቀን የኦራክል መረጃ ቋት አስተዳዳሪ ልሆን የቻልኩት
en: That's how I became a doctor by night and Oracle Database Admin by day.
ha: Ta haka na zamo Likita dare ɗaya na kuma zamo Adimin na Manhajar Rumbun Adana Bayanai Na Kanfanin Oricle.
sw: Ndivyo nilivyokuwa usiku daktari na mchana msimamizi wa hifadhi data za Oracle.
yo: Báyìí ni mo ṣe di dókítà lọ́wọ́ alẹ́ ti mo sì di alákoso ọpọlọ Oracle lóju-ọjọ́.
zu: Yileyo ndlela engaba ngayo udokotela ebusuku kanye ne-Oracle Database Admin emini.

am: ይህ በ2001እ.ኤ.አ አካባቢ ነው፡፡
en: This was around 2001.
ha: Wannan a wajajen shekarar 2001 ne.
sw: Hii ilikuwa mnamo 2021.
yo: Èyí wáyé ní nǹkan bí ọdún 2001.
zu: Lokhu kwenzeka cishe ngo-2001.

am: ከፈርስት ባንግ ጋር በወቅቱ ፕሮጀክት ላይ የሰራን ሲሆን ይህም እውነተኛ መረጃ ቋቶች ላይ እጆቼን እንዳቆሽሽ በእርግጥም መልካም አጋጣሚ ሆኖኛል፡፡
en: We were working on a project with First Bank at the time and this really gave me an opportunity of getting my hands dirty with real life databases.
ha: Lokacin muna aiki da Bankin First Bank wannan ya ban dama in tsoma hannuna a cikin harkar sarrafa manhajar rumbun adana bayanai.
sw: Tulikuwa tukifanya kazi katika mradi wa First Bank nwakati huo na hii ilinipa fursa ya kutumia hifadhi data katika maisha yangu.
yo: À ń ṣiṣẹ́ àkànṣe pẹ̀lú ilé-ìfowópamọ́ First Bank nígbà náà èyí sì fún mi ní àǹfààní láti tọwọ́ bọ àt`ojọ ìpìlẹ̀ ojú ayé ní ti sàn-án sàn-án.
zu: Besisebenza kuphrojekthi neFirst Bank ngaleso sikhathi futhi lokhu kwanginikeza ithuba lokwenza umsebenzi kudathabheyisi yangempela.

am: ይህ ቴክ ውስጥ የገባሁበት መንገድ ነው፡፡
en: That's pretty much how I entered tech.
ha: Wannan shi ne bayanin yadda na shiga harkar kimiyyar fasaha.
sw: Hivyo ndivyo nilivyoingia kwenye teknolojia.
yo: Báyìí ni mo ṣe wọnú iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Yileyo ndlela-ke engangena ngayo kwezobuchwepheshe.

am: ኤምኤም፦ ለቴክኖሎጂ ያለዎትን ፍላጎት ለመፈፀም መድሃኒትህን ተመችቶህ ለማቆም የወሰንከው በምን ነጥብ ላይ ነው?
en: MM: At what point did you decide you could comfortably quit medicine to pursue your passion for tech?
ha: MM:A wanna lokacin ko wacce gaɓa ka yanke shawara barin harkar karatunilimin haɗa magungunaa ka faɗa harkar kimiyyar fasaha?
sw: MM: ni wakati gani uliamua kuwa unaweza kuacha utabibu kwaurahisi ili kufuata mapenzi yako ya teknolojia?
yo: MM: Ní dèédé ipò wo gan-an ni o ti pinu ó lè fi iṣẹ́ dókítà sílẹ̀ látí lé àlá rẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ?
zu: MM: Unqume ngasiphi isikhathi ukuthi ungawuyeka ngokukhululekile ukuba ngudokotela ukuze wenze lokhu okuthanda okungubuchwepheshe?

am: ዲኦ ሴናተር አዮ አሪሲ ጋር ተገናኝቼ በወቅቱ ሴናተር አልነበሩም ከአሜሪካ ካርድስ ቴክኖሎጂ ሊሚትድ/ሲቲኤል ለመመስረት የመጡ
en: DO: I met Senator Ayo Arise — he was not a Senator at the time — who came back from the US to found Cards Technology Limited (CTL).
ha: DO: Na haɗu da Sanata Ayo Arise-- ba sanata ba ne a lokacin, wanda ya zo daga Amurka don samar da fasahar Cards Technology Limited(CTL). (Kanfanin Samar da kainan Waya Da Harkar sai Da Su a internet).
sw: DO: Nilikutana na Seneta ayo Arise, hakuwa seneta wakati huo ambaye alirudi kutoka marekani kuanzisha Card technologies Limited (CTL).
yo: DO: Mo pàdé abẹnugan ilé ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin Ayọ̀ Aríṣe — ọmọ ilé-ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin ni ó jẹ́ nígbà yẹn — ó wá láti ìlú Amẹ́ríkà láti ṣe àwárí ilé-iṣẹ́ Cards Technology Limited (CTL).
zu: DO: Ngahlangana neLungu lesiGele (Senator) u-Ayo Arise — wayengelona iLungu lesiGele ngaleso sikhathi — owayebuye e-US ezosungula iCards Technology Limited (CTL).

am: በዚህ ወቅት ናይጄሪያ ውሰጥ ከባህሉ ካርደ በስተቀር ካርዶቸ የሉም
en: There were no cards in Nigeria by this time asides ValuCard.
ha: Babu katuna a Nijeriya a lokacin in ban da katin ValuCard.
sw: Hakukuwa na kadi nchini Nigeria kwa wakati huo mbali na Valu card.
yo: Kò sí àwọn káàdì ní Nàìjíríà ni ìgbà yẹ̀n àyàfi ValuCard.
zu: Ayengekho amakhadi eNigeria ngalesi sikhathi ngaphandle kwe-ValuCard.

am: በዛ ወቅት ምን አልባትም 10 ሺ ብቻ ነበሩ፡፡
en: There were probably only about 10,000 of them at that time.
ha: Akwai su kusan dubu goma a lokacin.
sw: Labda kulikuwa na 10,000 tu kati yao wakati huo.
yo: Àwọn nǹkan bí 10, 000 wọn ni ó wà nígbà náà.
zu: Cishe kwakukhona ayengaba yizi-10,000 kuphela ngaleso sikhathi.

am: በብሮድ መንገድ ላይ በናይጄሪያ ሶሻይቲ ጄኔራል ባንክ ባለቤትነት የተያዙ 2 ኤቲኤሞች ብቻ እንደነበሩ አስታውሳለሁ።
en: I remember there only 2 ATMs owned by Societe Genrale Bank Nigeria, in Broad Street.
ha: Zan iya tunawa akwai Injin ATM guda biyu a lokacin wanda Bankin Societe Gnerale Bank Of Nigeria Ya mallaka a Broad Street.
sw: Nakumbuka kuna ATM 2 tu zinzomilikiwa na Benki ya Societis General Nigeria, katika mtaa wa Broad.
yo: Morántí pé ẹ̀rọ-ìgbówó (ATM) 2 ni ó wà tí ó jẹ́ ti Societe Genrale Bank Nigeria, ní òpópónà fífẹ̀ gbánlasa.
zu: Ngikhumbula ukuthi kwakukhona kuphela ama-ATM ama-2 ayengaweSociete Genrale Bank Nigeria, eBroad Street.

am: ሴናተር አሪሲ ኤሌክትሮኒክ ክፍያዎች ራዕሱን ለእኔ ሰጠ እሱንም ለመተግበር ታርኩ፡፡
en: Senator Arise painted his vision for electronic payments to me and I latched on to it.
ha: sanata Arise ya bayyana tunaninsa na biyan kuɗi ta internet ni kuma na fahimce shi.
sw: Seneta Arise alichora maono yake malipo ya kielektroniki kwangu na nikayashikilia.
yo: Ọmọ ilé-ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin Aríṣe ṣàgbékalẹ̀ àfojúsùn rẹ̀ nípa ṣísàn owó pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún mi tí mo sì ń ṣiṣẹ́ tọ̀ ọ́.
zu: ILungu lesiGele u-Arise wangidwebela umbono wakhe wokukhokha ngensiza kagesi futhi ngabambelela kuwo.

am: ሕክምናን እንደምተው ስለማውቅ ለዚህ ቁርጠኛ ሆኛለሁ፡፡
en: I felt like this was something I could actually commit myself to because I knew ultimately that I would quit medicine.
ha: Na ji kamar abu ne da zan iya sadaukar da kaina a kai, sboda na san daga baya zan bar harkar likitanci.
sw: Nilihisi kama hili ni jambo ambalo ningeweza kujitolea kwa sababu nilijua hatimaye kuwa nitaacha utatibu.
yo: Mo rò ó lọ́kàn pé ohun tí mo lè fara jìn sí ni nítorí pé mo mọ̀ pé màá padà fi iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègún òyínbó sílẹ̀.
zu: Nganginomuzwa wokuthi lokhu kuyinto engingazibophezela kuyo ngoba ngangazi ukuthi ekugcineni ngizoyeka ukuba udokotela.

am: ለአመታት ሲታገለኝ የቆየውን ችግር መፍታት ስችል ለእኔ ጥሩ ወቅት ነበረ፡፡
en: The defining moment for me was when I solved a problem that had been struggling with for about a year.
ha: Lokaci mai mahimmanci a gare ni, shi ne yayin da na warware matalar da ake fama da ita kusan shekara ɗaya.
sw: wakati wa kufafanua kwangu ni wakati nilitatua shida ambayo ilikuwa ikinisumbua kwa takribani mwaka mmoja.
yo: Ìgbéṣẹ̀ náà wáyé lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí mo yanjú ìṣòro tí ó ti ń kojú fún ọdún kan.
zu: Isikhathi esakwenza kwacaca lokhu kwaba lapho ngixazulula khona inkinga ebengilokhu ngiyithola ilukhuni isikhathi esingangonyaka.

am: ሴናተር አርሲ ጉዳዩን መፍታት ከቀጠልኩ ስራ እንደሚኖር ገልጸዋል፡፡
en: Senator Arise had assured me that if I could help resolve the issue, I had the job.
ha: Sana Arise ya tabbatar min da cewa in har zan iya taimakawa a magance matsalar, to ina da aiki (a gurin sa).
sw: Seneta Arise balikuwa amenihakikishia kuwa kama ningeweza kusaidia kutatua suala hilo, ningepata kazi.
yo: Abẹnugan ilé-ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin Aríṣe tí mu dámi lójú pé máà rí iṣẹ́ tí mo bá ti bá òun yanjú ìṣòro náà.
zu: ILungu lesiGele u-Arise wayesengiqinisekisile ukuthi uma ngingasiza ekuxazululeni inkinga, wayenginika umsebenzi.

am: በምሽት ዶክተር መሆኔን እና አሁንም ሌላኛውን የቀን ስራዬን ኦራክል ዲቢኤ(Oracle DBA) በቀን እየሰራሁ እንደሆነ አትርሱ።
en: Don't forget I was doctor by night and still working my other day job as an Oracle DBA by day.
ha: Kar ka manta na zama likita a dare ɗaya kuma har yanzu ina aikina na rana a matsayin me iya sarrafa manhajar Rumbun Adana Bayanai Na Kanfanin Oricle.
sw: Usisahau nikiuwa tabibu usiku na bado nikifanya kazi yangu nyengine ya siku kama Oracle DBA wakati wa mchana.
yo: Ẹ má gbàgbé pé mo sì ń ṣe dókítà lálẹ́ tí mo sì ń ṣiṣẹ́ mí gẹ́gẹ́ bí alákoso ìpìlẹ̀ dátà lójú ọjọ́.
zu: Ungakhohlwa ukuthi ngangingudokotela ebusuku futhi ngisasebenza omunye umsebenzi wami wasemini njenge-Oracle DBA emini.

am: ያለኝ ብቸኛ ጊዜ ምሸቱ ነው፡፡
en: The only time I had left was overnight.
ha: Lokaci da na fita kawai shi ne da daddare.
sw: wakati pekee ambao nilikuwa nimeondoka ulikuwa usiku mmoja.
