zu: Indlela engcono kakhulu yokuzilungiselela lokho ukusebenzela inkampani ekhona eyisekelo se-eCommerce, kodwa hhayi ngezinga leKonga neJumia, ngoba ungase ungatholi umuzwa wangempela wezinselele lapho.

am: ሲስተሙ እንዴት እንደሚሰራ በማወቅ ገበያ አካሄድ መለየት
en: The idea is to get first hand insight into how the system works and how the market is evolving.
ha: Hanyar da tafi dacewa ka kafa kanka ita ce ka yiwa kanfanoni da suke aiki tuni na harkar kasuwancin internet,amma banda waɗanda girmansu yakai kamar Kongo da Jumia, saboda baza ka taɓa samun haƙiƙanin sanin ƙalubalen da ya ke a ciki ba.
sw: Wazo ni kupata ufahamu wa kwanza jinsi mfumo unavyofanya kazi na jinsi soko linavyoendelea.
yo: Èròǹgbà ibẹ̀ ni láti rí bí ìlànà náà ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́ àti ọ̀rọ̀-ajé rẹ̀ ṣe máa ń lọ.
zu: Umqondo uwukuthola umbono wokuthi uhlelo lusebenza kanjani nokuthi imakethe iguquka kanjani.

am: ኤምኤም፦ በአጠቃላይ ለጀማሪ ሥራ ፈጣሪዎች ምን ምክር ይሰጣሉ?
en: MM: What advice would you give budding entrepreneurs in general?
ha: MM: Waɗanne shawarwari za ka bawa 'yan kasuwa masu tasowa?
sw: MM: Je, ungewapa ushauri gani wajasiliamali chipukizi kwa ujumla?
yo: MM: Àmọ̀ràn wo ni wà á fún àwọn olókoòwò tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń dìde gòkè bọ̀?
zu: MM: Yisiphi iseluleko ongasinikeza osomabhizinisi abakhulayo jikelele?

am: ዲኦ መዘጋጀት አለብህ፡፡
en: DO: You need to be prepared.
ha: DO: Akwai buƙatar ka shirya.
sw: DO: Unahitaji kuwa tayari.
yo: DO: O níláti gbáradì.
zu: DO: Kudingeka uzilungiselele.

am: ከግሎ በፊት ያልተሳኩ ብዙ ቢዝነሶች ነበሩኝ፡፡
en: Long before Gloo, I had a bunch of business that failed.
ha: Can da kafin zuwan kanfaninn Gloo, Na yi kasuwanci da yawa da suka durƙushe.
sw: Muda mrefu kabla ya Gloo, nilikuwa na kundi la biashara ambalo halikufaulu.
yo: Ní àwọn àkókò kan ṣẹ́yìn kí Gloo tó dé, mo ti ṣe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iṣẹ́ tí ó tíó ní ìjákulẹ̀.
zu: Esikhathini eside ngaphambi kweGloo, nganginenqwaba yamabhizinisi angazange aphumelele.

am: ከዚያ አይነቱ ልምድ ትማራለህ፡፡
en: But you learn from experiences like that.
ha: Amma kana koyo ne daga abubuwan da suke faruwa.
sw: Lakini unajifunza kutokana na uzoefu kama huo.
yo: Ṣugbọ́n a máa kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ látara ìríri náà ni.
zu: Kodwa uyafunda kulokho okukwehlelayo okufana nalokho.

am: ያለ ድርጅት ላይ መስራት በተለይ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ እንደሲሊኮን ቫሪ ከፍተኛ ኢኮ ሲስተም አለመኖር ስራ ፈጣሪን ለማግኘት መልካም አጋጣሚ ይሆናል፡፡
en: Working in an existing venture, especially in Nigeria where there is no robust ecosystem like in Silicon Valley, is the best opportunity you have to absorb what entrepreneurship really is.
ha: Aikin a sana'ar da aka fara yin ta a Nijeriya,musamman a inda ba yanayi mai inganci kamar a Sillicon Valley, ita ce ta fi dacewa ka fahimci yadda ainihin sana'ar take.
sw: Kufanya kazi katika mradi uliopo, hususani nchini Nigeria ambapo hakuna mfumo ikolojia thabiti kama huko Silicon Valley, ndio fursa bora zaidi unayo kupata ujasiliamali ni nini.
yo: Ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ ní níbi àwọn okòòwò tí ó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀, pàápàá jù lọ níbi tí kò ti ṣí ètò ọrọ ajé tí ó fìdí múlẹ̀ dáadáa bí ti èyí tí ó wà ní Silicon Valley jẹ́ èyí tí ó dára jù láti ní ìmọ̀ ohun tí ìdókòwò gan-an jẹ́ ní pàtó.
zu: Ukusebenza ebhizinisini elivele likhona, ikakhulukazi eNigeria lapho kungekho khona uhlelo oluqinile lwezinto ezinamandla ezifana neSilicon Valley, kuyithuba elingcono kakhulu onalo lokuthola ukuthi yini ngempela ukuba ngusomabhizinisi.

am: ነገሮችን በቅድሚያ ማየት እንዲችሉ ከመስራች ሰራተኞች አንዱ መሆን ከቻሉ የተሻለ ነው።
en: Even better if you could be one of the foundation staff so you can see things first hand.
ha: Zai ma iya zama abun da yafi kyau ka zamo wanda yasamar da sana'ar don ka ga yadda abubuwa suke.
sw: Bora zaidi kama unaweza kuwa mmoja wa wafanyakazi wa msingi ili uweze kuona mambo kwanza.
yo: Kì bá dára tí ó bá lè jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ àjọ náà láti lè máa rí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí ó lábùlà níbẹ̀.
zu: Okungcono nakakhulu uma ungaba omunye wabasebenzi besisekelo ukuze ukwazi ukubona izinto mathupha.

am: ይህ የምሰጠው ምክር ነው፡፡
en: That's best advice I can give.
ha: Wannan ita ce shawara mafi dacea da zan iya baks.
sw: Huo ndio ushauri bora ninaoweza kukupa.
yo: Ìyẹn ni àmọ̀ràn tí ó dára jù lọ tí mo lè fún ọ.
zu: Lesi yiseluleko esingcono kakhulu engingasinikeza.

am: በነባር ድርጅት ውስጥ እንደ መስራች ሰራተኛ ይስሩ።
en: Work as a foundation staff in an existing venture.
ha: Yin aiki a matsayin ma'aikaci a wani kasuwanci da aka riga aka fara.
sw: Fanya kazi kama mfanyakazi wa msingi katika mradi uliopo.
yo: Ṣe iṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan lára ìgbìmọ̀ àjọ ibi ìdókòwò kan tí ó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: Sebenza njengomsebenzi owenza okuyisisekelo ebhizinisini eselivele likhona.

am: ስለ አፋጣኝ ኢንኩቤተሮች እና አክስለሬተሮች ሁሉንም እርሳው፡፡
en: Forget all the hype about incubators and accelerators.
ha: Ka manta da duk wata farfaganda game da injinan ƙyanƙyasa ko Injinan ƙara gudu.
sw: sahau hype zote kuhusu vitotozi na vichapuzi.
yo: Gbàgbé gbogbo àṣọdùn jíjẹ́ ẹni àgbéga àti ìsáré gòkè wọn.
zu: Khohlwa yikho konke okubatshazwayo mayelana nama-incubator nama-accelerator.

am: ናይጄሪያ እንደዛ አይሰራም፡፡
en: Nigeria doesn't work like that.
ha: Najeriya ba a haka ta ke aiki ba.
sw: Nigeria haifanyi kazi hiyo.
yo: orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà kì í ṣe é bẹ́yẹn.
zu: INigeria ayisebenzi kanjalo.

am: ኤምኤም፦ የግሎ የረጅም ጊዜ እቅድህ ምንድነው?
en: MM: What's your long term vision for Gloo?
ha: MM: Menen dogon burika game da kanfanin Gloo?
sw: MM: Yapi malengo yako ya muda mrefu kwa Gloo?
yo: MM: Kín ni àfójúsùn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ yín fún Gloo?
zu: MM: Uyini umbono wakho wesikhathi eside ngeGloo?

am: ዲኦ ናይጄሪያን አሁን በመመልከት የችርቻሮ ልማት በተለይ ሱፐርማርኬት ከአሜሪካ ጋር ሲነጻጸር
en: DO: Take a look at Nigeria now in terms of retail development, particularly the supermarket space, in comparison to the US.
ha: DO:Ka dube Najeriya a yanzu dangane da cigaban sarara da kaya,musamman fagen sufamaket in ka kwatanta da Amurka.
sw: DO: Angalia Nigeria sasa katika masuala ya maendeleo ya rejareja, hususani nafasi maduka makubwa kwa kulinganisha na Marekani.
yo: DO: Wo orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà báyìí nípa ìdàgbàsókè tí ó dé bá ìtàjà alábọ́dé, pàápàá jù lọ ní ìgbọ́ni ilé-ìtàjà ìgbàlódé tí a bá fi wé ti orílẹ̀-èdè US.
zu: DO: Bheka iNigeria manje mayelana nokuthuthukiswa kwezitolo, ikakhulukazi indawo yamasuphamakethe, uma kuqhathaniswa ne-US.

am: አሜሪካ ውስጥ 80 ፐርሰንት የገበያ ድርሻ ለዘመናዊ ችርቻሮ አላቸው፡፡
en: In the US, they have 80% market share for formal modern retail.
ha: A Amurka,suna da kashi tamanin daga cikin ɗari na hannun jarin kasuwa don harkar sarar da kaya ta zamani.
sw: Nchini Marekani wana 80% ya soko la rejareja rasmi la kisasa.
yo: Ní orílẹ̀-èdè US, wọ́n ní ẹ̀tọ́ tí ó jẹ́ 80% fún ìtajà alábọ́dé onílànà tótọ́ ti ìgbàlódé.
zu: E-US, banesabelo semakethe esingama-80% sokudayisa kwesimanjemanje.

am: ይህ ብሪክ እና ሞርታር (brick and mortar) መደብር እንደ ዎል ማርት ፣ ታርጌት እና ከዚያም ኢ-ኮሜርስን ያካትታል፡፡
en: That includes brick and mortar stores like Walmart, Target and then eCommerce.
ha: Wanna ya haɗa da Kananoni kamar su Walmart da Target da kuma Kamfanonin na kasuwancin internet.
sw: Hiyo inajumuisha maduka ya matofali na chokaa kama vile Walmart, Target na kisha eCommerce.
yo: Ìyẹn náà pẹ̀lú àwọn iléìtàjà alábọ́dé tí ó dàbí ti ayélujára bí i Walmart, Target àti okòòwò ayélujára.
zu: Lokho kuhlanganisa izitolo eziyizizakhiwo ezifana neWalmart, iTarget bese kuba yi-eCommerce.

am: ኢ ኮሜርስ የአጠቃላየ ገበያው 5 ፐርሰንት ብቻ አለው፡፡
en: eCommerce has only about 5% of the entire market.
ha: Harkar kasuwanci ta internet tana da kashi biyar ne kawai cikin ɗari na duka kasuwancin.
sw: eCommerce ina takribani 5% tu ya soko zima.
yo: Okòòwò ayélujára ní nǹkan bí ìdá márùn-ún péré nínú gbogbo ọrọ̀ ajé náà.
zu: i-eCommerce inemakethe ephelele engaba ngu-5% kuphela.

am: ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ተመሳሳይ ነው፡፡
en: In the UK it's the same.
ha: A Birtaniya ma haka abun yake.
sw: Uingereza hivyo hivyo.
yo: Ní orílẹ̀-èdè United Kingdom, bákàn náà ni.
zu: Kuyafana lokhu nase-UK.

am: ደቡብ አፍሪካ 60 ፐርሰንት ነው፡፡
en: In South Africa it's 60%.
ha: A Afirka ta kudu kuma kashi sittin cikin ɗari.
sw: Nchini afrika Kusini ni 60%.
yo: 60% ni ó jẹ́ ni ìlàrà-oòrùn Adúláwọ̀.
zu: ENingizimu Afrika ngu-60%.

am: በኬንያ ውስጥ መደበኛ ዘመናዊ ችርቻሮ 30% ነው።
en: In Kenya it's 30% for formal modern retail.
ha: A Kenya kuma Talatin a cikin ɗari.
sw: Nchini Kenya ni 30% kwa rejareja rasmi ya kisasa.
yo: Ní orílẹ̀-èdè Kenya, ó jẹ́ 30% fún àwọn ìtajà alábọ́dé ìgbàlódé onílànà tótó.
zu: EKenya ingu-30% ngokuphathelene nokudayisa okusemthethweni kwesimanjemanje.

am: ናይጄሪያ ስትመጣ 2 ፐርሰንት ብቻ ነው፡፡
en: But when you come to Nigeria, it's just 2%.
ha: Amma in kazo Najeriya kashi biyu ne cikin ɗari kawai.
sw: Lakini unapokuja Nigeria ni 2% tu.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí o bá wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, 2% péré ni.
zu: Kodwa uma uza eNigeria, kungu-2% nje kuphela.

am: ያ በሁለት ዋና አካላት መካከል ነው - ፓርክ 'ኤን' ሾፕ እና ሾፕራይቲ።
en: That's between two primary entities — Park 'n' Shop and Shoprite.
ha: Wannan tsakanin ɓangarori guda biyu ne -- Park 'n' Shop da Shorite.
sw: Hiyo ni kati ya vyombo viwili vya msingi-Park 'n' Shop na Shoprite.
yo: Ìyẹn wà láàrin àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìtajà méjì — Park 'n' Shop àti Shoprite.
zu: Lokho kuphakathi kwezinhlangano ezimbili eziyinhloko — Isitolo sePark 'n' Shop kanye neShoprite.

am: ሰዎች አጎራባች አነስተኛ እስቶር መሄድ እንደሚመርጡ ያሳይሀል፡፡
en: What that shows you is that people still prefer to go to their neighbourhood small store.
ha: abun da hakan zai nuna ma shi ne mutane har yanzu sun fu san su je sayayya a ƙananan shagunan unguwarsu.
sw: Kinachokuonyesha ni kwamba watu bado wanapendelea kwenye duka lao dogo la jirani.
yo: Ohun tí èyí ń sọ fún ẹ ni pé àwọn ènìyàn fẹ́ràn láti lọ ra ọjà nílé ìtaja kékeré alájọgbé wọn.
zu: Lokho kukubonisa ukuthi abantu basancamela ukuya esitolo esincane sendawo abahlala kuyo.

am: አስታውሳለሁ የዛሬ 2 ወር ገደማ፣ ከግዙፉ የችርቻሮ መሸጫዎች በአንዱ የተለመደውን የውድድር ቅኝት አድርጌ ነበር።
en: I remember about 2 months ago, I went on my customary competitive scan at one of the huge retail outlets.
ha: Na tuna wata biyu da suka wuce, na je bincikena na ƙwafaf a manyan cibiyoyin kasuwanci.
sw: Nakumbuka kama miezi 2 iliyopita nilichanganua shindano langu la kimila katika moja wapo ya maduka makubwa ya rejareja.
yo: Mo rántí ní nǹkan bí oṣù 2 tí mo lọ fún ìlànà ìyànàná ìbáfigagbága ní ilé ìtajà akábọ́dé kan tí ó tóbi.
zu: Ngikhumbula cishe ezinyangeni ezi-2 ezedlule, ngaqhubeka nokuyohlola okwenzekayo kwengincintisana nabo kwesinye sezitolo ezinkulu zokuthengiswayo.

am: ኒራ 8000 የሚሆኑ ምርቶች ብገዛም እሁድ ከሰዓት በኃላ ገበያ መውጫ 2፡30 ደቂቃ ፈጅቶብኛል፡፡
en: I bought ₦8000 worth of products but it took me 2 hours 30 minutes to checkout, on a Sunday afternoon.
ha: Na sayo kayan da suka kai dubu takwas amma ya ɗauke ni sa'a(awa) biyu da minti talatin in yi bincike ranar lahadi da rana.
sw: Nilinunua bidhaa zenye thamani ya N8,000 lakini ilichukua masaa 2 na dakika 30 kulipa, Jumapili mchana.
yo: Mo ra ọjà tí ó tó bí ₦‎8000 ṣùgbọ́n ó gbà mí tó bí wákàtí 2 àti ìṣẹ́jú 30 kí n tó lè yanjú ara mi láti jádé lọ́sàn-án ọjọ́ ìsìnmi.
zu: Ngathenga imikhiqizo yenani elingu-₦8000 kodwa kwangithatha amahora ama-2 imizuzu engama-30 ukwazi ukukhokha ngiphume, ngeSonto ntambama.

am: ከዚያ ውስጥ 1 ሰአት ከ45 ደቂቃው ወረፋው ላይ ጠፍቷል።
en: About 1 hour 45 mins of that was spent on the queue itself.
ha: Kusan awa da mintuna arba'in da biyar a layi.
sw: Takribani saa 1 na dakika 45 kati ya hizo zenyewe zilitumika kwenye foleni.
yo: Nǹkan bí wákàtí 1 àti ìṣẹ́jú 45 ni mo lò níbi tí mo ti tò.
zu: Ngachitha cishe ihora eli-1 imizuzu engama-45 yaleso sikhathi ngangime emgqeni.

am: ሰዎች እዛ ለመሄድ ለምን መረጡ፡፡
en: But why do people keep going there?
ha: Amma me yasa mutane suke zuwa can?
sw: Kwa nini watu wanaendelea kwenda huko?
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n kí ló dé tí àwọn ènìyàn fí ń lọ síbẹ̀?
zu: Kodwa kungani abantu beqhubeka beya laphaya?

am: ባላቸው ምርጫ ምክንያት ነው፡፡
en: Because of the selection that they have.
ha: Saboda da zaɓin da suke da shi.
sw: Kwa sababu ya uchaguzi walio nao.
yo: Nítorí àṣàyàn tí wọ́n ní.
zu: Kungenxa yezinketho abanazo.

am: እነዚህ ሰዎች ሰዎችን ለረጅም ጊዜ ሆን ብለው ማቆየት አይፈልገም፡፡
en: These guys don't deliberately want to keep people that long.
ha: Waɗannan gayun ba da gangan suka tsayar da mutane tsawon lokaci ba.
sw: Watu hao hawataki kwa makusudi kuwaweka watu kwa muda mrefu.
yo: Arákùnrin yìí kò kan mọ̀-ọ́n mọ̀ fẹ́ dá àwọn ènìyàn dúró pẹ́ jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ ni.
zu: Laba bantu abafuni ukugcina abantu isikhathi eside kangako ngamabomu.

am: ያላቸው ችግር በጡብ እና ሞርታር መገደባቸው ነው፡፡
en: The challenge that they have is they're constrained by brick and mortar.
ha: ƙalubalen da suke fuskanta shi ne,su na ta'allaƙa da kantuna.
sw: Changamoto waliyonayo ni kubanwa na matofali na chokaa.
yo: Ìṣòro kan tí wọ́n ní ni pé wọ́n dúró lórí ilé-ìtàja alábọ́dé aláfojúrí.
zu: Inselele abanayo ukuthi bavaleleke esakhiweni.

am: ብዙ ስቶሮች በመክፈት ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ሪልስቴት በጣም ውድ ነው፡፡
en: They need to open more stores but, in Nigeria, real estate is very expensive.
ha: Su na buƙatar su buƙe kantuna da yawa, amma a Najeriya gini yana tsada.
sw: Wanahitaji kufungua maduka zaidi lakini, nchini Nigeria, mali isiyohamishika nia ghali sana.
yo: wọ́n nílò láti ṣí àwọn ilé ìtajà díẹ̀ si, ṣùgbọ́n ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, ilẹ̀ àti ilé wọ́n.
zu: Kudingeka ukuthi bavule izitolo ezengeziwe kodwa, eNigeria, izakhiwo zibiza kakhulu.

am: ናይጄሪያ እንደ ወጪ ትልቅ ሱፐርማርኬት በማቀድ ስላልበለጸገች ፋይናንስ ጉዳዩ ባይሆንም አመቺ ቦታ ማግኘት በራሱ ትልቅ ችግር ነው፡፡
en: Because Nigeria wasn't developed with the plan of having big supermarkets like abroad, even if finance was not an issue, getting the suitable location in the first place is a big challenge.
ha: Saboda Nijeriya ba ta tsarin samar da manyan shaguna ba kamar a ƙasar waje, ko da sha'anin kuɗi bai zama matsala ba, samun gurin da ya dace babban ƙalubale ne.
sw: Kwa sababu Nigeria haikuundwa na mpango wa kuwa na maduka makubwa kama nje ya nchi, hata kama fedha haikuwa tatizo, kupata eneo linalofaa kwanza ni changamoto kubwa.
yo: Nítorí pé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà kò dàgbàsókè láti pẹ̀lú ìpinu láti ní ilé-ìtajà ìgbàlódé tí ó tóbi bí ti ilẹ̀ òkèèrè kó dà kí ó má jẹ̀ ẹ́ pé owó gan-an ni ìṣòro, rírí àwọn ààyè tí ó dára ni yóò kọ́kọ́ jẹ́ ìṣòro ńlá.
zu: Ngenxa yokuthi iNigeria ayizange ithuthukiswe ngohlelo lokuba namasuphamakethe amakhulu njengasemazweni apheshayo, ngisho noma ezezimali zazingeyona inkinga, ukuthola indawo efanele kwayikona kuyinselele enkulu.

am: ማበልጸጉ ሌላው ችግር ነው፡፡
en: Developing it is another challenge.
ha: Raya gurin shi ma wani ƙalu bale ne.
sw: Kuikuza ni changamoto nyengine.
yo: Ṣíṣe ìdàgbàsókè jẹ́ àdojúkọ mìíràn.
zu: Ukuthuthuka kungenye inselele.

am: ሾፕራይቲ ለምሳሌ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ለ11 ዓመታት ቢቆይም በመለያ አገሪቱ 9 ስቶሮች ብቻ ገምብተዋል፡፡
en: Shoprite for example has been in Nigeria for about 11 years but they have built only 9 stores across the nation.
ha: Misali shagon Shaprite ya kasance a Nijeriya kimanin shekara 11, amma sun iya gina sito 9 ne kawai a faɗin ƙasa.
sw: Shoprite kwa mfano imekuwa nchini Nigeria kwa takribani miaka 11 lakini wamejenga maduka 9 pekee nchini kote.
yo: Fún àpẹẹrẹ ilé-ìtajà Shoprite ti wà ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà fún bí ọdún 11 ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò ní ju ilé-ìtajà mẹ́sàn-án lọ káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè.
zu: Isibonelo, iShoprite ibilokhu seyibe seNigeria cishe iminyaka engu-11 kodwa bakha izitolo eziyi-9 kuphela ezweni lonke.

am: ፓርክ 'ኤን' ሱቅ 25 ዓመቱ ነው፡፡
en: Park 'n' Shop has been here 25 years.
ha: Park 'n' Shop ya kasance anan Najeriya shekaru goma sha biyar.
sw: Park 'n' Shop imekuwa hapa kwa miaka 25.
yo: Ilé-ìtajà yà kí o rajà ti wà láti fún ọdún 25.
zu: Isitolo iPark 'n' shop seyibekhona iminyaka engama-25.

am: ወደ 2% የገበያ ድርሻ ለመድረስ ለሁለቱም በድምሩ 25 ዓመታት ፈጅቶባቸዋል።
en: It took both of them a combined 25 years to get to 2% marketshare.
ha: Ya ɗauke su shekara ashirin da biyar su sami ƙimar kashi biyu cikin ɗari na dararar hannun jarin kasuwa.
sw: Iliwachukua wote wawili kwa pamoja kwa miaka 25 kufikia sehemu ya soko ya 2%.
yo: Ó gba àwọn méjéèjì ní àpapọ̀ ọdún 25 láti ní ọrọ̀ ajé 2%.
zu: Kwabathatha bobabili iminyaka engama-25 ehlangene ukuze bafinyelele ku-2% wokwabelana ngemakethe.

am: እኛ 2 ዓመት ከግማሽ የሆነን ቢሆንም ፣ አጠቀለይ ሌጎስን ሸፍነናል፡፡
en: We've been around just two and a half years, yet we've covered the whole of Lagos.
ha: Mu kasance shekara biyu kacal da rabi amma mun mamaye Legas.
sw: Tumekuwa takribani miaka miwili na nusu tu, lakini tunashughulikia Lagos nzima.
yo: A ti wà nílẹ̀ láti ọdún méjì àti ààbọ̀ péré ṣíbẹ̀ a ti yíká gbogbo Èkó.
zu: Sesineminyaka emibili nengxenye nje kuphela, kodwa sesihlanganise yonke iLagos.

am: በሚቀጥለው ሩብ አመት ግላጎቱ ስላለ ወደ አቡጃ እንሄዳለን፡፡
en: We're going to Abuja next quarter - the demand is still there.
ha: Za mu je Abuja watanni uku masu zuwa- can su na da buƙata.
sw: Tunakwend Abuja robo ijayo, mahitaji bado yapo.
yo: A sì ń lọ sí apá ibìkan ní Àbújá - àwọn ènìyàn ń bèèrè wà níbẹ̀.
zu: Siya e-Abuja ngekota ezayo - kusenesidingo.

am: ብሪክ እና ሞርታር (brick and mortar) ሊመዘኑ በሚችሉት እና ፍላጎቱን በሚወስዱት እና ኢ-ኮሜርስ በሚሰራው መካከል ትልቅ ክፍተት አለ።
en: There is a huge gap between what the brick and mortar can scale to and take on that demand and what eCommerce can do.
ha: Akwai banbamci me faɗi tsakanin kanfanoni na gine dangane da buƙatun al'umma da kuma abun da harkar kasuwanci ta internet za ta iya yi.
sw: Kuna pengo kubwa katia ya kile matofali na chokaa kinaweza kufikia mahitaji hayo ni kile ambacho eCommerce inawez kufanya.
yo: Ìyàtọ̀ tí ó fojú hàn dáadáa ni ó wà láàrin ohun tí ilé ìtajà alábọ́dé lè wọ̀n àti bí wọ́n ṣe lè dá àwọn ènìyàn lóhùn sí àti èyí tí okòòwò orí ayélujára lè ṣe.
zu: Kunesikhala esikhulu phakathi kwalokho okungenziwa yizitolo ezisesakhiweni futhi kuthathe leso sidingo nalokho i-eCommerce engakwenza.

am: የምናየው ይሄን ነው፡፡
en: And that's what we see.
ha: Kuma wannan shi ne abun da zamu iya gani.
sw: Na ndiyo tunayoona.
yo: Ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ nìyẹn.
zu: Futhi yilokho esikubonayo.

am: የእኛ ራዕይ ግልጽ ነው- የናየጄሪያ ትልቁ ሱፐርማርኬት መሆን፡፡
en: Our vision is very clear — to become Nigeria’s biggest supermarket.
ha: Fatanmu a fili yake-- mu zamo sufamaket da tafi kowacce girma a Najeriya.
sw: Maono yetu yapo wazi sana, kuwa duka kubwa zaidi la Nigeria.
yo: Àfojúsùn wa farahàn gedegbe - láti di ilé-ìtajà ìgbàlódé tí ó tóbi jù lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: Umbono wethu ucace bha — ukuba yisuphamakethe enkulu kunazo zonke eNigeria.

am: አትቀላቅሉት፡፡
en: Don’t mix it up.
ha: Kar ka cakuɗa shi.
sw: Usichanganye.
yo: Máṣe dàárú.
zu: Ungakuhlanganisi lokhu.

am: አሁን የናይጄሪያ ትልቁ የኢነትርኔት ሱፐርማርኬት ነን፡፡
en: We are already Nigeria’s biggest online supermarket.
ha: Mu ne babbar kasuwar zamani da tafi kowacce a Najeriya.
sw: Tayari sisi ni duka kuu la mtandaoni la Nigeria.
yo: A ti di ilé-ìtajà ìgbàlódé ayélujára tí ó tóbi jù lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: Sesivele siyisuphamakethe enkulu eku-inthanethi yaseNigeria.

am: የምንሮጠው ሩጫ ከሾፒሪት እና ፓርክ n ሱቅ ይልቅ ትልቅ ለመሆን ነው።
en: The race we are running is to be as big as Shoprite and Park n Shop.
ha: Abin da muke hanƙoron shi ne samun fiye da shagon Shoprite da Park n Shop.
sw: Mbio tunazokimbia ni kubwa kama Shoprite na park 'n' shop.
yo: Eré ohun tí à ń ṣá ni láti tóbi bí ilé-ìtajà Shoprite àti ilé-ìtajà yà kó o rajà.
zu: Umncintiswano esiwugijimayo uzoba mkhulu njengeShoprite kanye nePark n Shop.

am: ባለፈው ፋይናንሺያል አመት ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ሶፕራይቲን 400 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ገበያ አግኝቶአል፡፡
en: Shoprite had $400 million revenue in Nigeria last financial year.
ha: Shoprite ha sami kuɗin shiga har dala miliyan ɗari huɗu a Najeriya shekarar da ta wuce.
sw: Shoprite ilikuwa na mapato ya dola milioni 400 nchini Nigeria mwaka wa fedha uliopita.
yo: ilé-ìtajà Shoprite ní mílíọ̀nù $400 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà gẹ́gẹ́ bí owó tí ó wọlé bí ìsúná ní ọdún tí ó kọjá.
zu: IShoprite yayinemali engenayo eyizigidi ezingu-$400n eNigeria ngonyaka wezimali odlule.

am: የእነሱ 10 ቢሊየን ዶላር ገቢ 4 ፐርሰንት ነው፡፡
en: That’s 4% of their $10 billion group revenue.
ha: Wato kashi huɗu cikin ɗari na dala biliyan goma na duk kuɗin shigarsu.
sw: Hiyo ni 4% ya mapato yao ya kikundi cha bilioni $10.
yo: Ìyẹn jẹ́ 4% nínú bílíọ̀nù $10 tí ó ń wọlé lápapọ̀.
zu: Lokho kungu-4% wemali yabo yeqembu eyizigidigidi ezingu-$10.

am: የናይጄሪያ ትልቁ ሱፐርማርኬት ለመሆን የሚያስፈልገው የናይጄሪያን ብራንድ መጠቀም ነው፡፡
en: To be Nigeria’s biggest supermarket, all it takes is to be a Nigerian brand.
ha: Don kasancewa shago mafi girma a Nijeriya, abun da ake buƙata shi ne kasancewakamfanin Nijeriya.
sw: Ili kuwa duka kubwa zaidi la Nigeria, kinachohitajika ni kuwa rajamu ya Nigeia.
yo: Láti jẹ́ ilé ìtajà tí ó tóbi jù lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ohun tí ó gbà ni láti jẹ́ okòòwò orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: Ukuze ube yisuphamakethe enkulu kunazo zonke eNigeria, okudingekayo nje ukuba yibhrendi yaseNigeria.

am: ከሱፕራይቲ በላይ ትልቅ መሆን እንፈልጋለን ማለቴ አይደለም፡፡
en: We are not saying we want to be bigger than Shoprite.
ha: Bun mu ce muna son wuce Shoprite ba ne.
sw: Hatusemi tunataka kuwa wakubwa kuliko Shporite.
yo: A kò sọ pé a fẹ́ tóbi ju ilé-ìtaja Shoprite lọ.
zu: Asisho ukuthi sifuna ukuba bakhulu kunoShoprite.

am: አንድ የናየጄሪያ ትልቁ ሰፐርማርኬት ስንሆን የናይጄሪያ ግሎባል ኮም ትልቁ የቴሌኮም ኩባንያ እንደማለት ነው፡፡
en: But we will be Nigeria's biggest supermarket, the same way Globacom is Nigeria’s biggest telecoms company.
ha: Amma za mu zamo babbar kasuwar zamani mafi girma a Najeriya, daidai da yadda kanfanin Globalcom ya za kanfanin sadarwa mafi girma a Najeriya.
sw: Lakini tutakuwa duka kubwa zaidi la Nigeria, kama vile Globacom ni kamapuni kubwa zaidi ya mawasiliano ya Nigeria.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n a fẹ́ jẹ́ iléìtajà ìgbàlódé tí ó tóbi jù lọ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ ojú-òpó ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ Globacom ṣe jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ ojú òpó-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ tí ó tóbi jù lọ.
zu: Kodwa sizoba yisuphamakethe enkulu kunazo zonke eNigeria, ngendlela efanayo iGlobacom eyinkampani enkulu kunazo zonke yezokuxhumana eNigeria.

am: የናይጄሪያ ብራንድ በናይጄሪያውያን ተጀምሯል፡፡
en: It’s a Nigerian brand started by Nigerians.
ha: Kamfanin Nijeriya ne wanda 'yan Nijeriya suka fara.
sw: Ni rajamu ya kinaijeria iliyoanzishwa na wanaijeria.
yo: Ó jẹ́ okòòwò orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà tí ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà bẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀.
zu: Yibhrendi yaseNigeria eqalwe ngabantu baseNigeria.

am: ግሎ.ኤንጂ (Gloo.ng) ይህ ነው፡፡
en: That’s what Gloo.ng is.
ha: Wannan shi ne ma'anar Kamfanin Gloo.ng.
sw: Hivyo ndivyo Gloo.ng ilivyo.
yo: Ohun tí Gloo.ng jẹ́ nìyẹn.
zu: Yilokho iGloo.ng eyikho.

am: ራዕዩ ያ ነው፡፡
en: That’s the vision
ha: Wannan shi ne fata.
sw: Hayo ndio maono
yo: Ohun tí ó jẹ́ àfojúṣùn wa nìyẹn.
zu: Ngumbono wethu lowo

am: ስዊፒ ፋይናንሻል ሰርቪስስ ሊሚትድ ስዊፒን ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ አስጀምሯል፡፡
en: Swwipe Financial Services Limited Launches “Swwipe” in Nigeria.
ha: Kamfanin Swwipe Financial Services Limited ya ƙaddamar da tsarin Swwipe a Nijeriya.
sw: Swwipe Finencial Services Limited imezindua "swwipe" nchini Nigeria.
yo: Ilé-Iṣẹ́ Ètò-Owó Swwipe Ṣe Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ “Swwipe” ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: ISwwipe Financial Services Limited Yethula i-“Swwipe” eNigeria.

am: ታፕ ቱ ፔይ፣ በባንክ ገንዘብ ማስተላለፍ፣ ዩኤስኤስዲ፣ ፒንፓድ እና ፔይመንት ጌትዌይን ለንግድ ስራ ባለቤቶች የክፍያ መሰብሰብን እንደገና መስራት ።
en: Redefining Payment Collections for Business owners - Tap to Pay, Bank Transfers, USSD, PinPad and Payment Gateway
ha: Sake bayyanar da yadda ake karɓar biyan kuɗi ga 'yan kasuwa-- tsarin taɓa ka biya da aikawa da kuɗi ta banki da kuma yin amfani da lambar sirri ta USSD da tsarin biyan kuɗi na PinPad da kuma Tsari biyan kuɗi na Payment Gateway.
sw: Kufafanua upya mikusanyiko ya malipo kwa wamiliki wa biashara, gusa ili uipe, uhamisho wa kibenki USSD, Pinpad na malipo ya Gateway
yo: Ṣíṣé àtúnrọ ọ̀nà ìsanwówọlé fún àwọn onísòwò - tẹ̀ ẹ́ kí o sanwó, fífowó ránṣẹ́ ní ilé-ìfowópamọ́, fífi nọ́ḿbà ṣe ìdókòwò (USSD), PinPad ìlànà ìsanwó Gateway
zu: Ukuchazwa Kabusha Kokuqoqwa Kwezinkokhelo Zabanikazi Bebhizinisi - Thepha ukuze Ukhokhe, Okudluliselwa Ibhange, i-USSD, iPinPad kanye nePayment Gateway

am: እያንዳንዱን የንግድ ስራ ለማካሄድ ክፍያን የመሰብሰቢያ ዘዴ ያስፈልጋል፣ አንድ የንግድ ስራ ለማካሄድ ውጤታማ ብቻ ሳይሆን ለደንበኞች ብዙ አማራጮችን ይዞ የሚቀርብ የክፍያ መሰብሰቢያ ዘዴ ማልማት ያስፈልጋል፡፡
en: Payment collection is at the heart of every business operation, businesses need payment solutions that are not only efficient but also flexible enough to cater to a wide range of customer preferences.
ha: Karɓar biyan kudi kuɗi shi ne zuciyar kowane kasuwanci da aka ƙulla, harkoki suna buƙatar hanyoyin biyan kuɗi ba wai kawai masu yiwuwa ba sai dai masu sarrafuwa ta hanyoyi da dama domin biyawa abokan kasuwanci bukatunsu.
sw: Ukusanyi wa malipo ndio kitovu cha kila uendeshaji wa kibiashara, biashara zinahitaji suluhu za malipo ambazo sio tu zenye ufanisi lakini pia zinazonyumbulika vya kutosha kukidhi matakwa mbalimbali.
yo: Owó sísanwọlé ni ó wà lọ́kàn àwọn olùdókòòwò, àwọn okòòwò ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìsanwó tí ó káàtò tí ó sì rọrùn láti tẹ́ ọ̀gọ̀ọ̀rọ̀ àwọn oníbàárà lọ́rùn.
zu: Ukuqoqwa kwezimali ezikhokhwayo kuwumgogodla wakho konke ukusebenza kwebhizinisi, amabhizinisi adinga izixazululo zokukhokha ezingaphumeleli nje kuphela kodwa futhi ezivumelana nezimo ngokwanele ukuhlangabezana nezinhlobonhlobo zokuthandwa amakhasimende.

am: ስዊፒ ፋይናንሻል ሰርቪስስ ሊሚትድ፣ ተለዋዋይ ንግድ ስራ መጀመሪያ፣ ስዊፒ የሚባል መፍትሄ ይዞ የቀረበ ሲሆን ለሁሉም የንግድ ስራ ድርጅቶች የሚከፈላቸውን ክፍያዎችን ከግለሰብም ሆነ በኦንላይን በፍጥነት መቀበል የሚያስችል ስርዓት አቅርቧል፡፡
en: Swwipe Financial Services Limited, a dynamic startup, emerges with a solution called Swwipe that provides a cutting-edge platform that empowers businesses of all sizes to receive payments seamlessly, both in-person and online.
ha: Kanfanin Swwipe Fanacial Services Limited wani ƙaramin kanfani ne da bayyana da waraka me suna SWWipe wacce take samar da wani dandali wanda ya ke ƙarfafar ƙananan 'yan kasuwa su karɓi kuɗaɗansu cikin sauƙi hannu da hannu ko ta internet.
sw: Swwipe Finencial Services Limited, kampuni inayoanza kutumika, inaibuka na suluhu inayoitwa swwipe ambayo hutoa jukwaa la kisasa ambalo huwezesha biashara za ukubwa wowote kupokea malipo bila changamoto ana kwa ana, na mtandaoni.
yo: Ètò-Owó Swwipe, jẹ́ ìgbéṣẹ̀ tí ó lágbára tí ó kún fún ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí a pè ní Swwipe tí ó ń gbèsè ìkànì tí ó ń ṣe ìkúnlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn onírúurú okòòwò bí ó ti lè wù kí ó kéré tàbí kí ó tóbi mọ láti gba owó pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn yálà nípa gbígbà lókorojú tàbí lórí ayélujára.
zu: ISwwipe Financial Services Limited, inkampani eqalisayo enamandla, ivela ngesixazululo esibizwa ngokuthi iSwwipe esinikeza inkundla eseqophelweni eliphezulu enika amabhizinisi abo bonke ubukhulu amandla okuthola izinkokhelo kalula, kokubili ngokoqobo naku-inthanethi.

am: ለንግድ ስራ ድርጅቶች የቀረበ የክፍያ መፈጸሚያ መንገድ ላይ ከፍተኛ ለውጥ ለማምጣት ሲባል፣ ከስዊፒ ገጽታዎች ውስጥ ዝግጁነቱ እና ሁለገብ መሆኑ የሚገለጹ ናቸው፡፡
en: Building on its mission to transform the payment experience for Businesses, one of Swwipe's standout features is its commitment to versatility.
ha: Ginawa a kan manufarsa ta canja tsarin biyan kuɗi ga 'yan kasuwa, ɗaya daga cikin fitacciyar siffar Kamfanin SWWipe ita ce ƙtudirinsa na mamaya.
sw: Kwa kuzingatia dhamira yake ya kubadilisha hali ya malipo kwa biashara, moja wapo ya vipengele bora zaidi vya swwipe ni kujitolea kwake kwa matumizi mengi.
yo: Ṣíṣe àfikún rẹ̀ láti mú àyípadà bá ìlànà ìsanwó fún okòòwò, ọ̀kan lára àbùdá Swwipe pàtàkì ni nínú ìfarajìn nínú ṣíṣe oríṣìíríṣìí nǹkan.
zu: Ukwakha phezu komgomo wayo wokuguqula okwenzeka ekukhokheni kumaBhizinisi, esinye sezici ezivelele zeSwwipe ukuzibophezela kwayo ekusebenzeni ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene.

am: የንግድ ስራ ባለቤቶች ደንበኞቻቸው ክፍያ መፈጸም እንዲችሉ የሚያደርጉ የክፍያ መፈጸሚያ ስርዓት አቅርቧል፡፡
en: Business owners can now offer their customers a range of payment options, all within a single platform.
ha: Mamallaka harkokin kasuwanci yanzu za su iya samarwa da abokanan kasuwancinsu zaɓin hanyoyin biyan kuɗi iri iri duk da dandamali guda.
sw: Wamiliki wa biashara sasa wanaweza kuwapa wateja wao machaguo mbalimbali ya malipo, yote ndani ya jukwaa moja.
yo: Àwọn onísòwò lè fún àwọn oníbàárà wọn ní oríṣìíríṣìí ìlànà ìsanwó pẹ̀lú ìkànì kan ṣoṣo.
zu: Abanikazi bamabhizinisi manje sebenganikeza amakhasimende abo izindlela zokukhokha ezihlukahlukene, konke ngaphakathi kwepulatifomu eyodwa.

am: ከታፕ ቱ ፔይ መተግበሪያ እስከ ዩኤስኤስዲ፣ በባንክ ገንዘብ ማስተላለፍ፣ እና በካርድ ክፍያ መፈጸም ስርዓቶችን አካቶ፣ ስዊፒ እያንዳንዱ ደንበኛ በመረጠው መንገድ ክፍያ መፈጸም እንዲችል የሚያደርጉ ስርዓቶችን አዘጋጅቷል፡፡
en: From the seamless Tap-to-pay functionality to the familiarity of USSD, Bank Transfers, and Card payments, Swwipe ensures that every customer's preference is met.
ha: Daga tsarin mara lamba zuwa tsarin taɓa-ka-biya zuwa tsarin da aka sani na biyan kuɗi ta USSD, da tura kuɗaɗe ta banki da cirar kuɗi a katin Swwipe yana tabbatar da biyan buƙatar kwastoma.
sw: Kuanzia utendaji kazi wa gusa ili ulipe hadi ujuzi wa USSD, uhamisho wa kibenki na malipo ya kadi, swwipe huhakikisha kwamba mapebdeleo ya kila mteja yametimizwa.
yo: Láti ibi ìrọ̀rùn fọwọ́-kàn-án-kí-o-sanwó títí dé ibi ìfaramọ́lé ìfi nọ́ḿbà dókòòwò (USSD), ìfowóránṣẹ́ ní ilé-ìfowópamọ́, àti fífi káàdì sanwó, Swwipe ri dájú pé gbogbo ohun tí àwọn oníbàárà ń fẹ́ ni àwọn ṣe fún wọn.
zu: Kusukela ekusebenzeni kalula iTap-to-pay kuya ekujwayeleni i-USSD, Okudluliselwa Yibhange, Nokukhokha ngeKhadi, iSwwipe iqinisekisa ukuthi kuhlangabezwana nezinto eziningi ezithandwa amakhasimende.

am: ታፕ ቱ ፔይ ክፍያ ለመፈጸም እጅግ ቀላሉ አማራጭ ሲሆን የነጋዴው ስልክም ሆነ የደንበናው ካርድ ኤንኤፍሲ ሊኖራቸው ይገባል፡፡
en: The Tap to Pay feature is as simple as it sounds, to enjoy this feature, both the merchant's phone and the customer's card must be NFC-enabled.
ha: Tsarin Taɓa-ka-biya mai sauƙi ne kamar yadda aka kira shi, domin more wannan tsarin, dole ya zama katin mai saye da na mai sayarwa suna kan tsarin NFC-enabled.
sw: Kipengele cha gusa ili ulipe ni rahisi jinsi kinavyosikika ili kufurahia kipengele hiki, smu muuzaji na kadi ya mteja lazima ziwe zimewezeshwa na NFC.
yo: Àbùdá fọwọ́-kàn-án-kí-o-sanwó rọrùn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ó ṣe dún, láti jẹ ìgbádùn àbùdá yìí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ olùtajà àti káàdì oníbàárà ni ó gbọ́dọ̀ ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú NFC.
zu: Isici seTap to Pay sisibenziseka kalula njengoba kuzwakala, ukuze ujabulele lesi sici, kuko kokubili kuselula yomthengisi nekhadi lekhasimende kumele kuvunyelwe yiNFC.

am: እንዲህ መሆኑ ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ እና ፈጣን ገንዘብ ማስተላለፊያ መተግበሪያ እንዲኖር ያስችላል፡፡
en: This ensures a secure and rapid communication channel.
ha: Wannan yana tabbatar da keɓantacciyar hanyar sadarwa mai sauri.
sw: Hii inahakikisha njia salama na ya haraka ya mawasiliano.
yo: E`yí mú ìkànì ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ tí ó láàbọ̀ tí ó sì yá wá.
zu: Lokhu kuqinisekisa isiteshi sokuxhumana esiphephile nesisheshayo.

am: አንድ ጊዜ ክፍያ የመፈጸሚያ አማራጩ ከተመረጠ፣ ደንበኛው ካርዱን የደንበኛው ኤንኤፍሲ ያለው ስልክ ጀርባ ክፍል ላይ እንዲሰካ ማድግ ያለበት ሲሆን፣ በዚህ ጊዜ ለደንበኛው የፒን ቁጥር ማስገቢያ አማራጭ የሚመጣ ሲሆን ደንበኛው ይህንን ቁጥር በመሙላት ክፍያውን ከፍሎ ማጠናቀቅ ይችላል፡፡
en: Once the payment option is selected, the customer is prompted to tap their card at the back of the merchant's NFC-enabled phone, the pin input option pops up for the customer to enter his/her pin and transaction is completed.
ha: Da zarar an zaɓi irin biyan, sai a sa kwastoma ya zaɓi taɓa katinsa a bayan NFC na wayar ɗan kasuwar zai, sai a zaɓi wurin sanya lambar sirri wadda kwastoma zai shigar da lambobin sai kasuwanci ya kammala.
sw: Chaguola malipo likisha chaguliwa mteja anaombwa kugusa kadi yake nyuma ya simu ya mfanyabiashara inayoweza kutumia NFC, chaguo la kuweka pini litatokea ili mteja aweke pini yake na shughuli yake ikamilike.
yo: Ní kété tí o bá ti yan ìlànà ìsanwó, oníbàárà yóò tẹ káàdì wọn tí ó wà lẹ́yìn ẹ̀rọ-`ibánisọ̀rọ̀ olùtajà tí ó ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú NFC, ààyè títẹ nọ́ḿbà àsírí yóò hàn jádé fún oníbàárà láti tẹ̀, ìdókòòwò bá parí.
zu: Lapho inketho yokukhokha isikhethiwe, ikhasimende licelwa ukuthi lithephe ikhadi lalo ngemuva kweselula yomthengisi oluvunyelwe iNFC, inketho yokufaka iPIN iyavela ukuze ikhasimende lifake iPIN yalo bese kuphothulwa ukuthengiselana.

am: ስዊፒ ጫወታ ቀያሪ ስርዓት ሲሆን፣ ከዚህ ቀደም ክፍያ መፈጸሚያ መተግበሪያዎች ይልቅ ፈጣን እና አመቺ ነው፡፡
en: Swwipe is a game-changer, making payments faster and more convenient than ever before.
ha: Swwipe ya zo da sabon tsari, ya sanya biyan kuɗi cikin sauri da jin daɗi fiye da koyaushe.
sw: Swwipe ni kibadilishaji mchezo, kufanya malipo kwa haraka na kwa urahisi zaidi kuliko hapo awali.
yo: Swwipe jẹ́ olùyípadà ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀, sísanwó ní kíákíá pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn ju ti tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ.
zu: ISwwipe ishintsha indlela okwenziwa ngayo izinto, yenza ukukhokha kusheshe futhi kube lula kunaphambilini.

am: ጊዜ ገንዘብ ነው፣ እና ስዊፒ ይህንን በደንብ ይገነዘባል፡፡
en: Time is money, and Swwipe understands this well.
ha: Lokaci kuɗi ne kuma KaMfanin SWWipe ya fahimci hakan sosai.
sw: Wakati ni ukuta, na swwipe inaelewa hili vizuri.
yo: Àkókò ṣe pàtàkì, ósì yé Swwipe dáadáa.
zu: Isikhathi sidla imali, futhi iSwwipe ikuqonda kahle lokhu.

am: በ3 ደቂቃ ውስጥ ሂደቱ ውስጥ ሳይን አፕ ማድረግ የሚቻል ሲሆን፣ የንግድ ስራዎት ስዊፒን በመጠቀም ማቀላጠፍ የሚቻል ሲሆን ስዊፒን በመጠቀም የቀረቡ አመቺ ሁኔታዎችን በመጠቀም የንግድ ስራዎትን ያቀላጥፉ፡፡
en: With a swift 3-minute sign-up process, businesses can quickly join the Swwipe ecosystem and begin enjoying its myriad benefits.
ha: Da mintuna 3 kacal na tsarin shiga, kasuwanci zai iya samun gaggawar shiga tsari Swwipe kuma a fara more alfanunsa.
sw: Kwa mchakato wa haraka wa kujisajili wa dakika 3, biashara zinzaweza kujiunga kwa haraka na mfumo ikolojia wa swwipe na kuanza kufurahia manufaa yako mengi.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìlànà ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ta, oríṣìíríṣìí okòòwò lè darapọ̀ mọ́ ìlànà ọrọ̀ ajé Swwipe tí wọn yóò sì máa jẹ̀ ìgbádùn aláìlẹ́gbẹ̀ rẹ̀.
zu: Ngenqubo yokubhalisa esheshayo eyimizuzu emi-3, amabhizinisi angajoyina ngokushesha uhlelo lwensiza yeSwwipe futhi aqale ukujabulela izinzuzo zalo eziningi.

am: ሄንሪ ኤምቢኤ፣ የስዊፒ ዋና ስራ አስጻሚ ኮሚቴ አባል የኩንያው አላማ ለሁሉም የንግድ ስራ ድርጅቶች ስዌፒን በመጠቀም የክፍያ መፈጸሚያ መንገዳቸውን እንዲያዘምኑ እና ሁሉንም ክፍያዎችን በአንድ ጊዜ መፈጸም ማስቻል ነው፡፡
en: Henry Mba, CEO of Swwipe, stated, "Our goal has always been to make payment collection seamless for businesses of all sizes, with Swwipe, you have all your payments in one place.”
ha: Henry Mba CEO na kanfanin Swwipf ya ce," Manufarmu ita ce mayar da harkar biyan kuɗi me sauƙi ga dukkanin 'yan kasuwa koami ƙanƙantar su, tare da kanfanin Swwipe , za ku sami harkar biyan kuɗinku a waje ɗaya.
sw: Henry Mba, mkurugenzi mtendaji na swwipe, alisema "lengoletu siku zote limekuwa kufanya ukusanyaji wa malipo wa biashara za ukubwa tofauti, kwa kutumia swwipe, uwe na malipo yako yote mahali pamoja
yo: Henry Mba, Alákoso àti olùdarí Swwipe, ṣàlàyé pé àfojúsùn àwọn ni láti mú ìlànà ìsanwó rọrùn fún gbogbo onírúurú okòòwò, o lè sanwó rẹ lójú kan pẹ̀lú Swwipe.
zu: UHenry Mba, iCEO yeSwwipe, wathi, "Umgomo wethu bekulokhu kuwukwenza ukuqoqwa kwemali ekhokhwayo kube lula emabhizinisini awubukhulu obehlukene ngeSwwipe, unakho konke ukukhokhelana kwakho endaweni eyodwa."

am: የንግድ ስራ ፋይናንስ ሁኔታን ማስተዳደር አስቸጋሪ ነው፣ ነገር ግን ስዊፒ ይህን ሂደት አቅልሏል፡፡
en: Managing finances can be challenging, but Swwipe simplifies the process.
ha: Gudanar da hada hadar kuɗi abu ne mai wahala,sai dai Swwipe ya sauƙaƙa hakan.
sw: Kusimamia fedha kunaweza kuwa changamoto, lakini swwipe hurahisha mchakato.
yo: Ṣíṣàkóso ètò ìnáwó lè jẹ́ ìsòro, ṣùgbọ́n Swwipe jẹ́ kí ìlànà náà rọrùn.
zu: Ukwengamela izimali kungaba yinselele, kodwa iSwwipe ikwenza kube yinqubo elula.

am: ክፍያ መፈጸሚያ ስርዓቱን ቀልጣፋ በሆነ ሁኔታ በመጠቀም፣ ሌሎች ተወዳዳሪ ክፍያ ስርዓት መፈጸሚያዎችን መጠቀም በተሻለ መልኩ የፋይናንስ ግልጸኝነት ባለበት ሁኔታ ክፍያዎትን መፈጸም ይችላሉ፡፡
en: With instant settlement, businesses can enjoy real-time transparency and financial clarity at a subsidized rate compared to other competitors.
ha: Zama guri ɗaya nan da nan, harkar kasuwanci za ta more wa cikakken bayanin harkar kuɗi a farashi ma rahusa.
sw: Kwa malipo ya papo hapo biashara zinaweza kufurahia uwazi wa wakati halisi na uwezo wa kifedha kwa kiwango cha ruzuku ikilinganishwa na washindani wengine.
yo: Pẹ̀lú níní ojútùú kíákíá, àwọn okòòwò lè jẹ̀gbádún àkóyawọ́ ojúkorojú àti ìlànà ìnáwó tí ó mọ́ gaara lówó tí ó ga ju ara lọ yàtọ̀ sí ti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Ngokukhokhelwa ngokushesha, amabhizinisi angajabulela ukubona isikhathi sangempela nokucaca kwezezimali ngenani elixhasiwe uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izimbangi.

am: የተላለፉ ገንዘቦችን አስመልክቶ የፋይናንስ እርማት ለማድረግ ብዙ ቀኖችን መጠበቅ አያስፈልጎትም፣ ስዊፒ ለንግድ ስራ እንቅስቃሴዎት አፋጣኝ ውሳኔ መወሰን እንዲችሉ የሚያደርጉ መተግበሪያዎችን ይዞ ቀርቧል፡፡
en: No more waiting for days to reconcile transactions; Swwipe provides businesses with the tools they need for instant decision-making and peace of mind.
ha: Babu sauran jira na ranaku domin daidaita biyan kuɗi; Swwipe ya tanadar wa harkokin kasuwanci kayan aikin da suke buƙata kamar wajen yanke hukunci da kwanciyar hankali.
sw: Hakuana kusubiri kwa siku ili kupatanisha shughuli, swwipe huwapatia biashara zana wanazohitaji kwa ajili ya kufanya maamuzi ya hapo hapo na amani ya akili.
yo: Kò sí dídúró ọjọ́ kan fún okòòwò láti jíṣẹ́ tàbí ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́; Swwipe pèsè oríṣìíríṣìí ohun-èlò tí àwọn okòòwò nílò láti mú ìpinu wọn ṣẹ àti ìbàlẹ̀ ọkàn.
zu: Akusekho ukulinda izinsuku zokuvumelanisa ukuthengiselana; ISwwipe inikeza amabhizinisi amathuluzi awadingayo ekwenzeni izinqumo ngokushesha kanye nokuthula kwengqondo.

am: ፕላትፎርሙ ፈጣን የጥሬ ገንዘብ ክፍያ መፈጸሚያ ያቀረበ ሲሆን፣ ይህ ሁኔታ እያንዳንዱን ክፍያ ደህንነቱ በተጠበቀ ሁኔታ መፈጸም እንዲያስችል የሚያደርግ ነው፡፡
en: The platform offers robust cashier monitoring tools, allowing businesses to track transactions and ensure that every payment is handled with the utmost care.
ha: Dandamalin yana samar da ingantattun kayan aikin lura da kashiya, ya kuma baiwa harkoki damar bibiyar gudanawar kasuwanci domin a tabbatar da cewa kowane biya an yi shi cikin kula.
sw: Jukwaa linatoa dhana thabiti za ufatiliaji wa keshia kuruhusu biashara kufatlia miamala na kuhakikisha kuwa kila malipo yanashughulikiwa kwa uangalifu mkubwa.
yo: Ìkànì náà pèsè ohun-èlò ìdáàbòbò ìlùsanwó-gbowó, èyí tí ó fi ààyè sílẹ̀ fún àwọn okòòwò láti tọpaṣẹ̀ ìdókòòwò kí wọ́n sì ri dájú pé gbogbo ìṣanwó ni wọ́n fọwọ́ gidi mú.
zu: Ipulatifomu inikeza amathuluzi anamandla okuqapha ocashier, avumela amabhizinisi ukuthi alandelele ukuthengiselana futhi aqinisekise ukuthi yonke imali ekhokhwayo isingathwa ngokucophelela okukhulu.

am: የንግድ ስራ ባለቤቶች የሚፈልጉትን ያህል ገንዘብ ተቀባይ ሲስተሙ ላይ መጠቀም የሚያስችላቸው ሲሆን እነዚህ ገንዘብ ተቀባዮችን ግልጸኝበት በሚታይበት እና የሂሳብ ልዩነት እንዳይኖር በሚያደርግ መልኩ መቆጣጠር የሚያስችል ነው፡፡
en: Business owners can add as many cashiers as possible and monitor them with ease, enhancing transparency and reducing the chances of discrepancies.
ha: Mamallaka harkokin kasuwanci za su iya adadin kashiyoyinsu iya yanda suke buƙata, kuma su kula da su cikin sauƙi, gami da kyautata amana tare da daƙile yiyuwar samun matsaloli.
sw: Wamiliki wa biashara wanaweza kuongeza watunza fedha wengi iwezekanavyo na kufuatilia kwa urahisi kuongeza uwazi na kupunguza uwezekano wa hitilafu.
yo: Àwọn olókòòwò lè ṣàfikún olùsanwó gbowó lọ́pọ̀ yanturu tí wọn yóò sì máa sọ wọn pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn pẹ̀lú kíkákòóyawó àti mímú àdíkù bá ìwà àgàbàgebè.
zu: Abanikazi bamabhizinisi bangafaka ocashier abaningi ngangokunokwenzeka futhi babaqaphe kalula, benze ngcono ukuba sobala futhi banciphise amathuba okungahambi kahle.

am: የገንዘብ ክፍያ መፈጸምን አስመልክቶ የክፍያው አፈጻጸም ደህንነት መጠበቅ ከፍተኛ ትኩረት የሚያስፈልገው ሲሆን፣ እና ስዊፒ ይህን ጉዳይ በትኩረት ይመለከታል፡፡
en: Security is a paramount concern in the world of payments, and Swwipe takes it seriously.
ha: Tsaro / aminci wani abu ne mai me mahimmanci a duniyar harkar biyan kuɗi kuma kanfanin SWWIpe ya ɗauke shi da mahimmanci.
sw: Usalama ni jambo linalosumbua sana katika ulimwengu wa malipo, na swwipe, linachukulia kwa uzito.
yo: Ètò ààbò ṣe pàtàkì nínú ìlànà owó sísan Swwipe kò sì fi ṣeré rárá.
zu: Ukuphepha kuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu emhlabeni wokukhokhelana, futhi iSwwipe ikuthathela phezulu lokho.

am: ፕላትፎርሙ በፒሲአይ እና ዲኤስኤስ ፍቃድ ያለው ሲሆን እና ለንግድ ስራ ድርጅቶች እና ደንበኛዎች አመቺ የክፍያ ስርዓት በመሆኑ ምክንያት ከናይጄሪያ ማዕከላዊ ባንክ ፍቃድ አግኝቷል፡፡
en: The platform is PCI DSS certified and holds a license from the Central Bank of Nigeria, providing a robust layer of protection for both businesses and customers.
ha: Shafin shi ne Kanfanin PCI DSS yana da takardar sheda da kuma lasisi daga banban bankin ƙasa da yake samar da tsaro me gwai ga 'yan kasuwa da kuma abokan huɗɗarsu.
sw: Jukwaa hili limeidhinishwa na PCI DSS na hizo leseni hutoka benki kuu ya Nigeria, ikitoa safu thabiti ya ulinzi kwa biashara na wateja.
yo: Ìkànnì náà gbàsẹ-gbòǹtẹ̀ PCI DSS tí ó sì ní òǹtẹ̀ láti ọ̀dọ̀ ilé-ìfowópamọ́ àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, fún pípèsè ìpele ààbò tí ó tóbi fún oríṣìíríṣìí okòòwò àti oníbàárà.
zu: Le pulatifomu iqinisekisiwe yiPCI DSS futhi inelayisensi evela eCentral Bank of Nigeria, enikeza isivikelo esiqinile kubo bobabili amabhizinisi kanye namakhasimende.

am: ስዊፒ መተግበሪያ ሲሆን መተግበሪያውን ከፕሌይስቶር እና አፕል አፕስቶር ማውረድ ይችላሉ፡፡
en: The Swwipe app is on the Google playstore and Apple appstore.
ha: Manhajar Swwipe tana Runbun ajiye manhaja na Googl Playstore da kuma na Applestore.
sw: Programu ya swwipe ipo kwenye Google Playstore na Apple Appstore.
yo: Aápù Swwipe wà lórí ìkànnì Google playstore àti ìkànnì Apple appstore.
zu: Isisetshenziswa seSwwipe sikuGoogle playstore kanye ne-Apple appstore.

am: የንግድ ስራ ባለቤቶች ከደንበኞቻቸው ገንዘብ በቀላሉ ለመቀበል ብሎም የገንዘብ ማስተላለፍ ሂደትን አስመልክቶ ዝርዝር መረጃ ለማግኘት በሚያስችላቸው መልኩ ሲስተሙን የንግድ ስራ ድህረ ገጻቸው ላይ እንዲቀናጅ ማድረግ ይችላሉ፡፡
en: Business owners can also integrate a personalized payment gateway page on their business’s website or app to receive funds easily from their customers as well as a good monitoring tool to view transaction details.
ha: Sannan kuma mamallakn harkokin kasuwanci za su iya haɗa hanyar biyan kuɗi ta internet a shafin kasuwancin su ko manhajarsu don karɓar kuɗi cikin sauƙi daga abokan huƙƙarsu da kuma wani manhajar da za su gane an biya su kuƙin koko a'a.
sw: Wamiliki wa biashara wanaweza piakujuisha ukurasa binafsi wa malipo ya gateway kwenye tovuti au programu ya biashara zao ili kupokea pesa kwa urahisi kutoka kwa wateja zao na pia zana nzuri ya ufuatiliaji ili kuona maelezo ya miamala.
yo: Àwọn olókoòwò tún lè fi ìlànà ojú òpó gateway ti ara-ẹni sórí ìtàkùn ayélujára okòòwò wọn tàbí ẹ̀rọ(app) wọn láti gba owó pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn lọ́wọ́oníbàárà wọn pẹ̀lú ohun-èlò aṣàmójú tí ó dára láti wo àlàyé ìdókòòwò wọn.
zu: Abanikazi bebhizinisi bangase futhi bahlanganise ikhasi le-payment gateway elenzelwe wena kuwebhusayithi noma i-app yebhizinisi labo ukuze bathole imali kalula kumakhasimende abo kanye nethuluzi elihle lokuqapha lokubuka imininingwane yemali engenayo nephumayo.

am: ስለዚህ፣ እርሶ የሱፐርማርኬት ባለቤት አልያም በኦንላይ ሽያጭ የሚሰሩ ነጋዴ፣ የክለብ ባለቤት ወይም ትልቅ ድርጅት ውስጥ የሚሰሩ ይሁሉ፣ ስዊፒ ለሚፈጸምሎት ሁሉም ክፍያዎች ክፍያዎቹ የሚፈጸሙት ሁሉም አማራጮች ይዞ ቀርቧል፡፡
en: So, whether you are a supermarket owner, an online vendor, a club owner or work in a large enterprise, Swwipe has a solution for all your payment needs.
ha: Don haka, ko kai me babbar kasuwar zamani ne ko ƙaramin ɗan kasuwa a yanar gizo ko wanda ya mallaki kulaf ko wata babbar sana'a, kanfanin Swwipe yana da waraka ga duk kanin buƙatun biyan kuɗinku.
sw: Hivyo, iwe wewe ni mmiliki wa maduka makubwa, mchuuzi wa mtandaoni, mmiliki wa klabu au unafanya kazi katika iashara kubwa, swwipe ina suluhisho la mahitaji yako yote ya malipo.
yo: Bákan náà, Bóyá o jẹ́ olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-ìtajà ìgbàlódé, olùtajà oríayélujára, olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-ìgbafẹ́ tàbí ò ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó wàyà mì, Swwipe ní ojútùú sí ìsòro ìsanwó rẹ.
zu: Ngakho, akunandaba ukuthi ungumnikazi wesitolo esikhulu, othengisa ku-inthanethi, umnikazi wekilabhu noma usebenza ebhizinisini elikhulu, iSwwipe inesixazululo sazo zonke izidingo zakho zokukhokha.

am: ሮቁ የአውሮፓ ኦፕሬሽን ሃላፊ ሾሟል፡፡
en: Roqqu Appoints Head of Operations for Europe
ha: Roqqu ya naɗa Shugaban Sashen Ayyuka naTurai.
sw: Roqqu yateua mkuu wa operesheni wa ulaya
yo: Roqqu yan alákoso iṣẹ́ fún ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù
zu: I-Roqqu Iqoka Inhloko Yezemisebenzi YaseYurophu

am: በሮቁ(Roqqu) አውሮፓ የኩባንያችንን መሪ ቡድን የተጠናከረ እንዲሆን በደስታ እናስታውቃለን፡፡
en: We are pleased to announce a significant addition to our leadership team at Roqqu Europe.
ha: Muna farin cikin sanar da ƙarin tim na shugabancin a Roqqu na Turai.
sw: Tunayofuraha kutangaza nyongeza muhimu kwa timu yetu ya uongozi huko Roqqu Ulaya.
yo: Inú wa dùn láti kéde àfikún pàtàkì sí ẹgbẹ́ adarí wa ní Roqqu Yúróòpù.
zu: Kuyintokozo kithi ukumemezela ozohlanganyela ethimbeni labaholi owaziwayo eRoqqu eYurophu.

am: ኤሊያስ አሆነን፣ ኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥ በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ታዋቂ የሆነ ባለሙያ የኦፕሬሽናችን ሃላፊ ክፍልን ተቀላቅሏል፡፡
en: Elias Ahonen, an internationally acclaimed industry expert with a proven track record, has joined us as Head of Operations.
ha: Elias Ahonen, wanda ake kallo a matasyin kwararre kan harkar masana'antu na duniya mai tabbataccen tarihi, ya hade da mu a matsayin Shugaban Ayyuka.
sw: Elias Ahonen, mtaalamu wa tasnia anaetambuliwa kimataifa na rekodi iliyothibitishwa amejiunga nasi kama mkuu wa uendeshaji.
yo: Elias Ahonen, ọ̀jìnmì akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àgbáyé tí ó ní àtimáaṣebọ̀ tí ó dára ti darapọ̀ mọ́ wa gẹ́gẹ́ bí olórí-ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́.
zu: U-Elias Ahonen, uchwepheshe wemboni odumile emhlabeni wonke onerekhodi eliqinisekisiwe, usijoyine njengeNhloko Yezemisebenzi.

am: ኢንዱስትሪውን አስመልክቶ መጽኃፍ ያሳተመው (እ.ኤ.አ. 2021)፣ አሆነን ኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥ ከ10 አመት በላይ የሆነ የስራ ልምድ ያለው ሲሆን፣ የግለሰቡ የስራ ልምድ ቶከን ቫሊ እ.ኤ.አ 2016 መስራች አማካሪ ሆኖ ሰርቷል፡፡
en: The author of the industry textbook Blockland (2021), Ahonen, has over 10 years of global experience in the industry, including founding consulting firm Token Valley in 2017.
ha: Marubucin littafan masana'anta mai suna Blockland (2012), Ahonen, yana da gogewa ta sama da shekara 10 a masana'anta da ya haɗa da samar da Kamfanin Token Valley a 2017.
sw: Mwandishi wa kitabu cha kiada cha tasnia Blockchain (2021), Ahonen, anauzoefu wa kimataifa katika sekta hiyo zaidi ya miaka 10 kiwa ni pamoja na mwanzilishi wa kampuni ya ushauri wa Token Valley mnamo 2017.
yo: Òǹkọ̀wé íwé ilé-iṣẹ́ Blockland (2021), Ahonen, ni ó lé ní ìrírí ọdún mẹ́wàá kàákiri àgbáyé nínú ile-iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ ìjùmọ̀sọ̀rọ̀ Token Valley ní ọduń 2017.
zu: Umbhali wencwadi yemboni iBlockland (2021), u-Ahonen, uneminyaka engaphezu kweyi-10 yokuhlangenwe nakho komhlaba wonke kule mboni, kuhlanganise usungula inkampani ye-consulting iToken Valley ngo-2017.

am: የአሆነን ሹመት አውሮፓ ውስጥ ያለ ገቤ ላይ ጠንካራ ሆነን ተወዳዳሪ እንድንሆን እና ለረጅም ጊዜ ራዕያችን ቀጣይነት ስኬት ጥንካሬ የሚያመጣ ነው፡፡
en: Ahonen's appointment will strengthen our capabilities and long-term strategic vision for continued success across the European market.
ha: Naɗin Ahoen zai ƙarfafa ikonmu da kuma dogon borinmu don samun nasara me ɗorewa a sashen kasuwanci a Turai.
sw: Uteuzi wa Afinen utaimarisha uwezo wetu na dira ya kimkakati ya muda mrefu ya mafanikio endelevu katika soko la Ulaya.
yo: Ìyànsípò Ahonen yóò túbọ̀ mú àlékún bá agbára wa àti ìlànà àfojúsùn wa láti máa túbọ̀ ṣe àṣeyọrí káàkiri ọrọ̀ ajé ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù.
zu: Ukuqokwa kuka-Ahonen kuzoqinisa amakhono ethu nombono wesikhathi eside wempumelelo eqhubekayo kuyo yonke imakethe yase-Europe.

am: አቶ ኤልያስን ወደ ሮቁ ስንቀበል በደስታ ነው፡፡
en: "We are thrilled to welcome Elias to Roqqu.
ha: Muna cikin shauƙin na maraba da Elias zuwa Roqqu.
sw: "Tunafuraha kumkaribisha Elias huko Roqqu.
yo: “Inú wa dùn láti kí Elias káàbọ̀ sí Roqqu.
zu: "Sinesasasa lokwemukela u-Elias eRoqqu.

am: የሮቁ ዋና ስራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ አባል የሆኑት ቤንጃሚን ኦኖሞር የግለሰቡ የስራ ልምድ እና የመምራት ብቃት አውሮፓ ውስጥ የንግድ ስራችንን ለማስፋፋት ወሳኝ ነው እና ምርቶቻችን ለሚጠቀሙ ደንበኛዎቻችን በልዩነት አገልግሎት ማቅረብ ያስችለናል ብለዋል፡፡
en: His expertise and leadership will be instrumental as we expand our presence in Europe and provide exceptional solutions to our valued users," said Benjamin Onomor, CEO of Roqqu.
ha: Ƙwarewarsa da jagoranci zai zamo muhimmin madafi, kamar yadda muka faɗaɗa kasancewarmu a Turai kuma muke samar da ingantattun ayyuka ga abokan mu'amalarmu." kamar yadda shugaban Raqqu Benjamin Onomor,CEO ya bayyana.
sw: Utaalamu na uongozi wake utakuwa muhimu tunapopanua uwepo wetu barani ulaya na kutoa masuluhisho ya kipekee kwa watumiaji wetu wanaothaminiwa" alisema Benjamin Onomor, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Roqqu.
yo: Benjamin Onomor, alákoso Roqqu ṣàlàyé pé ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti ìjásiwájú rẹ̀ yóò wúlò bí ó ṣe jẹ́ pé a ti nàyẹ́ ibùdó wa káàkiri ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù àti láti pèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí ò lẹ́gbẹ́ fún àwọn oníbàárà wa.
zu: Ubuchwepheshe nobuholi bakhe buzoba usizo njengoba sikhulisa ukuba khona kwethu e-Europe futhi sinikeza izixazululo eziyingqayizivele kubasebenzisi bethu esibazisayo," kusho uBenjamin Onomor, iCEO yeRoqqu.

am: ሮቁ እ.ኤ.አ. 2019 ላይ የተቋቋመ ሲሆን ብሎክቼይን ቴክኖሎጂ በመጠቀም አፍሪካ ውስጥ የወደፊት ጊዜ የፋይናንስ ስርዓት እየገነባ ይገኛል፡፡
en: Founded in 2019, Roqqu is building the financial future of Africa using blockchain technology.
ha: Wanda aka samar a shekarar 2019, manhajar Roqqu ya gina tsarin hada hadar kuɗi na gaba ga'yan Afirka da suke amfani da fasahar adana bayanai kai tsaye a na'ura.
sw: Ilianzishwa mwaka 2019, Roqqu imejeng mustakbali wa kifedha wa Afrika kwa kutumia teknolojia ya Blockchain.
yo: A dá sílẹ̀ ní ọdún 2019, Roqqu ń pilẹ̀ ọjọ́ ọ̀la ẹ̀náwó orílẹ̀-èdè Adúláwọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ blockchain.
zu: Yasungulwa ngo-2019, iRoqqu yakha ikusasa lezezimali lase-Afrika isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe beblockchain.

am: ይህ አገልግሎቶቻችን ሳናቋርጥ እንድናሻሽል እና ተጨማሪ አመቺ ፕላትፎርሞችን እንድናቀርብ ያስችለናል፡፡
en: This constantly inspires us to keep improving our services while striving to offer more flexible features on our platform.
ha: Wannan zai cigaba da ƙarafa mana gwiwa mu cigaba da inganta ayyukanmu a yayin da kuma muke ƙoƙarin samar da yanayiyyika masu iya canjuwa a shafin namu.
sw: Hii mara kwa mara hututia moyo kuendelea kuboresha huduma zetu huku tukijitahidi kutoa vipengele vunavyonyumbulika zaidi kwenye jukwaa letu.
yo: Èyí sáábà máa ń fún wa ní ìwúrí láti mú àgbéga bá àwọn iṣẹ́ wa bí ó ṣe jẹ́ pé à ń gbìyàjú láti pèsè ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àbùdá ìrọ̀rùn lórí ìkànnì wa.
zu: Lokhu kusikhuthaza njalo ukuthi siqhubeke sithuthukisa izinsiza zethu ngesikhathisilwela ukunikeza izici ezivumelana nezimo kakhudlwana kupulatifomu yethu.

am: አውሮፓ የበለጠ የበሰለ፣ የተስተካከለ እና በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ የተገናኘ ገበያ የሚገኝበት ሲሆን ይህም ለድርጅታችን አዳዲስ ተግዳሮቶች እና እድሎችን ይዞ የሚመጣ ነው- ኤሊያስ አሆነን
en: "Europe represents a more mature, regulated, and internationally connected market, which comes with new challenges and opportunities." - Elias Ahonen.
ha: "Turai su na gabatar da harkar kasuwanci wanda yake karansa yakai tsaiko kuma tsararre kuma a duniya baki ɗaya wanda yake zuwa da ƙalubale da damammaki."- Elias Ahonen.
sw: "Ulaya inawakilisha soko lilokomaa zaidi, lilodhibitiwa, na lilounganishwa kimataifa, ambalo linakuja na changamoto na fursa mpya", Elias Ahonen.
yo: "orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù ṣaṣojú ètò ọrọ̀ ajé aláfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ àgbáyé tí ó gbókàn pẹ̀lú ìjánu èyí tí ó ní àfojúsún àti àǹfààní"- Elias Ahonen.
zu: "I-Europe imelela imakethe emnkantshubomvu, elawulwayo, nexhumene nomhlaba wonke, ehambisana nezinselele kanye namathuba amasha." - U-Elias Ahonen.

am: አሆነን በአለም አቀፍ ህግ የማስተርስ ዲግሪ፣ እና አሁን ላይ አለም አቀፍ ክሪፕቶከረንሲ የህግ ድንጋጌ ላይ የፒኤችዲ ዲግሪ ጽኁፉን በመስራት ላይ ይገኛል፡፡
en: Ahonen holds an MA in International Law, and is writing his Ph.D. thesis on the international legal status of cryptocurrency.
ha: Ahonen yana da takardar sheda me darajar MA a ilimin dokar Duniya, yan kuma yin Ph.D. digirinsa game da matsayin kiriptokaransi a dokar duniya.
sw: Ahonen anashahada ya uzamili katika sheria ya kimataifa na anaandika nadharia juu aya hali ya kisheria ya kimataifa ya Cryptocurre.
yo: Ahonen gboyè ẹ̀kọ́ gíga kèjì nínú òfin àgbáyé, tí ó sì ń kọ̀wé ìgboyèdọ̀mọ̀wé lórí ipò ofin àgbáyé lórí owó Crypto (cryptocurrency).
zu: U-Ahonen une-MA eMthethweni Wamazwe Omhlaba, futhi ubhala ithisisi yakhe yePh.D. ngesimo sezomthetho somhlaba wonke secryptocurrency.

am: ሮቁ በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ የሚያቀርበው አገልግሎት ገራሚ ነው፣ የሮቁ መተግበሪያን ሁሉም አፕ ስቶሮች ላይ ማግኘት የሚችሉ ሲሆን፣ እና ሁሉንም እጅግ በጣም ጥሩ ጥቅሞችን ይጠቀሙ፡፡
en: It's amazing how Roqqu is taking us worldwide; join the train today if you still need to by downloading the Roqqu App available in all Stores, and enjoy excellent benefits.
ha: Abin mamaki ne yadda Roqqu ya zagaye duniya: shigo tsarin a yau idan kana buƙatar hakan ta sauke manhajar Roqqu da take a kowane shagon intanet domin amfana.
sw: Inashangaza jinsi Roqqu inatupeleka Duniani kote jiunge; Jiunge na safari leo kama unahitaji kupakuwa Programu ya Roqqu inayopatikana katika maduka yote na ufurahie mabufaa bora.
yo: Ohun ìyanu ni ó jẹ́ bí Roqqu ṣe ń gbé wa hàn sí àgbáyé; dara pọ̀ mọ́ wa lónìí bí ó bá fẹ́ nípa ṣíṣe àgbàsílẹ̀ ẹ̀rọ Roqqu tí ó wà ní gbogbo orí ìkànì ìgbẹ̀rọsílẹ̀ kí o sì máa jẹ ìgbádùn àǹfààní tí ó dára jù lọ.
zu: Kuyamangalisa ukuthi iRoqqu isiyisa kanjani emhlabeni wonke; joyina isitimela namuhla uma usadinga ukwenza kanjalo ngokudawuniloda iRoqqu App etholakala kuzo zonke Izitolo, bese ujabulela izinzuzo ezinhle kakhulu.

am: በክሪፕቶ ተጨማሪ ክፍያዎችን ይፈጽሙ….
en: Do more with crypto….
ha: Yi abubuwa da yawa da kirifto….

am: ራክ ሴንተር፣ ወርክፕሌስ ሴንተር (TWPC) እና ዩናይትድ ዌይ ግሬተር ናይጄሪያ (UWGN) በማብራሪያ በማስተማር ለኤስኤምኢ እና ለወጣቶች ዲጂታል ክህሎቶችን እንዲያገኙ በመተባበር ይሰራሉ።
en: Rack Centre, The Workplace Centre (TWPC) and United Way Greater Nigeria (UWGN) Partner to Train SMEs and Youths on Digital Skills
ha: Cibiyar Rack Centre da The Workplace Center (TWPC) da kuma United Greater Nigeria (UWGN) sun gama kai domin koyar da matasa ƙanana da matsakaitan 'yan kasuwa dabarun na'ura.
sw: Kituo cha Rack, cha mahali pakazi (TWPC) na washirika wa United wayGreater Nigeria (UWGN) kutoa mafunzo kwa SME na vijana kuhusu ujuzi wa kidijitali
yo: Rack Centre, The Workplace Centre (TWPC) àti United Way Greater Nigeria (UWGN) ní àjọṣepọ̀ láti kọ́ àwọn SMEs àti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ lórí ìmọ̀ ìgbàlódé.
zu: I-Rack Centre, i-The Workplace Centre (iTWPC) kanye ne-United Way Greater Nigeria (i-UWGN) Umlingani Wokuqeqesha ama-SME kanye Nentsha Ngamakhono Edijithali

am: ራክ ሴንተር፣ የምዕራብ አፍሪካ በጥሩ መረጃ አውታረ መስመር የተገናኘና ክላውድ ገለልተኛ መረጃ ማዕከል፣ ከወርክፕሌስ ሴንተር (TWPC) እና ከዩናይትድ ዌይ ግሬተር ናይጄሪያ (UWGN) ጋር በሽርክና የሲኤስአር ተነሳሽነትን አስጀምሯል፡፡ ኤስ.ቲ.ኢ.ፒ. (የቅጥር መርሃግብር ችሎታዎች) እና ዲጂታል ኢኔብልመንት ወርክሾፕ፣ 150 ወጣቶች በዋናነት የዲጂታል ክህሎቶችን ለመስጠት እና በሌጎስ ግዛት ውስጥ ካሉ ነዋሪዎች ውስጥ 50 አካባቢ ኤስኤምኢ እንዲጠቀሙ አድርጓል።
en: Rack Centre, West Africa’s Best-connected Carrier and Cloud neutral data centre has announced the launch of its CSR initiative in partnership with The Workplace Centre (TWPC) and United Way Greater Nigeria (UWGN) – The S.T.E.P. (Skills to Employment Program) and Digital Enablement Workshop, aimed at empowering 150 youths with essential digital skills and equipping 50 local SMEs around select areas in Lagos State.
ha: Cibiyar Rack Centre, wadda ta kasance mahaɗar giza gizai ta sanar da ƙaddamar da ƙirƙirar CSR tare da haɗin guiwar The Workplace Center (TWPC) da United Greater Nigeria) (UWGN) - da tsarin S.T.E.P.(Skills to Employment Program) da nufin tallafa wa matasa 150 da muhimmin horon na'ura da kuma samar da kayan aiki ga ƙananan masana'antu a cikin waɗansu zaɓaɓɓun wurare a Jihar Legas.
sw: Kituo cha Rack, kituo cha data kilichounganishwa bora zaidi cha Afrika magharibi na kituo cha data cha Cloud neutral kimetangaza kuzindua mpango wake wa CSR kwa kushirikiana na The Workplace center (TWPC) na Unite way Greater Nigeria (UWGN), S.T.E.P (programu ya ujuzi wa Ajira na warsha ya uwezeshaji wa kidigitali, inayolenga kuwawezesha vijana 150 na ujuzimuhimu wa kidigitali na kuwapa SMEs 50 za ndani karibia maeneo mahususi katika jimbo la Lagos.
yo: Rack Centre, Alárinà iṣẹ́ tí ó dára jù lọ àti àjọ tó ń rí sí àkọsílẹ̀ ìwọ̀ntunwọ̀sí ojú ọjọ́ ti kéde ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àgbékalẹ̀ CSR wọn pẹ̀lú àjọṣepọ̀ The Workplace Centre (TWPC) àti United Way Greater Nigeria (UWGN) – The S.T.E.P. (ìmọ̀ fún ìrónilágbára) àti ibi-iṣẹ́ ìfúniláǹfààní ọ̀nà ìgbàlódé lérò láti ṣe ìrónilágbára fún `awọn àádọ́jọ ọ̀dọ́ pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ ìgbàlódé tí ó ṣe pàtàkì àti ìkúwọ́ fún àwọn àádọ́ta SME alábẹ́lé láàrin àwọn àdúgbò tí a yàn ní ìlú ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó.
zu: I-Rack Centre, i-West Africa 's Best-connected Carrier and Cloud neutral data centre imemezele ukwethulwa kwesinyathelo sayo se-CSR ngokubambisana ne-The Workplace Centre (i-TWPC) ne-United Way Greater Nigeria i-(UWGN) – i-S.T.E.P. (Skills to Employment Program) ne-Digital Enablement Workshop, okuhloswe ngayo ukunika intsha eyi-150 amakhono edijithali abalulekile nokuhlomisa ama-SME endawo angama-50 ezindaweni ezikhethiwe eLagos State.

am: በስልጠናው ጊዜ ትኩረት የተሰጣቸው ነገሮች ስነ-ምድራዊ ንድፍ፣ ዲጂታል ገቤ፣ የድህረ-ገጽ ልማት፣ የኔትወርኪን እና ደህንነት እና የሶፍትዌር ችሎታዎችን ያካትታል፡፡
en: The focus areas available during the training include Graphic design, Digital Marketing, Front-end Web Development, Networking and Security and Soft skills.
ha: Ɓangarorin da aka fi mai da hankali a kansu a yayin horarwar su ne, Kimiyyar Iya tsara Zane da Kasuwanci Intanet da Ilimin Iya Tsara Shafin Intanet da kuma Ilimin Sanin Haɗakar intanet da kuma Sanin Yadda Ake Samar Da tsaro a intanet da kuma Ilimin Iya ƙirƙirar Manhaja.
sw: Maeneo ya kuzingatia yanayopatiakana wakati wa mafunzo ni pamoja na ubunifu kwa picha, uuzaji wa kidigitli, ukuaji wa wavuti wa mbele, mitandao na usalama na ujuzi muhimu.
yo: Àwọn abala tí a gbájúmọ́ wà nílẹ̀ ṣẹpẹ́ ní àkókò ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lára wọn ni ṣíṣẹ̀dá-àwòrán(Graphic design), ìpolówó ọjà àgbáyé(Digital marketing), ìṣẹ̀dá-ìkànnì ayélujára alábala- òpin-iwájú(Front-end Web Development), ìkànsíra-ẹni(Networking) àti ààbò pẹ̀lú ìmọ ajẹmọ́gbọ́-orí(Soft skills).
zu: Izindawo okugxilwa kuzo ezitholakalayo phakathi nokuqeqeshwa zihlanganisa iGraphic design, iDigital Marketing, iFront-end Web Development, iNetworking and Security kanye namaSoft skills (amkhono adingeka emsebenzini owuqeqeshelwe).

am: እነዚህ ስልጠናዎች፣ እኚህም ከራክ ማዕከል ፕሮገግራም ጋር ዘላቂ እንዲሆኑ የተደረጉ የእነዚህ ግለሰቦች ችሎታን ለማሳደግ ብቻ የተዘጋጁ ሳይሆኑ ግን ማህበረሰቡ ውስጥ አዎንታዊ ለውጥ እንዲኖር ታቅዶ የተዘጋጁ ናቸው፡፡
en: These trainings, which are in tandem with the sustainability programme of Rack Centre, are designed not only to bolster the capabilities of these individuals but also to create a ripple effect of positive change in society.
ha: Wannan horarwa, wadda ta dace da Cibiyar Rack Center, an shirya ta ne ba don kawai tallafa wa waɗannan mutanen ba, sai dai don samar da wani tasiri na kawo sauyi mai ma'ana a cikin al'umma.
sw: Mafunzo haya ambayo yanaambatana na mpango endelevu wa kituo cha Rack, yameundwa sio tu kuimarisha uwezo wa watu hawa lakini pia kuunda athari ya mabadiliko chanya katika jamii.
yo: Àwọn ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọ̀nyí, èyí tí ó wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ètò ìmúdúró Rack Centre, jẹ́ èyí ti a kò gbé kalẹ̀ láti sàfikún agbwára àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí nìkan ṣùgbọ́n láti ṣẹ̀dá ipa ìyípadà ìlọsíwájú rere láwùjọ.
zu: Lezi zindlela zokuqeqesha, ezihambisana nohlelo lokusimama lweRack Centre, aziklanyelwe nje kuphela ukuqinisa amakhono alaba bantu abangabodwana kodwa futhi nokudala umphumela oqhubekayo woshintsho oluhle emphakathini.

am: የሲኤስአር ሽርክና ላይ የራክ ማዕከል፣ ዋና የኦፕሬሽን ሃላፊ የሆነው እዝቅኤል ኢግቦዬ በሚናገር ጊዜ ወጣቶችን የቀጣይ ትውልድ ቴክኖሎጂ ተጠቃሚ እንዲሆኑ ማስቻል ዲጂታል ኢኮኖሚ ለመገንባት እንደሚያስችል ተናግሯል፡፡
en: Speaking on the CSR partnership, Chief Operating Officer, Rack Centre, Ezekiel Egboye, stated that the collaboration will empower the youths to become the next generation of tech-savvy professionals to compete favourably in the burgeoning digital economy.
ha: Da yake magana a kan haɗin gwiwar Kamfanin CSR, Babban Mai Gudanarwa na Cibiyar Rack, Ezekiel Egboye ya bayyana cewa haɗin gwiwar zai tallafa wa mutane masu zuwa a nan gaba sanin fasahar sadarwa domin yin gogayya a duniyar tattalin arzikin intanet.
sw: Akizungumzia ushirikiano wa CSR, afisa mkuu wa uendeshaji, Rack Centere, Ezekiel Egboye, alisema kuwa ushirikiano huo utawawezesha vijana kuwa kizazi kijacho cha wataalamu wa teknolojia ili kushinda vyema katika uchumi wa kidigitali unaoendelea.
yo: Nígbà tó ń sọ̀rọ̀ lórí àjọṣepọ̀ CSR, Olóyè òṣìṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ Rack Centre, Ezekiel Egboye, sọ pé ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ náà yóò fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní agbára láti di ìran akọ́ṣẹmọṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tó ń bọ̀ láti figagbága gidi ní ìgbọ́ni ìgbọ̀ni ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé ayáragòkè.
zu: Ekhuluma ngobambiswano lweCSR, iChief Operating Officer, iRack Centre, u-Ezekiel Egboye, wathi ukubambisana kuzonika intsha amandla okuba yisizukulwane esilandelayo songoti bezobuchwepheshe abazoncintisana kahle emnothweni okhulayo wedijithali.

am: ስትራቴጂው ስልጠና ያገኙ ተጠቃሚዎች ስራ ለመስራት የሚያስችል ተወዳዳሪ የንግድ ስራ ከባቢ ሁኔታ ውስጥ ልምዳቸውን መጠቀም እንዲችሉ ያደርጋቸዋል፡፡
en: The strategy is to ensure that beneficiaries of the training get the opportunity to deploy the skills acquired in a competitive work environment.
ha: Hikimar ita ce tabbatar da cewa masu morar shirin horarwar sun sami damar amfani da da horan da suka samu a muhallin mai cike da gogayya.
sw: Mkakati ni kuhakikisha kwamba walengwa wa mafunzo wanapata fursa ya kupeleka ujuzi walioupata katika mazingira ya ushindani wa kazi.
yo: Ìlànà náà ni láti ri dájú pé àwọn tí ó kópa nínú ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà rí àǹfààní láti ṣàmúlò àwọn ọgbọ́n tí wọ́n kọ́ ní agbègbè tí ó kún fún ìfigagbága.
zu: Isu liwukuqinisekisa ukuthi abahlomuli bokuqeqeshwa bathola ithuba lokusebenzisa amakhono atholakele esimweni sokuncintisana emsebenzini.

am: 150 ወጣቶች የኤስ.ቲኢ.ፒ (ስኪልስ ቱ ኢምፕሎይመንት ፕሮግራም) ላይ ተሳትፎ የሚያደርጉ ሲሆን በዚህም ለሰልጣኖች አስፈላጊ የዲጂታል ቴክኖሎጂ ስልጠናዎች እንዲያገኙ የሚደረግ ይሆናል፡፡
en: The 150 youths that will participate in S.T.E.P (Skills to Employment Program) will be equipped with essential digital skills that are pivotal in today's fast-paced world.
ha: Matasa 150 ne shiga Shirin na Horarwa (S.T.E.P), inda za a koya musu muhumman dabarun fasahar intanet da ake buƙata a duniyar yau.
sw: Vijana 150 watakaoshiriki katika S.T.E.P (programu ya ujuzi wa ajira) watakuwa na ujuzi muhimu wa kidigitali ambao ni muhimu katika ulimwengu wa kisasa unaoenda ulimwengu wa kisasa unaoenda kasi.
yo: Àwọn ọ̀dọ́ 150 tí yóò kópa nínú S.T.E.P (Ètò Ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe sí Ìníṣẹ́lọ́wọ́)ni wọ́n ó ní ìmọ̀ tí ó ṣe pàtàkì nínú ìdàgbàsókè ayé òde-òní.
zu: Yintsha eyi-150 ezobamba iqhaza kuS.T.E.P (Skills to Employment Program) izohlonyiswa ngamakhono edijithali abalulekile kakhulu ezweni lanamuhla elisheshayo.

am: ስልጠናው የቀጣይ ትውልድ የቴክኖሎጂ ባለሙያዎች ልምድ እንዲያገኙ የሚያደርግ ሲሆን የስልጠናው መጀመሪያ ቀን ጥቅምት 9/2023እ.ኤ.አ ላይ ሲሆን ለ8 ሳምንቶች የሚቆይ ይሆናል፡፡
en: The training is dedicated to nurturing the next generation of tech-savvy professionals and will begin on the 9th October, 2023 and run for 8 weeks.
ha: An sadaukar horarwar ce ga rainon manyan gobe wajen ƙwarewa a harkar fasaha wanda za a fara ranar tara 9 ga watan Oktoban 2023 sannan za a yi ne tsawon sati takwas.
sw: Mafunzo hayo yanalenga kulea kizazi kijacho cha wataalamu wa teknolojia na yataanza tarehe 9 Oktoba 2023 na kuendeshwa kwa wiki 8.
yo: Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà ni a lò láti tọ́jú àwọn ìran akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tó ń bọ̀ èyí tí yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní 9 Oṣù Kẹwàá, ọdún 2023 tí yóò sì wáyé fún ọ̀ṣẹ̀ 8.
zu: Lokhu kuqeqesha kunikezelwe ekunakekeleni isizukulwane esilandelayo songoti bezobuchwepheshe futhi kuzoqala ngomhlaka-9 kuMfumfu, wezi-2023 bese luqhuba amasonto ayi-8.

am: የኤስኤምኢ ዲጂታል ቴክኖሎጂ ተጠቃሚዎች፣ ወሳኝ የዲጂታል ቴክኖሎጂ ላይ ችሎታ እንዲኖራቸው የሚያደርግ እና የስራ አፈጻጸማቸው እንዲጨምር የሚያደርግ፣ በበለጠ ለገበያ ተደራሽ እንዲሆኑ የሚያደርግ እና የንግድ ስራቸው በዘላቂነት እድገት እንዲያመጣ አስተዋዕጾ የሚያበረክት ነው፡፡
en: The beneficiaries of the Digital Enablement Workshop for SMEs will be upskilled with vital digital tools and practices that will enhance their operational efficiency, widen their market reach, and contribute to the sustainable growth of their businesses.
ha: Waɗanda suka amfana da shirin Horar da Ƙanana da Matsakaitan Msana'antu za a ƙarfafe su da muhimman kayan aiki da dabaru waɗanda za su inganta ƙwazansu na aiki da faɗaɗa kasuwancinsu da kuma taimaka musu wajen ciyar da harkar kasuwancin su gaba.
sw: Walengwa wa warsha ya wawezeshaji wa kidigitali kwa SMEs watakuwa na ujuzi wa hali ya juu na zana na mazoea muhimu ya kidigitali ambayo yataimarisha ufanisi wao wa uendeshaji, kupanua ufikiaji wao wa soko, na kuchangia ukuaji endelevu wa biashara zao.
yo: Àwọn olùkópa nínú Ìkọ́ni-mọ̀ọ́ṣe ajẹmọ́ Ìlò Díjítà fún àwọn SME yóò ní ìmọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ohun-èlò tíó ṣe pàtàkì àti ìdánrawò tí yóò mú kí wọ́n lè ṣiṣẹ́ tí ó múnádóko, yóò jẹ́ kí ọrọ̀ ajé wọn gbòòrò àti dídásí ìmúdúró ìdàgbàsókè onírúurú okòòwò.
zu: Abahlomuli beDigital Enablement Workshop yamaSME bazofundiswa ngamathuluzi nezinqubo ezibalulekile zedijithali ezizothuthukisa ukusebenza kwazo, zandise ukufinyelela kwazo emakethe, futhi zibe nomthelela ekukhuleni okusimeme kwamabhizinisi abo.

am: ስልጠናው የቴክኖሎጂ መራቀቅ ላይ ድጋፍ የሚያደርግ ሲሆን የስልጠናው መጀመሪያ ቀን ህዳር 6/2023እ.ኤ.አ ሲሆን ለ4 ሳምንቶች የሚቆይም ይሆናል፡፡
en: The training aims at fostering technological advancement at the grassroots level will commence on the 6th November, 2023 and run for 4 weeks.
ha: Manufar horarwar ita ce bunƙasa ci gaban fasaha daga tushe za ta fara ranar 6 ga watan Nuwambar 2023 sannan za ta gudana na tsawon mako 4.
sw: Mafunza haya yanalenga kukuza maendeleo ya kiteknolojia katika ngazi ya chini yataanza tarehe 6 Novemba 2023 na yataendelea kwa wiki 4.
yo: Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà ní èròǹgbà láti mú àgbéga bá ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀pẹ̀ tí yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní 6 Oṣù Kọkànlá ọdún 2023 tí yóò wáyé fún ọ̀ṣẹ̀ 4.
zu: Ukuqeqesha kuhloselwe ukukhuthaza intuthuko yezobuchwepheshe ezingeni labafufusayo kuzoqala ngomhlaka-6 kuLwezi, wezi-2023 bese kuqhutshwa amasonto ama-4.

am: በዚህ ስልጠና፣ ኢኮኖሚው ላይ አዎንታዊ ተጽዕኖ ማሳደር የሚችል የንግድ ስራ ከባቢ ሁኔታ ለመፍጠር ጥረት ይደረጋል፡፡
en: Through this training, we envision a resilient ecosystem of thriving businesses that positively influence the economic landscape.
ha: Ta wannan horarwa, mun fahimci yadda za a haɓaka kasuwanci da zai yi tasiri ga tsarin tattalin arziki.
sw: Kupitia mafunzo haya, tunatazamia mfumo ikolojia thabiti wa biashara zinazostawi ambao huathiri vyema hali ya kiuchumi.
yo: Nípaṣẹ̀ ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ yìí, a ti fojú wo àpéjúwe àyípadà okòòwò tí yóò lapa rere nínú ètò-ọrọ̀ ajé.
zu: Ngalokhu kuqeqesha, sibheka uhlelo lokuqinisela kwamabhizinisi achumayo anomthelela omuhle esimweni sezomnotho.

am: ይህ አስፈላጊ ስልጠናን ለማስጀመር ከቲደብሊውፒሲ እና ከዩደብሊውጂኤን ጋር በሽርክና ስራ በመስራታችን በጣም ደስተኞች ነን፡፡
en: "We are excited to partner with TWPC and UWGN to launch this important initiative.
ha: "Muna farin cikin yin haɗin gwiwa da Kamfanin TWPC da kuma UWGN wajen samar da wannan mahimmin shirin.
sw: Tunafuraha kushirikiana na TWPC na UWGN kuzindua mpango huu muhimu.
yo: “Inú wa dùn láti ṣe alábàáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú TWPC àti UWGN láti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ pàtàkì yìí.
zu: "Sinesasasa ngokubambisana neTWPC ne-UWGN ukuze sethule lesi sinyathelo esibalulekile.

am: ይህ በወጣቶች እና በጥቃቅን እና አነስተኛ ኢንተርፕራይዝ አካባቢ የተሰራጨውን የችሎታ እጥረት ለመሙላት ረጅም ርቀት እንደሚሄድ እናምናለን፡፡
en: We believe this would go a long way to bridging the skill deficit prevalent among the youths and SMEs.
ha: Mun yi imani cewa wannan zai taimaka sosai wajen cike giɓin ƙwarewar aiki da yayi yawa tsakanin matasa da kuma ƙanana da matsakaitan masana’antu, wato SMEs.
sw: Tunaamini hili lingesaidia sana kukabiliana na upungufu wa ujuzi uliomo miongoni mwa vijana na wajasiriamali.
yo: A ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé eléyìí yóò ṣe àǹfààní púpọ̀ láti di àlàfo àìní ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí ó wọ́pọ̀ láàárín àwọn ọ̀dọ́ àti àwọn Okòwò alábọ́dé.
zu: Sikholwa ukuthi lokhu kuzosiza kakhulu ukuvala ukushoda kwamakhono okugcwele entsheni namaSME.

am: ለዲጂታል ችሎታ ያለ ፍላጎት በየቀኑ፣በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ማደጉን ቀጥሏል፣ እና ናይጄሪያም ነጻ አይደለችም፡፡
en: The need for digital skills keeps growing daily, globally, and Nigeria is not exempted.
ha: Buƙata kan ƙwarewar fasahar na’ura na ci gaba da girma kullum a duniya, kenan har a Najeriya.
sw: Hitaji la ujuzi wa kidigitali linaendelea kukua kila siku, kimataifa na Nigeria haija achwa.
yo: Pàtàkì àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe ajẹmọ́lò-ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára ń pọ̀ sí i lójoojúmọ́, káàkiri àgbáyé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni kò yọ Nigeria sílẹ̀.
zu: Isidingo samakhono obuchwepheshe silokhu sikhula nsuku zonke, emhlabeni jikelele, futhi iNigeria ayikhululiwe.

am: ‘’በዚህ ጥረት ውስጥ ማህበረሰቡን ማነሳሳት፣ አኗኗርን መቀየር እና ለብሩህ፣ለተሻለ አካታች ነገ አስተዋጽዎ ማድረግ እንደምንችል እናምናለን’’ ብሏል፡፡
en: We believe that through this effort, we can uplift communities, transform lives, and contribute to a brighter, more inclusive future," he said.
ha: Mun yi imani cewa, ta hanyar wannan yunƙurin, za mu iya ciyar da al'umma gaba, mu kawo canji mai kyau ga rayuwar mutane, kuma mu ba da gudummawa ga kyakkyawa makoma wadda ta ƙunshi kowa," in ji shi.
sw: Alisema,"tunaamini kwamba kupitia juhudi hizi,tunaweza kuinua jamii,kubadilisha maisha na kuchangia zaidi mustakabali mzuri jumuishi".
yo: Ó ní, "A ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé nípasẹ̀ akitiyan yìí, a lè mú ìdàgbàsókè bá àwọn àwùjọ, a lè yí àwọn ìgbésí ayé padà, kí a sì nípa nínú ọjọ́ iwájú tí ó dára ní gbogbo ọ̀nà".
zu: Sikholelwa ukuthi ngalo mzamo, singakwazi ukuphakamisa imiphakathi, siguqule izimpilo, futhi sibambe iqhaza ekusaseni eliqhakazile nelibandakanya wonke umuntu,” usho kanje.

am: ‘’ይሄንን መነሳሳት በመደገፋችን ኩራት ይሰማናል፣ይህም ለናይጄሪያ የተሸለ አካታች እና የበለፀገ ነገን ለመፍጠር ይረዳል‘’ ብለው ዶ/ር ሞጂ ኦላትሩ-ኦላግቤጊ, የቴይ ዋህ የህዝብ ድርጅት (ቴ/ዋ/ህ/ድ) ዋና ስራ አስፈጻሚ, ተናግረዋል፡፡
en: "We are proud to support this initiative, which will help to create a more inclusive and prosperous future for Nigeria," said Dr Moji Olateru-Olagbegi, Chief Executive Officer of TWPC.
ha: "Muna alfahari da wannan ƙungiyar da za ta taimaka wajen bunƙasawa da ciyar da Najeriya gaba" Dr Moji Olateru-Olagbegi, Shugaban TWPC, ya faɗa.
sw: Alisema Dk Moji Olateru-Olagbegi, Afisa Mkuu Mtendaji wa TWPC,"Tunajivunia kuunga mkono juhudi hizi,ambazo zitasaidia kuunda mustakabali jumuishi na wenye mafanikio kwa Nigeria".
yo: Ọ̀mọ̀wé Moji Olateru-Olagbegi, Ọ̀gá Àgbà pátápátá fún TWPC sọ pé "Inú wá dùn láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àgbékalẹ̀ yìí, èyí tí yóò ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti ṣẹ̀dá ọjọ́ iwájú tí ó dára fún Nigeria".
zu: "Siyaziqhenya ngokusekela lolu hlelo, oluzosiza ekwakheni ikusasa elibandakanya wonke umuntu neliphumelelayo leNigeria," kusho uDkt Moji Olateru-Olagbegi, oyiSikhulu Esiphezulu seTWPC.

am: ‘’ዲጂታል ኢኮኖሚ ለያንዳንዱ አዲስ እድል እየፈጠረ ነው፣እና እኛም ይሄ በትክክለኛ አቅጣጫ ላይ ያለ እርምጃ እንደሆነ እናምናለን’’ ብላለች፡፡
en: "The digital economy is creating new opportunities for everyone, and we believe this is a step in the right direction," she said.
ha: Ta ce, "Tattalin arziƙin na fasahar na’ura yana samar da sabin damarmaki ga kowa, kuma mun yi imani cewa wannan mataki ne da yake kan turba mai kyau.".
sw: Alisema, "Uchumi wa kidigitali unatengeneza fursa mpya kwa kila mtu,na tunaamini kuwa hii ni hatua katika mwelekeo sahihi,".
yo: Ó ní, "Ètò ọrọ̀-ajé ajẹmẹ́rọ-ayélujára ń ṣẹ̀dá àwọn àǹfààní tuntun fún gbogbo ènìyàn, a sì ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé èyí jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ tí ó tọ́".
zu: "Umnotho wezobuchwepheshe uvulela wonke umuntu amathuba amasha, futhi sikholelwa ukuthi lesi yisinyathelo esisendleleni efanele," kusho yena.

am: የህብረት መንገድ የተሻለች ናይጄሪያ (የህ/መ/ተ/ና) ዋና ዳይሬክተር, ዲኦላ ዱሮዶላ, በንግግሯ ውስጥ እንደገለጸችው ለዲጂታል ችሎታ ያለ ፍላጎት አልተጋነነም፣ ምክንያቱም ብዙ ንግድ እና ስራዎች ሙሉ በሙሉ በጡባዊ-እና-ሞርታር ጥገኛ ከሆኑበት ዘመን ወደ ዲጂታል ተለውጠዋል፡፡
en: In her remarks, the Executive Director of UWGN, Deola Durodola, stated that the need for digital skills cannot be overemphasized because most businesses and operations have moved from the era of total dependence on brick-and-mortar to digital.
ha: A cikin jawabinta, Babbar Daraktar UWGN, Deola Durodola, ta bayyana cewa buƙatar fasahar da ake da ita ta fasahar na’ura tana da matuƙar girma, saboda yawancin masana’antu da hanyoyin gudanar da ayyuka sun bar dogara kan yin abubuwa da hannu zuwa yin abubuwa da na’ura.
sw: Katika maelezo yake, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa UWGN, Deola Durodola, alisema kuwa ujuzi wa kidigitali haiwezi kusisitizwa kupita kiasi kwasababu biashara na shughuli nyingi zimehama kutoka njia za kizamani hadi njia za kisasa.
yo: Nínú àkíyèsí rẹ̀, Olùdarí Àgbà fún UWGN, Deola Durodola, fìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé pàtàkì àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe ajẹmẹ̀rọ-ayélujára kò ṣe é fojú kéré nítorí pé púpọ̀ àwọn okòwò àti iṣẹ́ ti kúrò ní àsìkò gbígbé ara lé okòwò nínú orígun mẹ́rin ilé lọ sí orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára.
zu: Emazwini akhe, uMqondisi Omkhulu we-UWGN, uDeola Durodola, wabeka ngokuthi amakhono ezobuchwepheshe awanakugcizelelwa ngokwanele ngoba amabhizinisi nemisebenzi eminingi isifudukile endaweni lapho ibincike ezakhiweni kodwa manje isisebenza ngobuchwepheshe.

am: "በዲጂታል እድሜ ውስጥ ስኬታማ ለመሆን የሚፈልጉትን ችሎታ ለማሳደግ ወጣት ሰዎችን ለመርዳት የተሰጠን ነን፡፡
en: "We are committed to helping young people develop the skills they need to succeed in the digital age.
ha: “Mun himmatu wajen taimaka wa matasa kan samun ƙwarewar da suke buƙata wajen gogawa a duniyar fasahar na’ura.
sw: Tumejitoa kuwasaidia vijana kukuza ujuzi wanaohitaji ili kufanikiwa katika zama hizi za kidigitali.
yo: "A ní ìpinnu láti láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n nílò láti ṣe àṣeyọrí ní àsìkò ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára yìí.
zu: "Sizibophezele ekusizeni abantu abasha ukuthi bathuthukise amakhono abawadingayo ukuze baphumelele kulesi sikhathi sezobuchwepheshe.

am: "ይሄ ስልጠና ለወጣት ሰዎች አዲስ ችሎታ ለመማር እና የተግባር ልምድ ለማግኘት ጠቃሚ እድል ነው፡፡" ብላለች፡፡
en: This training is a valuable opportunity for young people to learn new skills and gain practical experience," she said.
ha: Wannan horon wata dama ce mai muhimmanci ga matasa ta koyon sabin fasahohi da kuma samun gogewa a aikace,” inji ta.
sw: Alisema "mafunzo haya ni fursa muhimu kwa vijana kujifunza ujuzi mpya na kupata uzoefu wa vitendo.".
yo: Ó ní, "Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ yìí jẹ́ àǹfààní tí ó ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láti kọ́ àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tuntun kí wọ́n sì ní ìrírí ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe".
zu: Lokhu kuqeqeshwa kuyithuba elibalulekile lokuthi abantu abasha bafunde amakhono amasha," futhi bathole isipiliyoni esingokoqobo ,” kusho yena.

am: በዲጂታል ኢንዱስትሪ ላይ ልምድ ያላቸዉ ባለሞያዎች ስልጠናውን ይሰጣሉ፡፡
en: Experienced professionals in the digital industry will deliver the training.
ha: ƙwararrun kan harkokin fasahar na’ura ne za su bayar da horon.
sw: Wataalamu wenye uzoefu katika tasnia ya kidigitali watatoa mafunzo hayo.
yo: Àwọn alámọ̀já tí wọ́n ní ìrírí nípa iṣẹ́ ajẹmẹ̀rọ-ayélujára ni wọ́n yóò ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà.
zu: Ochwepheshe abanolwazi embonini yedijithali bazoletha ukuqeqeshwa.

am: ተሳታፊዎች ስልጠናውን በስኬት ለመጨረሳቸው የምስክር ወረቀት ይቀበላሉ እና በተለያዩ ድርጅቶች ውስጥ የተለማማጅነት እድል ይኖራቸዋል፡፡
en: Participants will receive certificates upon successful completion of the training and will have access to internship opportunities within various organizations.
ha: Za a bawa mahalarta takardun shaida bayan sun kammala karɓar horon, kuma za su sami damar yin aikin koyon aiki a wuraren aiki daban-daban.
sw: Washiriki watapata vyeti baada ya kuhitimu mafunzo na fursa za kujitolea kwenye mashirika mbalimbali.
yo: Àwọn akópa yóò gba ìwé ẹ̀rí lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bá parí ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà bẹ́ẹ̀ ni wọn yóò ní àwọn àǹfààní sí ẹ̀kọ́ṣẹ́ ní àwọn onírúurú ilé iṣẹ́.
zu: Ababambiqhaza bazothola izitifiketi ekuphothulweni ngempumelelo kokuqeqeshwa futhi bazokwazi ukufinyelela kumathuba ama-internship ezinhlanganweni ezahlukahlukene.

am: ስለ ራክ ማእከል
en: About Rack Centre
ha: Game da Cibiyar Tattara Bayanai ta Rack
sw: Kuhusu kituo cha Rack
yo: Nípa Rack Centre
zu: Mayelana neRack Centre

am: ራክ ማእከል የምእራብ አፍሪካ ምርጥ-የተገናኘ ተሸካሚ እና ክላውድ ገለልተኛ የመረጃ ማዕከል ነው፡፡
en: Rack Centre is West Africa's Best-connected Carrier and Cloud neutral data centre.
ha: Cibiyar Tattara Bayanai ta Rack, itace cibiyar tattarawa da adana bayanai ta Yammacin Afirka da bata ɗaukar tsaki da aka fi shiga.
sw: Kituo cha Rack ni kituo bora cha Afrika magharibi chenye kuunganisha fani na kituo cha data cha cloud neutral.
yo: Rack Centre jẹ́ Ọkọ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára tí àsopọ̀ rẹ̀ dára jùlọ ni Ìwọ oòrùn ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà àti pé ó jẹ́ ibùdó àkójọfáyẹ̀wò tí kò ní àsopọ̀ pẹ̀lú àjọ kankan tí ó ń pèsè ìtàkùn-ayélujára.
zu: I-Rack Center iyisikhungo sedatha esixhumeke Kakhulu eNtshonalanga Afrika kanye ne-Cloud neutral data.

am: እ.ኤ.አ በ 2012 የተቋቋመው ኩባንያው ምርጥ-የክፍል-ውስጥ መረጃ ማእከል ድባብ አገልግሎቶችን እና ነጻ የአቅራቢዎችና የደንበኞች ግንኙነት ይሰጣል፡፡
en: Established in 2012, the company provides best-in-class data centre colocation services and free interconnection between carriers and customers.
ha: Kamfanin, wanda aka kafa shi a shekarar 2012, yana yin mafiya kyawun ayyukan kafa cibiyar bayanai cikin kamfanoni, wato colocation, tsakanin dillalan sadarwa da abokan ciniki.
sw: Ilianzishwa mwaka 2012, kampuni hutoa huduma bora zaidi katika kituo husika na kuwaunganisha bure watoa huduma na wateja.
yo: Wọ́n dá a sílẹ̀ ní ọdún 2012, ilé iṣẹ́ náà pèsè àwọn ibùdó àkójọfáyẹ̀wò tí ó dára jùlọ fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ mìíràn àti àsopọ̀ ọ̀fẹ́ láàrin àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ olùpèsè ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára àti àwọn oníbàárà.
zu: Isungulwe ngonyaka wezi-2012, le nkampani inikeza izinsiza ezingcono kakhulu zokufakwa kwesikhungo sedatha kanye nokuxhumana kwamahhala phakathi kwabathwali namakhasimende.

am: ይሄንን ማወቅ ለደንበኞች በቴክኒክ የላቀ፣ በአካል የተሻለ አስተማማኝ፣ እና አነስተኛ-ዋጋ ያለው አካባቢን ለመረጃ ስርአቶቻቸው ይሰጣል፡፡
en: Knowing this gives customers a technically superior, physically more secure, and lower-cost environment for their information systems.
ha: Sanin wannan yana ba abokan ciniki fifikon fasaha, mafi aminci a zahiri, da ƙarancin farashi don tsarin bayanan su.
sw: Kujua hili huwapa wateja mbinu bora zaidi na salama kimwili na kuwa na gharama ndogo kwa mifumo yao ya kitaarifa.
yo: Mímọ eléyìí fún àwọn oníbàárà ní agbègbè tí ìpele rẹ̀ ga jùlọ, tí ó ní ààbò ojúkojú síi, àti olówó pọ́ọ́kú fún àwọn àgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára wọn.
zu: Ukwazi lokhu kunikeza amakhasimende indawo engcono yobuchwepheshe, evikeleke kakhulu, futhi enezindleko eziphansi yezinhlelo zabo zolwazi.

am: የተሸካሚና እና የክላውድ ገለልተኝነት ጠቀሜታ ደንበኞች የተሻለ ዋጋ ለማግኘት፣ ዝቅተኛ መዘግየት እና ከፍተኛ የመቋቋም አቅምን ለማግኘት ትራፊክን እንዲያስተዳድሩ ያስችላቸዋል እና በደንበኞች ፣በአውታረ መረቦች ፣በደመና እና ይዘት አቅራቢዎች ፣በናይጄሪያ የኢንተርኔት መለዋወጫ ነጥብ ፣የአፍሪካ ትስስር ግንኙነት ክፍት ገበያን ይፈጥራል።
en: The Carrier and Cloud neutrality advantage allows customers to manage traffic to get better value, lower latency, and higher resilience and creates an open market for partnerships between customers, networks, cloud and content providers, the Internet Exchange Point of Nigeria, the African Interconnection Exchange and managed service providers.
ha: Rashin Ɗaukar tsagin cibiyar yana ba abokan ciniki damar gudanar da zirga-zirga don samun mafi kyawun ƙima, ƙarancin jinkiri, da juri mai girma, da kuma ƙirƙirar buɗaɗɗiyar kasuwar haɗin gwiwa tsakanin abokan ciniki, cibiyoyin sadarwa, na fasahar ajiya da masu haɗa shirye-shirye, Dandalin Musayar Intanet na Najeriya, Haɗakar Haɗin kai ta Afirka, da kamfanonin sadarwa da ake kula dasu.
sw: Faida ya kutoegemea upande wowote kwa Mtoa huduma na Cloud huruhusu wateja kudhibiti trafiki ili kupata thamani bora, muda wa kusubiri, na uthabiti wa hali ya juu na huunda soko wazi la ushirikiano kati ya wateja, mitandao, watoa huduma za wingu na maudhui, Internet Exchange Point ya Nigeria, African Interconnection Exchange.
yo: Ọkọ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára àti Àìní àsopọ̀ mọ́ ilé iṣẹ́ olùpèsè ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára fún àwọn oníbàárà ní àǹfààní láti ṣe àkóso àwọn ìkọlùkọgbà láti rí ìwúlò tí ó dára, ìlọ́ra díẹ̀, àti ìfaradà púpọ̀ kí wọ́n sì ṣẹ̀dá ọjà tí ó gbòòrò fún àjọṣepọ̀ láàrin àwọn oníbàárà, ìtakùn, ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára, olùpèsè àkóónú, Internet Exchange Point of Nigeria, African Interconnection Exchange kí wọ́n sì ṣàkóso àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ olùpèsè ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára.
zu: Usizo olungathathi hlangothi lweCarrier neCloud livumela amakhasimende ukuthi alawule ithrafikhi ukuze athole inani elingcono, ukusebenza kwe datha okusezingeni eliphansi, nokuqina okukhulu futhi idala imakethe evulekile yobudlelwano phakathi kwamakhasimende, amanethiwekhi, abahlinzeki bokusemoyeni nokuqukethwe, i-Internet Exchange Point yaseNigeria, i-African Interconnection Exchange kanye nabahlinzeki bezinsizakalo abaphethwe.

am: ለበለጠ መረጃ https://rack-centre.com/ ይጎብኙ
en: For more information, visit https://rack-centre.com/
ha: Don ƙarin bayani, ziyarci https://rack-centre.com/
sw: Kwa taarifa zaidi tembelea https://rack-centre.com/
yo: Fún àlàyé síi, ṣàbẹ̀wò sí https://rack-centre.com/
zu: Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe, vakashela ku-https://rack-centre.com/

am: ኢታና ለአፍሪካ የመጀመሪያ ዲጂታል ነጻ ዞን መንገድ ለማስተካከል 2 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የቅድመ-ዘር ፋይናንስ አገኘ፡፡
en: Itana Secures $2 Million Pre-Seed Funding to Pave the Way for Africa's First Digital Free Zone
ha: Itana Ta Samu Jarin Gabanin ƙaddamarwa na $2m Don Buɗe Hanya Ga Shiyyar Kyauta ta Na’ura ta Farko a Afirka
sw: Itana kutunza $2 Milioni ya Mbegu ya awali ili Kufungua Njia kwa Ukanda wa Kwanza wa Kidijitali Afrika
yo: Itana gba Mílíọ̀nù $2 owó ìrànwọ́ Ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ láti pilẹ̀ Èbúté Ọ̀fẹ́ orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára àkọ́kọ́ ní Áfíríkà.
zu: I-Itana Ivikela Uxhaso Lwangaphambili Lwembewu Engu-$2 Million Ukuvula Indlela Yendawo Yokuqala Yedijithali yase-Afrika Ekhululekile

am: ኢታና( የቀድሞው የችሎታ ከተማ) ዓለም አቀፍ የንግድ ካፒታሊስት በሆኑት የሃገር ውስጥ ግሎብ፣ አምፕሎ፣ ፕሮኖሞስ ካፒታል እና የወደፊቷ አፍሪካ በመመራት ቅድመ-ዘር ዙር 2 ሚሊዮን ዶላር አሰባስቧል።
en: Itana (formerly Talent City) has raised $2 million in a pre-seed round led by global venture capitalists LocalGlobe, Amplo, Pronomos Capital, and Future Africa.
ha: Itana (wanda a baya ake kira Talent City) ya tara jarin gabanin ƙaddamarwa na dala miliyan 2 daga masu saka hannun jari da yawa, wanda suka haɗa da Future Africa da LocalGlobe da Amplo da kuma Pronomos Capital.
sw: Itana (zamani Talent City) imechangisha $2 milioni katika mbegu ya awali iliyoongozwa na mabepari wa ubia wa kimataifa LocalGlobe, Amplo, Pronomos Capital, na Future Africa.
yo: Itana (Talent City nígbà kan) ti kó mílíọ̀nù $2 jọ fún ìpele ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ èyí tí àwọn olùdókòwò ilé iṣẹ́ ní àgbáyé LovalGlobe, Amplo, Pronomos Capital, àti Future Africa síwájú rẹ̀.
zu: I-Itana (eyayiTalent City ngaphambilini) iqoqe izigidi ezingu-$2 emzuliswaneni owandulela ukudlalwa oholwa ngonxiwankulu bomhlaba wonke iLocalGlobe, i-Amplo, iPronomos Capital, neFuture Africa.

am: ይህ ስምምነት እንደ ኢ-ኢስቶኒያ ያሉ ሞዴል የዲጂታል ኅብረተሰቦችን ከሚደግፉና መጠነ ሰፊ የሆኑ ምርቶችን ከሠሩ አጋሮች ጥልቅ የኢንዱስትሪ ችሎታና የቴክኒክ እውቀት ኃይለኛ ኃይል ያሰባስባል።
