zu: Ngesikhathi somcimbi, umqondisi wezwe weGoMyCode uBabatunde Olaifa uzwakalise ukujabula kwakhe, wathi, “Sijabule kakhulu ngokuvula ihhovisi lethu lase-Abuja namuhla.

am: ይህ መስፋፋት ግለሰቦች በዲጂታል ዘመን የላቀ ደረጃ ላይ ለመድረስ የሚያስፈልጉትን የቴክኖሎጂ ክህሎቶች ለማስታጠቅ ያለንን ቁርጠኝነት ያረጋግጣል።
en: This expansion is a testament to our dedication in equipping individuals with the necessary tech skills to excel in the digital era.
ha: Wannan faɗaɗawa shaida ce ga sadaukarwar da muke yi wajen ba wa mutane ƙwararrun ƙwarewar fasaha don yin fice a zamanin dijital.
sw: Upanuzi huu ni uthibitisho wa kujitolea kwetu katika kuwapa watu binafsi ujuzi muhimu wa teknolojia ili kufanya vyema katika enzi ya digitali.
yo: Ìmúgbòòrò yìí jẹ́ ẹ̀rí ìfarajìn wa láti ró àwọn ènìyàn lágbára pẹ̀lú àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe ẹ̀rọ tí ó ṣe pàtàkì láti ṣe àṣeyọrí ní àsìkò ẹ̀rọ yìí.
zu: Lokhu kwanda kuwubufakazi bokuzibophezela kwethu ekuhlomiseni abantu ngabanye ngamakhono obuchwepheshe adingekayo ukuze baphumelele enkathini yedijithali.

am: አቡጃ አቅም እና ተሰጥኦ የተሞላባት ከተማ ናት፣ እናም የቴክኖሎጂ ምህዳሯ አካል በመሆናችን ደስተኞች ነን።"
en: Abuja is a city brimming with potential and talent, and we are excited to be part of its tech ecosystem."
ha: Abuja birni ne mai cike da hazaka da hazaka, kuma muna farin cikin kasancewa cikin tsarin fasaharsa."
sw: Abuja ni jiji lililojaa uwezo na talanta, na tunafurahi kuwa sehemu ya mfumo wake wa kiteknolojia."
yo: Abuja jẹ́ ìlú tí ó kún fún ẹ̀bùn àti ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe, inú wa sì dùn láti jẹ́ apá kan nínú ètò àwùjọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ rẹ̀.
zu: I-Abuja yidolobha eligcwele amandla nethalente, futhi sijabule ngokuba yingxenye ye-tech ecosystem yayo. "

am: በተለይም እንደ ናይጄሪያ ባሉ ታዳጊ አገሮች ሥራ አጥነት ትልቅ ፈተና ሆኖ በመቆየቱ፤ የጎማይኮድ የቴክኖሎጂ ቦታ ከፍተኛ ጥራት ያለው የቴክኖሎጂ ትምህርት እና ስልጠና በማቅረብ ይህንን ጒዳይ በቀጥታ ይቋቋማል።
en: As unemployment remains a significant challenge, particularly in developing countries like Nigeria; GoMyCode's tech space tackles this issue head-on by providing access to high-quality tech education and training.
ha: Kamar yadda rashin aikin yi ya kasance babban kalubale, musamman a ƙasashe masu tasowa kamar Ƙasar Najeriya; Filin fasaha na GoMyCode yana magance wannan batun gaba-gaba ta hanyar ba da damar samun ingantaccen ilimin fasaha da horo.
sw: Kwa vile ukosefu wa ajira unasalia kuwa changamoto kubwa, hasa katika nchi zinazoendelea kama Nigeria; Nafasi ya teknolojia ya GoMyCode inashughulikia suala hili moja kwa moja kwa kutoa ufikiaji wa elimu na mafunzo ya teknolojia ya hali ya juu.
yo: Bí àìníṣẹ́lọ́wọ́ ṣe jẹ́ ìdojúkọ ńlá síbẹ̀, pàápàá jùlọ ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń gòkè àgbà bí Nigeria; ibùdó ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ GoMyCode kojú ìdojúkọ yìí lójúkojú nípa pípèsè àǹfààní sí ètò ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti ìdanilẹ́kọ̀ọ́.
zu: Njengoba ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi kuseyinselelo enkulu, ikakhulukazi emazweni asathuthuka njengeNigeria; Isikhala sobuchwepheshe beGoMyCode sibhekana ngqo nalolu daba ngokunikeza ukufinyelela emfundweni yezobuchwepheshe yezinga eliphezulu nokuqeqeshwa.

am: ተመጣጣኝ እና ተለዋዋጭ ፕሮግራሞችን በማቅረብ ግለሰቦች እንደ ድህረ-ልማት፣ የውሂብ ሳይንስ፣ በሰው የተፈጠረ አዋቂ እና ሌሎችም የመሳሰሉ ተፈላጊ ክህሎቶችን ማግኘት ይችላሉ።
en: By offering affordable and flexible programs, where individuals can acquire in-demand skills such as web development, data science, artificial intelligence, and more.
ha: Ta hanyar ba da shirye-shirye masu araha da sassauƙa, inda daidaikun mutane za su iya samun ƙwarewar buƙatu kamar haɓaka yanar gizo, kimiyyar bayanai, basirar ɗan adam, da ƙari.
sw: Kwa kutoa programu za bei nafuu na rahisi, ambapo watu binafsi wanaweza kupata ujuzi unaohitajika kama vile ukuzaji wa wavuti, sayansi ya data, akili ya bandia na zaidi.
yo: Nípa ìpèsè àwọn ètò tí kò ga jara lọ tí ó sì rọrùn, níbi tí àwọn ènìyàn ti lè kọ́ àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n ń béèrè gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìṣẹ̀dá ìtakùn ayélujára, ìmọ̀ sáyẹ́ńsì àlàyé-ìwífún, ọgbọ́n àtọọ́dá, àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Ngokuhlinzeka ngezinhlelo ezithengekayo nezivumelana nezimo, lapho abantu ngabanye bengathola khona amakhono adingekayo njengokuthuthukiswa kwewebhu, isayensi yedatha, ubuhlakani bokwenziwa, nokuningi.

am: ከዚህም በላይ የጎማይኮድ ቀጣይነት ያለው ተነሳሽነት በዲጂታል ትስስር እና በመስመር ላይ ትምህርት ላይ በማተኰር የርቀት ሥራ እድሎችን በማስቻል የሥራ አጥነት ችግርን ይፈታዋል።
en: Furthermore, GoMyCode's progressive initiative addresses the issue of unemployment by enabling remote work opportunities through its focus on digital connectivity as well as online learning.
ha: Bugu da ƙari, yunƙurin ci gaba na GoMyCode yana magance matsalar rashin aikin yi ta hanyar ba da damar yin aiki mai nisa ta hanyar mai da hankali kan haɗin kai na dijital da kuma ilmantarwa ta kan layi.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, mpango endelevu wa GoMyCode unashughulikia suala la ukosefu wa ajira kwa kuwezesha fursa za kazi za mbali kupitia kulenga muunganisho wa kidigitali pamoja na kujifunza mtandaoni.
yo: Síwájú sí í, àgbékalẹ̀ ìtẹ̀síwájú GoMyCode kojú ìṣòro àìníṣẹ́lọ́wọ́ nípa pípèsè àwọn àǹfààní iṣẹ́ àtiléṣe nípasẹ̀ àfojúsùn rẹ̀ lórí àsopọ̀ orí ẹ̀rọ àti ìdanilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ orí ẹ̀rọ pẹ̀lú.
zu: Ukwengeza, umkhankaso oqhubekayo weGoMyCode ubhekana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngokunika amandla amathuba omsebenzi akude ngokugxila ekuxhumekeni kwedijithali nokufunda ku-inthanethi.

am: የጎማይኮድ የቴክኖሎጂ ቦታ ሴቶች እና ሕፃናትን በማብቃት እና በቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ የፆታ ልዩነትን በማጥበብ ላይ ከፍተኛ ትኩረት ይሰጣል::
en: GoMyCode's tech space places a strong emphasis on empowering women and children and bridging the gender gap in the tech industry.
ha: Filin fasaha na GoMyCode yana ba da fifiko mai ƙarfi kan ƙarfafa mata da yara da kuma cike gibin jinsi a cikin masana'antar fasaha.
sw: Nafasi ya teknolojia ya GoMyCode inaweka mkazo mkubwa katika kuwawezesha wanawake na watoto na kuziba pengo la kijinsia katika tasnia ya teknolojia.
yo: Ibùdó ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ GoMyCode tẹnumọ́ ìrónilágbára àwọn obìnrin àti ọmọdé púpọ̀ àti dídí àlàfo ìjákọ̀jábo tí ó wà nínú ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Isikhala sobuchwepheshe seGoMyCode sibeka ukugcizelela okuqinile ekunikezeni amandla abesifazane nezingane kanye nokuvala igebe lobulili embonini yezobuchwepheshe.

am: የቴክኖሎጂ ትምህርት ተደራሽነትን በማመቻቸት እና ደጋፊ አከባቢን በመፍጠር፣ በተጨማሪ፣ የቴክኖሎጂ ቦታው ለልጆች ልዩ ፕሮግራሞችን እና ንብረቶችን ያቀርባል፣ ከትንሽ ዕድሜ ጀምሮ አስፈላጊ የዲጂታል ክህሎቶችን ያስታጥቃቸዋል፡፡
en: By facilitating access to tech education and creating a supportive environment, additionally, the tech space offers dedicated programs and resources for children, equipping them with essential digital skills from a young age.
ha: Ta hanyar sauƙaƙe damar samun ilimin fasaha da ƙirkirar yanayi mai tallafi, bugu da ƙari, sararin fasaha yana ba da shirye-shiryen sadaukarwa da albarkatu don yara, yana ba su kayan fasaha masu mahimmanci na dijital tun suna ƙanana.
sw: Kwa kuwezesha ufikiaji wa elimu ya teknolojia na kuunda mazingira ya kuunga mkono, zaidi ya hayo, nafasi ya teknolojia inatoa programu na rasilimali maalum kwa watoto, kuwapa ujuzi muhimu wa digital kutoka kwa umri mdogo.
yo: Nípa mímú kí àǹfààní wà fún ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti ṣíṣẹ̀dá àyíká tí ó ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn, ní àfikún, ibùdó ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ náà ṣètò àwọn ètò pàtàkì àti irinṣẹ́ fún àwọn ọmọdé, ó ń fún wọn ní ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe pàtàkì láti kékeré.
zu: Ngokwenza lula ukufinyelela emfundweni yezobuchwepheshe nokudala indawo esekelayo, ngaphezu kwalokho, indawo yezobuchwepheshe inikeza izinhlelo nezinsiza ezizinikezele zezingane, ezihlomisa ngamakhono edijithali abalulekile kusukela zisencane.

am: "የናይጄሪያ ወጣቶችን በማሰልጠን እና በማብቃት አቅማቸውን ወደ እውነታ እንዲቀይሩ እና የበለጠ ኢኮኖሚያዊ እድገትን በማጠናከር እና የፈጠራ ባህል እንዲጎለብቱ እናደርጋለን።"
en: "By training and empowering the Nigerian youth, we will be enabling them to turn their potential into reality, while further bolstering economic growth, and fostering a culture of innovation."
ha: "Ta hanyar horar da matasan Ƙasar Najeriya da kuma ƙarfafa musu gwiwa, za mu ba su damar mayar da damarsu zuwa ga gaskiya, tare da kara habaka ci gaban tattalin arziƙi, da bunƙasa al'adun kirkire-kirkire."
sw: "Kwa kutoa mafunzo na kuwawezesha vijana wa Nigeria, tutakuwa tukiwawezesha kugeuza uwezo wao kuwa ukweli, huku tukiimarisha zaidi ukuaji wa uchumi, na kukuza utamaduni wa uvumbuzi."
yo: "Nípa ṣíṣe ìdanilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ Nigeria, a ó máa fún wọn ní àǹfààní láti sọ ẹ̀bùn wọn di òtítọ́, nígbà tí a ń túbọ̀ mú ìlọsíwájú bá ìdàgbàsókè ọrọ̀ ajé, tí a sì ń mú ìlọsíwájú bá àṣà ṣíṣe àtinúdá."
zu: Ngokuqeqesha nokuthuthukisa intsha yaseNigeria, sizobe siyivumela ukuthi iguqule amandla ayo abe ngokoqobo, kuyilapho siqinisa ukukhula komnotho, futhi sigqugquzela isiko lokusungula izinto ezintsha.

am: ይህ አጽንዖት የተሰጠው የብሔራዊ መረጃ ቴክኖሎጂ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ኤንአይቲዲኤ) ዋና ዳይሬክተርን በመወከሉትና የብሔራዊ ዲጂታል ፈጠራ ቢሮ(ኦኤንዲአይ) ዋና የኮርፖሬት እና የኮሙኒኬሽን ኃላፊ በሆኑት ዋና ተናጋሪው አቶ እኒየነ ኢባንጋ ነበር፡- ሃከርስፔስ የናይጄሪያን ኢኮኖሚ ለማሻሻል ያለውን ጠቀሜታ አጽንኦት ሰጥተዋል።
en: this was emphasised by the keynote speaker Mr.Inyene Ibanga the Lead, Corporate and Communications officer of the office for National Digital Innovation (ONDI) who represented the Director General of National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) Mr. Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi; who stressed on the importance of Hackerspaces to improve the economy of Nigeria.
ha: Hakan ya fito ne ta bakin babban mai magana da yawun Mista Inyene Ibanga, jami’in watsa labarai na ofishin National Digital Innovation (ONDI) wanda ya wakilci Darakta Janar na Hukumar Bunƙasa Fasahar Sadarwa ta Ƙasa (NITDA) Mista Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi; wanda ya jaddada mahimmancin Hackerspaces don inganta tattalin arziƙin Ƙasar Najeriya.
sw: hilo lilisisitizwa na mtoa mada Bw.Inyene Ibanga Afisa Kiongozi, Ushirika na Mawasiliano ya Ofisi ya Taifa ya Ubunifu wa Kidigitali (ONDI) ambaye alimwakilisha Mkurugenzi Mkuu wa Wakala wa Taifa wa Maendeleo ya Teknolojia ya Habari (NITDA) Bw. Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi; ambaye alisisitiza juu ya umuhimu wa Hackerspaces kuboresha uchumi wa Nigeria.
yo: èyí jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ ìtẹnumọ́ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ Olùbánisọ̀rọ̀ pàtàkì Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Iyene Ibanga Adarí, Corporate and Communications officer ti ilé-iṣẹ́ fún National Digital Innovation (NDI) ẹni tí ó ṣojú Olùdarí Àgbà fún National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi ; ẹni tí ó tẹnumọ́ pàtàkì àpéjọ àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ láti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ọrọ̀-ajé Nigeria.
zu: lokhu kwagcizelelwa yisikhulumi esiqavile uMnu. Inyene Banga unguMholi, Isikhulu Sebhizinisi Nezokuxhumana sehhovisi Likazwelonke Lokusungulwa Kwedijithali (i-ONDI) obemele uMqondisi Jikelele we-Ejensi Kazwelonke Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezobuchwepheshe Bolwazi (iNITDA) uMnu. Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi; ogcizelele ukubaluleka kwamaHackerspaces ukuthuthukisa umnotho waseNigeria.

am: የርቀት ሥራ በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ተወዳጅነት እያገኘ በመምጣቱ የጎማይኮድ የቴክኖሎጂ ቦታ እነዚህን የርቀት የሥራ ዕድሎች ለማረጋገጥ አስፈላጊ የሆኑ ክህሎቶችን ለግለሰቦች ያስታጥቃል፣ በዚህም በተለይ በሰው የተፈጠረ አዋቂን መምጣት የሥራ እድሎችን አድማስ ያሰፋል።
en: With remote work gaining popularity globally, GoMyCode's tech space equips individuals with the skills necessary to secure these remote job opportunities, thus broadening the horizon of employment prospects especially in the advent of Artificial Intelligence.
ha: Yayinda aiki daga nesa yake samun shahara a duniya, fasahar GoMyCode yana bawa mutanen da suke da dabaru da suka dace don samo irin waɗannan ayyuka da ake yi daga nesa, don ƙara faɗaɗa fagen samar da ayyukan yi, musamman a sanda ake tsaka da ƙirƙirar fasahar AI.
sw: Huku kazi za mbali zikipata umaarufu duniani kote, nafasi ya teknolojia ya GoMyCode huwapa watu binafsi ujuzi unaohitajika ili kupata fursa hizi za kazi za mbali, hivyo basi kupanua upeo wa matarajio ya ajira hasa katika ujio wa Akili Bandia.
yo: Pẹ̀lú bí àwọn iṣẹ́ àtiléṣe ṣe ń gbilẹ̀ káàkiri àgbáyé, ibùdó GoMyCode ń pèsè ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí ó ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ènìyàn láti ní àǹfààní sí àwọn iṣẹ́ àtiléṣe wọ̀nyí, nítorí náà ó ń ṣe ìmúgbòòrò àwọn iṣẹ́ tí àwọn ènìyàn lè ṣe pàápàá jùlọ ní àsìkò Ọgbọ́n Àtọọ́dá.
zu: Njengoba umsebenzi okude uzuza ukuduma emhlabeni wonke, indawo yobuchwepheshe yeGoMyCode ihlomisa abantu ngabanye ngamakhono adingekayo ukuze kuvikelwe la mathuba emisebenzi akude, ngaleyo ndlela andisa amathuba emisebenzi ikakhulukazi emkhakheni we-Artificial Intelligence.

am: ኩባንያው በተለያዩ የትምህርት ዘርፎች 20,000 ተማሪዎችን በማብቃት በ ቱኒዚያ፣ ናይጄሪያ፣ ሞሮኮ፣ ሴኔጋል፣ አልጄሪያ፣ ኬንያ፣ ዮርዳኖስ፣ ኮትዲቫር እና ግብፅ በሚባሉት ዘጠኝ ሀገራት በዲጂታል መልክዓ ምድር የላቀ ደረጃ ላይ እንዲደርሱ አስፈላጊውን ክህሎት በማስታጠቅ አስደናቂ ታሪክ ያለው መሆኑን መጥቀስ የሚያስመሰግን ነው።
en: It is laudable to mention that the company has an impressive track record of empowering 20,000 students across various disciplines, equipping them with the necessary skills to excel in the digital landscape in nine countries namely; Tunisia, Nigeria, Morocco, Senegal, Algeria, Kenya, Jordan, Côte d'Ivoire and Egypt.
ha: Abin yabawa ne a ambaci cewa kamfanin yana da kyakkyawan tarihi na ba wa ɗalibai 20,000 ƙarfin gwiwa a fannoni daban-daban, tare da ba su ƙwarewar da suka dace don yin fice a fannin dijital a ƙasashe tara wato; Tunisiya, Ƙasar Najeriya, Morocco, Senegal, Aljeriya, Ƙasar Kenya, Jordan, Cot d'Ivoire da Masar.
sw: Inastahili kusifiwa kutaja kwamba kampuni ina rekodi ya kuvutia ya kuwawezesha wanafunzi 20,000 katika taaluma mbalimbali, kuwapa ujuzi muhimu ili kufanya vyema katika mazingira ya kidigitali katika nchi tisa ambazo ni; Tunisia, Nigeria, Morocco, Senegal, Algeria, Kenya, Jordan, Côte d'Ivoire na Misri.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí láti mẹ́nubà pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní àkọsílẹ̀ dáradára nípa ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ 20, 000 káàkiri àwọn onírúurú ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀, wọ́n kọ́ wọn ní àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí ó ṣe pàtàkì láti ṣe àṣeyọrí ní ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́sàn-án; Tunisia, Nigeria, Morocco, Senegal, Algeria, Kenya, Jordan, Cote d'Iboire àti Egypt.
zu: Kuyancomeka ukusho ukuthi le nkampani inomlando omuhle wokuhlomisa abafundi abangu-20 000 emikhakheni eyahlukene, ibahlomise ngamakhono adingekayo ukuze baphumelele emhlabeni wedijithali emazweni ayisishiyagalolunye okuyilawa; Tunisia, Nigeria, Morocco, Senegal, Algeria, Kenya, Jordan, Côte d'Ivoire kanye ne-Egypt.

am: ኩባንያው በአሁኑ ዲጂታል ዘመን እንዲበለጽጉ የሚያስፈልጉ ክህሎቶችን ለግለሰቦች በማጐልበት ትምህርትን ዲሞክራሲያዊ ለማድረግ አብዮታዊ ተልዕኮ ላይ ነው።
en: The company is on a revolutionary mission to democratise education by empowering individuals with the skills needed to thrive in the current digital age.
ha: Kamfanin yana kan manufar juyin juya hali don ba da dimokaradiyya ilimi ta hanyar ƙarfafa mutane da ƙwarewar da ake buƙata don bunƙasa a zamanin dijital na yanzu.
sw: Kampuni iko katika dhamira ya kimapinduzi ya kuleta elimu kwa demokrasia kwa kuwawezesha watu binafsi na ujuzi unaohitajika ili kustawi katika enzi ya sasa ya kidigitali.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní èròǹgbà àyípadà láti sọ ètò ẹ̀kọ́ di tolorí tẹlẹ́mù nioat ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ènìyàn pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí ó ṣe pàtàkì láti ṣe àṣeyọrí ní àsìkò ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ yìí.
zu: Le nkampani isemkhankasweni wokuguqula izinto ukwenza imfundo ibe yizwe lonke ngokunika abantu amandla ngamakhono adingekayo ukuze baphumelele enkathini yedijithali yanamuhla.

am: በአስፈሪው ሰፊ የጠላፊ ቦታዎች አውታረመረብ፤ ጎማይኮድ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ አምስት አካላዊ ቦታዎች አሉት፣ ያባ፣ አይኬጃ፣ ፌስታክ፣ ሌኪ፣ በሌጎስ ውስጥ አቡጃ የቅርብ ጊዜ ስኬቶቹ ሆነዋል፡፡
en: With a formidable extensive network of hackerspaces; GoMyCode currently has five physical spaces in Nigeria; Yaba, Ikeja, Festac, Lekki; in Lagos with Abuja being the latest of its accomplishments.
ha: Tare da ƙaƙƙarfar rukunin wurare kutsen na'ura; GoMyCode a halin yanzu yana da ginannun wurare guda biyar a Ƙasar Najeriya; Yaba, Ikeja, Festac, Lekki; a Legas tare da Abuja, wanda shine na baya-bayan nan na ayyukan da kammala.
sw: Na mtandao wa kutisha wa nafasi za wadukuzi; GoMyCode kwa sasa ina nafasi tano halisi nchini Nigeria; Yaba, Ikeja, Festac, Lekki; mjini Lagos huku Abuja ikiwa ya hivi punde zaidi ya mafanikio yake.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìbáṣepọ̀ àwùjọ àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó gbòòrò; GoMyCode ní àwọn ibùdó ojúkojú márùn-ún ní Nigeria báyìí; Yaba, Ikeja, Festac, Lekki; ní Èkó oelut Abuja tí ó jẹ́ àṣeyọrí rẹ̀ tuntun.
zu: Ngenethiwekhi emangalisayo ebanzi yamahackerspaces; IGoMyCode njengamanje inezikhala ezinhlanu ezibonakalayo eNigeria; Yaba, Ikeja, Festac, Lekki; ILagos lapho i-Abuja ingeyakamuva empumelelweni yayo.

am: ስለ ጎሚኮድ ፕሮግራሞች እና አዲስ ስለተከፈተው የአቡጃ ቢሮ ተጨማሪ መረጃ ለማግኘት እባክዎን ድረ ገጻቸውን www.gomycode.com ይጐብኙ።
en: For more information about Gomycode's programs and the newly opened Abuja office, please visit their website at www.gomycode.com.
ha: Don ƙarin bayani game da shirye-shiryen Gomycode da sabon ofishin Abuja da aka buɗe, ziyarci gidan yanar gizon su a www.gomycode.com.
sw: Kwa taarifa zaidi kuhusu programu za Gomycode na ofisi mpya ya Abuja iliyofunguliwa, tafadhali tembelea tovuti yao kwa www.gomycode.com.
yo: Fún àlàyé sí nípa àwọn ètò GoMyCode àti ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ sí ní Abuja, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ kàn sí www.gomycode.com.
zu: Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe mayelana nezinhlelo zeGomycode kanye nehhovisi elisanda kuvulwa lase-Abuja, sicela uvakashele iwebhusayithi yabo ku-www.gomycode.com.

am: የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር አፍሪሄልዝ የናይጄሪያን ፈጣኑ የአምቡላንስ ማስያዣ አገልግሎት ይጀምራል።
en: Health Tech Startup, Afrihealth Launches Nigeria’s Fastest Ambulance Booking Service
ha: Health Tech Startup, Afrihealth Ta Ƙaddamar da Sabis ɗin Buƙatar Ambulance Mafi Sauri a Ƙasar Najeriya
sw: Health Tech Startup, Afrihealth Yazindua Huduma ya Kuhifadhi Ambulensi ya Haraka Zaidi ya Nigeria
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdelẹ̀ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìlera, Afrihealth ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Ètò Ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì tí ó yára jùlọ ní Nigeria.
zu: IHealth Tech Startup, i-Afrihealth Yethula Isevisi Yokubhuka Esheshayo Ye-Ambulance eNigeria

am: የታክሲ መጓጓዣ መጥራት ማያደክም ሆኗል ምስጋና ታዋቂ ለሆኑት የመጓጓዣ- ኩባንያዎች ይሁን፡፡
en: Hailing a taxi ride has become effortless thanks to popular ride-hailing companies.
ha: Ɗauko hayar tasi ya zama ba wahala, godiya ga mashahuran kamfanoni hayar tasi.
sw: Kupongeza safari ya teksi imekuwa rahisi shukrani kwa kampuni maarufu za utelezi.
yo: Pípé kabúkabú ti di ìrọ̀rùn ọpẹ́ fún àwọn gbajúmọ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ ìwákabúkabú lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára.
zu: Ukwazisa ukugibela amatekisi akulula ngenxa yezinkampani ezidumile ezithwala abagibeli.

am: አሁን፣ የናይጄሪያ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ - አፍሪሄልዝ፣ የአምቡላንስ የውዳሴ አገልግሎትን በእሷ መተግበሪያ - ሪጎርፕላስ ማስጀመሯ የአምቡላንስ ጉዞን ቀላል አድርጎታል፣ ይህም የ8 ደቂቃ ምላሽ እንደሚሰጥ ቃል ገብቷል፣ ይህም በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ አምቡላንስ ለማግኘት 45 ደቂቃ -1 ሰአት የሚወስድ የተለመደውን መንገድ አስቀርቷል ።
en: Now, booking an ambulance ride has been made even easier as Nigerian health tech company - Afrihealth, launches an Ambulance hailing service on her app - Rigourplus, that promises an 8 minute response time, disrupting the conventional 45 mins - 1 hour it takes to get an ambulance in Nigeria.
ha: Yanzu, yin tanadin motar ɗaukar marasa lafiya ya zama mai sauƙi, kasancewar kamfanin fasahar kiwon lafiya dake Najeriya - Afrihealth, ya ƙaddamar da tsarin bada hayar motar ɗaukar marasa lafiya a manhajarsa - Rigourplus, wanda yayi alƙawarin amsa kira cikin mintuna 8, inda ya kawo ƙarshen jiran mituna 45 zuwa awa 1 da yake ɗauka kafin samun motar ɗaukar marasa lafiya a Najeriya.
sw: Sasa, kuweka nafasi ya Ambulance kumerahisishwa zaidi kwani kampuni ya teknolojia ya afya ya Nigeria - Afrihealth, inapozindua huduma ya kupigia Ambulance kwenye programu yake - Rigourplus, ambayo inaahidi muda wa kujibu wa dakika 8, na kutatiza dakika 45 za kawaida - saa 1 inachukua kupata Ambulance Nigeria.
yo: Ní báyìí, pípé ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì ti di ìrọ̀rùn síi bí ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ nínú ìlera Nigeria - Afrihealth, ti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó ń pèsè ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì lórí ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ - Rigourplus, tí ó ṣe ìlérí ìṣẹ́jú 8 láti fèsì, èyí tí ó yàtọ̀ sí ìṣẹ́jú 45 - wákàtí 1 tí ó máa ń gbà tẹ́lẹ̀ kí ènìyàn tó rí ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì ní Nigeria.
zu: Manje, ukubhuka uhambo lwe-ambulensi senziwe kwaba lula nakakhulu njengoba inkampani yezobuchwepheshe bezempilo yaseNigeria - i-Afrihealth, yethule isevisi ye-Ambulensi ethokomele kuhlelo lwayo lokusebenza - iRigourplus, ethembisa isikhathi sokuphendula semizuzu engu-8, ephazamisa imizuzu engu-45 evamile - ihora elingu-1. okudingekayo ukuthola. i-ambulensi eNigeria.

am: ይህ ደማቅ እርምጃ በሌጎስ እና በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ የጤና እንክብካቤ ምላሽን ለመለወጥ ያለመ ሲሆን ቀድሞውኑ በሪጎርፕላስ ላይ የሚገኙትን አስደናቂ የአገልግሎት መስመሮችን የበለጠ ይጨምርል፡፡
en: This bold move aims to transform emergency healthcare response in Lagos and Nigeria, further enhancing the impressive lineup of services already available on Rigourplus.
ha: Wannan ƙwaƙƙwaran yunƙuri na da nufin canza tsarin kai ɗaukin kiwon lafiya na gaggawa a Legas da Najeriya, da ƙara ƙarfafar ƙayatattun tsarukan da ake dasu akan manhajar Rigourplus.
sw: Hatua hii ya ujasiri inalenga kubadilisha majibu ya huduma ya afya ya dharura huko Lagos na Nigeria, na kuimarisha zaidi safu ya kuvutia ya huduma ambazo tayari zinapatikana kwenye Rigourplus.
yo: Ìgbésẹ̀ ìgboyà yìí ní àfojúsùn láti se àyípadà sí ìfèsì ètò ìlera pàjáwìrì ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó àti Nigeria, tí ó túbọ̀ ń mú ìlọsíwájú bá àwọn àtòjọ iṣẹ́ tí yááyì tí ó wà lórí Rigourplus.
zu: Lesi sinyathelo esinesibindi sihlose ukuguqula impendulo yokunakekelwa kwezempilo eziphuthumayo eLagos naseNigeria, ngokuqhubekayo kuthuthukiswe uhla oluhlaba umxhwele lwezinsizakalo kakade ezitholakalayo e-Rigourplus.

am: ይህ መተግበሪያ ተመጣጣኝ እና ምቹ የሆነ የምክክር ቦታ ማስያዝ እንዲሁም መድኃኒት ለማዘዝ እና በማንኛውም ቦታ እንዲደርሰው አማራጭን በማቅረብ ብቁ ለሆኑ ሐኪሞች ተደራሽነትን ላይ ከፍተኛ ለውጥ እያመጣ ነው፡፡
en: This app is revolutionizing access to qualified doctors through affordable and convenient consultation booking, as well as offering the option to order medicine and have it delivered to any location.
ha: Wannan app yana canza hanyar samun ƙwararrun likitoci ta hanyar yin rajistar shawarwari mai araha da dacewa, tare da ba da zaɓi don yin odar magunguna da isar da shi zuwa kowane wuri.
sw: Programu hii inaleta mapinduzi katika kuwafikia madaktari wabobevu kupitia uhifadhi wa ushauri wa bei nafuu na rahisi, pamoja na kutoa chaguo la kuagiza dawa na kuwasilishwa mahali popote.
yo: Ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ yìí ń mú àyípadà bá níní àǹfààní sí àwọn oníṣègùn òyìnbó tí wọ́n kájúẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ ìforúkọsílẹ̀ fún ìpàdé tí owó rẹ̀ kò ga jara lọ tí ó sì rọrùn, àti bákan náà ó ń pèsè àṣàyàn láti ra òògùn kí wọ́n sì gbé e wá sí ibikíbi.
zu: Lolu hlelo lokusebenza luguqula ukufinyelela kodokotela abaqeqeshiwe ngokubhuka ukubonisana okungabizi futhi okulula, kanye nokunikeza ithuba loku-oda umuthi futhi ulethwe kunoma iyiphi indawo.

am: ተደራሽ እና ምቹ የጤና ጥበቃ መፍትሄዎችን ለመስጠት ተልዕኮውን በመገንባት አዲሱ የአምቡላንስ ማስያዣ ባህሪ ናይጄሪያውያን የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ የህክምና አገልግሎቶችን እንዴት ማግኘት እንደሚችሉ ተስፋ ይሰጣል፡፡
en: Building on its mission to provide accessible and convenient healthcare solutions, the new ambulance booking feature promises to change how Nigerians access emergency medical services.
ha: Gina kan manufarsa na samar da hanyoyin samar da lafiya da dacewa, sabon fasalin ajiyar motar asibiti yayi alkawarin canza yadda 'yan Ƙasar Najeriya ke samun sabis na kiwon lafiya na gaggawa.
sw: Kwa kuzingatia dhamira yake ya kutoa masuluhisho ya huduma ya afya yanayofikiwa na yanayofaa, kipengele kipya cha kuhifadhi ambulensi kinaahidi kubadilisha jinsi Wanigeria wanavyopata huduma za matibabu ya dharura.
yo: Kíkọ́ lé orí èròǹgbà rẹ̀ láti pèsè àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ sí ìtọ́jú ìlera tí ó wà káàkiri tí ó sì rọrùn, àbùdá ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì tuntun náà ṣe ìlérí láti yí bí àwọn ọmọ Nigeria ṣe ń lo àwọn ìrànlọ́wọ́ ìlera pàjáwìrì.
zu: Ngokwakhela umgomo wayo wokuhlinzeka ngezixazululo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo ezifinyeleleka kalula nezilula, isici esisha sokubhukha i-ambulensi sithembisa ukushintsha indlela abantu baseNigeria abafinyelela ngayo ezinsizeni zezokwelapha eziphuthumayo.

am: የአምቡላንስ ማስያዣ ገጾች ተጠቃሚዎች በአቅራቢያቸው ካሉ ሆስፒታሎች አምቡላንስ እንዲጠሩ ያስችላቸዋል፣ ሁሉም በቁልፍ መጫን ላይ ነው፡፡
en: The ambulance booking feature will enable users to call for an ambulance from the nearest hospitals, all at the tap of a button.
ha: Alamar tanadar motar asibitin na bawa masu amfani damar kiran motar asibiti daga asibitoci mafi kusa, duk a danna madanni ɗaya.
sw: Kipengele cha kuhifadhi ambulensi kitawawezesha watumiaji kupiga simu kwa ambulensi kutoka hospitali za karibu, zote kwa kugusa kitufe.
yo: Àbùdá ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì náà yóò fi ààyè gba àwọn aṣàmúlò láti pe ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì láti àwọn ilé ìwòsàn tí ó sún mọ́ jùlọ, gbogbo rẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ títẹ àtẹ̀ṣẹ kan.
zu: Isici sokubhukha i-ambulensi sizokwenza abasebenzisi ukuthi bashayele i-ambulensi ezibhedlela eziseduze, konke ngokucindezela inkinobho.

am: ይህ ማለት በአደጋ ጊዜ እርዳታ በጥቂት ጠቅታዎች ብቻ ማለት ነው።
en: This means that in the face of emergencies, help will be just a few clicks away.
ha: Wannan yana nufin cewa a cikin fuskantar gaggawa, taimako zai kasance kaɗan kaɗan.
sw: Hii inamaanisha kuwa katika hali ya dharura, usaidizi utakuwa mibofyo machache tu.
yo: Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé nígbà tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ pàjáwìrì bá ṣẹlẹ̀, ìrànlọ́wọ́ kò jìnnà nípasẹ̀ ṣíṣe àmúlò ẹ̀rọ ayélujára.
zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi esimweni esiphuthumayo, usizo luzoba ngokuchofoza okumbalwa nje.

am: የአፍሪሄልዝ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ሊንዳ ኦቢ እንዳሉት "ግባችን ሁልጊዜ የጤና እንክብካቤን ለሁሉም ሰው ተደራሽ ማድረግ ነው።
en: Linda Obi, CEO of Afrihealth, stated, "Our goal has always been to make healthcare accessible to everyone.
ha: Linda Obi, Shugaba na Afrihealth, ta ce, "A koyaushe burinmu shine samar da lafiya ga kowa da kowa.
sw: Linda Obi, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji CEO wa Afrihealth, alisema, "Lengo letu daima limekuwa kufanya huduma ya afya kupatikana kwa kila mtu.
yo: Linda Obi, Ọ̀gá Afrihealth, sọ pé, "Àfojúsùn wa láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ni láti jẹ́ kí gbogbo ènìyàn ní àǹfààní sí ìtọ́jú ìlera.
zu: ULinda Obi, oyiCEO ye-Afrihealth, uthe, “Inhloso yethu bekulokhu kuwukwenza ukunakekelwa kwezempilo kufinyelele kuwo wonke umuntu.

am: የአምቡላንስ ቦታ ማስያዝ ገጽ የትም ይሁኑ የትም ጥራት ያለው የጤና አገልግሎት ለሁሉም ናይጄሪያውያን ተደራሽ ለማድረግ ያለንን ቁርጠኝነት የሚያሳይ ነው።
en: The ambulance booking feature is a testament to our dedication to making quality healthcare available to all Nigerians, no matter where they are."
ha: Yanayin ajiyar motar asibiti shaida ce ga sadaukarwar da muka yi na samar da ingantaccen kiwon lafiya ga dukkan 'yan Ƙasar Najeriya, ko da kuwa inda suke."
sw: Kipengele cha kuhifadhi gari la wagonjwa ni uthibitisho wa kujitolea kwetu kufanya huduma bora za afya zipatikane kwa Wanigeria wote, bila kujali walipo."
yo: Àwòmọ́ ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì náà jẹ́ ẹ̀rí sí ìfarajìn wa láti mú kí ìtọ́jú ìlera wà fún gbogbo ọmọ Nigeria, ní ibikíbi tí wọ́n bá wà.
zu: Isici sokubhukha i-ambulensi siwubufakazi bokuzibophezela kwethu ekwenzeni ukunakekelwa kwezempilo okuseqophelweni eliphezulu kutholakale kubo bonke abantu baseNigeria, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi bakuphi.”

am: “በዚህ አምቡላንስ ቦታ ማስያዝ ባህሪ፣ ተልእኳችንን ለማሳካት ሌላ ትልቅ ዝላይ እያደረግን ነው።
en: “With this ambulance booking feature, we're taking another giant leap towards actualizing our mission.
ha: â€œTare da wannan fasalin ajiyar motar asibiti, muna yin wani babban tsalle don aiwatar da manufarmu.
sw: "Kwa kipengele hiki cha kuhifadhi ambulensi, tunachukua hatua nyingine kubwa kuelekea kufanikisha dhamira yetu.
yo: "Pẹ̀lú àwòmọ́ ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì yìí, a ń gbé ìgbésẹ̀ ìdàgbàsókè ńlá láti mú èròǹgbà wa sẹ.
zu: “Ngalesi sici sokubhukha i-ambulensi, sithatha elinye igxathu elikhulu ekufezeni umsebenzi wethu.

am: በአስቸኳይ ጊዜ ውስጥ እያንዳንዱ ሰከንድ ለውጥ ሊያመጣ ይችላል፣ እናም ናይጄሪያውያን በጣም በሚያስፈልጋቸው ጊዜ ፈጣን እርዳታ ማግኘት መቻላቸውን ማረጋገጥ እንፈልጋለን።"- ሊንዳ ኦቢ
en: Every second can make a difference in an emergency, and we want to make sure that Nigerians have the quickest access to help when they need it most." - Linda Obi
ha: Kowane daƙiƙa na iya kawo sauyi a cikin gaggawa, kuma muna so mu tabbatar da cewa ’yan Ƙasar Najeriya sun fi saurin samun taimako lokacin da suka fi buƙatar hakan. ” - Linda Obi
sw: Kila sekunde inaweza kuleta mabadiliko katika dharura, na tunataka kuhakikisha kwamba Wanigeria wanapata ufikiaji wa haraka wa usaidizi wakati wanauhitaji zaidi." - Linda Obi
yo: Ìṣẹ́jú àáyá kọ̀ọ̀kan lè ṣe ìyàtọ̀ ní àsìkò pàjáwìrì, a sì fẹ́ rí i dájú pé àwọn ọmọ Nigeria ní àǹfààní tí ó yára jùlọ sí ìrànlọ́wọ́ nígbà tí wọ́n bá nílò rẹ̀ jùlọ." - Linda Obi.
zu: Umzuzwana ngamunye ungenza umehluko esimweni esiphuthumayo, futhi sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abantu baseNigeria bathola usizo olusheshayo lapho beludinga kakhulu. " - ULinda Obi

am: አፍሪሄልዝ በናይጄሪያ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ መስክ ውስጥ አንቀሳቃሽ ኃይል ሆኖ በሪጎርፕላስ በኩል የጤና ጥመቃን በጣቶችዎ ጫፍ ለማድረስ ፈጠራን በመጠቀም ቆይቷል።
en: Afrihealth has been a driving force in the Nigerian health tech landscape, leveraging innovation to bring healthcare to your fingertips through Rigourplus.
ha: Afrihealth ya kasance wani ƙarin kuzari a cikin tsarin fasahar kiwon lafiya ta Najeriya, yana ba da damar ƙirkira don kawo kiwon lafiya a tafin hannunku ta hanyar manhajar Rigourplus.
sw: Afrihealth imekuwa msukumo katika mazingira ya teknolojia ya afya ya Nigeria, ikitumia uvumbuzi kuleta huduma za afya kwa vidole vyako kupitia Rigourplus.
yo: Afriheath ti jẹ́ àtìlẹ́yìn ńlá ní agbọn ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ nínú ìlera, ó ń ṣe àmúlò àtinúdá láti mú ìtọ́jú ìlera wá sí ẹnu ọ̀nà yín nípasẹ̀ Rigourplus.
zu: I-Afrihealth ibe ngamandla endaweni yobuchwepheshe bokunakekelwa kwezempilo eNigeria, ithuthukisa indlela entsha yokuletha ukunakekelwa kwezempilo kalula nge-Rigourplus.

am: ከዶክተሮች ጋር ቀጠሮ ከመያዝ ጀምሮ እስከ መድኃኒት ማዘዝ ድረስ የሪጎርፕላስ መተግበሪያ የጨዋታ ለዋጭ ሆኗል፡፡
en: From booking appointments with doctors to ordering medications, the Rigourplus app has been a game-changer.
ha: Daga shirya neman ganin likitoci zuwa ba da odar magunguna, manhajar Rigourplus ta zamo mai canza wasan.
sw: Kuanzia kuweka miadi na madaktari hadi kuagiza dawa, programu ya Rigourplus imekuwa ikileta mabadiliko.
yo: Láti orí ìforúkọsílẹ̀ fún ìpàdé pẹ̀lú àwọn oníṣègùn òyìnbó dórí ríra òògùn, ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ Rigourplus jẹ́ ìtẹ̀síwájú ńlá.
zu: Kusukela ekubhukheni ama-aphoyintimenti nodokotela ukuya eku-odeni imithi, uhlelo lokusebenza lweRigourplus lushintshile.

am: አሁን፣ በአምቡላንስ ቦታ ማስያዝ ባህሪ፣ ናይጄሪያውያን በአስቸጋሪ ጊዜያት የጤና ጥበቃ እንዴት እንደሚያገኙ እንደገና ሊገልጽ ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: Now, with the ambulance booking feature, it's set to redefine how Nigerians experience healthcare in critical moments.
ha: Yanzu, tare da alamar tanadin motar asibiti, ya shirya don sake fasalin yadda 'yan Najeriya ke fuskantar tsarin kiwon lafiya a cikin lokuta na tsanani.
sw: Sasa, pamoja na kipengele cha kuhifadhi ambulensi, imepangwa kufafanua upya jinsi Wanigeria wanavyopata huduma za afya katika nyakati hatari.
yo: Ní báyìí, pẹ̀lú àwòmọ́ pípe ọkọ̀ pàjáwìrì, ó ti ṣetán láti ṣe àyípadà bí àwọn ọmọ Nigeria ṣe ń ní ìrírí ìtọ́jú ìlera ní àwọn àsìkò làásìgbò.
zu: Manje, ngesici sokubhukha i-ambulensi, sesizochaza kabusha ukuthi abantu baseNigeria bathola kanjani ukunakekelwa kwezempilo ngezikhathi zobunzima.

am: ሪጎርፐላስ ይህንን ገጽ ሲያወጣ እና ጭንቀት ሳይኖርበት እንዲያገኙ መተግበሪያውን እንዲያወርዱ ሲያበረታታዎ ከማያ ገፆችዎ ጋር ተጣብቀው ይቈዩ።
en: Stay glued to your screens as Rigourplus rolls out this feature and encourages you to download the app for stress-free access.
ha: Kasance manne da sikirin ɗinku, a yayin da manhajar Rigourplus ke fitar da wannan alama kuma tana ƙarfafa ku daku sauke manhajar don samun damar shiga mara damuwa.
sw: Endelea kufuatilia skrini zako kadri Rigourplus anavyosambaza kipengele hiki na kukuhimiza kupakua programu ili upate ufikiaji bila mafadhaiko.
yo: Fojú sọ́nà lójú àtẹ agbáwòrán rẹ bí Rigourplus ṣe ń ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àwòmọ́ yìí bẹ́ẹ̀ ni mo rọ̀ ẹ láti ṣe ìgbàsórí-ẹ̀rọ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ yìí fún àǹfààní ìlò tí kò ní wàhálà.
zu: Hlala unamathele ezikrinini zakho njengoba uRigourplus ekhipha lesi sici futhi ekukhuthaza ukuthi ulande uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze ufinyelele ngaphandle kwengcindezi.

yo: Shiba Inu (SHIB): Shibarium Bridge ti wà lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára Báyìí.
zu: Shiba Inu (SHIB): Shibarium Bridge Now Online

am: እ.ኤ.አ በነሐሴ 28/ 2023 የሺባ ኢኑ( ኤስኤችአይቢ) ገንቢዎች ከሺባሪየም ድልድይ ምልክት ማውጣት አሁን በቀጥታ እንዳለ እና ለተጠቃሚዎች እንደሚገኝ አስታውቀዋል፡፡
en: On August 28, 2023, Shiba Inu (SHIB) developers announced that token withdrawals out of the Shibarium bridge are now live and available to users.
ha: A ranar 28 ga Agustan 2023, wanɗanda suka ƙirƙiro Shiba Inu (SHIB) sun ba da sanarwar cewa cire shi daga kan Shibarium yanzu kai tsaye ne kuma yana samuwa ga masu amfani.
sw: Mnamo tarehe 28 Agosti 2023, wasanidi programu wa Shiba Inu (SHIB) walitangaza kuwa uondoaji wa tokeni nje ya daraja la Shibarium sasa unapatikana na unapatikana kwa watumiaji.
yo: Ní Ọjọ́ 28 Oṣù Kẹjọ, 2023, àwọn aṣẹ̀dá Shiba Inu (SHIB) kéde pé gbígba owó àkósódù jáde láti Shibarium Bridge ti ń ṣẹlẹ̀ ó sì ti wà fún àwọn aṣàmúlò báyìí.
zu: Ngomhla zingama-28 kuNcwaba 2023, abathuthukisi be-Shiba Inu (iSHIB) bamemezele ukuthi ukuhoxiswa kwamathokheni ngaphandle kwebhuloho le-Shibarium manje sekubukhoma futhi kuyatholakala kubasebenzisi.

am: ይህ የመጣው በሺባ ኢኑ ኔትወርክ ገንዘብ ውስጥ በሚሊዮኖች የሚቆጠር ዶላር እንዲታገድ ካደረገው የብዙ ሶፍትዌር ችግሮች ምክንያት በአሳዛኝ ሁኔታ ከከሸፈው በጣም ሲጠበቅ ከነበረው ጅምር ከአጭር ጊዜ በኋላ ነው።
en: This is coming shortly after a much-anticipated launch that failed miserably due to several software issues that caused millions of dollars in Shiba Inu network funds to be frozen.
ha: Wannan dai na zuwa ne jim kaɗan bayan ƙaddamar da wani shiri da aka dade ana sa ran wanda bai yi nasara ba saboda matsalolin manhajoji da dama da suka sa aka daskarar da miliyoyin daloli na kuɗaɗen sadarwar Shiba Inu.
sw: Haya yanajiri muda mfupi baada ya uzinduzi uliokuwa ukitarajiwa na wengi ambao haukufaulu kutokana na masuala kadhaa ya programu ambayo yalisababisha mamilioni ya dola za pesa za mtandao wa Shiba Inu kusitishwa.
yo: Eléyìí ń jáde láìpẹ́ lẹ́yìn ìfilọ́lẹ̀ tí àwọn ènìyàn ti ń fojú sọ́nà fún tí ó kùnà pátápátá nítorí àwọn onírúurú ìṣòro ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ èyí tí ó mú kí ẹgbẹ̀lẹ́gbẹ̀ dọ́là àwọn owó àjọ nínú Shiba Inu di gbígbẹ́sẹ̀lé.
zu: Lokhu kuza ngemuva nje kokwethulwa obekulindelwe ngabomvu okuhluleke ngokudabukisayo ngenxa yezinkinga ezimbalwa zesoftware okubangele ukuthi kumiswe izigidi zamaDola kuxhaso lwenethiwekhi yeShiba Inu.

am: የሺባ ኢኑ( ኤስኤችአይቢ)፣ ሊሽ( ሊሽ) እና የተጠቀለለ ኤተር( wETH) የሺባሪየም ሥነ-ምህዳራዊ ምልክቶች ገንዘብ ማውጣት ከ 45 ደቂቃዎች እስከ 3 ሰዓታት ድረስ ይወስዳል፣ ቦን(ቦን) ገንዘብ ማውጣት እስከ 7 ቀናት ሊወስድ ይችላል.
en: Withdrawals of Shibarium ecosystem tokens Shiba Inu (SHIB), Leash (LEASH), and Wrapped Ether (wETH) will take anywhere from 45 minutes to 3 hours to be processed, while Bone (BONE) withdrawals could take up to 7 days.
ha: Sauke Shiba Inu (SHIB), Leash (LEASH), da Wrapped Ether (wETH) daga Shibarium ecosystem, a ko'ina zai ɗauki daga mintuna 45 zuwa sa'o'i 3 don aiwatar dasaukewar, yayin da sauke kashi (KASHI) zai iya ɗaukar kwanaki 7.
sw: Uondoaji wa tokeni za mfumo ikolojia wa Shibarium (SHIB), Leash (LEASH), na Etheri Iliyofunikwa (wETH) itachukua mahali popote kutoka dakika 45 hadi saa 3 ili kuchakatwa, huku uondoaji wa bone (BONE) utachukua hadi siku 7.
yo: Gbígba owó àkósódù Shiba Inu (SHIB) , Leash (LEASH), àti Wrapped Ether (wETH) jáde nínú ètò àwùjọ Shibarium yóò gbà tó láti ìṣẹ́jú 45 sí wákàtí 3 láti délẹ̀, nígbà tí gbígba owó jáde lórí Bone (BONE) lè gbà tó ọjọ́ 7.
zu: Ukuhoxiswa kwamathokheni e-Shibarium ecosystem Shiba Inu (iSHIB), Leash (iLEASH), kanye ne-Ether Egoqiwe (wETH) kuzothatha noma yikuphi ukusuka kumaminithi angu-45 ukuya emahoreni angu-3 ukuze kucutshungulwe, kuyilapho ukuhoxiswa kweBone (i-IBONE) kungathatha izinsuku ezingafika kweziyi-7.

am: ዜናው በሺባ ኢኑ (ኤስኤችአይቢ) ዋጋ ላይ በጎ ተጽዕኖ ያሳደረ ሲሆን በሚቀጥሉት ቀናት የ ኤስኤችአይቢ ዋጋ ትንበያ ላይም አዎንታዊ ተጽእኖ ይኖረዋል፡፡
en: The news has had a positive effect on Shiba Inu (SHIB) price and will also positively affect SHIB price prediction for the coming days.
ha: Labarin ya yi tasiri mai kyau akan farashin Shiba Inu (SHIB) kuma zai yi tasiri sosai akan hasashen farashin SHIB na kwanaki masu zuwa.
sw: Habari imekuwa na matokeo chanya kwa bei ya Shiba Inu (SHIB) na pia itaathiri vyema ubashiri wa bei wa SHIB kwa siku zijazo.
yo: Ìròyìn náà ti ní ipa tí kò dára lórí ìdíyelé Shiba Inu (SHIB) yóò sì nípa tí kò dára lórí ìdíyelé ọjọ́ iwájú SHIB ní àwọn ọjọ́ tí ó ń bọ̀.
zu: Lezi zindaba zibe nomthelela omuhle enanini leShiba Inu (iSHIB) futhi zizoba nomthelela omuhle esibikezelweni senani seSHIB ezinsukwini ezizayo.

am: ዜናው ከተሰማበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ የሺባ ኢኑ (ኤስኤችአይቢ) ዋጋ ከ$0.00000823 ወደ 0.00000838 በ1.8% ጨምሯል።
en: Since the news broke, Shiba Inu's (SHIB) price has increased by 1.8% from $0.00000823 to $0.00000838.
ha: Tun bayan da labarin ya fito, farashin Shiba Inu (SHIB) ya karu da kashi 1.8% daga $0.00000823 zuwa $0.00000838.
sw: Tangu habari kuzuka, bei ya Shiba Inu (SHIB) imeongezeka kwa 1.8% kutoka $0.00000823 hadi $0.00000838.
yo: Láti ìgbà tí ìròyìn náà ti jáde, ìdíyelé Shiba Inu (SHIB) ti pọ̀ si pẹ̀lú 1.8% láti $0.00000823 lọ sí $0.00000838.
zu: Selokhu kwavela izindaba, intengo ye-Shiba Inu (SHIB) inyuke ngo-1.8% isuka ku-$0.00000823 yaya ku-$0.00000838.

am: ለ 2023 የ ኤስኤችአይቢ ዋጋ ትንበያ $0.00001083 ነው።
en: The SHIB price prediction for 2023 is $0.00001083.
ha: Hasashen farashin SHIB na 2023 shine $0.00001083.
sw: Utabiri wa bei ya SHIB kwa 2023 ni $0.00001083.
yo: Ìdíyelé ọjọ́ iwájú Shint fún 2023 ni $0.00001083.
zu: Intengo yesibikezelo yeSHIB yango-2023 ingu-$0.00001083.

am: እንደ ሆንግ ኮንግ መንግሥት ያሉ መንግሥታት የክሪፕቶ ምንዛሪዎችን ማጽደቃቸው እና የአሜሪካ ፌዴሬሽንም የወለድ ምጣኔ ጭማሪ ማቋረጡ ለዚህ መጨመር አስተዋጽኦ ያደርጋሉ ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
en: The endorsements of cryptocurrencies by governments like the Hong Kong government and the pause on interest rate hikes by the US Fed are expected to contribute to this upward trend.
ha: Ana sa ran amincewa da cryptocurrencies daga gwamnatoci kamar gwamnatin Hong Kong da kuma dakatar da hauhawar riba ta Fed na Amurka zai ba da gudummawa ga wannan haɓakar cigaba.
sw: Uidhinishaji wa fedha siri na serikali kama vile serikali ya Hong Kong na kusitisha kwa upandishaji wa viwango vya riba na Shirika la Fedha la Marekani Fed vinatarajiwa kuchangia katika mwelekeo huu wa juu.
yo: Ìfọwọ́sí àwọn owó àkósódù láti ọwọ́ àwọn ìjọba bí ìjọba Hong Kong àti ìdáwọ́dúró lórí ìwọ̀n ìlọsíwájú ère láti ilé ìfowópamọ́ ìjọba Àpapọ̀ US jẹ́ èyí tí a ní ìrètí pé yóò kópa nínú ìlọsíwájú yìí.
zu: Ukugunyazwa kwezimali zecrypto ohulumeni abafana nohulumeni waseHong Kong kanye nokumiswa okwesikhashana kokwenyuswa kwezinga lenzalo yi-US Fed kulindeleke ukuthi kube nesandla kulo mkhuba okhuphukayo.

am: ይህ ሺባ ኢኑ (ኤስኤችአይቢ) በአሁኑ ጊዜ ኢንቨስት ለማድረግ ከፍተኛው ክሪፕቶ ሊሆን እንደሚችል ያሳያል።
en: This indicates that Shiba Inu (SHIB) might currently be the top crypto to invest in.
ha: Wannan yana nuna cewa Shiba Inu (SHIB) na iya kasancewa a halin yanzu shine babban crypto don saka hannun jari.
sw: Hii inaonyesha kuwa Shiba Inu (SHIB) kwa sasa inaweza kuwa fedha fiche ya juu zaidi kuwekeza.
yo: Eléyìí fi hàn pé Shiba Inu (SHIB) lè jẹ́ owó àkósódù tí ó dára jùlọ báyìí láti fi dókòwò.
zu: Lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi iShiba Inu (iSHIB) kungenzeka njengamanje ibe yi-crypto ephezulu ongatshala kuyo.

am: የሺባሪየም ወደ ታዋቂ ንጣፍ 2 ፕሮጀክት የማደግ አቅም ጋር, የሺባ ኢኑ የዋጋ ትንበያ እ.ኤ.አ ለ 2030 በ 0,00004785 ዶላር እና በ 0,00006056 ዶላር መካከል ይደርሳል፡፡
en: With the potential of Shibarium to grow into a prominent Layer 2 project, Shiba Inu's price prediction for 2030 ranges between $0.00004785 and $0.00006056.
ha: Tare da yuwuwar Shibarium ya haɓaka zuwa babban shiri a Layer 2, Hasashen farashin Shiba Inu na 2030 yana tsakanin dala $0.00004785 da dala $0.00006056.
sw: Kwa uwezekano wa Shibarium kukua na kuwa mradi maarufu wa Tabaka 2, utabiri wa bei wa Shiba Inu kwa 2030 ni kati ya $0.00004785 na $0.00006056.
yo: Pẹ̀lú bí ó ti ṣe é ṣe kí Sharibium dàgbà di gbajúgbajà àkànṣe Layer 2, àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ iye Shiba Inu fún 2030 wà láàárín $0.00004785 àti 0.00006056.
zu: Njengoba iShibarium inethuba lokukhula ibe iphrojekthi evelele yeLayer 2, isibikezelo sentengo yeShiba Inu ngo-2030 siphakathi kuka-$0.00004785 kanye no-$0.00006056.

am: ቢናንስ ቤተ-ሙከራዎች በስድስት ወራት ውስጥ ከፍተኛው የዌብ 3 ባለሀብት ነው-የቢኤንቢ( ቢኤንቢ) ዋጋን ከፍ ያደርገዋል?
en: Binance Labs Is The Top Web3 Investor In Six Months: Will It Drive BNB (BNB) Price Up?
ha: Binance Labs Shine Babban Mai saka hannun jari na Web3 A cikin Watanni shida: Shin Zai ɗaga Farashin BNB (BNB)?
sw: Maabara ya Binance Ndiye Mwekezaji Bora wa Web3 Katika Miezi Sita: Je, Itaendesha Bei ya BNB (BNB) Juu?
yo: Binance Labs ni Olùdókòwò Top Web3 ní Oṣù Mẹ́fà: Ṣé yóò mú iye owó BNB (BNB) lọ sókè?
zu: IBinance Labs Ingumtshalizimali Ophezulu WeWeb3 Ezinyangeni Eziyisithupha: Ingabe Izothuthukisa Intengo YeBNB (BNB)?

am: በነሀሴ 27 መሳሪ እንዳለው ቢናነስ ቤተ-ሙከራዎች ባለፉት ስድስት ወራት ውስጥ ከተፈጸሙት ስምምነቶች ከ80% በላይ ዋና ባለሃብት ነበር።
en: According to Messari on August 27, Binance Labs was the lead investor in more than 80% of the deals executed in the last six months.
ha: A cewar Messari a ranar 27 ga watan Agusta, Binance Labs shine jagoran masu saka hannun jari a fiye da kashi 80% na yarjejeniyar da aka aiwatar a cikin watanni shida da suka gabata.
sw: Kulingana na Messari mnamo Agosti 27, Maabara ya Binance alikuwa mwekezaji mkuu katika zaidi ya 80% ya mikataba iliyotekelezwa katika miezi sita iliyopita.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ Messari ní Ọjọ́ 27 Oṣù Kẹjọ, Binance Labs jẹ́ asíwájú olùdókòwò nínú ó lé ní àwọn àdéhùn okòwò 80% tí wọ́n ṣe ní àwọn oṣù mẹ́fà sẹ́yìn.
zu: Ngokusho kukaMessari ngoNcwaba 27, iBinance Labs yayingumtshali-zimali oholayo ngaphezu kwe-80% yezivumelwano ezenziwe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule.

am: ቢናነስ ቤተ-ሙከራዎች ከ17ቱ ስምምነቶች ውስጥ በ14ቱ ውስጥ ቀዳሚውን የኢንቨስተር ሚና የተጫወተ ሲሆን ይህም ከሁለተኛው ምርጥ DWFዲደብሊውኤፍ ቤተ-ሙከራዎች ጋር ሲነጻጸር በእጥፍ ገደማ ነው።
en: Binance Labs took the lead investor role in 14 out of 17 deals, nearly double that of the second-best DWF Labs.
ha: Binance Labs ya karɓe jagorancin mai saka hannun jari da hada-hada 14 daga cikin 17, kusan ninki biyu na DWF Labs wanda yazo na biyu.
sw: Maabara ya Binance ilichukua jukumu la mwekezaji mkuu katika mikataba 14 kati ya 17, karibu mara mbili ya Maabara ya pili bora ya DWF.
yo: Binance Labs gba ipò asíwájú olùdókòwò nínú àdéhùn okòwò 14 nínú 17, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ tó ìlọ́po méjì DWF Labs tí ó wà nípò kejì.
zu: IBinance Labs yayingumtshali-zimali oholayo kumadili angu-14 kwangu-17, acishe aphinde kabili amalebhu eDWF ahamba phambili okwesibili.

am: ሜሳሪ ይህ የተቋቋሙ ፕሮጀክቶች ወደ ቢናንስ ሳነቲም(ቢኤንቢ) ሰንሰለት እንዲስፋፉ ለመርዳት የአዲሱ ፖሊሲ አካል እንደነበር ተናግረዋል።
en: Messari said this was part of a new policy to assist established projects in expanding to the Binance Coin (BNB) Chain.
ha: Messari ya ce wannan wani ɓangare ne na sabuwar manufar taimakawa shirye-shiryen da suka kafu don faɗaɗuwa zuwa jerin Binance Coin (BNB).
sw: Messari alisema hii ni sehemu ya sera mpya ya kusaidia miradi iliyoanzishwa katika kupanua Msururu wa Sarafu ya Binance (BNB).
yo: Messari sọ pé èyí jẹ́ ara ìlànà tuntun láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn àgbékalẹ̀ iṣẹ́ àkànṣe láti gbòòrò di Binance Coin (BNB) Chain.
zu: UMessari uthe lokhu kuyingxenye yenqubomgomo entsha yokusiza amaphrojekthi amisiwe akhule ku-Binance Coin (iBNB) Chain.

am: ዜናው ከተሰራጨ በኋላ የቢኤንቢ ሳንቲም ዋጋ ነሐሴ 27 ላይ ከ 216.37 ዶላር በነሐሴ 29 ላይ ወደ 228.57 ዶላር በ 7.1% ጨምሯል።
en: After the news broke, the BNB coin price increased by 7.1% from $216.37 on August 27 to $228.57 as of August 29.
ha: Bayan da labarin ya bayyana, farashin tsabar kuɗin na BNB ya ƙaru da kashi 7.1% daga $216.37 a ranar 27 ga watan Agusta zuwa Dala 228.57 a ranar 29 ga watan Agusta.
sw: Baada ya habari kuenea, bei ya sarafu ya BNB iliongezeka kwa 7.1% kutoka $216.37 mnamo Agosti 27 hadi $228.57 kufikia Agosti 29.
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí ìròyìn náà jáde, iye owó àkósódù BNB gòkè pẹ̀lú 7.1% láti $216.37 ní Ọjọ́ 27 Oṣù Kẹjọ di $228.57 ní Ọjọ́ 29 Oṣù Kẹ̀sán-án.
zu: Ngemva kokuvela kwezindaba, intengo yeBNB inyuke ngo-7.1% isuka ku-$216.37 ngoNcwaba 27 yaya ku-$228.57 kusukela ngoNcwaba 29.

am: ይሁን እንጂ አብዛኛው ጭማሪው የግሬይስኬል ድል ውጤት ነው።
en: However, most of the increase was a result of Grayscale's victory.
ha: Duk da haka, yawancin ƙaruwar sakamako ne na nasarar Grayscale.
sw: Walakini, ongezeko kubwa lilitokana na ushindi wa Grayscale.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, púpọ̀ ọ̀wọ́n náà jẹ́ àbájáde ìṣẹ́gun Grayscale.
zu: Nokho ukunyuka okukhulu kube wumphumela wokunqoba kukaGreyscale.

am: እንደ ተንታኞች የ BNB የዋጋ ትንበያ በሚቀጥለው ሳምንት፣ የ ቢኤንቢ ሳንቲም ዋጋ በሴፕቴምበር 11 ወደ $319.99 ሊደርስ ይችላል፣ ይህም በገበያው ለግሬይስኬል ብይን ባሳየው ከፍተኛ ምላሽ ነው።
en: According to analysts' BNB price prediction for next week, BNB coin price could reach $319.99 by September 11, buoyed by the market's bullish reaction to the Grayscale ruling.
ha: A cewar hasashen manazarta na farashin BNB a mako mai zuwa , farashin koyin na BNB zai iya kaiwa dala $319.99 a ranar 11 ga Satumba, wanda ya samu zuzutawar ƙarya daga karɓuwar da Grayscale ya samu.
sw: Kulingana na utabiri wa bei ya BNB ya wachambuzi kwa wiki ijayo, bei ya sarafu ya BNB inaweza kufikia $319.99 kufikia Septemba 11, ikichochewa na athari ya soko kwa uamuzi wa Grayscale.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ àwọn lámèétọ́ nípa iye BNB fún ọ̀sẹ̀ tí ó ń bọ̀, iye ẹyọó BNB lè dé $319.99 ní Ọjọ́ 11 Oṣù Kẹsàn-án, ìgbéga nítorí àbájáde ipá ọjà lórí ìdájọ́ Grayscale.
zu: Ngokusho kwesibikezelo sentengo yeBNB sabahlaziyi ngesonto elizayo, intengo yethokheni ye-BNB ingafinyelela ku-$ 319.99 ngoMandulo 11, ikhuthazwe ukusabela kwemakethe esinqumweni seGreyscale.

am: ቪሲ ስፔክትራ (ኤስፒሲቲ) ለባለሀብቶች የሚሰጠውን ትርፍ ዋስትና ይሰጣል፡፡
en: VC Spectra (SPCT) Guarantees Profits For Investors
ha: VC Spectra (SPCT) Yana Ba da garantin Riba Ga Masu saka hannun jari
sw: VC Spectra (SPCT) Inahakikisha Faida Kwa Wawekezaji
yo: VC Spectra (SPCT) Fún àwọn Olùdókòwò ní Ìdánilójú fún Èrè.
zu: I-VC Spectra (iSPCT) Iqinisekisa Inzuzo Yabatshalizimali

am: ቪሲ ስፔክትራ (ኤስፒሲቲ) ያልተማከለ የንብረት አያያዝ ፕሮቶኮል እና የግብይት መድረክ ሲሆን ዓላማው የብሎክቼይን እና የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪን ማግኘት ዲሞክራሲያዊ ማድረግ እና ለባለሀብቶች ዘላቂ እና ትርፋማ ተመላሾችን ማቅረብ ነው፡፡
en: VC Spectra (SPCT) is a decentralized asset management protocol and trading platform that aims to democratize access to the blockchain and technology industry and provide investors with sustainable and profitable returns.
ha: VC Spectra (SPCT) yarjejeniya ce ta sarrafa kadara da dandamalin ciniki wanda ke da nufin ba da dimokuraɗiyya damar yin amfani da blockchain da masana'antar fasaha da samar da masu saka hannun jari mai ɗorewa da riba mai ɗorewa.
sw: VC Spectra (SPCT) ni itifaki ya usimamizi wa mali iliyogatuliwa na jukwaa la biashara ambalo linalenga kuweka kidemokrasia ufikiaji wa blockchain na tasnia ya teknolojia na kuwapa wawekezaji mapato endelevu na yenye faida.
yo: VC Spectra (SPCT) jẹ́ ìlànà ìṣàkóso ọrọ̀ ẹlẹ́kajẹ̀ka àti ìkànnì ìṣòwò tí ó fojúsun sísọ àǹfààní sí àká ìṣàkóso ìdúnàádúrà owó àkósódù àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ di àwaarawa kí wọ́n sì pèsè àbájáde kánrinkése tí ó ní èrè fún àwọn olùdókòwò.
zu: I-VC Spectra (iSPCT) iyiphrothokholi ehlukaniselwe ukuphathwa kwempahla kanye nenkundla yokuhweba ehlose ukwenza intando yeningi ukufinyelela embonini ye-blockchain nobuchwepheshe futhi inikeze abatshalizimali imbuyiselo esimeme nenenzuzo.

am: ባለሀብቶች በቪሲ ስፔክትራ (ኤስፒሲቲ) መድረክ ላይ በሁለት መንገዶች ትርፍ ያገኛሉ።
en: Investors earn profits on the VC Spectra (SPCT) platform in two ways.

sw: Wawekezaji hupata faida kwenye jukwaa la VC Spectra (SPCT) kwa njia mbili.
yo: Àwọn olùdókòwò yóò jèrè lórí ìkànnì VC Spectra (SPCT) ní ọ̀nà méjì:.
zu: Abatshalizimali bayazuza kuVC Spectra (iSPCT) ngezindlela ezimbili.

am: አንደኛው ተስፋ ሰጪ በሆኑ የብሎክቼይን ሥራዎች ላይ ኢንቬስት ማድረግ ሲሆን ሁለተኛው መንገድ ከቪሲ ስፔክትራ( ኤስፒሲቲ) የዋጋ ጭማሪ ማትረፍ ነው፡፡
en: One is through investing in promising blockchain ventures, while the second way is to profit from VC Spectra (SPCT) price increases.
ha: Ɗayan shine ta hanyar saka hannun jari a cikin kasuwancin blockchain masu ban sha'awa, yayin da hanya ta biyu ita ce riba daga ƙaruwar farashin VC Spectra (SPCT).
sw: Moja ni kupitia kuwekeza katika ubia wa kuahidi wa blockchain, wakati njia ya pili ni kufaidika na ongezeko la bei la VC Spectra (SPCT).
yo: Èkíní ni nípa ìdókòwò nínú àwọn okòwò àká ìṣàkóso ìdúnàádúrà owó àkósódù tí ọjọ́ ọ̀la wọ́n dára, nígbà tí ọ̀nà kejì jẹ́ èrè láti àwọn iye owó VC Spectra tí wọ́n ń gòkè.
zu: Enye iwukutshala imali emabhizinisini eblockchain athembisayo, futhi indlela yesibili iwukuba wenze imali ngenani elikhulayo leVC Spectra (iSPCT).

am: ቪሲ ስፔክትራ( ኤስፒሲቲ) ተስፋ ሰጭ ፕሮጀክቶችን፣ ሥነ ምግባራዊ እና ኃላፊነት የሚሰማቸው የኢንቨስትመንት ልምዶችን እንዲሁም ግልጽነትን እና ተጠያቂነትን ለማቅረብ ቁርጠኛ ነው፡፡
en: VC Spectra (SPCT) is committed to providing access to promising projects, ethical & responsible investment practices, and transparency & accountability.
ha: VC Spectra (SPCT) ta himmatu wajen samar da dama ga ayyuka masu ban sha'awa, ɗabi'a & ayyukan saka hannun jari, da kuma nuna gaskiya & ba da lissafi.
sw: VC Spectra (SPCT) imejitolea kutoa ufikiaji wa miradi inayoahidi, mazoea ya uwekezaji yenye maadili na uwajibu, na uwazi & uwajibikaji.
yo: VC Spectra (SPCT) farajìn nínú pípèsè àǹfààní sí àwọn iṣẹ́ tí ọjọ́ ọ̀la wọ́n dára, àwọn ìṣe ìdókòwò tí ó tọ́, àti àkóyawọ́ àti ìjíyìn.
zu: I-VC Spectra (iSPCT) izibophezele ekuhlinzekeni ukufinyelela kumaphrojekthi athembisayo, izinqubo zokutshala izimali ezinobulungiswa nezinomthwalo wemfanelo, nokuba sobala nokuziphendulela.
