zu: Sizoletha amathuba emisebenzi futhi sikhuthaze ubudlelwano bamazwe angaphandle kanye nokusebenzisana kwasekhaya okubonisa ngokuziqhenya ubuzwe bethu obucebile nobuhlukahlukene endaweni yasekhaya neyomhlaba wonke, futhi sizophakamisa ukuma kwezomnotho kwesizwe sakithi.

am: እንደ የፈጠራ ማዕከሎች፣ የናይጄሪያ የባህል ኤክስፖ፣ ብሔራዊ የመዝናኛ ማዕከል፣ ብሔራዊ የሥነ ጥበብ ጋለሪ፣ የፈጠራ ሕትመት ሽርክና እና የጨዋታ ሳንድቦክስ ፕሮጀክት ያሉ በርካታ ተነሳሽነት እና ፕሮጀክቶች አሉን።
en: We have multiple initiatives & projects planned such as creative hubs, a Nigeria cultural expo, a national entertainment centre, a national art gallery, innovative publishing partnerships and a gaming sandbox project.
ha: Muna da tsare-tsare da ayyuka da yawa da aka tsara kamar wuraren ƙirƙira da baje kolin al'adun Najeriya da cibiyar nishaɗi ta ƙasa da gidan wasan kwaikwayo na ƙasa, da kuma haɓakar wallafe-wallafen sabbin fasahohi da kuma aikin wurin wasannin yara.
sw: Tuna mipango na miradi mingi iliyopangwa kama vile vitovu vya ubunifu, maonyesho ya kitamaduni ya Nigeria, kituo cha burudani cha kitaifa, jumba la sanaa la kitaifa, ushirikiano wa uchapishaji wa kibunifu na mradi wa sanduku la michezo ya kubahatisha.
yo: A ní àwọn onírúurú ìwòye & iṣẹ́ àkànṣe tí a ti ṣètò bí àwọn ibùdó àtinúdá, ìpàtẹ àṣà Nigeria, ibùdó ìdánilárayá orílẹ̀-èdè, gbọ̀ngàn ìṣàfihàn iṣẹ́ ọ̀nà orílẹ̀-èdè, àwọn ìbánidòwòpọ̀ ìtẹ̀wéjáde ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun àti iṣẹ́ àkànṣe eré ayo adáwà.
zu: Sinezinhlelo eziningi namaphrojekthi ahleliwe njengamahabhu obuciko, umbukiso wamasiko waseNigeria, isikhungo sokuzijabulisa sikazwelonke, igalari yezobuciko kazwelonke, ubambiswano olusha lokushicilela kanye nephrojekthi ye-sandbox yezemidlalo.

am: ዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃውን የጠበቀ የፊልም ፌስቲቫል፣ በሚሸሊን ኰከብ ሼፍ የሚመራ የምግብ አሠራር አካዳሚ እና የፋሽን መስራች በመገንባት ላይ እንገኛለን።
en: We are building a global standard film festival, a culinary academy led by a Michelin star chef and a fashion foundry.
ha: Muna gina tsayayyen ma'aikatar fina-finai ta duniya, makarantar koyar da abinci a ƙarƙashin jagorancin tauraruwa Michelin da kuma wurin samar da kayayyaki.
sw: Tunaunda tamasha la kimataifa la filamu, chuo cha upishi kinachoongozwa na mpishi nyota wa Michelin na mwanzilishi wa mitindo.
yo: À ń ṣẹ̀dá ayẹyẹ eré àwòránhùn tí òṣùwọ̀n rẹ̀ báyé mu, ilé ẹ̀kọ́ oúnjẹ tí gbajúmọ̀ alásè Michelin kan sáájú àti ibùdó ìṣaralóge.
zu: Sakha ifestivali yamafilimu esezingeni lomhlaba, isikole sokupheka esiholwa umpheki wodumo we-Michelin nomsunguli wemfashini.

am: በመጨረሻም የቤኒን ነሐስን ጨምሮ ብሔራዊ ቅርሶቻችንን ወደ ቤታችን ለማምጣት ያለማቋረጥ እደግፋለሁ።
en: Finally, I will be relentless in my support to bring home our national heritage artifacts including the Benin bronzes.
ha: A ƙarshe, ba zan yi ƙasa a gwiwa ba wajen bayar da goyon baya na dawo da kayayyakin tarihi na ƙasa da suka haɗa da tagullan Benin.
sw: Hatimaye, nitasitasita kuunga mkono kurudisha nyumbani vitu vyetu vya urithi wa kitaifa ikiwa ni pamoja na shaba za Benin.
yo: Ní ìparí, èmi kì yóò sinmi nínú àtìlẹ́yìn mi láti kó àwọn iṣẹ́ ọ̀nà ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé wa wá sílé tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn ère idẹ Benin.
zu: Okokugcina, ngeke ngiyeke ukusekela ukubuyiselwa kwengcebo yezwe lethu okuhlanganisa nobhedu lwaseBenin.

am: እናመሰግናለን፣ በመነሳሳት እና ፈጠሪ በመሆን ይቆዩ እና ሃሳቦችህን በእኛ አጋራ በ
en: Thank you, stay inspired & creative and share your ideas with us at
ha: Na gode, ku kasance cikin himma kuma masu fasahar ƙirƙira kuma ku turo mana ra'ayoyinku a
sw: Asante, endelea kuhamasika na mbunifu na ushiriki maoni yako nasi kwa
yo: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ tẹ̀síwájú nínú ìmísí & àtinúdá kí ẹ sì pín àwọn ìwòye yín pẹ̀lú wa.
zu: Siyabonga, hlala ukhuthazekile futhi uhlakaniphile futhi wabelane ngemibono yakho nathi ku-

am: ሉፕስክራይብ በማስተዋወቅ ላይ: አብዮታዊ ማስታወሻዎች መተግበሪያ ለመማር እና ሀሳብ ለመስጠት የተመቻቸ ነው
en: Introducing Loopscribe: A Revolutionary Notes App Optimized for Learning and Reflection
ha: Gabatar da Manhajar Loopscribe: Wata Ingantacciyar Manhajar Rubutu Da aka Shiryata don Koyo da Tunani
sw: Tunakuletea Loopscribe: Programu ya Madokezo ya Mapinduzi Iliyoboreshwa kwa Kujifunza na Kuangazia
yo: Ṣíṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Loopscribe: Ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ Aṣàyípadà èrò tí wọ́n gbe gbé kalẹ̀ fún Ẹ̀kọ́ àti Ìdánwò.
zu: Sethula iLoopscribe: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwamanothi eRevolutionary Olulungiselelwe Ukufunda Nokuzindla

am: የሚጠበቀው አልቋል!
en: The anticipation is over!
ha: Tsammanin ya ƙare!
sw: Matarajio yameisha!
yo: Àsìkò Ìdúró ti tán!
zu: Ukulinda kuphelile!

am: መማርን እና ሃሳብ መስጠትን ለማጉላት በጥንቃቄ የተሠራው ድንገተኛ ማስታወሻ መተግበሪያ ሉፕስክራይብ በጉጉት ሲጠበቅ የነበረው የመጀመሪያ ስራውን ሊያደርግ ነው።
en: Loopscribe, a groundbreaking notes app meticulously crafted to amplify learning and reflection, is set to make its highly anticipated debut.
ha: Manhajar Loopscribe, wata gagarumar manhajar rubuta bayani da aka ƙera sosai don inganta koyo da tunani, an shirya fitar da ita da ake ta tsimayi.
sw: Kipengele kikuu cha Loopscribe ni sehemu yake ya Chaneli, inayowapa watumiaji uwezo wa kutengeneza na kushiriki maudhui ya muda mrefu na ulimwengu.
yo: Loopscribe, ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ èrò tuntun tí wọ́n dìídì gbé kalẹ̀ láti mú ìlọsíwájú bá ẹ̀kọ́ àti ìdánwò, ti ṣètò láti ṣe ìkójáde tí àwọn ènìyàn ti ń retí.
zu: ILoopscribe, uhlelo lokusebenza olubalulekile lokuthatha amanothi oluklanywe ngokucophelela ukuthuthukisa ukufunda nokuzindla, lusethelwe ukwenza uhlelo lwalo lokuqala okulindeleke kakhulu.

am: መስራች እና ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ዴቪድ ኡኪዌ የአዕምሮ ልጅ የሆነው ሉፕስክራይብ ግለሰቦች ከሃሳባቸው፣ ከግቦቻቸው እና ከምኞቶቻቸው ጋር የሚገጥሙበትን መንገድ ለመለወጥ ያለመ ነው፡፡
en: A brainchild of Founder and CEO David Ukiwe, Loopscribe aims to revolutionize how individuals engage with their thoughts, goals, and aspirations.
ha: Wanda ya kafa kuma Shugaba David Ukiwe, manhajar Loopscribe tana da nufin kawo sauyi kan yadda mutane ke tafiyar da tunaninsu da burinsu da kuma abin da ke burgesu.
sw: Mchanganuo wa mawazo ya Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji David Ukiwe, Loopscribe inalenga kuleta mapinduzi ya jinsi watu binafsi wanavyojihusisha na mawazo, malengo na matarajio yao.
yo: Olùṣẹ̀dá ìdásílẹ̀ àti Olùdarí Àgbà Pátápátá David Ukiwe, Loopscribe fojúsun mímú àyípadà bá bí àwọn ènìyàn ṣe ń ṣàmúlò àwọn èrò, àfojúsùn, àti èrò wọn.
zu: Ingqondo yomsunguli kanye neCEO uDavid Ukiwe, iLoopscribe ihlose ukuguqula indlela abantu ababelana ngayo ngemicabango, imigomo, kanye nezifiso zabo.

am: ሉፕስክራይብ ሌላ የማስታወሻ መተግበሪያ አይደለም፤ ይህ ተለዋዋጭ የማስታወሻዎች ድብልቅ ነው፣ ዝርዝሮችን ለመስራት፣ ጋዜጣዎች፣ እና የሕልም መጽሐፍ፣ ሁሉም በእድገት ጉዟቸው ላይ ተጠቃሚዎች ለማብቃት ያላንዳች እንከን ይቀናጃሉ፡፡
en: Loopscribe isn't just another notes app; it's a dynamic amalgamation of notes, to-do lists, journals, and a dreambook, all seamlessly integrated to empower users on their journey of growth.
ha: Manhajar Loopscribe ba kawai wata manhaja ba ce; ita gamayya ce mai ƙarfi ta shafin rubutu, da safin jerin abubuwan da za a yi da mujallu da littafin mafarki, duk an haɗa su ba tare da wata matsala ba don ƙarfafa masu amfani kan tafiyarsu ta ci gaba.
sw: Loopscribe sio programu nyingine ya madokezo; ni muunganisho thabiti wa madokezo, orodha za mambo ya kufanya, majarida, na kitabu cha ndoto, vyote vimeunganishwa bila mshono ili kuwawezesha watumiaji katika safari yao ya ukuaji.
yo: Loopscribe, ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ aṣàyípadà èrò; ó jẹ́ ìsopọ̀ṣọ̀kan ọlọ́pọ̀ èrò, àwọn àkójọ ohun àtiṣe, jọ́nà, àti ìwé èròǹgbà, gbogbo èyí tí wọ́n kójọ láti set ìrónilágbára fún àwọn aṣàmúlò ní ojú ọ̀nà wọn sí ìdàgbàsókè.
zu: ILoopscribe ayilona nje olunye uhlelo lokusebenza lwamanothi; iyinhlanganisela eguqukayo yamanothi, izinhlu zokwenziwa, amajenali, nencwadi yamaphupho, konke kuhlanganiswe ngaphandle komthungo ukunikeza abasebenzisi amandla ohambweni lwabo lokukhula.

am: ይህ የፈጠራ መድረክ ተጠቃሚዎች ተልዕኮአቸውን፣ ራዕያቸውን፣ እሴቶቻቸውን እና ግቦቻቸውን እንዲዘረዝሩ የሚያስችል የራስ-አስተያየት ማዕከልን ያስተዋውቃል፣ ይህም ምኞቶቻቸውን በጥልቀት እንዲገነዘቡ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: This innovative platform introduces a self-reflection hub that lets users chart their mission, vision, values, and goals, fostering a deeper understanding of their aspirations.
ha: Wannan sabon tsarin dandali yana gabatar da cibiya ta tunani wanda ke baiwa masu amfani damar tsara manufofinsu da hangen nesa da ɗabi'u da burace-buracensu da kuma ƙara zurfin fahimtar abin da ke burge su.
sw: Jukwaa hili bunifu linatanguliza kitovu cha kujitafakari ambacho huwaruhusu watumiaji kuorodhesha dhamira, maono, thamani na malengo yao, hivyo basi kukuza uelewa wa kina wa matarajio yao.
yo: Ìkànnì ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun yìí ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ibùdó àgbékalẹ̀ èrò ara ẹni tí yóò fi ààyè gba àwọn aṣàmúlò láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ èròǹgbà, àfojúsùn, ìṣe, àti èrò wọn, èyí tí yóò mú ìdàgbàsókè bá òye èròǹgbà wọn.
zu: Le nkundla entsha yethula ihabhu yokuziphendulela evumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bahlele umgomo wabo, umbono, amanani, kanye nemigomo, ethuthukisa ukuqonda okujulile kwezifiso zabo.

am: የሉፕስክራይብ መስራች እና ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ዴቪድ ኡኪዌ " ተማሪ፣ ባለሙያ ወይም በራስ-ተኮር ትምህርት ላይ የተሰማሩ ይሁኑ፣ ሉፕስክራይብ ከተለመደው በላይ የሆነ ማስታወሻ ለመያዝ ልዩ አቀራረብን ይሰጣል" ብለዋል፡፡
en: "Whether you're a student, a professional, or engaged in self-directed learning, Loopscribe offers a unique approach to note-taking that transcends the ordinary," said David Ukiwe, Founder and CEO of Loopscribe.
ha: Ko kai ɗalibi ne ko ƙwararre ko kuma ka tsunduma cikin koyo na kai-da-kai, manhajar Loopscribe tana ba da wata hanya ta musamman don yin rubutu wanda ya zarce na yau da kullun, in ji David Ukiwe, wanda ya ƙirƙira kuma Shugaba na Loopscribe.
sw: David Ukiwe, Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Loopscribe alisema. "Iwapo wewe ni mwanafunzi, mtaalamu, au unajishughulisha na kujifunza kwa kujitegemea, Loopscribe inatoa mbinu ya kipekee ya kuchukua kumbukumbu ambayo inapita kawaida,".
yo: "Bóyá o jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́, akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tàbí o ń kópa nínú ẹ̀kọ́ ara ẹni, Loopscribe ń pèsè ìlànà àrà ọ̀tọ̀ láti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ tí ó tayọ ojú lásán," ni ọ̀rọ̀ David Ukiwe, Olùdásílẹ̀ àti Ọ̀gá Àgbà Pátápátá Loopscribe.
zu: Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ungumfundi, uchwepheshe, noma uzifundisile, iLoopscribe ikunikeza indlela ehlukile yokubhala amanothi angaphezu kwejwayelekile, kusho uDavid Ukiwe, Umsunguli kanye neCEO yeLoopscribe.

am: "ሃሳብ መስጠት የዕድገት መሠረት ነው ብለን እናምናለን፣ እና ሉፕስክራይብ ተጠቃሚዎች ሃሳባቸውን እንዲመዘግቡ፣ ሊተገበሩ የሚችሉ ግቦችን እንዲያስቀምጡ እና ወደ ስኬት ጎዳናቸውን እንዲያሳዩ ኃይል ይሰጣቸዋል፡፡"
en: "We believe that reflection is the cornerstone of progress, and Loopscribe empowers users to document their thoughts, set actionable goals, and chart their course to success."
ha: Mun yi imanin cewa tunani shi ne ginshiƙin ci gaba, kuma manhajar Loopscribe tana ba wa masu amfani damar rubuta tunaninsu da saita manufofin da za a iya aiwatarwa, da tsara hanyarsu zuwa nasara.
sw: "Tunaamini kuwa kutafakari ndio msingi wa maendeleo, na Loopscribe inawawezesha watumiaji kuandika mawazo yao, kuweka malengo yanayoweza kutekelezeka, na kupanga njia zao za mafanikio."
yo: "A ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ìdánwò ni ọ̀pákùtẹ̀lẹ̀ ìlọsíwájú, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni Loopscribe ń ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn aṣàmúlò láti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ èrò wọn, ṣíṣe ètò àwọn àfojúsùn tí ó ṣe é ṣe, kí wọ́n sì wá ọ̀nà wọn sí àṣeyọrí.
zu: Sikholelwa ukuthi ukuzindla kuyisisekelo senqubekelaphambili, futhi iLoopscribe inika abasebenzisi amandla okubhala phansi imicabango yabo, ukusetha imigomo engafinyeleleka, futhi badwebe indlela eya empumelelweni.

am: የ ሉፕስክራይብ ልዩ ባህሪ ለተጠቃሚዎች የረዥም ጊዜ ይዘትን ለመስራት እና ለአለም የማጋራት ችሎታ የሚሰጥ የቻነሎች ክፍል ነው።
en: A standout feature of Loopscribe is its Channels section, offering users the ability to craft and share long-form content with the world.
ha: Babban fasalin da manhajar Loopscribe tayi zarra dashi shi ne sashin Tashoshi, wanda yake bawa masu amfani damar yin sana'a da yaɗa shirye-shiryen da suka haɗa masu tsayi ga duniya.
sw: Kipengele kikuu cha Loopscribe ni sehemu yake ya Chaneli, inayowapa watumiaji uwezo wa kutengeneza na kushiriki maudhui ya muda mrefu na ulimwengu.
yo: Àbùdá Loopscribe kan tí ó dá yàtọ̀ ni ìpín àwọn Ìkànnì rẹ̀, èyí tí ó ń fún àwọn aṣàmúlò ní àǹfààní láti ṣẹ̀dá kí wọ́n sì pín ẹ̀yà àwọn àkóónú gígùn pẹ̀lú gbogbo agbaye.
zu: Isici esivelele seLoopscribe isigaba sayo seziteshi, esinikeza abasebenzisi amandla okudala nokwabelana ngokuqukethwe bekude.

am: የአካዳሚክ ትምህርት ማስታወሻዎች፣ የፖድካስት ትዕይንቶች ማስታወሻዎች፣ አስተዋይ መጣጥፎች፣ ወይም አነቃቂ ድርሰቶች ይሁን፣ የቻናሎቹ ባህሪ በ ሉፕስክራይብ ማህበረሰብ ውስጥ እውቀትን መፍጠር እና መለዋወጥን ያበረታታል።
en: Whether it's academic lecture notes, podcast show notes, insightful articles, or thought-provoking essays, the Channels feature encourages the creation and exchange of knowledge within the Loopscribe community.
ha: Ko bayanan lacca na ilimi ko na faifan shirin sauti ko labarai masu ma'ana, ko ƙasidu masu jan hankali, fasalin Tashoshi yana ƙarfafa ƙirƙira da musayar ilimi a cikin al'ummar da ke amfani da manhajar Loopscribe.
sw: Iwe ni madokezo ya mihadhara ya kitaaluma, madokezo ya kipindi cha podikasti, makala ya maarifa, au insha zinazochochea fikira, kipengele cha Vituo kinahimiza uundaji na ubadilishanaji wa maarifa ndani ya jumuiya ya Loopscribe.
yo: Yálà ó jẹ́ àkọsílẹ̀ ìdanilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilé ẹ̀kọ́, àkọsílẹ̀ ìgbésáfẹ́fẹ́, àwọn àtẹ̀jáde gidi, tàbí àwọn àrọko tí ó mọ́gbọ́n wá, àwọn àbùdá Ìkànnì náà fi ààyè gba ìṣẹ̀dá àti ìpààrọ̀ ọgbọ́n láàrin àwùjọ Loopscribe.
zu: Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi amanothi ezinkulumo, amanothi ombukiso wepodcast, ama-athikili anokuqonda, noma ama-eseyi ashukumisa ingqondo, isici seziteshi sikhuthaza ukudalwa nokushintshisana ngolwazi phakathi komphakathi weLoopscribe.

am: ሉፕስክራይብ ከመሳሪያ በላይ ነው; በመረጃ ላይ የተመሰረተ ኑሮ ለመምራት የሚደረግ እንቅስቃሴ ነው።
en: Loopscribe is more than just a tool; it's a movement towards informed living.
ha: Manhajar Loopscribe ta fi matsayin abin aiki kawai; wata ci gaba a rayuwar ilimi.
sw: Loopscribe ni zaidi ya chombo; ni harakati kuelekea upewaji wa taarifa.
yo: Loopscribe ju irinṣẹ́ lásán lọ; ó jẹ́ ìsípòpadà sí ìgbé ayé ọ̀tun.
zu: ILoopscribe ingaphezu nje kwethuluzi; kuwumnyakazo obheke ekuphileni ngolwazi.

am: በሁለቱም የአንድሮይድ እና የአይኦኤስ ስሪቶች ከየራሳቸው የመተግበሪያ መደብሮች ለማውረድ ይገኛሉ፣ ይህ ነጻ መተግበሪያ የተማሪዎችን፣ የባለሙያዎችን እና የዕድሜ ልክ ተማሪዎችን ፍላጐት ለማሟላት የተቀየሰ ነው፡፡
en: With both Android and iOS versions available for download from their respective app stores, this free app is designed to cater to the needs of students, professionals, and lifelong learners alike.
ha: Tare da nau'ikan Android da iOS waɗanda ke samuwa don saukewa daga shagunan manhajojinsu, wannan manhajar ta kyauta an ƙirƙira ne don biyan buƙatun ɗalibai, ƙwararru, da masu karatu na tsawon rayuwa baki ɗaya.
sw: Kwa kuwa matoleo ya Android na iOS yanapatikana kwa kupakuliwa kutoka kwa maduka yao ya programu husika, programu hii isiyolipishwa imeundwa kukidhi mahitaji ya wanafunzi, wataalamu na wanafunzi wa maisha yao yote.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀yà Android àti iOS tí ó wà fún ìgbàsórí-ẹ̀rọ lórí àwọn ilé ìtajà ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ, ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ yìí jẹ́ èyí tí a ṣẹ̀dá láti mójú tó àìní àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́, akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́, àti àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ títí ayé pẹ̀lú.
zu: Ngazo zombili izinguqulo ze-Android ne-iOS ezitholakalayo ukuze zilandwe ezitolo zazo zezinhlelo zokusebenza ngokulandelana kwazo, lolu hlelo lokusebenza lwamahhala lwenzelwe ukubhekelela izidingo zabafundi, ochwepheshe, nabafundi impilo yonke ngokufanayo.

am: የግል እድገትን ለማጐልበት፣ የምንማርበትን መንገድ ለመለወጥ እና የበለጠ ዓላማ-ተኮር ዓለምን ለመፍጠር የሉፕስክራይብ ቁርጠኝነትን ያግኙ።
en: Discover Loopscribe's commitment to enhancing personal growth, transforming the way we learn, and creating a more purpose-driven world.
ha: Gano himmar manhajar Loopscribe wajen inganta cigaban mutum, ind take canza yadda muke koyo, da ƙirƙirar duniya mai cike da manufa.
sw: Gundua dhamira ya Loopscribe ya kuimarisha ukuaji wa kibinafsi, kubadilisha jinsi tunavyojifunza, na kuunda ulimwengu unaoendeshwa zaidi na madhumuni.
yo: Wádìí ìpinnu Loopscribe láti mú ìtẹ̀síwájú bá ìdàgbàsókè ara ẹni, ó ń mú àyípadà bá ọ̀nà tí à ń gbà kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́, ó ń ṣẹ̀dá ayé tó kún fún ìmúṣẹ èròǹgbà.
zu: Zitholele ukuzibophezela kukaLoopscribe ekuthuthukiseni ukukhula komuntu siqu, ukuguqula indlela esifunda ngayo, nokudala umhlaba oqhutshwa inhloso.

am: የማወቅ ጕጕት፣ እድገት እና ስኬት ባላቸው እሴቶች ላይ ምስክርነት በሚሰጥ አሳታፊ ማስታወሻዎች መተግበሪያ አማካኝነት መማር እና ሃሳብ መስጠትን ለማበረታታት በዚህ አስደሳች ጕዞ ላይ እኛን ይቀላቀሉን።
en: Join us on this exciting journey to foster learning and reflection through an engaging notes app that stands as a testament to the values of curiosity, growth, and achievement.
ha: Kasance tare da mu a cikin wannan tafiya mai ban sha'awa don haɓaka koyo da tunani ta hanyar manhajar rubutu wacce ke a matsayin shaida ga ƙimar son sani da girma da kuma nasara.
sw: Jiunge nasi kwenye safari hii ya kusisimua ya kukuza kujifunza na kutafakari kupitia programu ya madokezo ya kuvutia ambayo ni ushuhuda wa maadili ya udadisi, ukuaji na mafanikio.
yo: Darapọ̀ mọ́ wa ninu ìrìn-àjò dídára yìí láti mú ìlọsíwájú bá ẹ̀kọ́ Kíkọ́ àti àtúnyẹ̀wò nípasẹ̀ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ aṣàkọsílẹ̀ tí ó dára èyí tí ó dúró gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ̀rí fún àwọn iyì ìwádìí ìmọ̀, ìdàgbàsókè, àti àṣeyọrí.
zu: Hlanganyela nathi kulolu hambo olujabulisayo lokukhuthaza ukufunda nokuzindla ngohlelo lokusebenza lwamanothi ahehayo oluma njengobufakazi bamagugu elukuluku, ukukhula, kanye nempumelelo.

am: ምንም እንኳን አግቦላ የ ፍላተርዌቭ አይፒኦ የማይቀር መሆኑን ቢያመለክትም፣ “ገበያዎቹ አሁን ጥሩ አይደሉም” ሲል አምኗል።
en: Although Agboola indicated that a Flutterwave IPO is inevitable, he also admitted that “the markets aren’t great right now."
ha: Kodayake Agboola ya nuna cewa Flutterwave IPO ba makawa ne, ya kuma yarda cewa "kasuwanni ba su da kyau a yanzu."
sw: Ingawa Agboola alionyesha kuwa IPO ya Flutterwave haiwezi kuepukika, pia alikiri kwamba "masoko si mazuri hivi sasa."
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ fi hàn pé Agboola sọ pé dandan ni ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ Flutterwave, ó tún sọ pé "ojú ọjà kò dára tó nísinsìnyí báyìí."
zu: Nakuba u-Agboola ebonise ukuthi i-IPO yeFlutterwave yayingenakugwemeka, ubuye wavuma ukuthi "izimakethe azilungile njengamanje."

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ በእርግጥ በአይፒኦ ዕቅዶች ጋር ወደፊት ይሄዳል?
en: Will Flutterwave really go ahead with IPO plans?
ha: Shin Flutterwave da gaske zai ci gaba akan tsare-tsaren IPO?
sw: Flutterwave itaenda mbele na mipango ya IPO kweli?
yo: Ṣé Flutterwave yóò tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú àwọn ètò ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀?
zu: Ngabe iFlutterwave izoqhubeka ngempela nezinhlelo ze-IPO?

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ የተሳለቀው ይፋ ሲወጣ ይህ የመጀመሪያው አይደለም።
en: This is not the first time Flutterwave has teased going public.
ha: Wannan ba shi ne karo na farko da Flutterwave ke yin ba'ar shiga jama'a ba.
sw: Hii si mara ya kwanza kwa Flutterwave kutania hadharani.
yo: Èyí kì í ṣe ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí Flutterwave ti sọ pé àwọn yóò gba àwùjọ láyè.
zu: Akukhona okokuqala ukuthi iFlutterwave ihlekise umphakathi.

am: በመጀመሪያ የአይፒኦ አላማዎችን በኦገስት 2022 ይፋ አድርጓል።
en: It first revealed IPO intentions officially in August 2022.
ha: Ya fara bayyana niyyar IPO a hukumance a watan Agustan 2022.
sw: Ilifichua nia ya IPO kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo Agosti 2022.
yo: Ó kọ́kọ́ ṣàfihàn àwọn ìpinnu ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ní Oṣù Kẹjọ 2022.
zu: Iqale yembula ngokusemthethweni izinhloso zayo ze-IPO ngoNcwaba 2022.

am: እንደ ዘገባው ከሆነ አይፒኦ በናስዳቅ የአክሲዮን ልውውጥ ላይ የሚዘረጋ ሲሆን የፊንቴክን አሠራር በነባር ገበያዎች ለማስፋት እና ወደ አዲስ የአፍሪካ ገበያዎች ለማስፋፋት ይጠቅማል።
en: According to a report, the IPO will be rolled out on the Nasdaq stock exchange and will be used to expand the fintech's operation in existing markets and expand into new African markets.
ha: A cewar wani rahoto, za a ƙaddamar da IPO a kasuwar hada-hadar hannayen jari ta Nasdaq kuma za a yi amfani da shi wajen faɗaɗa ayyukan fasahar samun kuɗi a kasuwannin da ake da su da kuma faɗaɗawa zuwa sabbin kasuwannin Afirka.
sw: Kulingana na ripoti, IPO itaanzishwa katika soko la hisa la Nasdaq na itatumika kupanua uendeshaji wa fintech katika masoko yaliyopo na kupanuka katika masoko mapya ya Afrika.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìròyìn kan, ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ náà yóò forúkọ sílẹ̀ lórí Ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò Nasdaq wọn yóò sì ṣàmúlò rẹ̀ láti mú ìgbòòrò bá iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná nínú àwọn ọjà tí ó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀ kí wọ́n sì tàn wọ inú àwọn ọjà Afíríkà.
zu: Ngokwalo mbiko, i-IPO izokwethulwa emakethe yamasheya yaseNasdaq futhi izosetshenziselwa ukwandisa ukusebenza kwefintech ezimakethe ezikhona futhi yandise izimakethe ezintsha zase-Afrika.

am: ሆኖም፣ ከአይፒኦ ጋር አልሄደም።
en: However, it didn't go ahead with the IPO.
ha: Duk da haka, bai ci gaba da IPO ba.
sw: Walakini, haikuendelea na IPO.
yo: Àmọ́ sá, kò tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ náà.
zu: Nokho, ayizange iqhubeke ne-IPO.

am: ፍላተርዌቭ የአይፒኦ እቅዱን እየደገመ ቢሆንም እድገቱን እና ለሕዝብ አቅርቦት ዝግጁነቱን የሚጠቁሙ አሃዞችን አላጋራም፡፡
en: While Flutterwave is reiterating its IPO plans, it has not shared figures that indicate its growth and readiness for a public offering.
ha: Yayin da Flutterwave ke sake maimaita shirye-shiryen IPO, ba ta yaɗa alƙaluman da ke nuna ci gabanta da shirinta ga jama'a ba.
sw: Wakati Flutterwave inakariri mipango yake ya IPO, haijashiriki takwimu zinazoonyesha ukuaji na utayari wake kwa toleo la umma.
yo: Nígbà tí Flutterwave ń ṣe àtúnwí àwọn ètò ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀, kò sọ iye tí ó ṣàfihàn ìdàgbàsókè àti ìgbáradì wọn láti bọ́ sí gbangba.
zu: Nakuba iFlutterwave iphinde yagcizelela izinhlelo zayo ze-IPO, ayizange yabelane ngezibalo ezibonisa ukukhula nokulungela ukunikezwa komphakathi.

am: በጠቅላላው ገቢ ዓመታዊ ጭማሪን ከብሉምበርግ ጋር ለመጋራት ፈቃደኛ አልሆነም ነገር ግን የክፍያ ማቀነባበሪያ የንግድ ሥራ ጐን በ 2023 የመጀመሪያ አጋማሽ ላይ በ 23 እጥፍ አድጓል ብሏል።
en: It declined to share an annual increase in total revenue with Bloomberg but said the payment processing side of the business increased 23-fold in the first half of 2023.
ha: Yaƙi yaɗa ƙaruwa ta shekara-shekara ta jimilar kuɗaɗen shiga da Bloomberg, amma yace ɓangaren sarrafa biyan kuɗi ya ƙaru da ninki 23 a farkon rabin shekarar 2023.
sw: Ilikataa kushiriki ongezeko la kila mwaka la mapato yote na Bloomberg lakini ilisema upande wa usindikaji wa malipo wa biashara uliongezeka mara 23 katika nusu ya kwanza ya 2023.
yo: Ó kọ̀ láti pín ìlọsíwájú àpapọ̀ èrè ọdọọdún pẹ̀lú Bloomberg ṣùgbọ́n ó sọ pé agbọn ìsanwó okòwò náà ti lọ síwájú ní ìlọ́po 23 ní ìdá kìíní 2023.
zu: Inqabile ukwabelana ngokwenyuka konyaka kwesamba semali engenayo neBloomberg kodwa yathi uhlangothi olukhokhayo lwebhizinisi lukhuphuke izikhathi ezingama-23 kwikota yokuqala ka-2023.

am: ምንም እንኳን ፍሎተርዌቭ ወደ ሕዝብ ለመሄድ ባቀደው እቅድ ውስጥ ግልጽ ያልሆነ ቢሆንም፣ የአይፒኦ የማይቀር መሆኑን አመላካቾች አሉ፡፡
en: Although Flutterwave has been vague in its plans to go public, there are indicators that an IPO could be imminent.
ha: Ko da yake Flutterwave ya kasance yana ɓoye shirinsa na fitowa fili, akwai alamun cewa IPO na iya zuwa. ba makawa.
sw: Ingawa Flutterwave imekuwa na utata katika mipango yake ya kwenda kwa umma, kuna viashiria kwamba IPO inaweza kuwa karibu.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé Flutterwave kò sọ pàtó nínú ètò rẹ̀ láti bọ́ sí gbangba, àwọn àmì wà pé ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ lè má pẹ́ mọ́.
zu: Yize iFlutterwave ibingacacile ezinhlelweni zayo zokuphumela obala, kunezinkomba zokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi i-IPO isondele.

am: ለምሳሌ፣ ተሻጋሪ ባለሀብቶች ተሳትፎ -ተሻጋሪ ባለሀብቶች ብዙውን ጊዜ አይፒኦ ከመግባታቸው በፊት በማደግ ላይ ባሉ ንግዶች ላይ ኢንቨስት ያደርጋሉ - ልክ እንደ ዌል ሮክ ካፒታል በመጨረሻው የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ዙር።
en: For example, the participation of a cross-over investor —cross-over investors often invest in growing businesses right before they IPO — like Whale Rock Capital in its last funding round.
ha: Misali, sa hannu na mai saka hannun jari tin kafin da bayan kafa kamfani a harkokin kasuwanci masu tasowa kafin su IPO -kamar Whale Rock Capital a zagayen kuɗaɗensa na ƙarshe.
sw: Kwa mfano, ushiriki wa mwekezaji mtambuka - wawekezaji waliovuka mipaka mara nyingi huwekeza katika kukuza biashara kabla ya IPO - kama vile Whale Rock Capital katika awamu yake ya mwisho ya ufadhili.
yo: Fún àpẹẹrẹ, ìkópa olùdókòwò aládàáni –olùdókòwò aládàáni máa ń sáábà dókòwò sínú àwọn okòwò tí ó ń dàgbà kí wọ́n tó ṣe ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ – bí Whale Rock Capital nínú owó ìrànwọ́ ìdókòwò rẹ̀ tó kẹ́yìn.
zu: Isibonelo, ukubamba iqhaza komtshali-zimali owela imingcele - abatshalizimali abawela imingcele bavame ukutshala imali emabhizinisini akhulayo ngaphambi nje kokuthi bafake i-IPO - njengeWhale Rock Capital emzuliswaneni wayo wokugcina wokuxhasa ngezimali.

am: ፍሎተርዌቭ ለአይፒኦው የተወሰነ ቀን ባይሰጥም፣ በመጨረሻም ከግብ እንደሚያደርስ የሚናገረው ጊዜ ብቻ ነው፡፡
en: While Flutterwave hasn't given a specific date for its IPO, only time will tell if it'll eventually go through with it.
ha: Yayin da Flutterwave bai ba da takamaimiyar rana ta IPO ɗinsa ba, lokaci ne kawai zai nuna idan zai yi nasarar sakinsa.
sw: Ingawa Flutterwave haijatoa tarehe maalum ya IPO yake, ni wakati tu ndio itaonyesha ikiwa itamaliza nayo.
yo: Nígbà tí Flutterwave kò tíì sọ déètì pàtó fún ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀, àsìkò nìkan ni yóò sọ bóyá yóò ṣe é ṣe.
zu: Yize iFlutterwave ingazange inikeze usuku oluqondile lwe-IPO yayo, isikhathi kuphela esizosho ukuthi izoqhubeka nayo yini.

am: የፍሉተርዌቭ አይፒኦ አግቦላን የአሜሪካ ዶላር ቢሊየነር ሊያደርገው ይችላል?
en: Can a Flutterwave IPO make Agboola a US dollar billionaire?
ha: Shin Flutterwave IPO zai iya sa Agboola ya zama hamshaƙin attajirin dalar Amurka?
sw: Je, IPO ya Flutterwave inaweza kumfanya Agboola kuwa bilionea wa dola za Marekani?
yo: Ṣé ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò Flutterwave sọ Agboola di olówó bílíọ́nù dọ́là?
zu: Ingabe i-IPO yeFlutterwave izomenza u-Agboola abe usozigidi wamadola aseMelika?

am: በፒችቡክ መሠረት የአግቡላ በ ፍሉተርዌቭ ውስጥ ያለው ድርሻ እሴት ከ 370 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በላይ እንደሚሆን ይገመታል በ 2022 የፊንቴክ የመጨረሻው የፋይናንስ ዙር፡፡
en: According to PitchBook, The value of Agboola's stake in Flutterwave was estimated to be over $370 million as of the fintech's last funding round in 2022.
ha: A cewar PitchBook, an ƙiyasta darajar hannun jarin Agboola a Flutterwave ya haura dala miliyan 370 a zagayen kuɗaɗe na ƙarshe na fintech a shekarar 2022.
sw: Kulingana na PitchBook, Thamani ya hisa za Agboola katika Flutterwave ilikadiriwa kuwa zaidi ya dola milioni 370 kama kipindi cha mwisho cha ufadhili wa fintech mnamo 2022.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ PitchBook, Iye ìpín ìdókòwò Agboola nínú Flutterwave ní wọ́n pajú dé sí pé ó ju mílíọ̀nù $370 gẹ́gẹ́ bí owó ìrànwọ́ ìdókòwò ìpele tí ó gbẹ̀yín ní 2022.
zu: Ngokusho kwePitchBook, isiteki sika-Agboola eFlutterwave silinganiselwa ngaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-370 zamaliliyoni emzuliswaneni wokugcina woxhaso wefintech ngo-2022.

am: አንዳንድ ሰዎች አግቦላ በፍሉተርዌቭ ያለው ድርሻ ፍሉተርዌቭ በይፋ ከወጣ ቢሊየነር ሊያደርገው እንደሚችል ያምናሉ።
en: Some people believe Agboola's stake in Flutterwave could make him a billionaire if Flutterwave goes public.
ha: Wasu mutane na ganin hannun jarin Agboola a Flutterwave zai iya sa ya zama hamshaƙin attajiri idan Flutterwave ya bayyana.
sw: Baadhi ya watu wanaamini kuwa hisa za Agboola katika Flutterwave zinaweza kumfanya kuwa bilionea ikiwa Flutterwave itatangaza hadharani.
yo: Àwọn ènìyàn kan gbàgbọ́ pé ìpín ìdókòwò Agboola nínú Flutterwave lè sọ ọ́ di olówó bílíọ́nù bí Flutterwave bá bọ́ sí gbangba.
zu: Abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi isiteki sika-Agboola kuFlutterwave singamenza usozigidi uma iFlutterwave iphumela obala.

am: አለቃ መረጃዎን ከየት ያገኙታል? ስለዚህ የእነሱ አይፒኦ በጣም ስኬታማ ከሆነ...ጂቢ በቅርቡ ቢሊየነር ሊሆን ይችላል... ባዶ ስም🇮🇱 (@ojiomaaa) እ.ኤ.አ ሃሴ 22፣ 2023
en: Boss where do you get your data from ?So if their IPO is very successful ...gb might be a billionaire soon...— Blank Name🇮🇱 (@ojiomaaa) August 22, 2023
ha: Mai gida, daga ina kake samun bayananka? To idan IPO ɗinsu ya yi nasara sosai ...gb na iya zama hamshaƙin attajiri nan ba da jimawa ba... — Ba Sunan 🇮🇱(@ojiomaaa) 22 gaAgustan shekarar 2023.
sw: Bosi unapata data yako kutoka wapi ?Kwa hivyo ikiwa IPO yao itafanikiwa sana ...gb huenda ikawa bilionea hivi karibuni....— Jina tupu🇮🇱 (@ojiomaaa) Agosti 22, 2023
yo: Ọ̀gá níbo ni o ti ń rí ìwífun-àlàyé rẹ? Nítorí náà bí ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò wọn bá yọrí sí dáadáa...gb lè di olówó bílíọ́nù láìpẹ́... – Blank Name🇮🇱 (@ojiomaaa)22 Oṣù Kẹjọ, 2023.
zu: Mphathi, uyithathaphi idatha yakho? Manje uma i-IPO yabo iphumelele kangaka...i-gb ingase ibe usozigidigidi maduze.... Igama Elingenalutho🇮🇱 (@ojiomaaa) kuNcwaba 22, 2023

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ ወደ ህዝብ ቢወጣ ምን እንደሚሆን መተንበይ አስቸጋሪ ቢሆንም የአግቡላ 370 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ቢሊየነር ያደርገዋል ብሎ ማሰብ ግን አይቻልም።
en: While it is difficult to predict what will happen if Flutterwave goes public, it is unlikely that Agboola's $370 million will make him a billionaire.
ha: Duk da yake da wuya a iya hasashen abin da zai faru idan Flutterwave ya bayyana, da wuya a ce dala miliyan 370 na Agboola zai sa ya zama hamshaƙin attajiri.
sw: Ingawa ni vigumu kutabiri kitakachotokea ikiwa Flutterwave itatangaza hadharani, hakuna uwezekano kwamba dola milioni 370 za Agboola zitamfanya kuwa bilionea.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ṣòro láti sọ àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ohun tí yóò ṣẹlẹ̀ bí Flutterwave bá bọ́ sí gbangba, kò fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ ṣe é ṣe kí mílíọ̀nù $370 Agboola sọ ọ́ di olówó bílíọ́nù.
zu: Yize kunzima ukubikezela ukuthi kuzokwenzekani uma iFlutterwave iphumela obala, mancane amathuba okuthi u-$370 wezigidi ka-Agboola umenze usozigidi.

am: ከአይፒኦ በኋላ በኩባንያው ውስጥ ያለው ድርሻ በ ፍሉተርዌቭ ዋጋ ከአይፒኦ በኋላ ይወሰናል።
en: The value of his stake in the company after an IPO will be determined by the value of Flutterwave after the IPO.
ha: Ƙimar hannun jarinsa a kamfani bayan IPO za a ƙayyade shi ne ta ƙimar Flutterwave bayan IPO.
sw: Thamani ya hisa yake katika kampuni baada ya IPO itabainishwa na thamani ya Flutterwave baada ya IPO.
yo: Iye ìpín ìdókòwò rẹ̀ nínú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lẹ́yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ yóò jẹ́ èyí tí ìdíyelé Flutterwave yóò pinnu lẹ́yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ náà.
zu: Inani lesiteki sakhe enkampanini ngemva kwe-IPO lizonqunywa inani le-Flutterwave ngemva kwe-IPO.

am: በአይፒኦ ዝግጅት ውስጥ የፍሉተርዌቭን ዋጋ እንዴት እንወስናለን?
en: How do we determine Flutterwave's value in the event of an IPO?
ha: Ta yaya za mu tantance ƙimar Flutterwave a yanayin IPO?
sw: Je, tunatambuaje thamani ya Flutterwave katika tukio la IPO?
yo: Báwo ni a ṣe lè mọ ìdíyelé Flutterwave ní àsìkò ìpàtẹ ìpín Ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀?
zu: Siyazisa kanjani i-Flutterwave uma kune-IPO?

am: የአንድ ኩባንያ ከአይፒኦ በኋላ ያለው ዋጋ በብዙ ነገሮች ላይ እንደ ስሜት፣ ፍላጎት እና የአክሲዮን አቅርቦት እና የገበያ ሁኔታዎች ይወሰናል።
en: The value of a company after an IPO depends on many many factors such as sentiment, demand and supply of shares, and market conditions.
ha: Darajar kamfani bayan IPO ya dogara da abubuwa da yawa kamar jinsa arai, buƙatuwa da samar da hannun jari, da yanayin kasuwa.
sw: Thamani ya kampuni baada ya IPO inategemea mambo mengi kama vile hisia, mahitaji na usambazaji wa hisa, na hali ya soko.
yo: Iye owó ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lẹ́yìn ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ dá lórí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn nǹkan bí ojúsàájú, ìbéèrè àti ìpèsè àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò, àti àwọn ipò ọjà.
zu: Inani lenkampani ngemva kwe-IPO lincike ezintweni eziningi ezifana nemizwa, ukufunwa nokuhlinzekwa kwamasheya, nezimo zemakethe.

am: ነገር ግን፣ እንደተማረ መገመት የሚቻልበት አንዱ መንገድ የገበያ ካፒታላይዜሽን ቀመርን መጠቀም ሲሆን ይህም ተባዝቶ የላቀው የድርሻ ብዛት ከአይፒኦ በኋላ ባለው የድርሻ ዋጋ ተባዝቶ ነው።
en: However, one way to make an educated guess is to use the market capitalisation formula, which is the number of shares outstanding multiplied by the price of shares after an IPO.
ha: Duk da haka, hanya ɗaya don yin hasashe na ilimi shi ne a yi amfani da tsarin ƙima na kasuwa, wanda shi ne adadin hannun jarin da ke ƙasa sau ninkin farashin hannun jari bayan IPO.
sw: Hata hivyo, njia moja ya kukisia kwa elimu ni kutumia fomula ya mtaji wa soko, ambayo ni idadi ya hisa ambazo hazijalipwa zikizidishwa na bei ya hisa baada ya IPO.
yo: Àmọ́ sá, ọ̀nà kan láti ṣe àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ni láti ṣàmúlò àgbékalẹ̀ ìdókòwò ọjà, èyí tí ó jẹ́ iye àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò tí wọ́n wà nílẹ̀ ní ìlọ́po iye owó àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò lẹ́yìn ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.
zu: Kodwa-ke, enye indlela yokwenza ukuqagela okufundile ukusebenzisa ifomula yokwenza imali yemakethe, okuyinani lamasheya asele eliphindaphindwe ngenani lesheya ngemva kwe-IPO.

am: ይህ ቀመር የ ፍሉተርዌቭ አክሲዮኖች ብዛት ከአይፒኦ በፊት እና በኋላ ተመሳሳይ ነው ብሎ በመገመት ድህረ-አይፒኦ ዋጋ ለመወሰን ይረዳናል፡፡
en: This formula will help us arrive at a post-IPO valuation by assuming that the number of outstanding shares in Flutterwave remains the same before and after the IPO.
ha: Wannan dabarar za ta taimaka mana wajen ƙimantawa bayan IPO ta hanyar ɗauka cewa adadin manyan hannun jari a Flutterwave ya kasance iri ɗaya kafin da kuma bayan IPO.
sw: Fomula hii itatusaidia kufikia tathmini ya baada ya IPO kwa kudhani kuwa idadi ya hisa ambazo hazijalipwa katika Flutterwave bado zile zile kabla na baada ya IPO.
yo: Àgbékalẹ̀ yìí yóò ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti mú wa gúnlẹ̀ sí ìdíyelé ẹ̀yìn ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ nípa gbígbà pé iye àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò tí ó wà nílẹ̀ ní Flutterwave wà ní iye kan náà síwájú àti lẹ́yìn ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.
zu: Le fomula izosisiza ukuthi sifike esilinganisweni sangemva kwe-IPO ngokuthatha ukuthi inani lamasheya asele e-Flutterwave lihlala lifana ngaphambi nangemuva kwe-IPO.

am: ፍሉተርዌቭ ለሕዝብ ይፋ ባለመሆኑ የተከፈለባቸው አክሲዮኖች ብዛት በቀላሉ አይገኝም፣ ግን የአሁኑን ዋጋ በአክሲዮን ዋጋው በማካፈል፣ የተከፈለባቸው አክሲዮኖች ብዛት ምን እንደሆነ ሃሳብ ማግኘት እንችላለን፡፡
en: Since Flutterwave hasn't gone public, the number of outstanding shares isn't readily available, but by dividing its current valuation by its share price, we can get an idea of what the number of outstanding shares is.
ha: Tun da Flutterwave bai bayyana ba, ba za a samu adadin hannun jari da ke ƙasa ba a yanzu, amma ta hanyar rarraba ƙimarsa ta yanzu ta farashin hannun jari, za mu iya sanin wani abu game da mene ne adadin yawan hannun jarin da ke ƙasa.
sw: Kwa kuwa Flutterwave haijaonekana hadharani, idadi ya hisa zinazosalia haipatikani kwa urahisi, lakini kwa kugawa hesabu yake ya sasa kwa bei yake ya hisa, tunaweza kupata wazo la idadi ya hisa ambazo hazijalipwa ni.
yo: Níwọ̀n ìgbà tí Flutterwave kò tíì bọ́ sí gbangba, iye àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò tilẹ̀ kò ti ṣetán, ṣùgbọ́n nípa pínpín ìdíyelé wọn báyìí nípa ìpín owó wọn, a lè ní ìmọ̀ nípa iye tí ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ tilẹ̀ jẹ́.
zu: Njengoba iFlutterwave ingekho esidlangalaleni, inani lamasheya asele alitholakali kalula, kodwa ngokuhlukanisa ukulinganisa kwayo kwamanje ngenani lamasheya, singathola umbono wokuthi iyini inombolo yamasheya asele.

am: ከቁጥጥር ማመልከቻዎች፣ ከመገናኛ ብዙኃን እና ከዓለም አቀፍ የደላላዎች ፣ ባለሀብቶች እና ሠራተኞች ስብስብ የግል የገበያ መረጃዎችን የሚያገኝ ድር ጣቢያ Notice.co እንደሚለው የ ፍሉተርዌቭ የአክሲዮን ዋጋ 29 ዶላር ነው።
en: According to Notice.co, a website that sources private market data from regulatory filings, media, and an international collective of brokers, investors and employees, Flutterwave's current share price is $29.
ha: A cewar Notice.co, gidan yanar gizon da ke samar da bayanan kasuwa masu zaman kansu daga takaddun tsare-tsare da kafofin watsa labarai da kuma ƙungiyar dillalai, masu saka hannun jari da ma'aikata, farashin hannun jari na Flutterwave na yanzu shi ne $29.
sw: Kulingana na Notice.co, tovuti ambayo hupata data ya soko la kibinafsi kutoka kwa faili za udhibiti, media, na mkusanyiko wa kimataifa wa madalali, wawekezaji na wafanyikazi, bei ya sasa ya hisa ya Flutterwave ni $29.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ Notice.co, ìtakùn ayélujára kan tí ó ń pèsè ìwífun-àlàyé ọjà láti ara ìwé ìlànà àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́, ìròyìn, àti àgbájọ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ alárinà okòwò àgbáyé, àwọn olùdókòwò àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, iye ìpín ìdókòwò Flutterwave báyìí ni $29.
zu: Ngokusho kweNotice.co, iwebhusayithi ethola idatha yemakethe yangasese evela kumafayela okulawula, abezindaba, kanye neqoqo lamazwe ngamazwe labathengi, abatshalizimali nabasebenzi, inani lamanje lesheya leFlutterwave lingu-$29.

am: የፍሉተርዌቭ የአሁኑ ዋጋ 3 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ከሆነ፣ ይህ ማለት የፍሉተርዌቭ የላቀ ድርሻ 103 ሚሊዮን ነው።
en: Given that Flutterwave's current valuation is $3 billion, this means Flutterwave's outstanding shares are 103 million.
ha: Ganin cewa ƙimar Flutterwave a halin yanzu shine dala biliyan 3, wannan yana nufin fitattun hannun jarin Flutterwave shine miliyan 103.
sw: Ikizingatiwa kuwa tathimini ya sasa ya Flutterwave ni dola bilioni 3, hii inamaanisha kuwa hisa bora za Flutterwave ni milioni 103.
yo: Nítorí pé ìdíyelé Flutterwave báyìí jẹ́ bílíọ́nù $3, èyí túmọ̀ sí pé ìpín ìdókòwò tilẹ̀ fún Flutterwave jẹ́ mílíọ̀nù 103.
zu: Uma kucatshangelwa ukuthi inani lamanje leFlutterwave lingamadola ayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezintathu, lokhu kusho ukuthi amasheya avelele eFlutterwave ayizigidi ezingu-103.

am: የአንድ የግል ኩባንያ የአክሲዮን ዋጋ ከኩባንያው በቀጥታ የማይመጣ ከሆነ ሁልጊዜ ትክክለኛ እንዳልሆነ ልብ ሊባል ይገባል፡፡
en: It is important to note that the share price of a private company isn't always accurate if it is not coming directly from the company.
ha: Yana da muhimmanci a lura cewa farashin hannun jari na kamfani mai zaman kansa ba koyaushe daidai bane idan ba kai tsaye daga kamfani yake zuwa ba.
sw: Ni muhimu kutambua kuwa bei ya hisa ya kampuni ya kibinafsi sio sahihi kila wakati ikiwa haitoki moja kwa moja kutoka kwa kampuni.
yo: Ó ṣe pàtàkì láti ṣe àkíyèsí pé iye ìpín ìdókòwò ilé-iṣẹ́ aládàáni kì í sáábà ṣe déédéé bí kò bá wá láti ọwọ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tààrà.
zu: Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi intengo yamasheya enkampani ezimele ayilungile ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ingaveli ngqo enkampanini.

am: አሁን ጥሩ የአክሲዮን ብዛት ስላለን የፍሉተርዌቭ አይፒኦ ስኬታማ እንደሚሆን እና የአክሲዮን ዋጋው ልክ እንደሌላው አፍሪካዊ ጀማሪ ጁሚያ ከአይፒኦ በኋላ በ31% ከፍ ሊል እንደሚችል ሌላ ግምት መውሰድ አለብን።
en: Now that we have the number of outstanding shares, we need to make yet another assumption that Flutterwave's IPO will be successful and its share price will go up by 31% just like another African startup, Jumia, after its IPO.
ha: Yanzu da muke da adadin yawan hannun jari a ƙasa, muna buƙatar sake yin wani ƙiyasi cewa IPO na Flutterwave zai yi nasara kuma farashin hannun jarin zai haura da kashi 31 cikin ɗari, kamar dai wani sabon kamfani a Afirka, wato kamfanin Jumia, bayan IPO ɗinsa.
sw: Kwa kuwa sasa tuna idadi ya hisa ambazo hazijalipwa, tunahitaji kufanya dhana nyingine kuwa IPO ya Flutterwave itafanikiwa na bei yake ya hisa itapanda kwa 31% kama kampuni nyingine ya Kiafrika kuanza, Jumia, baada ya IPO yake.
yo: Nísinsìnyí tí a ní iye àwọn ìpín ìdókòwò tilẹ̀, a nílò láti sọ àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ mìíràn pé ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ Flutterwave yóò ṣe àṣeyọrí àti pé iye owó ìpín ìdókòwò rẹ̀ yóò lọ sókè pẹ̀lú 31% bí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdelẹ̀ Afíríkà mìíràn, Jumia, lẹ́yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀.
zu: Njengoba sesisele nenani lamasheya, kumele sicabange ukuthi i-IPO yakwaFlutterwave izoba yimpumelelo futhi intengo yayo izonyuka ngo-31% njengenye inkampani yase-Afrika, iJumia, ngemuva kwe-IPO yayo.

am: ይህ ማለት የፍሉተርዌቭ የአክሲዮን ዋጋ ከቅድመ-አይፒኦ $29 ወደ $38 ይሄዳል።
en: This means Flutterwave's share price will go from $29 pre-IPO to $38.
ha: Wannan yana nufin farashin hannun jari na Flutterwave zai tashi daga $29 a kafin-IPO zuwa $38.
sw: Hii inamaanisha kuwa bei ya hisa ya Flutterwave itatoka $29 kabla ya IPO hadi $38.
yo: Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé iye ìpín ìdókòwò Flutterwave yóò lọ láti $29 síwájú ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ sí $38.
zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi intengo yezabelo zeFlutterwave izosuka ku-$29 pre-IPO iye ku-$38.

am: የፍሉተርዌቭ የድህረ-አይፒኦ ዋጋ ስለዚህ 3.9 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ነው።
en: Flutterwave's post-IPO valuation, is therefore $3.9 billion.
ha: Ƙimar Flutterwave na bayan IPO, shi ne dala biliyan 3.9.
sw: Thamani ya baada ya IPO ya Flutterwave, kwa hiyo ni dola bilioni 3.9.
yo: Ìpín ìdókòwò ẹ̀yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀, jẹ́ bílíọ́nù $3.9 nígbà náà.
zu: Ngakho-ke, inani le-post-IPO le-Flutterwave lingama-dollar ayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-3.9.

am: ከድህረ-አይፒኦ በኋላ የ3.9 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ግምት ከተገመገመ በኋላ የአግቦላ ድርሻ
en: Agboola's stake after post-IPO valuation of $3.9 billion
ha: Jarin da Agboola ya zuba zai kai ƙimar dala biliyan 3.9 bayan IPO
sw: Hisa za Agboola baada ya tathmini na baada ya IPO ya $3.9 bilioni
yo: Ìpín Agboola lẹ́yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ bílíọ́nù $3.9
zu: Isabelo sika-Agboola ngemva kwe-IPO sinenani lama-dollar ayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-3.9

am: የአግቦላ $370 ሚሊዮን ድርሻ የፍሉተርዌቭን 12.33% ይወክላል።
en: Agboola's $370 million stake represents 12.33% of Flutterwave.
ha: Hannun jarin Agboola na dala miliyan 370 yana wakiltar kashi 12.33 na Flutterwave.
sw: Hisa za Agboola za $370 milioni zinawakilisha 12.33% ya Flutterwave.
yo: Ìpín ìdókòwò mílíọ̀nù $370 Agboola dúró fún 12.33% Flutterwave.
zu: Isabelo sika-Agboola sika-$370 wezigidi simele u-12.33% weFlutterwave.

am: የእሱ ድርሻ መቶኛ በ ፍሉተርዌቭ 3.9 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ዋጋ ሲባዛ ማለት ድህረ-አይፒኦ ያለው ድርሻ 480.8 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ይሆናል ማለት ነው፡፡
en: His stake percentage multiplied by Flutterwave's $3.9 billion valuation means that his post-IPO stake will become $480.8 million.
ha: Kashin hannun jarinsa da aka ninka shi sau adadin dala biliyan 3.9 ta Flutterwave na nufin cewa hannun jarinsa bayan zuba jarin IPO zai zama dala miliyan 480.8.
sw: Asilimia yake ya hisa ikizidishwa na hesabu ya Flutterwave ya $3.9 bilioni inamaanisha kuwa hisa zake za baada ya IPO zitakuwa $480.8 milioni.
yo: Ìpín ìdókòwò rẹ̀ ní ìlọ́po pẹ̀lú ìdíyelé bílíọ́nù $3.9 túmọ̀ sí pé ìpín ìdókòwò ẹ̀yìn ìpàtẹ ọjà ìpín ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ yóò di mílíọ̀nù $480.8.
zu: Iphesenti lakhe lenani eliphindwe ngenani lika-Flutterwave lika-$3.9 wezigidigidi lisho ukuthi isiteki sakhe sepost-IPO sizoba ngu-$480.8 wezigidi.

am: እነዚህ ስሌቶች በበርካታ ግምቶች የተሞሉ ቢሆኑም በአንጻራዊነት ጥሩ ሁኔታ ነው።
en: While these calculations are riddled with several assumptions, it is a relatively good-case scenario.
ha: Duk da yake waɗannan lissafin tastuniya ne kuma suna cike da zato da yawa, hakan wani labari ne mai kyau.
sw: Ingawa hesabu hizi zimejaa mawazo kadhaa, ni hali nzuri.
yo: Nígbà tí àwọn ìṣirò wọ̀nyí kún fún onírúurú àhesọ, ó jẹ́ àpẹẹrẹ àgbékalẹ̀ dáadáa.
zu: Nakuba lezi zibalo zigcwele ukuqagela okuningi, ziyisibalo esihle uma kuqhathaniswa.

am: አጉቦላ የአፍሪካ የቴክኖሎጂ ቢሊየነሮችን ለመቀላቀል ከፍ ያለ የፍላተርዌቭ ድርሻ ሊኖረው ይገባል።
en: Agboola would need to own a higher percentage of Flutterwave to join the ranks of Africa's tech billionaires.
ha: Agboola zai buƙaci ya mallaki kaso mafi girma na Flutterwave don shiga sahun masu kuɗin fasaha na Afirka.
sw: Agboola angehitaji kumiliki asilimia kubwa zaidi ya Flutterwave ili kujiunga na safu ya mabilionea wa teknolojia Afrika.
yo: Agboola yóò nílò láti ni ìpín Flutterwave tí ó ga láti darapọ̀ mọ́ àwọn olówò bílíọ́nù ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní Áfíríkà.
zu: U-Agboola uzodinga ukuba nephesenti eliphezulu leFlutterwave ukuze ajoyine osozigidigidi bezobuchwepheshe base-Afrika.

am: ማሳሰቢያ፡- እነዚህ ስሌቶች በፒችቡክ እና Notice.co አኃዞች ላይ የተመሠረቱ ናቸው፣ እነዚህም ቴክፖይን አፍሪካ በግል ሊያረጋግጠው አይችልም።
en: Disclaimer: These calculations are based on figures from PitchBook and Notice.co, which Techpoint Africa cannot independently verify.
ha: Sanarwa: Waɗannan ƙididdiga sun dogara ne akan adadi daga PitchBook da Notice.co, waɗanda Techpoint Africa ba za su iya tantance kansu ba.
sw: Kanusho: Hesabu hizi zinatokana na takwimu kutoka kwa PitchBook na Notice.co, ambazo Techpoint Africa haiwezi kuzithibitisha kwa kujitegemea.
yo: Àkíyèsí atakàhesọ: Àwọn ìṣirò wọ̀nyí dá lórí àwọn iye láti inú PitchBook àti Notice.co, èyí tí Techpoint Afirvat kò kò lè fọwọ́ rẹ̀ sọ̀yà.
zu: Ukuzihlangula: Lezi zibalo zisekelwe kwizibalo ze-PitchBook neNotice.co, iTechpoint Africa engakwazi ukuziqinisekisa ngokuzimela.

am: ለአፍሪካ የቴክኖሎጂ ተሰጥኦዎች ከቴክ ኔሽን ቪዛ 4 አማራጮች
en: 4 alternatives to the Tech Nation visa for African tech talents
ha: Wasu hanyoyi 4 ga kamfanin yin biza na Tech Nation don ƙwararru kan fasaha na Afirka
sw: Njia 4 mbadala za visa ya Tech Nation kwa vipaji vya teknolojia vya Kiafrika
yo: Àwọn ọ̀nà 4 mìíràn bí Tech Nation Visa fún àwọn onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ Áfríkà.
zu: Ezinye izinketho zevisa zeTech Nation ezi-4 zethalente lobuchwepheshe base-Afrika

am: ስለ ቴክ ኔሽን መዘጋቱ የማይቀር መሆኑ ዜና ሰዎች የሰጡትን ምላሽ የዘፈቀደ የኢንተርኔት ፍለጋ ድርጅቱ በተለያዩ አህጉራት በኑሮ ላይ ተፅእኖ ያላቸውን በርካታ ውጥኖች በተለይም የቪዛ ፕሮግራሞቹ ፈር ቀዳጅ ማድረጉን ያሳያል።
en: A random Internet search about people's reactions to the news of Tech Nation's imminent shutdown points to the fact that the organisation has pioneered several initiatives that have impacted lives across several continents, especially its visa programs.
ha: Binciken da aka yi ta yanar gizo game da martanin mutane game da labarin rufe Tech Nation na nuni da cewa ƙunr ta fara aiwatar da wasu tsare-tsare da suka shafi rayuwa a nahiyoyi da dama, musamman shirye-shiryenta na biza.
sw: PayPal, kwa mfano, inaruhusu kufungua akaunti kwa Waafrika, lakini sio uondoaji, na Olalere anaelezea kuwa imeathiri jinsi wameunda LemFi.
yo: Ìwádìí aláìlétò orí ayélujára kan nípa ohun tí àwọn ènìyàn rò nípa ìròyìn ìwọ́gilé Tech Nation tí kò ní pẹ́ mọ́ tọ́ka sí òtítọ́ pé àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àwọn onírúurú ètò tí ó ti nípa láyé àwọn ènìyàn káàkiri onírúurú ilẹ̀, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn ètò ìwé ìgbélùú wọn.
zu: ukusesha kwe-inthanethi okungahleliwe mayelana nokusabela kwabantu ezindabeni zokuvalwa kweTech Nation okuseduze kokuthi inhlangano idale izinhlelo ezimbalwa ezibe nomthelela ezimpilweni kuwo wonke amazwekazi amaningana, ikakhulukazi izinhlelo zayo zama-visa.

am: ዜናው በሀዘን ደረሰ።
en: The news was received with sadness.
ha: Labarin ya zo da baƙin ciki.
sw: Habari hizo zilipokelewa kwa huzuni.
yo: Wọ́n gba ìròyìn náà pẹ̀lú ìbànújẹ́.
zu: Lezi zindaba zemukelwe ngosizi.

am: የዩኬ አለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ቪዛ ፕሮግራም ስደተኞች በዩኬ ውስጥ በተወሰኑ የድጋፍ ምድቦች ውስጥ በማንኛውም ዘርፍ እንዲሰሩ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: The UK's Global Talent Visa program enables migrants to work in any sector within specific endorsement categories in the UK.
ha: Shirin Global Talent Visa program na Birtaniya yana baiwa baƙi damar yin aiki a kowane fanni daga cikin fannonin da Birtaniya ta amince.
sw: Mpango wa Visa wa Vipaji Ulimwenguni kwa Uingereza huwawezesha wahamiaji kufanya kazi katika sekta yoyote ndani ya kategoria mahususi za uidhinishaji nchini Uingereza.
yo: Ètò Global Talent Visa ti UK fi ààyè gba àwọn aṣàtìpó láti ṣiṣẹ́ ní ẹ̀ka èyíkéyìí nínú àwọn ọ̀wọ́ ìfọwọ́sí pàtó ni UK.
zu: Uhlelo lwase-UK lweGlobal Talent Visa luvumela abafuduki ukuthi basebenze kunoma yimuphi umkhakha ngaphakathi kwezigaba zokugunyazwa ezithile e-UK.

am: ለማብራራት፣ የቴክኖሎጂ ተሰጥኦዎች ይህንን ፕሮግራም ማግኘት የሚችሉት ከስድስቱ እውቅና ካላቸው የድጋፍ ድርጅቶች አንዱ በሆነው በቴክ ኔሽን ጥቆማ ብቻ ነው።
en: To clarify, tech talent can only access this program through Tech Nation's recommendation, which is one of its six recognized endorsement organisations.
ha: Don ƙarin haske, ƙwararru kan harkokin fasaha za su iya samun damar shiga wannan shirin ta hanyar lamunin Tech Nation, wanda ɗaya ne daga cikin ƙungiyoyin amincewa guda shida da aka yarda da su.
sw: Ili kufafanua, talanta ya teknolojia inaweza tu kufikia mpango huu kupitia pendekezo la Tech Taifa, ambalo ni mojawapo ya mashirika yake sita ya uidhinishaji yanayotambulika.
yo: Láti ṣàlàyé dáadáa, àwọn onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ lè ní àǹfààní sí ètò yìí nípasẹ̀ àtìlẹ́yìn láti ọwọ́ Tech Nation nìkan, èyí tí ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn àjọ aṣèrànwọ́ rẹ̀ mẹ́fà tí wọ́n dá mọ̀.
zu: Ukuze kucace, ithalente lezobuchwepheshe lingafinyelela kuphela lolu hlelo ngesincomo seTech Nation, enye yezinhlangano zayo eziyisithupha ezihlonishwayo.

am: ይህም ማመልከቻዎች ተቀባይነት ከማያገኙበት ከመጋቢት 31 ቀን 2023 በኋላ አዳዲስ ደጋፊዎች ካልተገኙ ሊከሰት የሚችለውን ችግር ያጎላል።
en: This highlights the potential bottleneck if new backers are not gotten after March 31, 2023, when applications will no longer be accepted.
ha: Wannan na nuna yiwuwar cikas idan ba a sami sabin masu tallafawa ba bayan 31 ga Maris, 2023, lokacin da ba za a ƙara karɓar nema ba.
sw: Hii inaangazia kizuizi kinachowezekana ikiwa wafadhili wapya hawatapatikana baada ya Machi 31, 2023, wakati maombi hayatakubaliwa tena.
yo: Èyí mẹ́nubà ìṣòro tí ó lè wà bí wọn kò bá rí àwọn aṣàtìlẹ́yìn tuntun títí 31 Oṣù Kẹta, 2023, nígbà tí wọn kò ní gba ìbẹ̀wẹ̀ mọ́.
zu: Lokhu kugqamisa isithiyo esingaba khona uma abaxhasi abasha bengatholakali ngemva komhla zingama-31 kuNdasa 2023, lapho izicelo ngeke zisamukelwa.

am: ቪዛው ከአንድ እስከ አምስት ዓመት የሚቆይ ሲሆን የድጋፍ ሰጪው ድርጅት የማይመለስ እና በቈይታ ወቅት ገቢ ማግኘትን የሚያረጋግጥ ማስረጃን ጨምሮ የተወሰኑ መስፈርቶች ከተሟሉ ላልተወሰነ ጊዜ ሊታደስ/ ሊራዘም ይችላል( ወደ ቋሚ መኖሪያ የሚያመራ) ።
en: The visa is valid for one to five years and can be renewed/extended indefinitely (leading to permanent residency) if certain requirements are met, including the endorsing organization not withdrawing and proof of earning income during the stay.
ha: Bizar tana aiki ne na tsawon shekara ɗaya zuwa shekaru biyar, kuma ana iya sabuntawa/ƙara mata tsawo na lokaci marar iyaka (wanda ke haifar da zama na dindindin) idan an cika wasu sharuɗɗa, wanda suka haɗa da cewa hukumar da ta kawo mutum ba ta janye amincewarta ba, da shaidar samun kuɗin shiga yayin zama.
sw: Visa ni halali kwa mwaka mmoja hadi mitano na inaweza kusasishwa/kuongezwa kwa muda usiojulikana (kusababisha ukazi wa kudumu) ikiwa mahitaji fulani yatatimizwa, ikiwa ni pamoja na shirika linaloidhinisha kutojiondoa na uthibitisho wa kupata mapato wakati wa kukaa.
yo: Ìwé ìgbélùú yìí wúlò fún ọdún kan sí márùn-ún wọ́n sì lè ṣe ìsọdọ̀tun/ìfàgùn rẹ̀ fún ọjọ́ pípẹ́ (èyí tí yóò yọrí sí dídi olùgbé ayérayé) bí wọ́n bá tẹ̀lé àwọn ìlànà tí ó yẹ, tí ó fi mọ́ àìyọwọ́ àjọ olùfọwọ́sí àti ẹ̀rí èrè owó tí ó ń wọlé lásìkò ìgbélùú.
zu: Ivisa isebenza unyaka owodwa kuya kwemihlanu futhi ingavuselelwa/inwetshwe unomphela (okuholela ekubeni umhlali unomphela) uma izidingo ezithile zihlangatshezwa, okuhlanganisa ukugunyazwa kokungahoxiswa kanye nobufakazi bemali engenayo ngesikhathi sokuhlala.

am: አስቂኝ እውነታ፡ ባለፉት አስርት አመታት ውስጥ ቴክ ኔሽን ከ94 ሀገራት ከ3,000 በላይ ግለሰቦችን ደግፏል።
en: Fun Fact: Over the last decade, Tech Nation has endorsed more than 3,000 individuals from 94 countries worldwide.
ha: Abin nishaɗi: Cikin shekaru goma da suka gabata, Tech Nation ya amince da mutane sama da 3,000 daga ƙasashe 94 a duniya.
sw: Ukweli wa Kufurahisha: Katika muongo uliopita, Tech Nation imeidhinisha zaidi ya watu 3,000 kutoka nchi 94 duniani kote.
yo: Òótọ́ Aládùn: Ní ọdún mẹ́wàá sẹ́yìn, Techt Nation ti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn ènìyàn tí ó ju 3, 000 lọ láti àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè 94 káàkiri àgbáyé.
zu: Iqiniso Elijabulisayo: Kule minyaka eyishumi edlule, iTech Nation iqinisekise abantu abangaphezu kuka-3,000 abavela emazweni angama-94 emhlabeni jikelele.

am: ናይጄሪያ ከህንድ እና ሩሲያ ጋር ከፍተኛ ውክልና ካላቸው ሀገራት አንዷ ነች።
en: Nigeria is one of the countries with the highest representation in its alumni, along with India and Russia.
ha: Najeriya na ɗaya daga cikin ƙasashen da suka fi yawa, tare da Indiya da Rasha.
sw: Nigeria ni mojawapo ya nchi zilizo na uwakilishi wa juu zaidi katika wanafunzi wake wa zamani, pamoja na India na Urusi.
yo: Nigeria jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè tí wọ́n ní aṣojú jùlọ nínú àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ti jẹ àǹfààní wọn, pẹ̀lú India àti Russia.
zu: INigeria ingelinye lamazwe amelwe kakhulu ngabafundi bayo, kanye neNdiya neRussia.

am: የተለያዩ አገሮች የሰው ኃይልን ወደ እነርሱ ለመሳብ የተለያዩ መንገዶች አሏቸው።
en: Different countries have various ways of attracting manpower into them.
ha: ƙasashe daban-daban suna da hanyoyi daban-daban na jawo ma'aikata zuwa cikin su.
sw: Nchi tofauti zina njia mbalimbali za kuvutia wafanyakazi ndani yao.
yo: Àwọn oríṣiríṣi orílẹ̀-èdè ní àwọn ọ̀nà tí wọ́n ń gbà mú òṣìṣẹ́ wọlé.
zu: Amazwe ahlukene anezindlela ezahlukene zokuheha abasebenzi kuwo.

am: ከእነዚህ አገሮች ውስጥ ብዙዎቹ ፈቃደኛ ሠራተኞች እጥረት ያጋጥማቸዋል ስለዚህም እነዚህን ሚናዎች እንዲሞሉ ስደተኞችን ይቀበላሉ፡፡
en: Many of these countries often face a shortage of willing workers and thus welcome immigrants to fill these roles.
ha: Yawancin waɗannan ƙasashe galibi suna fuskantar ƙarancin ma'aikata masu son yin aiki, don haka suna maraba da baƙi don yin waɗannan ayyukan.
sw: Nchi nyingi hizi mara nyingi zinakabiliwa na uhaba wa wafanyakazi wenye hiari na hivyo kuwakaribisha wahamiaji kutekeleza majukumu haya.
yo: Púpọ̀ nínú àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè wọ̀nyí máa ń kojú ọ̀wọ́ngógó àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ṣetán láti ṣiṣẹ́ nítorí náà wọ́n máa ń gba àwọn aṣàtìpó láàyè láti ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ wọ̀nyí.
zu: Iningi lala mazwe livamise ukubhekana nokushoda kwezisebenzi ezizimisele futhi ngaleyo ndlela lamukele abantu bakwamanye amazwe abazobamba lezi zindima.

am: ሌሎች በቀላሉ በኢኮኖሚያዊ ወይም ብዝሃነት ምክንያቶች ያደርጉታል።
en: Others simply do it for economic or diversity reasons.
ha: Wasu ƙasashen kuma suna yi ne don kawai dalilai na tattalin arziƙi ko faɗaɗawa.
sw: Wengine hufanya hivyo kwa sababu za kiuchumi au tofauti.
yo: Àwọn mìíràn ń ṣe é nítorí ọrọ̀ ajé tàbí ìgbépọ̀sọ̀kan àwọn onírúurú ènìyàn.
zu: Abanye bamane bakwenze ngenxa yezomnotho noma ezinye izizathu.

am: ምንም እንኳን ከአለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ቪዛ ጋር ተመሳሳይ ቪዛዎች በአለምአቀፍ ደረጃ በተለይም በስደት መገናኛ ቦታዎች ቢኖሩም የሚከተሉት ሀገራት ለዲጂታል ቴክኖሎጂ ተሰጥኦ፣ ፈጣሪዎች እና ባለሀብቶች አቅርቦቶች አሏቸው።
en: Although there are similar visas to the Global Talent Visa available globally, especially in migration hotspots, the following countries have provisions for digital technology talent, innovators, and investors.
ha: Ko da yake akwai biza irin Global Talent Visa a duniya, musamman a wuraren da 'yan ci rani suke da yawa, waɗannan ƙasashe na da tanadi kan baiwar fasahar kwamfuta da masu ƙirƙira da masu zuba jari.
sw: Ingawa kuna visa sawa na Visa ya Talent ya Ulimwengu inayopatikana ulimwenguni, haswa katika maeneo yenye uhamiaji, nchi zifuatazo zina masharti ya talanta ya teknolojia ya digitali, wavumbuzi na wawekezaji.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé àwọn ìwé ìgbélùú tí ó jọ Global Talent Visa wà káàkiri àgbáyé, pàápàá jùlọ nínú àwọn ìsíkiri tí ó gbajúmọ̀, àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè wọ̀nyí ní àwọn ìpèsè fún onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé, àwọn aṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun, àti àwọn olùdókòwò.
zu: Nakuba kunamaGlobal Talent Visas afanayo atholakala emhlabeni wonke, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezishisayo, amazwe alandelayo anezinhlinzeko zamakhono obuchwepheshe bedijithali, abasunguli, nabatshalizimali.

am: ግሎባል ታለንት ዥረት (ካናዳ)
en: Global Talent Stream (Canada)
ha: Shirin Global Talent Stream (Kanada)
sw: Utiririshaji wa Vipaji Ulimwenguni (Kanada)
yo: Global Talent Stream (Canada)
zu: IGlobal Talent Stream (Canada)

am: በካናዳ ያለው ከአለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ዥረት ፕሮግራም የተፈጠረው ከፍተኛ ችሎታ ያላቸውን የውጭ አገር ሠራተኞችን ወደ አገሪቱ ለመሳብ እና የካናዳ ኩባንያዎች የሚያስፈልጋቸውን ክህሎት እንዲያገኙ ለመርዳት ነው።
en: The Global Talent Stream program in Canada was created to attract highly-skilled foreign workers to the country and help Canadian companies acquire the skills they need.
ha: An ƙirƙiri shirin Global Talent Stream a Kanada ne don jawo hankalin ƙwararrun ma'aikatan ƙasashen waje zuwa ƙasar, da kuma taimakawa kamfanonin Kanada su sami ƙwararrun da suke buƙataata.
sw: Mpango Ulimwengu wa Utiririshaji wa vipaji nchini Kanada uliundwa ili kuvutia wafanyakazi wa kigeni wenye ujuzi wa juu kuja nchini na kusaidia makampuni ya Kanada kupata ujuzi wanaohitaji.
yo: Ètò Global Talent Stream ní Canada ni wọ́n ṣẹ̀dá láti fa àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè tí wọ́n ní ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe púpọ̀ wọlé sí orílẹ̀ èdè yìí kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ Canada láti ṣàmúlò ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n nílò.
zu: Uhlelo lweGlobal Talent Stream eCanada lwadalelwa ukuheha abasebenzi bangaphandle abanekhono kakhulu ezweni futhi lusize izinkampani zaseCanada zithole amakhono eziwadingayo.

am: ዥረቱ የካናዳ ትልቁ ኤክስፕረስ የስደት ስርዓት አካል ነው።
en: The Stream is part of Canada's larger Express Entry immigration system.
ha: Shirin wani ɓangare ne na tsarin Kanada na Shige da Fice Cikin Sauri.
sw: Mtiririko ni sehemu ya mfumo mkubwa wa uhamiaji wa Express Entry wa Kanada.
yo: Àgbékalẹ̀ náà jẹ́ ara ètò Ìsíwọlé ńlá àwọn Aṣàtìpó ti Canada.
zu: Ukusakaza kuyingxenye yohlelo olukhulu lwaseCanada lwe-Express Entry.

am: ከተሳካ የተወሰኑ መስፈርቶችን ካሟሉ በኋላ ወደ ቋሚ የመኖሪያ ፈቃድ ሊያመራ ይችላል፡፡
en: If successful, it can lead to permanent residency after meeting certain criteria.
ha: Idan ya yi nasara, tsarin zai iya haifar da zama na dindindin bayan cika wasu sharuɗɗa.
sw: Ikiwa imefanikiwa, inaweza kusababisha ukazi wa kudumu baada ya kufikia vigezo fulani.
yo: Ó yọrí sí rere, ó lè yọrí sí ìgbélùú títí ayé lẹ́yìn tí ènìyàn bá tẹ̀lé gbogbo àwọn ìlànà tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀.
zu: Uma kuphumelele, kungaholela ekubeni ngumhlali unomphela ngemva kokuhlangabezana nemibandela ethile.

am: ፕሮግራሙ በተለይ በቴክኖሎጂ ሥራዎች ላይ ያተኰረ ሲሆን የካናዳ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያዎች ፈጠራዎችን፣ መስራቾችን፣ የሳይበር ደኅንነት ባለሙያዎችን፣ የድር ገንቢዎችን፣ የድር ዲዛይነሮችን፣ የመረጃ ሳይንቲስቶችን፣ የሶፍትዌር መሐንዲሶችን፣ ወዘተ ጨምሮ ከመላው ዓለም የመጡ ከፍተኛ ችሎታዎችን እንዲያገኙ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: The program specifically focuses on tech jobs and provides Canadian tech companies access to top talent from around the world, including innovators, founders, cybersecurity experts, web developers, web designers, data scientists, software engineers, etc.
ha: Shirin ya mai da hankali musamman kan ayyukan fasaha, kuma yana bai wa kamfanonin fasaha na Kanada damar samun manyan masu hazaƙa daga ko ina a faɗin duniya, wanda suka haɗa da masu ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire, da masu kafa kamfanoni, da ƙwararru kan tsaro na yanar gizo, da masu samar da shafukan yanar gizo, da masu tsara shafukan yanar gizo, da masana kimiyyar bayanai, da masu ƙera manhajoji, da sauransu.
sw: Mpango huo unaangazia kazi za teknolojia na hutoa kampuni za teknolojia za Kanada ufikiaji wa talanta bora kutoka ulimwenguni kote, pamoja na wavumbuzi, waanzilishi, wataalam wa usalama wa mtandao, watengenezaji wa wavuti, wabuni wa wavuti, wanasayansi wa data, wahandisi wa programu, n.k.
yo: Ètò náà fojúsun àwọn iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ó sì pèsè àǹfààní fún àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ Canada láti ní àǹfààní sí àwọn onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n dára jùlọ káàkiri àgbáyé, tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn aṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun, àwọn olùdásílẹ̀, àwọn alámọ̀já ààbò ẹ̀rọ ayélujára, àwọn aṣẹ̀dá ojú òpó ìtakùn, àwọn ayàwòrán ojú òpó ìtakùn, àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ńsì ìwífun-àlàyé, àwọn onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ, abbl.
zu: Lolu hlelo lugxile ngokukhethekile emisebenzini yezobuchwepheshe futhi lunikeza izinkampani zobuchwepheshe zaseCanada ukufinyelela emathalenteni aphezulu avela emhlabeni wonke, okuhlanganisa abasunguli, abasunguli, ochwepheshe becybersecurity, abathuthukisi bewebhu, abaklami bewebhu, ososayensi bedatha, onjiniyela bezinhlelo zokusebenza, njll.

am: እንደ እንግሊዝ አለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ቪዛ ሁሉ አለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ዥረትም እንደ ቴክኔሽን እና የካናዳ ፈጠራዎች ምክር ቤት ያሉ ዕጩዎችን( በዚህ ጒዳይ ላይ ኩባንያዎችን) የሚያመለክቱ የተሰየሙ አጋሮች ዝርዝር አለው።
en: Like the UK's Global Talent Visa, the Global Talent Stream has a list of designated partners, such as TECHNATION and the Council of Canadian Innovators, that refer candidates (companies in this case).
ha: Kamar Global Talent Visa ta Birtaniya, Global Talent Stream yana da jerin sunayen abokan hulɗa da ya ayyana, kamar TECHNATION da Majalisar Masu ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire ta Kanada, waɗanda ke miƙa 'yan takara (anan muna nufin kamfanoni).
sw: Kama vile Visa ya Vipaji Ulimwenguni ya Uingereza, Global Talent Stream ina orodha ya washirika walioteuliwa, kama vile TECHNATION na Baraza la Wavumbuzi wa Kanada, ambao hurejelea wagombeaji (kampuni katika kesi hii).
yo: Bí Global Talent Visa ti UK, Global Talent Stream ní àtòjọ àwọn olùbádòwòpọ̀ tí wọ́n yà sọ́tọ̀, bí TECHNATION àti Council of Canadian Innovators, tí wọ́n máa ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn akópa (àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ni èyí).
zu: NjengeGlobal Talent Visa yase-UK, iGlobal Talent Stream inohlu lozakwethu abaqokiwe, njengeTECHNATION kanye neCouncil of Canadian Innovators, edlulisela amakhandidethi (izinkampani kuleli cala).

am: ነገር ግን፣ ከአለም አቀፍ ተስጦ ቪዛ በተቃራኒ ግለሰቦች ለዚህ ፕሮግራም በቀጥታ ማመልከት አይችሉም።
en: However, unlike the Global Talent Visa, individuals cannot directly apply for this program.
ha: Saidai ba kamar Global Talent Visa ba, ɗaiɗaikun mutane ba za su iya cika wannan shirin kai tsaye ba.
sw: Walakini, tofauti na Visa ya kipaji ya Ulimwenguni, watu binafsi hawawezi kutuma ombi moja kwa moja kwa programu hii.
yo: Àmọ́ sá, ó yàtọ̀ sí Global Talent Visa, nítorí àwọn akópa kò lè dá bẹ̀wẹ̀ fún ètò yìí.
zu: Kodwake, ngokungafani neGlobal Talent Visa, abantu abakwazi ukufaka isicelo ngqo salolu hlelo.

am: በመጀመሪያ ካናዳዊ ቀጣሪ ለችሎታቸው ፍላጐት እንዳለው በማሳየት ሥራ ሊሰጣቸው ይገባል፣ እና ተዛማጅ ብቃቶች ወይም ልምድ ሊኖራቸው ይገባል።
en: They must first be offered a job by a Canadian employer who can demonstrate a need for their skills, and they must have relevant qualifications or experience.
ha: Dole ne wani ma'aikacin Kanada wanda zai iya nuna buƙataatar ƙwarewar sa ya ba ku aiki, kuma dole ne su sami cancanta ko ƙwarewa.
sw: Ni lazima kwanza wapewe kazi na mwajiri wa Kanada ambaye anaweza kuonyesha hitaji la ujuzi wao, na lazima wawe na sifa zinazofaa au uzoefu.
yo: Wọ́n gbọ́dọ̀ kọ́kọ́ gba iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ Canada tí wọ́n lè fọwọ́ sọ̀yà fún ìlò ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe wọn, wọ́n sì gbọ́dọ̀ ní àwọn ìwé ẹ̀rí àti ìrírí tí ó yẹ.
zu: Kufanele baqale banikezwe umsebenzi umqashi waseCanada ongabonisa isidingo samakhono abo, futhi kufanele babe neziqu noma isipiliyoni esifanele.

am: ማመልከቻው በሁለቱም ምድቦች በአሠሪው ይከናወናል፡፡
en: The application will also be done by the employer under either of two categories.
ha: Haka nan mai ɗaukar aiki ne zai iya nema, a ƙarƙashin ɗaya daga cikin nau'ika biyun.
sw: Maombi pia yatafanywa na mwajiri chini ya mojawapo ya makundi mawili.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ni yóò ṣe ìwé ìbẹ̀wẹ̀ wọn lábẹ́ èyíkéyìí ẹ̀ka méjì.
zu: Isicelo sizobuye senziwe ngumqashi ngaphansi kwezigaba ezimbili.

am: የበለጠ እዚህ ያግኙ፡፡
en: Find out more here.
ha: Samu wasu labaran a nan.
sw: Pata maelezo zaidi hapa.
yo: Wo àlàyé sí níhìn-ín.
zu: Thola okwengeziwe lapha.

am: የአሜሪካ መስራች ቪዛ
en: US Founder Visa
ha: Founder Visa na Amurka
sw: Mwanzilishi wa Visa Marekani
yo: US Founder Visa
zu: IVisa yabasunguli base-US

am: ይህ የስደተኛ ያልሆነ ቪዛ ነው በመስካቸው ልዩ ችሎታ ወይም ስኬቶችን ማሳየት ለሚችሉ ግለሰቦች።
en: This is a non-immigrant visa for individuals who can demonstrate extraordinary ability or achievements in their field.
ha: Wannan biza ce ta baƙin haure ga mutane masu ƙwarewa ta ban mamaki ko nasarori a fannoninsu.
sw: Hii ni visa isiyo ya wahamiaji kwa watu binafsi ambao wanaweza kuonyesha uwezo au mafanikio ya ajabu katika nyanja zao.
yo: Èyí jẹ́ ìwé ìgbélùú àwọn aṣàtìpó fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọn lè ṣe àfihàn ipá tàbí àṣeyọrí tí ó yà wọn sọ́tọ̀ lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ wọn.
zu: Lena ivisa engeyona yabokufika yabantu abangabonisa ikhono elingavamile noma impumelelo emkhakheni wabo.

am: የ0-1 ቪዛ በመባልም ይታወቃል እና የሶስት አመት ጊዜያዊ የስራ ቪዛ ሲሆን ይህም በአንድ አመት ጭማሪ ሊታደስ ይችላል።
en: It is also known as the 0-1 Visa and is a three-year temporary work visa, which can be renewed in one-year increments.
ha: Haka nan ana kiranta da 0-1 Visa, kuma takardar izinin aiki ce ta wucin gadi na shekaru uku, wanda za a iya sabuntawa a cikin ƙarin shekara ɗaya.
sw: Pia inajulikana kama Visa 0-1 na ni visa ya kazi ya muda ya miaka mitatu, ambayo inaweza kusasishwa kwa nyongeza ya mwaka mmoja.
yo: Òhun náà ni 0-1 Visa ó sì jẹ́ ìwé ìgbélùú ìgbà díẹ̀ ọlọ́dún mẹ́ta, èyí tí ènìyàn lè sọdọ̀tun fún ìtẹ̀síwájú ọlọ́dún kan.
zu: Yaziwa nangokuthi i-0-1 Visa futhi iyi-visa yomsebenzi wesikhashana yeminyaka emithathu, engavuselelwa ngokunyuka konyaka owodwa.

am: ምንም እንኳን ቪዛው በሳይንስ፣ በሥነ ጥበብ፣ በትምህርት፣ በንግድ ወይም በአትሌቲክስ መስክ ልዩ ለሆኑ ግለሰቦች መሆኑን የሚያመለክት ቢሆንም የቴክኖሎጂ ችሎታዎች እና ሥራ ፈጣሪዎችም ሊጠቀሙበት ይችላሉ።
en: Although information about the visa indicates that it is for exceptional individuals in the fields of science, arts, education, business, or athletics, tech talents and entrepreneurs can also take advantage of it.
ha: Ko da yake bayanai game da bizar sun nuna cewa ta masana na musamman ne a fannonin kimiyya, fasaha, ilimi, kasuwanci, ko wasannin motsa jiki, ƙwararru akan harkokin fasaha da 'yan kasuwa suma na iya cin gajiyar sa.
sw: Ingawa maelezo kuhusu visa yanaonyesha kuwa ni ya watu wa kipekee katika nyanja za sayansi, sanaa, elimu, biashara, au riadha, vipaji vya teknolojia na wajasiriamali pia wanaweza kuchukua fursa hiyo.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé àlàyé nípa ìwé ìgbélùú náà fi hàn pé ó wà fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n tayọ ni ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ sáyẹ́ńsì, iṣẹ́ ọ̀nà, ètò ẹ̀kọ́, okòwò, tàbí àwọn eléré orí pápá, àwọn onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti àwọn oníṣòwò pẹ̀lú lè jẹ àǹfààní rẹ̀.
zu: Yize ulwazi olumayelana nevisa lukhombisa ukuthi ngeyabantu abasebenza ngokukhethekile emikhakheni yesayensi, ezobuciko, ezemfundo, ezamabhizinisi, noma ezokusubatha, amakhono ezobuchwepheshe kanye nosomabhizinisi nabo bangalisebenzisa leli thuba.

am: ብዙውን ጊዜ ብቁነት የሚወሰነው ቢያንስ ሶስቱን ከስምንት መስፈርቶች በማሟላት ነው፣ የታዋቂ ቡድኖች አባል መሆንን፣ ሽልማቶችን እና ብሄራዊ/አለም አቀፍ እውቅናን ጨምሮ ከሌሎቹ መሃል።
en: Usually, eligibility is determined by meeting at least three of eight requirements, including membership in prestigious groups, awards, and national/international recognition, among others.
ha: A yawancin lokuta, ana cancanta ne ta hanyar cika a ƙalla uku daga cikin sharuɗɗa takwas, wanda suka haɗa da kasancewa mamba a ƙungiyoyi masu daraja, da kyaututtuka, da kuma shuhura ta ƙasa/ƙasa-da-ƙasa a, da sauransu.
sw: Kwa kawaida, ustahiki hubainishwa kwa kutimiza angalau mahitaji matatu kati ya manane, ikijumuisha uanachama katika vikundi vya hadhi, tuzo, na utambuzi wa kitaifa/kimataifa, miongoni mwa mengine.
yo: Ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà, yíyẹ láti kópa máa ń dá lórí níní mẹ́ta nínú àwòmọ́ mẹ́jọ, tí ó fi mọ́ jíjẹ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ nínú àwọn ẹgbẹ́ pàtàkì, àmì ẹ̀yẹ, àti àyẹ́sí orílẹ̀-èdè/àgbáyé, àti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Ngokuvamile, ukufaneleka kunqunywa ngokuhlangabezana okungenani nezimfuneko ezintathu kweziyisishiyagalombili, okuhlanganisa ubulungu bamaqembu ahlonishwayo, imiklomelo, nokuqashelwa kuzwelonke/kwamazwe ngamazwe, phakathi kokunye.

am: ከታዋቂ አፋጣኝ በተሳካ ሁኔታ የተመረቁ ወይም በቬንቸር የሚደገፉ ጀማሪዎች ያላቸው መስራቾችም ከፍተኛ እድሎች የማግኘት ዕድላቸው ሰፊ ነው።
en: Founders who have successfully graduated from a prestigious accelerator or have venture-backed startups are also more likely to have higher possibilities.
ha: Waɗanda suka kafa waɗanda suka yi nasarar kammala aiki a manyan masu ƙara kuzari ko kuma suna da sabbin kamfanoni da kasuwanci ke tallafawa suma suna da babbar yiwuwa sosai ta samu.
sw: Waanzilishi ambao wamehitimu kwa mafanikio kutoka kwa kiongeza kasi cha kifahari au wana wanaoanzisha wanaofadhiliwa na miradi pia wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na uwezekano wa juu zaidi..
yo: Àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ tí wọ́n ti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́gboyè nínú ètò ìdàgbàsókè ilé iṣẹ́ àdìdelẹ̀ tàbí tí wọ́n ní àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdelẹ̀ ṣe é ṣe kí wọ́n ní àwòmọ́ tí ó yẹ.
zu: Abasunguli abaqede ngempumelelo i-accelerator ehlonishwayo noma abaneziqalo ezisekelwe ebhizinisini bangase babe namathuba aphezulu.

am: ይህ ቪዛ ከሶፍትዌር መሐንዲሶች እስከ ምርት ዲዛይነሮች ድረስ ዋና እና ተያያዥ የቴክኖሎጂ ሚናዎችን ለሚይዙ ተሰጥኦዎች ክፍት ነው።
en: This visa is also open to talent occupying core and adjacent tech roles, from software engineers to product designers.
ha: Wannan bizar kuma a buɗe take ga masu fasaha, waɗanda zasu yi aiki a matsayin manya ki ƙananan guraben aiki, daga masu ɓera manhajoji zuwa masu tsara kayayyaki.
sw: Visa hii pia iko wazi kwa talanta kuchukua majukumu ya msingi na ya karibu ya teknolojia, kutoka kwa wahandisi wa programu hadi wabuni wa bidhaa.
yo: Ìwé ìgbélùú yìí tún wà fún àwọn onímọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n di àwọn ipò pàtàkì àti ipò tí ó súnmọ́ra mú nínú ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, láti orí àwọn onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ dórí àwọn aṣàgbékalẹ̀ ọjà.
zu: Le visa futhi ivulekele ithalente ezindimeni zezobuchwepheshe ezibalulekile nezihlobene eduze, kusukela kubathuthukisi bezinhlelo zesoftware kuya kubaklami bemikhiqizo.

am: ለበለጠ መረጃ ይህንን ሊንክ መከተል ይችላሉ።
en: For more information, you can follow this link.
ha: Don neman ƙarin bayani, kuna iya bin wannan adireshin na yanar gizo.
sw: Kwa habari zaidi, unaweza kufuata kiungo hiki.
yo: Fún àlàyé sí i, ẹ lè kàn sí ojut òpó yìí.
zu: Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe, ungalandela lesi sixhumanisi.

am: ዓለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ፕሮግራም (አውስትራሊያ)
en: Global Talent Program (Australia)
ha: Shirin Global Talent Program (Ostreliya)
sw: Mpango wa Kimataifa wa Vipaji (Australia)
yo: Global Talent Program (Australia)
zu: Uhlelo Lwethalente Lomhlaba Wonke (Australia)

am: የአውስትራሊያ ኩባንያዎች የሚፈልጓቸውን ክህሎቶች እንዲያገኙ ለመርዳት ከፍተኛ ብቃት ያላቸውን የውጭ አገር ሠራተኞችን ወደ አገሪቱ ለመሳብ በአውስትራሊያ አለም አቀፍ የተሰጥኦ ፕሮግራም ተጀምሯል፡፡
en: The Global Talent Program in Australia is launched to attract highly-skilled foreign workers to the country to help Australian companies get the skills they need.
ha: An ƙaddamar da shirin Global Talent Program a Ostiraliya don jawo hankalin ƙwararrun ma'aikata na ƙasashen waje zuwa ƙasar don taimakawa kamfanonin Ostreliya su sami ma'aikata masu ƙwarewar da suke buƙataata.
sw: Mpango wa kimataifa wa vipaji nchini Australia umezinduliwa ili kuvutia wafanyakazi wa kigeni wenye ujuzi wa hali ya juu nchini ili kusaidia makampuni ya Australia kupata ujuzi wanaohitaji.
yo: Wọ́n ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Global Talent Program ní Australia láti fa àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè tí wọ́n ní ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe púpọ̀ wọlé sí orílẹ̀ èdè náà láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ Australia láti rí àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n nílò.
zu: IGlobal Talent Program e-Australia yethulwa ukuze ihehe izisebenzi zakwamanye amazwe ezinamakhono aphezulu ezweni ukuze zisize izinkampani zase-Australia zithole amakhono eziwadingayo.

am: ይህ ፕሮግራም የፊንቴክ፣ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ እና የግብርና ቴክኖሎጂን ጨምሮ ወሳኝ በሆኑ የክህሎት ዘርፎች ላይ ያተኰረ ሲሆን ዕጩዎች አስፈላጊ የቴክኖሎጂ ክህሎቶች እንዲኖራቸው እና ከ 162,000 አውስትራሊያዊ ዶላር በላይ የሆነ ፍትሃዊ የሥራ ከፍተኛ ገቢን የማግኘት ችሎታ እንዲኖራቸው ይጠይቃል።
en: This program has a focus on critical skill sectors, including fintech, healthtech, and agritech, and requires candidates to have relevant tech skills and the ability to earn above the Fair Work high-income threshold of AUD162,000.
ha: Wannan shirin ya mai da hankali kan fannonin fasaha masu mahimmanci, wanda suka haɗa da fasahar harkokin kuɗi, da fasahar harkokin lafiya, da fasahar harkokin noma, kuma yana buƙataatar masu neman aikin su sami ƙwarewar fasaha da ta dace da kuma ikon samun sama da matsakaicin samun kuɗin shiga na aiki na AUD162,000.
sw: Mpango huu unaangazia sekta muhimu za ustadi, ikijumuisha fintech, teknolojia ya afya, na teknolojia ya kilimo, na unahitaji watahiniwa kuwa na ujuzi unaofaa wa teknolojia na uwezo wa kupata mapato zaidi ya kiwango cha juu cha mapato ya Fair Work cha AUD162,000.
yo: Ètò yìí fojúsun àwọn ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí wọ́n ṣe pàtàkì, tí ó fi mọ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná, ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìlera, àti ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ọ̀gbìn, ó sì pè fún àwọn akópa láti ní àwọn ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí ó ní í ṣe àti agbára láti rí ju AUD 162, 000 gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìpele owó Òfin Iṣẹ́.
zu: Lolu hlelo lugxile ezicini zamakhono abalulekile, okuhlanganisa ifintech, ihealthtech, ne-agritech, futhi ludinga abantu abazongenela ukhetho babe namakhono obuchwepheshe afanelekile kanye nekhono lokuthola imali engaphezu komkhawulo wemali engenayo owumkhawulo weFair Work ongu-AUD162,000.

am: ፕሮግራሙ ግለሰቦች እራሳቸውን እንዲደግፉ ወይም በአውስትራሊያ ቀጣሪ ስፖንሰር እንዲሆኑ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: The program allows individuals to self-sponsor or be sponsored by an Australian employer.
ha: Shirin yana bawa mutane damar ɗaukar nauyin kansu ko kuma wani mai bayar da aiki a Ostreliya ya ɗauki nauyinsa.
sw: Mpango huu unaruhusu watu binafsi kujifadhili au kufadhiliwa na mwajiri wa Australia.
yo: Etoy náà fi ààyè gba àwọn ènìyàn láti ṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ ara wọn tàbí kí ilé-iṣẹ́ Australia kan ṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ wọn.
zu: Uhlelo luvumela abantu ukuthi bazixhase noma baxhaswe umqashi wase-Australia.

am: ብቁ ሆነው ለመታየት በአውስትራሊያ ከሚገኙ ተቀባይነት ካላቸው አካላት በአንዱ መገምገም እና መጠቆም አለባቸው።
en: To be considered eligible, they must be assessed and recommended by one of the approved endorsing bodies in Australia.
ha: Don a ayyanaku a matsayin waɗanda suka cancanta, dole ne ɗaya daga cikin masu amincewa na Ostreliya ya tantance kuma ya yarda da ku.
sw: Ili kuchukuliwa kuwa unastahiki, ni lazima ukaguliwe na kupendekezwa na mojawapo ya mashirika ya uidhinishaji yaliyoidhinishwa nchini Australia.
yo: Láti jẹ́ ẹni tí wọ́n kà yẹ, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn àjọ tí òfin fọwọ́sí ní Australia gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ìgbéléwọ̀n àti ìfọwọ́sí wọn.
zu: Ukuze bathathwe njengabafanelekile, kufanele bahlolwe futhi banconywe enye yezikhungo zokugunyazwa e-Australia.

am: በዚህ ቪዛ በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ ቢያንስ ከሶስት እስከ አራት አመታት ካሳለፉ በኋላ ግለሰቦች ለቋሚ ነዋሪነት እና ለዜግነት ማመልከት ይችላሉ.
en: After spending at least three to four years in the country with this visa, individuals can apply for permanent residency and citizenship.
ha: Bayan shafe a ɓalla shekaru uku zuwa huɗu a ƙasar da wannan bizar, ɗaiɗaikun mutane na iya neman izinin zama na dindindin da zama ɗan ƙasa.
sw: Baada ya kukaa angalau miaka mitatu hadi minne nchini na visa hii, watu binafsi wanaweza kutuma maombi ya ukaaji wa kudumu na uraia.
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bá lo ó kéré jù ọdún mẹ́ta sí mẹ́rin ní orílẹ̀ èdè náà pẹ̀lú ìwé ìgbélùú yìí, oníkálukú wọn lè bẹ̀wẹ̀ fún ìgbélùú títí ayé àti ìdọmọ-onílùú.
zu: Ngemva kokuchitha okungenani iminyaka emithathu kuya kwemine ezweni ngale visa, abantu bangafaka izicelo zokuba ngumhlali unomphela nokuba yisakhamuzi.

am: ተጨማሪ መረጃ እዚህ ማግኘት ይቻላል፡፡
en: More information can be found here.
ha: Ana iya samun ƙarin bayanai a nan.
sw: Taarifa zaidi zinaweza kupatikana hapa.
yo: Àlàyé sí i wà níhìn-ín.
zu: Ulwazi olwengeziwe lungatholakala lapha.

am: የአለም አቀፍ ተፅዕኖ ቪዛ (ኒውዚላንድ)
en: Global Impact Visa (New Zealand)
ha: Shirin Global Impact Visa (New Zealand)
sw: Visa ya Athari Duniani (New Zealand)
yo: Global Impact Visa (New Zealand)
zu: IGlobal Impact Visa (New Zealand)

am: የኒውዚላንድ መንግስት የቴክኖሎጂ ዘርፉን ለማሳደግ ከፍተኛ ተጽዕኖ ያላቸውን ስራ ፈጣሪዎች እና ፈጣሪዎችን ለማምጣት ከአለም አቀፍ የተፅኖ ቪዛ (ጂአይቪ) ፈጠረ።
en: The government of New Zealand created the Global Impact Visa (GIV) to bring in high-impact entrepreneurs and innovators to grow its tech sector.
ha: Gwamnatin New Zealand ta ƙirƙiri Global Impact Visa (GIV) don shigo da manyan 'yan kasuwa masu tasiri da masu ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire don haɓaka sashenta na fasaha.
sw: Serikali ya New Zealand iliunda Visa ilioathiri Ulimwengu (GIV) kuleta wajasiriamali na wavumbuzi wenye athari kubwa ili kukuza sekta yake ya teknolojia.
yo: Ìjọba New Zealand ṣètò Global Impact Visa (GIV) láti mú àwọn oníṣòwò àti aṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun tí wọ́n tayọ wọlé láti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ wọn.
zu: Uhulumeni waseNew Zealand udale iGlobal Impact Visa (iGIV) ukuze ilethe osomabhizinisi abanomthelela omkhulu nabasunguli abasha ukuze bakhulise umkhakha wabo wezobuchwepheshe.

am: የ3 ዓመት የስራ ቪዛ ወደ ኒውዚላንድ ለመምጣት የቴክኖሎጂ ቢዝነስ ወይም ኢንተርፕራይዝ ለመመስረት ለሚፈልጉ ግለሰቦች የተዘጋጀ ነው።
en: The 3-year work visa is designed for individuals who intend to come to New Zealand to establish and run a tech business or enterprise.
ha: An tsara takardar izinin aiki na shekaru 3 don mutanen da ke da niyyar zuwa New Zealand don kafawa da gudanar da kasuwancin harkokin fasaha ko kamfanoni.
sw: Visa ya kazi ya miaka 3 imeundwa kwa ajili ya watu binafsi wanaokusudia kuja New Zealand kuanzisha na kuendesha biashara ya teknolojia au biashara.
yo: Ìwé ìgbélùú ọlọ́dún 3 náà ni wọ́n ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ń gbèrò láti wá sí New Zealand láti ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ àti àkóso okòwò tàbí ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Ivisa yomsebenzi yeminyaka emi-3 yakhelwe abantu abathile abahlose ukuza eNew Zealand ukuze bamise futhi baqhube ibhizinisi noma ibhizinisi lobuchwepheshe.

am: ብቁ ለመሆን፣ አመልካቾች ከፍተኛ ብቃት ያለው እና ጠንካራ የፈጠራ ታሪክ ሊኖራቸው ይገባል።
en: To be eligible, applicants must have a high level of expertise and a strong track record of innovation.
ha: Don cancanta, dole ne ya zama masu nema suna da babban matakin ƙwarewa da kuma ingantaccen bayanin ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire.
sw: Ili kustahiki, waombaji lazima wawe na kiwango cha juu cha utaalam na rekodi nzuri ya uvumbuzi.
yo: Láti yẹ fún ètò yìí, àwọn akópa gbọ́dọ̀ ní ìpele ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe tí pọ̀ àti àkọsílẹ̀ ipa ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun tí ó dára.
zu: Ukuze bafaneleke, abafakizicelo kumele babe nezinga eliphezulu lobuchwepheshe kanye nerekhodi eliqinile lokusungula izinto ezintsha.

am: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ፣ የጀመሩት የንግድ ሥራ ስኬት እና ታሪክ ሪኮርድ ማደስ ወይም ለቋሚ ነዋሪነት ማመልከት ይችሉ እንደሆነ ይወስናል።
en: Meanwhile, the success and track record of the venture they start will determine if they can renew or apply for permanent residency.
ha: A halin yanzu, nasara da bayanan bin diddigin kasuwanci da suka fara, zai nuna ko za su iya sabunta zama ko neman izinin zama na dindindin.
sw: Wakati huo huo, mafanikio na rekodi ya ufuatiliaji wa mradi wanaoanzisha itaamua ikiwa wanaweza kufanya upya au kutuma maombi ya ukazi wa kudumu.
yo: Ní báyìí, àṣeyọrí àti ipa àkọsílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n bẹ̀rẹ̀ ni yóò sọ bóyá wọ́n lè ṣe ìsọdọ̀tun tàbí bẹ̀wẹ̀ fún ìgbélùú títí ayé.
zu: Khonamanjalo, impumelelo kanye nerekhodi lomkhondo lebhizinisi abaliqalayo kuzonquma ukuthi bangakwazi yini ukuvuselela noma ukufaka isicelo sokuba ngumhlali unomphela.

am: ጂአይቪ ለመደገፍ ፈቃደኛ ለሆኑ ባለሀብቶችም ክፍት ነው።
en: The GIV is also open to investors who are willing to support it.
ha: GIV kuma a buɗe yake ga masu zuba jari waɗanda suke son su tallafa masa.
sw: GIV pia iko wazi kwa wawekezaji ambao wako tayari kuiunga mkono.
yo: GIV tún wà fún àwọn olùdókòwò tí wọ́n ṣetán láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn rẹ̀.
zu: I-GIV ivulekele abatshalizimali abazimisele ukuyisekela.

am: ጂአይቪ በ2019 ተጀመረ፣ ግን የመጨረሻው የተቀበለው ቡድን በ2020 ነበር።
en: The GIV was launched in 2019, but the last cohort accepted was in 2020.
ha: An ƙaddamar da GIV a shekarar 2019, amma salon na ƙarshe da aka karɓa shi ne a shekarar 2020.
sw: GIV ilizinduliwa mwaka wa 2019, lakini kundi la mwisho lililokubaliwa lilikuwa mwaka wa 2020.
yo: Wọ́n ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ GIV ní 2019, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ikọ̀ tí wọ́n gbà wọlé kẹ́yìn ni 2020.
zu: I-GIV yethulwa ngo-2019, kodwa iqembu lokugcina elamukelwayo lalingo-2020.

am: ለጂአይቪ ብቸኛው ድጋፍ ሰጪ አካል የኤድመንድ ሂላሪ ፌሎውሺፕ (ኢኤችኤፍ) ነው፣ እና በአሁኑ ጊዜ አዲስ ገቢዎችን ለመቀበል ምንም የጊዜ መስመር የለም።
en: The only endorsing body for the GIV is the Edmund Hillary Fellowship (EHF), and there is currently no timeline for accepting new entries.
ha: Edmund Hillary Fellowship (EHF) ne kaɗai kamfanin da aka nuna don aikin GIV, kuma a halin yanzu babu wani ayyanannen lokaci na karɓar sabbin masu nema.
sw: Shirika pekee linaloidhinisha GIV ni Edmund Hillary Fellowship (EHF), na kwa sasa hakuna kalenda ya matukio ya kukubali maingizo mapya.
yo: Àjọ aṣàtìlẹ́yìn kan ṣoṣo fún GIV ni Edmund Hillary Fellowship (EHF), kò sì sí ààyè fún àwọn ìgbàniwọlé tuntun báyìí.
zu: Umzimba kuphela ogunyaza iGIV yi-Edmund Hillary Fellowship (i-EHF), futhi okwamanje awukho umugqa wesikhathi wokwamukela okufakiwe okusha.

am: ተጨማሪ መረጃ እዚህ ያግኙ።
en: Find more information here.
ha: Samu ƙarin bayanai a nan.
sw: Tafuta taarifa zaidi hapa.
yo: Wo àlàyé sí níhìn-ín.
zu: Thola ulwazi olwengeziwe lapha.

am: ብሉይቲ የምርት መመሪያ: ነጻ እና በቂ ኤሌክትሪክ እንዲኖርዎ የመጨረሻው የኃይል መፍትሔዎ
en: BLUETTI Product Guide: Your Ultimate Power Solution to Have Free and Sufficient Electricity
ha: Bayanin Samfuran BLUETTI: Ƙaƙƙarfan Mafitar Wutar Lantarkinku don Samar da Isasshiyar Wutar Lantarki a Kyauta
sw: Mwongozo wa Bidhaa za BLUETTI: Suluhu Yako ya Mwisho ya Nguvu ya Kuwa na Umeme Bila Malipo na wa Kutosha
yo: Atọ́ka Ọjà BLUETTI: Ọ̀nà àbáyọ Agbára yín tí ó dára jùlọ láti ní iná mọ̀nàmọ́ná ọ̀fẹ́ àti èyí tí ó tó.
zu: Umhlahlandlela Womkhiqizo weBLUETTI: Isixazululo Sakho Sokugcina Samandla Sogesi Wamahhala Nokwanele

am: ከ200 ሚሊዮን በላይ የሚሆነው 86 በመቶው የናይጄሪያ ሕዝብ በአሁኑ ወቅት የኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል አያገኝም።
en: 86 percent of Nigeria's vast population of over 200 million people currently lack access to electricity.
ha: Kashi 86 bisa 100 na al'ummar Najeriya na sama da miliyan 200 a halin yanzu ba su da wutar lantarki.
sw: Asilimia 86 ya idadi kubwa ya watu nchini Nigeria yenye zaidi ya watu milioni 200 kwa sasa hawana umeme.
yo: Ìdá 86 nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún iye ènìyàn ní Nigeria tí ó ní mílíọ̀nù 200 ènìyàn kò ní àǹfààní sí iná mọ̀nàmọ́ná.
zu: Amaphesenti angama-86 abantu baseNigeria abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-200 okwamanje abanawo ugesi.

am: የናይጄሪያ የስታቲስቲክስ ቢሮ( ኤንቢኤስ) እንደዘገበው ከኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል ካላቸው ሰዎች መካከል 5.96 ሚሊዮን የሚሆኑት እንኳን በሀገሪቱ የኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል ማከፋፈያ ኩባንያዎች ከመጠን በላይ ክፍያ ይከፍላሉ።
en: Even 5.96 million of those who do have electricity are overcharged by the country's electricity distribution companies, according to the Nigerian Bureau of Statistics (NBS).
ha: Hatta miliyan 5.96 na waɗanda ke da wutar lantarki, kamfanonin rarraba wutar lantarkin ƙasar ne ke biyansu fiye da ƙi, kamar yadda Hukumar ƙididdiga ta Najeriya NBS ta bayyana.
sw: Hata milioni 5.96 ya wale ambao wana umeme wanatozwa zaidi na makampuni ya usambazaji umeme nchini, kulingana na Ofisi ya Takwimu ya Nigeria (NBS).
yo: Kódà mílíọ̀nù 5.6 àwọn tí wọ́n ní iná mọ̀nàmọ́ná ń san àsanlé owó fún àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ iná mọ̀nàmọ́ná orílẹ̀-èdè, gẹ́gẹ́ bí Nigeria Bureau of Statistics ṣe sọ (NBS).
zu: Ngisho nezigidi ezingu-5.96 zalabo abangenawo ugesi zikhokhiswa ngokweqile izinkampani ezisabalalisa ugesi ezweni, ngokusho kweNigerian Bureau of Statistics (iNBS).

am: በዚህ የኃይል ፈታኝ ሁኔታ ውስጥ፣ ብሉይቲ፣ ግንባር ቀደም የንፁህ ሃይል ማከማቻ ኩባንያ፣ የናይጄሪያን የሃይል እጥረት ለመቅረፍ ውጤታማ መፍትሄዎችን ይሰጣል።
en: Amidst this energy challenge, BLUETTI, a leading clean energy storage company, offers effective solutions to help address Nigeria's power deficit.
ha: A tsakiyar wannan ƙalubalebalen makamashi, BLUETTI, babban kamfanin ajiyar makamashi mai tsafta, yana ba da ingantattun hanyoyin rage giɗin wutar lantarki a Najeriya.
sw: Katikati ya changamoto hii ya nishati, BLUETTI, kampuni inayoongoza ya kuhifadhi nishati safi, inatoa suluhisho madhubuti ya kusaidia kukabiliana na nakisi ya nishati nchini Nigeria.
yo: Nínú ìdojúkọ agbára yìí, BLUETTI, asíwájú ilé-iṣẹ́ agbára aláìdíbàjẹ́ kan, pèsè àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ kojú ìṣòro agbára Nigeria.
zu: Phakathi nale nselelo yamandla, iBLUETTI, inkampani ehamba phambili yokugcina amandla ahlanzekile, inikeza izixazululo ezisebenzayo zokusiza ukubhekana nokushoda kwamandla eNigeria.

am: በብሉይቲ የፀሐይ ኃይል ማመንጫ ጣቢያዎች ናይጄሪያውያን ነፃ የፀሐይ ኃይልን መጠቀም እና በኃይል መቋረጥ ጊዜ አስተማማኝ መጠባበቂያዎች ሊኖራቸው ይችላል።
