en: Don't miss this opportunity to turn your innovative idea into a thriving business.
ha: Kada ku rasa wannan dama ta juyar da sabbin dabarun ku zuwa kasuwanci mai bunƙasa.
sw: Usikose fursa hii ya kubadilisha wazo lako la ubunifu kuwa biashara inayostawi.
yo: Ẹ má pàdánù àǹfààní yìí láti sọ èrò ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun yín di okòwò ńlá.
zu: Ungaphuthelwa leli thuba lokuguqula umbono wakho omusha ube ibhizinisi elichumayo.

am: የጅምርዎን ስኬት ለማራመድ የአእምሮአዊ ንብረትን እና የአይፒ ቤተ-ሙከራዎችን ድጋፍ ይጠቀሙ።
en: Leverage intellectual property and the support of IP Labs to drive your startup's success.
ha: Yi amfani da kayan fasaha da tallafin IP Labs don samun da nasarar sabon kasuwancin ku.
sw: Tumia uwezo wa kiakili na usaidizi wa Maabara ya IP ili kuendeleza mafanikio ya uanzishaji wako.
yo: Ṣàmúlò dúkìá ohnont àtinúdá àti àtìlẹ́yìn IP Labs láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn àṣeyọrí ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdelẹ̀ yín.
zu: Sebenzisa impahla yengqondo ye-IP Labs nokwesekwa ukuze uqhubekisele phambili impumelelo yakho yokuqala.

am: ኤሴኤምኢዲኤኤን እና ኒምበስ መገናኛ በዙሃን ኤን40ሚ በሴቶች ለሚመሩ አነስተኛ አነስተኛና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች የማስታወቂያ ድጋፍ አስታወቁ፡፡
en: SMEDAN and Nimbus Media Announce N40m Advertising Support for Women-led SMEs
ha: Shafukan Yaɗa Labarai na SMEDAN da Nimbus sun sanar da Tallafin N40m Domin Ƙananan Kasuwanci na Mata
sw: SMEDAN na Nimbus Media Yatangaza Usaidizi wa Utangazaji wa N40m kwa SME zinazoongozwa na Wanawake
yo: SMEDAN àti Nimbus Media Kéde mílíọ̀nù N40 Àtìlẹ́yìn Ìpolówó fún Okòwò kéékèèké àti alábọ́dé.
zu: I-SMEDAN neNimbus Media Zimemezela Ukusekelwa Kokukhangisa kwe-N40m kwamaSME aholwa ngabesifazane

am: የቤት ውጭ የማስታወቂያ ኩባንያ እና የናይጄሪያ አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች ልማት ኤጀንሲ( ኤስኤምኤዲኤኤን) የሆነው ኒምቡስ ሚዲያ የተወሰነ ዛሬ ለኒምቡስ ድጋፍ ፕሮጀክት የ 2023 ዕትም ማመልከቻዎችን ጥሪ አሳውቀዋል፡፡
en: Nimbus Media Ltd, a destination out-of-home-advertising company and the Small and Medium Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria (SMEDAN) have today announced a call for applications for the 2023 edition of the Nimbus Aid Project.
ha: Kamfanin Nimbus Media Ltd, wani kamfanin talla na gida da kuma Hukumar Kula da ƙananan da Matsakaitan Masana'antu ta Najeriya (SMEDAN) a yau sun tallata neman tallafin Nimbus na shekarar 2023.
sw: Nimbus Media Ltd, kampuni ya utangazaji ya nje ya nyumba na Shirika la Maendeleo ya Biashara Ndogo na za Kati la Nigeria (SMEDAN) leo wametangaza wito wa maombi ya toleo la 2023 la Mradi wa Nimbus Aid.
yo: Nimbus Media Mtd, ilé-iṣẹ́ ibit ìpolówó ọjà níta ilé àti Small and Medium Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria (SMEDAN) ti kéde ìpè fún ìkọ̀wéforúkọsílẹ̀ lónìí fún Nimbus Aid Project àtúnṣe 2023.
zu: I-Nimbus Media Ltd, inkampani yokukhangisa ngaphandle kwekhaya kanye ne-Small and Medium Enterprises Development Agency yaseNigeria (iSMEDAN) namuhla imemezele isicelo sezicelo ze-2023 Nimbus Aid Project.

am: በኒምቡስ ሚዲያ የተወሰነ የሚመራው የለውጥ ማህበራዊ ተጽዕኖ ተነሳሽነት በመላው ናይጄሪያ በሴቶች የሚመሩ 20 ንግዶችን በኒምቡስ ማያ ገጾች ላይ ከ 40 ሚሊዮን ናራ( 53,681 ዶላር) በላይ ዋጋ ያለው ማስታወቂያ ያቀርባል።
en: The transformative social impact initiative spearheaded by Nimbus Media Ltd will provide 20 women-led businesses across Nigeria with over N40 million ($53,681) worth of advertising on Nimbus screens.
ha: Shirin kawo sauyi a zamantakewar al’umma wanda Nimbus Media Ltd ke jagoranta zai samarwa mata 20 masu sana’o’in hannu a duk fadin Najeriya tallafin sama da Naira miliyan 40 (dala 53,681) a Nimbus.
sw: Mpango wa kuleta mabadiliko ya kijamii unaoongozwa na Nimbus Media Ltd utatoa biashara 20 zinazoongozwa na wanawake kote nchini Nigeria utangazaji wa thamani ya zaidi ya N40 milioni ($53,681) kwenye skrini za Nimbus.
yo: Ètò àyípadà ipa àwùjọ yìí ni Nimbus Media Ltd sáájú yìí yóò pèsè àwọn okòwò tí àwọn obìnrin sáájú 20 káàkiri Nigeria pẹ̀lú ìpolówó tí ó ju mílíọ̀nù N40 ($53, 681) lójú àwọn àtẹ agbáwòrán Nimbus.
zu: Uhlelo olushintshayo lomthelela wezenhlalo oluholwa yiNimbus Media Ltd luzohlinzeka ngamabhizinisi aholwa ngabesifazane abangu-20 kulo lonke elaseNigeria ngemali engaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-N40 ($53,681) ekuxhaseni ngemali yokukhangisa ezikrinini zeNimbus.

am: የተሳካላቸው አመልካቾች ከሌሎች የፕሮጀክት አጋሮች የተለያዩ የግብይት እና የምርት ስም ግንባታ ድጋፍ ያገኛሉ።
en: Successful applicants will also benefit from various marketing and brand-building support from other project partners.
ha: Waɗanda suka yi nasara kuma za su amfana daga tallafin kasuwanci da na gina kasuwa daban-daban daga sauran abokan aikin.
sw: Waombaji waliofanikiwa pia watafaidika kutokana na usaidizi mbalimbali wa uuzaji na ujenzi wa chapa kutoka kwa washirika wengine wa mradi.
yo: Àwọn olùdíje tí wọ́n ṣe àṣeyọrí yóò jẹ àǹfààní láti ara àwọn onírúurú àtìlẹ́yìn ìtajà àti ìṣẹ̀dá iṣẹ́ láti ọwọ́ àwọn olùbádòwòpọ̀ iṣẹ́ àkànṣe mìíràn.
zu: Abafakizicelo abaphumelele bazophinde bazuze ekusekelweni okuhlukahlukene kokumaketha nokuthuthukiswa komkhiqizo okuvela kwabanye ozakwethu bephrojekthi.

am: ዶ/ር ቡንሚ ኮሌ-ዳዎዱ የኤስኤምኤዲኤኤን የሌጎስ ግዛት ሥራ አስኪያጅ ስለ ሽርክና ሲናገሩ፣ “ከኒምቡስ የእርዳታ ፕሮጀክት ጋር ያለን ትብብር ከ ኤስኤምኤዲኤኤን የዓመቱ ዕቅዶች ጋር አብሮ ይመጣል።
en: Speaking on the partnership, Dr Bunmi Kole-Dawodu Lagos State Manager, SMEDAN, stated, "Our partnership with the Nimbus Aid Project comes as a promising addition to SMEDAN's plans for the year.
ha: A nasa jawabin manajan ma’aikatar SMEDAN na jihar Legas, Dakta Bunmi Kole-Dawodu, ya bayyana cewa, "haɗin gwiwarmu da shirin tallafin na Nimbus ya zo ne a matsayin wani abin alfahari ga shirye-shiryen SMEDAN na wannan shekara".
sw: Akizungumzia ushirikiano huo, Dk Bunmi Kole-Dawodu Meneja wa Jimbo la Lagos, SMEDAN, alisema, "Ushirikiano wetu na Mradi wa Nimbus Aid unakuja kama nyongeza ya kuahidi kwa mipango ya SMEDAN kwa mwaka.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ń sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìbádòwòpọ̀ náà, Ọ̀mọ̀wé Bunmi Kole-Dawodu Alákòóso SMEDAN, Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó, sọ pé, "Ìbádòwòpọ̀ wa pẹ̀lú Nimbus Aid Project jẹ́ àfikún ńlá fún àwọn ètò SMEDAN ọdún yìí.
zu: Ekhuluma ngobudlelwano, uDkt Bunmi Kole-Dawodu IMenenja Yesifunda saseLagos, iSMEDAN, uthe, “Ukubambisana kwethu neNimbus Aid Project kuza njengesengezo esithembisayo ezinhlelweni zeSMEDAN zonyaka.

am: ቀደም ብለን ካደረግነው ጥረት ባለፈ በሴቶች የሚመሩ ኢንተርፕራይዞች ላይ ያለንን ተፅእኖ በከፍተኛ ደረጃ ለማራዘም አላማ አድርገናል።
en: We aim to significantly extend our impact on women-led enterprises beyond our previous efforts.
ha: Muna da burin faɗaɗa tasirinmu kan harkokin kasuwancin da mata ke jagoranta fiye da ƙokarin da muka yi a baya.
sw: Tunalenga kupanua kwa kiasi kikubwa athari zetu za biashara zinazoongozwa na wanawake zaidi kwa juhudi zetu za awali.
yo: À ń gbèrò láti mú ìlọsíwájú bá ipa wa lórí àwọn okòwò tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí ju àwọn ipa wa tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Sihlose ukwandisa kakhulu umthelela wethu emabhizinisini aholwa abesifazane ngaphezu kwemizamo yethu yangaphambilini.

am: በዚህ ትብብር እነዚህን ግቦች ለማሳካት እርግጠኞች ነን፡፡"
en: With this collaboration, we are confident in achieving these objectives."
ha: Tare da wannan haɗin gwiwar, muna da ƙwarin gwiwa wajen cimma waɗannan manufofin."
sw: Kwa ushirikiano huu, tuna imani katika kufikia malengo haya."
yo: Pẹ̀lú àjọṣepọ̀ yìí, at ní igbiha ìgboyà láti ṣe àṣeyọrí lórí àwọn èròǹgbà wọ̀nyí."
zu: Ngalokhu kubambisana, siyazethemba ekufezeni lezi zinhloso."

am: በናይጄሪያ አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች (ኤስኤምኢ) የኤኮኖሚው የጀርባ አጥንት ይሰራሉ, ፈጠራን ያንቀሳቅሳሉ, ስራዎችን ይፈጥራሉ እና የኢኮኖሚ ብዝሃነትን ያዳብራሉ፡፡
en: In Nigeria, small and medium enterprises (SMEs) constitute the backbone of the economy, driving innovation, creating jobs, and fostering economic diversification.
ha: A Najeriya, ƙanana da matsakaitan sana'o'i (SMEs) sune ƙashin bayan tattalin arziƙi, masu jawo ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire, samar da ayyukan yi, da bunkasa tattalin arziɗin ƙasa da ƙasa.
sw: Nchini Nigeria, biashara ndogo ndogo na za kati (SMEs) ni uti wa mgongo wa uchumi, kuendesha uvumbuzi, kuunda nafasi za kazi, na kukuza mseto wa kiuchumi.
yo: Ní Nigeria, àwọn okòwò kéékèèké àti alábọ́dé (SMEs) jẹ́ òpó ọrọ̀ ajé, wọ́n máa ń ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìṣẹ̀dá ọ̀tun, ìṣẹ̀dá àwọn iṣẹ́, àti mímú onírúurú ìlànà wọnú ètò ọrọ̀ ajé.
zu: ENigeria, amabhizinisi amancane naphakathi (amaSME) akha umgogodla womnotho, aqhuba ukuqanjwa kabusha, ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, futhi akhuthaze ukuhlukahluka komnotho.

am: በዓለም አቀፉ የሠራተኛ ድርጅት መረጃ መሠረት ከሀገሪቱ አጠቃላይ የሀገር ውስጥ ምርት ጋር በተያያዘ 48 በመቶ የሚሆነውን ድርሻ ይይዛሉ፣ የንግድ ድርጅቶች 96 በመቶ የሚሆነውን እንዲሁም 84 በመቶ የሚሆነውን ተቀጣሪዎች ይይዛሉ ።
en: According to the International Labour Organisation, they contribute 48% of the national GDP, account for 96% of businesses and 84% of employment.
ha: A cewar ƙunyar ƙwadago ta Duniya, suna ba da gudummawar kashi 48% na GDP na kasa, wanda ke da kashi 96% na kasuwanci da kashi 84% na ayyukan yi.
sw: Kulingana na Shirika la Kazi Duniani, wanachangia 48% ya Pato la Taifa, wanachangia 96% ya biashara na 84% ya ajira.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ International Labour Organization, wọ́n ń pa 48% Àpapọ̀ Èrè Abẹ́lé (GDP) wọlé, wọ́n pèsè 96% àwọn okòwò àti 84% iṣẹ́.
zu: Ngokwe-International Labour Organisation, banikela ngama-48% eGDP kazwelonke, bakha amabhizinisi angama-96% kanye nama-84% okuqashwa.

am: ነገር ግን፣ እነዚህ ኤስኤምኢዎች፣ በተለይም በሴቶች የሚመሩ፣ ብዙውን ጊዜ እድገታቸውን የሚገታ ፈተናዎች ያጋጥሟቸዋል።
en: However, these SMEs, particularly women-led ones, often face challenges that hinder their growth.
ha: Har wa yau, waɗannan SMEs, musamman waɗanda mata ke jagoranta, galibi suna fuskantar ƙalubalebale waɗanda ke hana haɗakar su.
sw: Hata hivyo, SMEs hizi, hasa zinazoongozwa na wanawake, mara nyingi hukabiliana na changamoto zinazozuia ukuaji wao.
yo: Àmọ́ sá, àwọn Okòwò kéékèèké àti alábọ́dé wọ̀nyí, pàápàá jùlọ èyí tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí, máa ń sáábà kojú àwọn ìṣòro tí ó máa ń dènà ìdàgbàsókè wọn.
zu: Kodwa-ke, lawa maSME, ikakhulukazi lawo aholwa ngabesifazane, avame ukubhekana nezinselelo eziphazamisa ukukhula kwawo.

am: የኒምቡስ ሚዲያ የተወሰነ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ የሆኑት አዴጎኬ" የኒምቡስ ድጋፍ ፕሮጀክት በህብረተሰባችን ውስጥ አዎንታዊ ለውጥ ለማምጣት ያለንን ቁርጠኝነት ያንጸባርቃል፡፡
en: Wale Adegoke, CEO of Nimbus Media Ltd, stated, "The Nimbus Aid Project reflects our commitment to driving positive change in our society.
ha: Wale Adegoke, Shugaban Kamfanin Nimbus Media Ltd, ya bayyana cewa, “Aikin Taimakon Nimbus yana nuna jajircewarmu na kawo canji mai kyau a cikin al’ummarmu.
sw: Wale Adegoke, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Nimbus Media Ltd, alisema, "Mradi wa Nimbus Aid unaonyesha kujitolea kwetu kuleta mabadiliko chanya katika jamii yetu.
yo: Wale Adegoke, Ọ̀gá Àgbà Pátápátá Nimbus Media Ltd, sọ pé, "Nimbus Aid Project jẹ́ àfihàn ìfarajìn wa láti mú àyípadà ọ̀tun wọ inú àwùjọ wa.
zu: UWale Adegoke, oyiCEO yeNimbus Media Ltd, uthe, “INimbus Aid Project ikhombisa ukuzibophezela kwethu ekuqhubeni izinguquko ezinhle emphakathini wethu.

am: የንግድ ድርጅቶችን ከፍ ለማድረግ እና መደመጥ ያለባቸውን ድምፆች ለማስደመጥ በመገናኛ ብዙሃን ሃይል እናምናለን።
en: We believe in the power of media to uplift businesses and empower voices that need to be heard.
ha: Mun yi imani da ƙarfin n kafofin watsa labarai don haɗaka kasuwanci da ƙarfafa muryoyin da ke buƙatar ji.
sw: Tunaamini katika uwezo wa vyombo vya habari kuinua biashara na kuwezesha sauti zinazohitaji kusikika.
yo: A ní ìgbàgbọ́ nínú agbára ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn láti ṣe àgbéga àwọn okòwò kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìrólágbára fún àwọn ènìyàn tí ohùn wọn nílò láti di gbígbọ́.
zu: Sikholelwa emandleni abezindaba okuthuthukisa amabhizinisi kanye nokunika amandla amazwi adinga ukuzwakala.

am: በዚህ ተነሳሽነት በሴቶች የሚመሩ ንግዶችን በማንጸባረቅ የፆታ እኩልነትን ከማሳደግ ባሻገር በናይጄሪያ የኢኮኖሚ እድገት ሞተርን በማነቃቃት ላይ እንገኛለን።
en: By spotlighting women-led businesses through this initiative, we're not only advancing gender equality but also fueling the engine of economic growth in Nigeria.”
ha: Ta hanyar haskaka kasuwancin da mata ke jagoranta ta hanyar wannan shiri, ba kawai inganta daidaiton jinsi ba, har ma muna ƙara kuzarin ci gaban tattalin arziƙin Najeriya.
sw: Kwa kuangazia biashara zinazoongozwa na wanawake kupitia mpango huu, sio tu kwamba tunaendeleza usawa wa kijinsia lakini pia tunachochea chanzo cha ukuaji wa uchumi nchini Nigeria.
yo: Nípa mímú àwọn okòwò tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí bọ́ sí gbangba nípa ètò èyí, kì í ṣe pé a ń mú ìlọsíwájú bá ìdọ́gba ẹ̀tọ́ láàrin takọtabo nìkan ṣùgbọ́n a tún ń fẹ́ná sí ìdàgbàsókè ọrọ̀ ajé ní Nigeria.
zu: Ngokuthuthukisa amabhizinisi aholwa ngabesifazane ngalolu hlelo, asikhuthazi nje kuphela ukulingana ngokobulili kodwa futhi sibhebhezela injini yokukhula komnotho eNigeria.”

am: "በዚህ አመት ኤሴኤምኢዲኤኤን፣ ማርኬቲንግ ኤጅ መጽሔት፣ ቴክካባል፣ ቴክፖይንት አፍሪካ፣ ዜና ማዕከላዊ ቴሌቪዥን፣ ሃረቨስት፣ ኤፍቢኤን ፍለጋ፣ ካርፕ ዳይም መፍትሄs እና ሌሎች በኢንተርፕረነርሺፕ እና በፆታ እኩልነት የኢኮኖሚ እድሎችን የመክፈት ራዕያችንን ለሚጋሩ ለታዋቂ ስፖንሰሮች ድጋፍ እናመሰግናለን።
en: “This year, we are grateful for the support of prominent sponsors, including SMEDAN, LSETF, Marketing Edge Magazine, TechCabal, Techpoint Africa, News Central TV, Hervest, FBN Quest, Carpe Diem Solutions and others who share our vision of unlocking economic opportunities through entrepreneurship and gender equality.”
ha: A wannan shekara, muna godiya da goyon bayan manyan masu tallafawa, da suka hada da SMEDAN, LSETF, Marketing Edge Magazine, TechCabal, Techpoint Africa, News Central TV, Hervest, FBN Quest, Carpe Diem Solutions da sauran wadanda suke da irin ƙudirin mu na buɗe damammakin tattalin arziƙi ta hanyar kasuwanci da daidaiton jinsi.
sw: Mwaka huu, tunashukuru kwa msaada wa wadhamini mashuhuri, wakiwemo SMEDAN, LSETF, Marketing Edge Magazine, TechCabal, Techpoint Africa, News Central TV, Hervest, FBN Quest, Carpe Diem Solutions na wengine wanaoshiriki maono yetu ya kufungua fursa za kiuchumi kupitia ujasiriamali na usawa wa kijinsia.”
yo: "Ní ọdún yìí, a dúpẹ́ fún àtìlẹ́yìn àwọn onígbọ̀wọ́ pàtàkì, tí ó fi mọ́ SMEDAN, LSETF, Marketing Edge Magazine, Tech Cabal, Techpoint Africa, News Central TV, Hervest, FBN Quest, Carpe Diem Solutions àti àwọn mìíràn tí wọ́n ṣe alábàápín àfojúsùn wa láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn àǹfààní ọrọ̀ ajé nípasẹ̀ okòwò àti ìṣedéédé takọtabo.
zu: “Kulo nyaka, sibonga kakhulu ngokwesekwa ngabaxhasi ababalulekile, okuhlanganisa iSMEDAN, LSETF, Marketing Edge Magazine, TechCabal, Techpoint Africa, News Central TV, Hervest, FBN Quest, Carpe Diem Solutions nabanye abanombono wethu wokuvula iminyango. amathuba ezomnotho mayelana nezamabhizinisi kanye nokulingana kobulili.”

am: የኒምቡስ የእርዳታ ፕሮጀክት በንግዶች ላይ ጉልህ የሆነ ተፅዕኖ ያለው የታሪክ አሻራ አለው።
en: The Nimbus Aid Project has a storied legacy of significantly impacting businesses.
ha: Aikin Tallafi na Nimbus yana da zaunannen tasirin mai mahimmancin kasuwanci.
sw: Mradi wa Nimbus Aid una urithi wa hadithi wa kuathiri biashara kwa kiasi kikubwa.
yo: Nimbus Aid Project ti ní ìtọ́kasí ìtàn miniy ipa lórí àwọn okòwò.
zu: I-Nimbus Aid Project inefa elicebile lamabhizinisi anomthelela.

am: ከ2016 ጀምሮ፣ 13 ድርጅቶችን፣ 11 በሴቶች የሚመሩ፣ ከ35 ሚሊዮን ናራ ዋጋ ያለው የዲጂታል ከቤት-ውጭ (ዲኦኦኤች) ማስታወቂያ ጋር ድጋፍ አድርጓል።
en: Since 2016, it has supported 13 organisations, 11 being women-led, with N35 million worth of Digital Out-Of-Home (DOOH) advertising.
ha: Tun daga shekarar 2016, ta tallafawa ƙungiyoyi guda 13, wanda guda 11 mata ne ke jagoranta, tare da kayayyakin tallace-tallace na Digital Out-Of-Home (DOOH) na Naira miliyan 35.
sw: Tangu 2016, imesaidia mashirika 13, 11 yakiongozwa na wanawake, yenye thamani ya MilioniN35 ya utangazaji wa Dijitali Nje Ya Nyumbani (DOOH).
yo: Láti 2016, ó ti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn àjọ 13, tí 11 jẹ́ èyí tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí, pẹ̀lú ìpolówó Ìmọ̀ ìpolówó Ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ìta ilé (DOOH).
zu: Kusukela ngo-2016, isisekele izinhlangano ezingu-13, ezingu-11 kuzo eziholwa abesifazane, ngokukhangisa kwe-Digital Out-Of-Home (iDOOH) ebiza izigidi ezingu-N35.

am: በዚህ ድጋፍ ተጠቃሚዎች በናይጄሪያ ቁልፍ ከተሞች ውስጥ ከ2.8 ሚሊዮን በላይ ልዩ የማስታወቂያ ቁሳቁሶችን ተመዝግበዋል።
en: With this support, beneficiaries have recorded over 2.8 million unique views of advert materials in key cities across Nigeria.
ha: Da wannan tallafin, masu cin gajiyar sun ji ra'ayoyi sama da miliyan 2.8 na musamman na kayan talla a manyan biranen Najeriya.
sw: Kwa usaidizi huu, wanufaika wamerekodi zaidi ya mitazamo ya kipekee milioni 2.8 ya nyenzo za matangazo katika miji muhimu kote Nigeria.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àtìlẹ́yìn yìí, àwọn àwọn olùkópa tí ni àkọsílẹ̀ ìwò àrà ọ̀tọ̀ tí ó ju mílíọ̀nù 2.8 ìpolówó àwọn èròjà ní àwọn ìlú ńlá ńlá káàkiri Nigeria.
zu: Ngalokhu kusekelwa, abahlomuli baqophe ukubuka okuhlukile okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-2.8 zezinto zokukhangisa emadolobheni abalulekile kulo lonke elaseNigeria.

am: የ 2023 ዕትም ይህንን ተጽዕኖ የበለጠ ለማሳደግ፣ በሴቶች የሚመሩ አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞችን በማጐልበት እና የበለጠ ሁሉን አቀፍ እና ኢኮኖሚያዊ ኃይል ላለው የንግድ ገጽታ መድረኩን በማዘጋጀት ላይ ይገኛል፡፡
en: The 2023 edition is poised to take this impact further, empowering women-led SMEs and setting the stage for a more inclusive and economically-empowered business landscape.
ha: Shirin na shekarar 2023 ya shirya tsaf don ƙara wannan tasirin sosai, yana ƙarfafa SMEs da mata ke jagoranta tare da saita matakin don ingantaccen yanayin kasuwanci mai ƙarfin da ƙarfin tattalin arziƙi.
sw: Toleo la 2023 liko tayari kuchukua athari hii zaidi, kuwezesha SMEs zinazoongozwa na wanawake na kuweka mazingira ya biashara jumuisha zaidi na iliyowezeshwa kiuchumi.
yo: Ẹ̀yà 2023 ni wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ láti láti mú ìtẹ̀síwájú bá ipa yìí, ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn Okòwò kéékèèké àti alábọ́dé tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí àti ṣíṣe ètò fún àwùjọ okòwò tí ó fi ààyè gba tí ó sì ṣètò ìrónilágbára ọrọ̀ ajé fún un.
zu: Uhlelo lwango-2023 selulungele ukuqhubekisela phambili lo mthelela, lunike amandla amaSME aholwa abesifazane futhi lubeke inkundla yebhizinisi elibandakanya wonke umuntu nelithuthuke ngokwezomnotho.

am: የ 2023 የኒምቡስ ድጋፍ ፕሮጀክት ለማመልከት በሴቶች የሚመሩ ንግዶች እንዲጎበኙ ይበረታታሉ https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project የማመልከቻዎች የመጨረሻ ቀን እ.ኤ.እ አርብ መስከረም 8 ቀን 2023 ነው፡፡
en: To apply for the Nimbus Aid Project 2023, women-led businesses are encouraged to visit https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project The deadline for applications is Friday, 8th September 2023.
ha: Don neman aikin Nimbus Aid Project 2023, ana ƙarfafa kasuwancin da mata ke jagoranta su ziyarci https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project Kwanan lokaci don aikace-aikacen shine Juma'a, 8 ga Satumba 2023.
sw: Kutuma maombi ya Mradi wa Nimbus Aid 2023, biashara zinazoongozwa na wanawake zinahimizwa kutembelea https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project Mwisho wa kutuma maombi ni Ijumaa, tarehe 8 Septemba 2023.
yo: Láti forúkọsílẹ̀ fún Nimbus Aid Project 2023, a rọ àwọn okòwò tí àwọn obìnrin ń darí láti kàn sí https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project. Gbèdéke ìparí ìkọ̀wéforúkọsílẹ̀ náà ni Ọjọ́ Ẹtì, ọjọ́ 8 oṣù Kẹ̀sán-án 2023.
zu: Ukufaka isicelo seNimbus Aid Project 2023, amabhizinisi aholwa ngabesifazane ayakhuthazwa ukuthi avakashele ku-https://www.nimbus.com.ng/nimbus-aid-project Umnqamulajuqu wokufaka izicelo ungoLwesihlanu, 8th kuMandulo 2023.

am: ስለ ኒምቡስ የእርዳታ ፕሮጀክት
en: About The Nimbus Aid Project
ha: Game da Aikin Tallafin na Nimbus
sw: Kuhusu Mradi wa Msaada wa Nimbus
yo: Nípa Nimbus Aid Project
zu: Mayelana ne-Nimbus Aid Project

am: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2016 ከተጀመረበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ የኒምቡስ የእርዳታ ፕሮጀክት በናይጄሪያ ማህበረሰቦች ውስጥ ኢኮኖሚያዊ እና ማህበራዊ እድሎችን ለመፍጠር ቁርጠኛ የንግድ ድርጅቶችን እና የማህበራዊ ተፅእኖ ድርጅቶችን ደግፏል።
en: Since its launch in 2016, the Nimbus Aid Project has supported businesses and social impact organisations committed to creating economic and social opportunities in Nigerian communities.
ha: Tun lokacin da aka ƙaddamar da shi a shekarar 2016, Nimbus Aid Project ya tallafa wa kamfanoni da ƙungiyoyi masu tasiri na zamantakewar al'umma da suka himmatu wajen samar da damar tattalin arziƙi da zamantakewa a cikin al'ummomin Najeriya.
sw: Tangu kuzinduliwa kwake mwaka wa 2016, Mradi wa Nimbus Aid umesaidia biashara na mashirika ya athari za kijamii yaliyojitolea kuunda fursa za kiuchumi na kijamii katika jamii za Nigeria.
yo: Láti ìgbà ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní 2016, Nimbus Aid Project ti set àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn okòwò àti àwọn àjọ onípa àwùjọ tí wọ́n farajìn láti ṣẹ̀dá ọrọ̀ ajé àti àǹfààní àwùjọ niy àwọn àgbègbè Nigeria.
zu: Kusukela yethulwa ngo-2016, iNimbus Aid Project iye yasekela amabhizinisi nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezizibophezele ekudaleni amathuba ezomnotho nezenhlalakahle emiphakathini yaseNigeria.

am: ይህ ተነሳሽነት በሌጎስ ውስጥ ከቤት ውጭ የማስታወቂያ ኤጀንሲ መዳረሻ በሆነው በኒምቡስ ሚዲያ ሊሚትድ ይመራል።
en: The initiative is led by Nimbus Media Ltd, a destination out-of-home advertising agency in Lagos.
ha: Kamfanin Nimbus Media Ltd ne ke jagorantar wannan shiri, wata cibiyar talla ta waje da ke Legas.
sw: Mpango huo unaongozwa na Nimbus Media Ltd, wakala wa matangazo ya nje ya nyumba huko Lagos.
yo: Ètò náà ni Nimbus Media Ltd sáájú, ilé-iṣẹ́ ìpolówó ìta ilé ní ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó.
zu: Lolu hlelo luholwa yiNimbus Media Ltd, isikhungo sokukhangisa sangaphandle eLagos.

am: ከዚህ ቀደም "የበጎ አድራጎት ድርጅትን ሹመት" በመባል የሚታወቀው የኒምቡስ እርዳታ ፕሮጀክት ተልእኮ ኤስኤምኢዎችን እና የማህበራዊ ተፅእኖ ድርጅቶች የውጪ ማስታወቂያ ለዋና ታዋቂ ምርቶች ከሚያመጣው ተደራሽነት እና ታማኝነት ተጠቃሚ ማድረግ ነው።
en: Previously known as "Nominate A Charity," Nimbus Aid Project’s mission is to ensure SMEs and social impact organisations benefit from the reach and credibility that outdoor advertising brings to major brands.
ha: Wanda a baya aka sani da suna "Nominate A Charity," manufar Aikin Tallafi na Nimbus ita ce tabbatar da cewa SME da ƙungiyoyi masu tasiri ga al'umma sun amfana da isa da aminci da tallace-tallacen waje ke kawowa ga manyan kamfanoni.
sw: Hapo awali ilijulikana kama "Teua Msaada," dhamira ya Mradi wa Nimbus Aid ni kuhakikisha SME na mashirika ya athari za kijamii yananufaika kutokana na ufikiaji na uaminifu ambao utangazaji wa nje huleta kwa chapa kuu.
yo: Wọ́n mọ̀ ọ́n sí "Nominate A Charity," Àfojúsùn Nimbus Aid Project ni láti rí i pé àwọn okòwò kéékèèké àti alábọ́dé àti àwọn àjọ onípa àwùjọ jẹ àǹfààní nínú àgbékalẹ̀ náà àti ìgbẹ́kẹ̀lé tí ìpolówó ọjà níta mú wá fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ńlá.
zu: Okwayaziwa ngokuthi "Khetha Umnikelo," umgomo we-Nimbus Aid Project uwukuqinisekisa ukuthi amaSME nezinhlangano ezisekelwe emphakathini ziyazuza ekufinyeleleni nasekuthembekeni okulethwa ukukhangisa kwangaphandle ezinkampanini ezinkulu.

am: የኒምቡስ እርዳታ ፕሮጀክት የቀድሞ ተጠቃሚዎች ሄድፎርዝ ፋውንዴሽን፤ ለትርፍ ያልተቋቋመ ድርጅት ለችግረኞች ነፃ እና ቀላል የፍትህ ተደራሽነት፤ የኔ መዳኒቶች፤ በመላ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ እውነተኛ እና ተመጣጣኝ መድኃኒቶችን ለማግኘት የመጨረሻው-ርቀት መድረክ;፤እና ዋዲ አፍሪካ፣ የአፍሪካ ተመራማሪዎችን እጅግ አስደናቂ ምርምር ለማድረግ ከሚያስፈልጉ ሀብቶች ጋር የሚያገናኝ ዲጂታል መድረክ፡፡
en: Past beneficiaries of the Nimbus Aid Project include Headforth Foundation; a non-profit providing free and easy access to justice for indigents; MyMedicines; a platform for last-mile access to genuine and affordable medicines across Nigeria; and Wadi Africa, a digital platform connecting African researchers to the resources required to carry out groundbreaking research.
ha: Waɗanda suka ci gajiyar Shirin Tallafi na Nimbus sun haɗa da Gidauniyar Headforth, wata Gidauniya mai zaman kanta da ke ba da kyauta da sauƙi don samur da adalci ga marasa galihu; da MyMedicine, wani dandali mai taimakawa wurin samun Magunguna da ba a cika nema ba masu araha a fadin Najeriya; da Wadi Africa, wani dandali na zamani da ke sadar da masu binciken Afirka zuwa kayan aikin da ake buƙataata don gudanar da bincike mai zurfi.
sw: Walengwa wa zamani wa Mradi wa Nimbus Aid ni pamoja na Headforth Foundation; shirika lisilo la faida linalotoa ufikiaji wa bure na rahisi wa haki kwa watu wasio na uwezo; MyMedicine; jukwaa la ufikiaji wa maili ya mwisho kwa dawa halisi na za bei nafuu kote Nigeria; na Wadi Africa, jukwaa la kidigitali linalounganisha watafiti wa Kiafrika na rasilimali zinazohitajika kufanyia utafiti muhimu.
yo: Àwọn akópa Nimbus Aid Project àtẹ̀yìnwá ni a ti rí Headforth Foundation, ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣèrànwọ́ kan tí ó pèsè àǹfààní ọ̀fẹ́ àti ìrọ̀rùn sí ìdájọ́ fún àwọn aláìní; My Medicines; ìkànnì kan fún àǹfààní abẹ́lé sí àwọn òògùn gidi tí owó rẹ̀ kò gunpá káàkiri Nigeria; àti Wadi Africa, ìkànnì orí ẹ̀rọ kan tí ó ń ṣàsopọ̀ àwọn aṣèwádìí Afíríkà pẹ̀lú àwọn ohun àmúlò tí wọ́n nílò láti gbé ìwádìí tí ó lààmìlaaka jáde.
zu: Abahlomuli baphambilini beNimbus Aid Project bahlanganisa iHeadforth Foundation; inhlangano engenzi nzuzo ehlinzeka ngokufinyelela kwamahhala nokulula kobulungiswa kwabampofu; Imithi Yami; inkundla yokufinyelela ekugcineni emithini yangempela nethengekayo kulo lonke elaseNigeria; kanye neWadi Africa, inkundla yedijithali exhumanisa abacwaningi base-Afrika nezinsiza abazidingayo ukuze benze ucwaningo oluyisisekelo.

am: ፕላትኖቫ፡ የግሎባል ፊንቴክን የመሬት ገጽታ እንደገና መወሰን
en: Platnova: Redefining the Landscape of Global Fintech
ha: Platnova: Sake fasalin yanayin Fintech na Duniya
sw: Platnova: Kufafanua Upya Mandhari ya Fintech ya Kimataifa
yo: Platnova: Ṣíṣe àtúnṣe Àwùjọ Ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná Lágbàáyé
zu: IPlatnova: Ichaza Kabusha IGlobal Fintech Landscape

am: በፍጥነት በማደግ ላይ ባለው የፋይናንሺያል አካባቢ ውስጥ, እንከን የለሽ, ዓለም አቀፋዊ የፊንቴክ መፍትሄዎች በጣም አስፈላጊ ሆኖው አያውቁም፡፡
en: In a rapidly evolving financial environment, the need for seamless, globalized fintech solutions has never been more paramount.
ha: Cikin yanayin tattalin arziƙin da ke haɗaka cikin sauri, buƙatar samun tsayayyar mafita ta Fasahar Harkokin Kuɗi na duniya bai taɓa kasancewa mafi muhimmanci kamar yanzu ba.
sw: Katika mazingira ya kifedha yanayobadilika kwa kasi, hitaji la ufumbuzi wa fintech usio fumwa, wa utandawazi haujawahi kuwa muhimu zaidi.
yo: Nínú àwùjọ ìṣúná tí ó ń yára yí padà, àsìkò yìí gan-an ni ìlò fún àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná tí ó káríayé ṣe pàtàkì jùlọ.
zu: Esimeni sezezimali esithuthuka ngokushesha, isidingo sezixazululo ezingenamthungo, zefintech zomhlaba wonke asikaze sibaluleke kakhulu.

am: ቀዳሚው የፊንቴክ መድረክ ፕላትኖቫ፣ ዛሬ እርስ በርስ ለተገናኘው ዓለም ፍላጎቶች የተጣጣሙ አጠቃላይ የፋይናንስ መፍትሄዎችን በማቅረብ ይህንን ክፍተት ለመፍታት ያለመ ነው።
en: Platnova, a groundbreaking fintech platform, aims to address this gap by providing comprehensive financial solutions tailored to the demands of today's interconnected world.
ha: Platnova, sabon dandalin Fasahar Harkokin Kuɗi, wanda ke da niyya don magance wannan giɓin ta hanyar samar da ingantattun hanyoyin hada-hadar kuɗi waɗanda suka dace da buƙatun duniyar haɗin gwiwa ta yau.
sw: Platnova, jukwaa muhimu la fintech, linalenga kushughulikia pengo hili kwa kutoa masuluhisho ya kina ya kifedha yanayolenga mahitaji ya ulimwengu wa sasa uliounganishwa.
yo: Platnova, ọ̀tun ìkànnì ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná kan, fojúsun dídí àlàfo yìí nípa pípèsè àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí ó gbòòrò tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ fún àwọn àìní ayé tí ó so mọ́ra lónìí.
zu: IPlatnova, inkundla yefintech ehamba phambili, ihlose ukubhekana naleli gebe ngokunikeza izixazululo zezezimali ezibanzi ezihlangabezana nezidingo zomhlaba wanamuhla oxhumene.

am: የተከበረው የዩኬ ግሎባል ታለንት ቪዛ ተቀባይ በሆነው ቤንጃሚን ኦይሞንላን የተመሰረተው ፕላትኖቫ፣ ከፋይናንሺያል መተግበሪያ በላይ በመሆን ብቅ ይላል - ይህ የአለም አቀፍ የገንዘብ ልውውጦችን በምንመለከትበት ላይ ለውጥን ይወክላል።
en: Founded by Benjamin Oyemonlan, an esteemed recipient of the UK Global Talent Visa, Platnova emerges as more than just a financial app—it represents a shift in how we perceive global financial transactions.
ha: Benjamin Oyemonlan ne ya kafa shi, babban mai karɓar Visa Global Talent Visa na Burtaniya, Platnova ya fito a matsayin fiye da aikace-aikacen kuɗi kaɗai, yana wakiltar sauyi a yadda muke fahimtar hada-hadar kuɗi ta duniya.
sw: Ilianzishwa na Benjamin Oyemonlan, mpokeaji maarufu wa Visa ya Vipaji vya Ulimwenguni ya Uingereza, Platnova kuibuka kama zaidi ya programu ya kifedha—inawakilisha mabadiliko katika jinsi tunavyoona shughuli za kifedha duniani.
yo: Ìdásílẹ̀ láti ọwọ́ Benjamin Oyemonla, gbajúmọ̀ kan tí ó gba Global Talent Visa, Platnova ju ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ ìṣúná lásán lọ–ó dúró gẹ́gẹ́ bí àyípadà nínú bí s ṣe ń rí awkmt ìdúnàádúrà ìṣúná lágbàáyé.
zu: Yasungulwa ngu-Benjamin Oyemonlan, umamukeli ohlonishwayo we-UK Global Talent Visa, uPlatnova uvela njengongaphezu nje kwe-app yezezimali—imele ushintsho endleleni esibuka ngayo ukuthengiselana kwezezimali emhlabeni jikelele.

am: እንደ ፈጣን የብዙ-ምንዛሪ ክፍያዎች፣ ቀላል የክፍያ መጠየቂያ ክፍያዎች፣ ምናባዊ ካርዶችን የመፍጠር እና የገንዘብ ድጋፍ የማደረግ አቅም እና የስጦታ ካርዶችን ለመግዛት እና ለአለም አቀፍ የትምህርት ክፍያ ለመክፈል ምቹ ሂደቶች ያሉ ሰፊ የባህሪያት ድርድረ ጋር ፕላትኖቫ እራሱን በፊንቴክ መፍትሄዎች ጫፍ ላይ አስቀምጧል።
en: With an extensive array of features such as swift multi-currency payments, simplified bill payments, the ability to create and fund virtual cards, and convenient processes for purchasing gift cards and paying international tuition fees, Platnova positions itself at the cutting edge of fintech solutions.
ha: Tare da ɗimbin fasalulluka kamar saurin biyan kuɗi da yawa, sauƙaƙe biyan kuɗi, ƙirƙira da ba da kuɗin katunan sadarwar zamani, da hanyoyin da suka dace don siyan katunan kyauta da biyan kuɗin koyarwa na ƙasa da ƙasa, Platnova ta sanya kanta a ƙarshen mafitar Fasahar Harkokin Kuɗi.
sw: Pamoja na safu nyingi za vipengele kama vile malipo ya haraka ya sarafu nyingi, malipo ya bili yaliyorahisishwa, uwezo wa kuunda na kufadhili kadi pepe, na michakato rahisi ya kununua kadi za zawadi na kulipa ada ya masomo ya kimataifa, Platnova anajiweka katika nafasi ya juu katika utatuzi wa fintech.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àwọn onírúurú àbùdá tí ó gbòòrò gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìsanwó ayákánkán ọlọ́pọ̀ ẹ̀yà owó, ìrọ̀rùn ìsanwó ọjà, agbára láti ṣẹ̀dá àti láti fi owó sí orí àwọn káàdì orí ẹ̀rọ, àti àwọn ètò ìrọ̀rùn láti ra àwọn káàdì ẹ̀bùn àti sísan owó ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ní orílẹ̀ èdè mìíràn, Platnova gbé ara wọn sí òkè téńté àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ fún ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná.
zu: Ngezinhlobonhlobo zezici ezifana nezinkokhelo zemali ezisheshayo, izinkokhelo zezikweletu ezenziwe lula, ikhono lokudala nokuxhasa amakhadi abonakalayo, nezinqubo ezikahle zokuthenga amakhadi esipho nokukhokha imali yokufunda yamazwe ngamazwe, uPlatnova uzibeka phambili ezixazululweni zefintech. .

am: የፕላትኖቫ ተልእኮ እምብርት ለቁጥጥር ተገዢነት እና የተጠቃሚ ደህንነት ቁርጠኝነት ነው።
en: At the heart of Platnova's mission is a commitment to regulatory compliance and user security.
ha: A zuciyar Platnova akwai burin saɗaukar da kai ga bin ƙa’ida da aminci mai amfani.
sw: Kiini cha dhamira ya Platnova ni kujitolea kwa kufuata sheria na usalama wa watumiaji.
yo: Ní àárín gbùngbùn àfojúsùn Platnova ni ìfarajìn fún títẹ̀lé àwọn òfin ìlànà àti ààbò aṣàmúlò.
zu: Umnyombo wenhloso kaPlatnova ukuzibophezela ekuthobeleni nasekuphepheni kwabasebenzisi.

am: መድረኩ በዩናይትድ ኪንግደም፣ በአሜሪካ፣ በካናዳ፣ በሩዋንዳ እና በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ስራዎችን ያካሂዳል፣ እያንዳንዱ ክልል የሱን እያንዳንዱን የፋይናንስ የቁጥጥር መስፈርቶችን ይደግፋል፡፡
en: The platform boasts operations across the UK, US, Canada, Rwanda, and Nigeria, each region adhering to its respective financial regulatory standards.
ha: Dandalin yana alfahari da ayyuka a cikin Burtaniya, Amurka, Kanada, Rwanda, da Najeriya, kowane yanki yana bin ƙa’idojin tsarin kuɗi daban-daban.
sw: Jukwaa hili linajivunia uendeshaji kote Uingereza, Marekani, Kanada, Rwanda, na Nigeria, kila eneo likizingatia viwango vyake vya udhibiti wa kifedha.
yo: Ìkànnì náà ń ṣiṣẹ́ káàkiri UK, US, Canada, Rwanda, àti Nigeria, agbègbè kọ̀ọ̀kan ń tẹ̀lé àwọn òfin ìlànà tirẹ̀.
zu: Inkundla isebenza kulo lonke elase-UK, US, Canada, Rwanda, kanye neNigeria, isifunda ngasinye sithobela izindinganiso zaso zokulawula izimali.

am: ይህ በአሜሪካ ውስጥ የ ፊንስን ደንብን፣ በካናዳ ውስጥ የ ኤምኤስቢ ምዝገባን፣ በዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ውስጥ በ ኤፍሲኤ ቊጥጥር ከሚደረግበት አካል ጋር ሽርክና እና በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ በ ሲቢኤን ቊጥጥር ከሚደረግበት አጋር ጋር ትብብርን ያካትታል፡፡
en: This includes FINCen regulation in the US, MSB registration in Canada, a partnership with an FCA-regulated entity in the UK, and collaboration with a CBN-regulated partner in Nigeria.
ha: Wannan ya haɗa da ka'idojin FINCen a Amurka, rajistar MSB a Kanada, haɗin gwiwa tare da ƙungiyar FCA da ke Burtaniya, da haɗin gwiwa tare da abokan hulɗa bisa tsarin CBN a Najeriya.
sw: Hii ni pamoja na udhibiti wa FINCen nchini Marekani, usajili wa MSB nchini Kanada, ushirikiano na huluki inayodhibitiwa na FCA nchini Uingereza, na ushirikiano na mshirika anayedhibitiwa na CBN nchini Nigeria.
yo: Lára èyí ni àwọn òfin FINCen ní US, ìforúkọsílẹ̀ MSB ní Canada, ìbádòwòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú àjọ alákòóso-FCA kan ní UK, àti ìbádòwòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú alábàáṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ òfin ìlànà-CBN ní Nigeria.
zu: Lokhu kufaka ukulawulwa kweFINCen e-US, ukubhaliswa kweMSB eCanada, ubambiswano nebhizinisi elilawulwa yiFCA e-UK, kanye nobudlelwano nozakwethu olawulwa yiCBN eNigeria.

am: "ዓለም አቀፋዊነት እየጨመረ በሄደበት ዓለም ውስጥ በርካታ ክልሎችን እና ምንዛሪዎችን የሚያሟላ የተቀናጀ የፋይናንስ መድረክ አስፈላጊ ነው፡፡
en: "In an increasingly globalized world, the need for a cohesive financial platform that caters to multiple regions and currencies is pressing.
ha: "A duniyar da abubuwa ke ƙara shahara, buƙatar tsarin haɗin gwiwar hada-hadar kuɗi wanda ke kula da yankuna da kuɗaɗe da yawa tana ƙaruwa".
sw: "Katika ulimwengu unaozidi kuwa wa utandawazi, hitaji la kuwa na jukwaa shirikishi la kifedha ambalo linashughulikia maeneo na sarafu nyingi linaendelea.
yo: "Ní ayé tí ó tit lajú púpọ̀, ó ṣe pàtàkì láti ní ìkànnì ìṣúná ìṣọ̀kan tí yóò ṣe ìtọ́jú fún àwọn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ agbègbè àti ẹ̀yà owó.
zu: “Ezweni eliya ngokuya lisebenza ngokubambisana, isidingo senkundla yezezimali ebumbene ebhekelela izifunda nezinhlobo zemali eziningi siyaqhubeka.

am: ከፕላትኖቫ ጋር፣ ይህንን ክፍተት ለመቅረፍ እና ድንበር ሳይለይ ለተጠቃሚዎች እንከን የለሽ የፋይናንስ ተሞክሮ ማቅረብ ዓላማችን ነው” ሲል ቤንጃሚን ኦይሞንላን ይናገራል።
en: With Platnova, we aim to bridge this gap and offer users a seamless financial experience irrespective of borders," shares Benjamin Oyemonlan.
ha: "Tare da Platnova, muna da nufin cike wannan giɓin da kuma baiwa masu amfani da su damar samun gogewa ta fuskar kuɗi ba tare da la'akari da iyakoki ba," in ji Benjamin Oyemonlan.
sw: Tukiwa na Platnova, tunalenga kuziba pengo hili na kuwapa watumiaji uzoefu wa kifedha usio fumwa bila kujali mipaka," anashiriki Benjamin Oyemonlan.
yo: Pẹ̀lú Platnova, a ní àfojúsùn láti dí àlàfo yìí kí á sì pèsè ìrírí ìṣúná tí ó rọrùn fún àwọn aṣàmúlò orílẹ̀ èdè yòówù tí wọ́n bá wà," Benjamin Oyemonla ló soy èyí.
zu: NgePlatnova, sihlose ukuvala leli gebe futhi sinikeze abasebenzisi ulwazi olungenazihibe lwezezimali ngaphandle kwemingcele,” kusho uBenjamin Oyemonlan.

am: የፊንቴክ ዘርፍ እንደ ፕላትኖቫ ያሉ መፍትሄዎችን በመምራት በአዲስ ዘመን አፋፍ ላይ ቆሟል።
en: The fintech sector stands on the brink of a new era, with solutions like Platnova leading the charge.
ha: Sashin Fasahar Harkokin Kuɗi yana tsaye a kan sabon zamani, tare da mafita kamar Platnova yana jagorantar hakan.
sw: Sekta ya fintech iko ukingoni mwa enzi mpya, na suluhu kama vile Platnova inayoongoza.
yo: Ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ nínú ìṣúná náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ wà ní ipò ìgbà ọ̀tun, pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ bí Platnova tí wọ́n síwájú ìgbésẹ̀ náà.
zu: Umkhakha wefintech usonqenqemeni lwenkathi entsha, enezixazululo ezifana ne-Platnova ehamba phambili.

am: ንግዶች እና ግለሰቦች ይበልጥ የተሳለጠ፣ ዓለም አቀፋዊ የፋይናንሺያል መፍትሄዎችን ሲፈልጉ፣ እንደ ፕላትኖቫ ያሉ መድረኮች የወደፊቱን የፋይናንስ ሁኔታ ለመቅረጽ ተዘጋጅተዋል።
en: As businesses and individuals alike seek more streamlined, globalized financial solutions, platforms like Platnova are poised to reshape the future of finance.
ha: Kamar yadda kasuwanci da ɗaiɗaikun mutane ke neman daidaituwa, hanyoyin samar da kuɗi na duniya, kamar dandamalin Platnova suna shirye don sake fasalin makomar kuɗi.
sw: Huku biashara na watu binafsi wakitafuta masuluhisho zaidi ya kifedha yaliyoratibiwa, ya utandawazi, majukwaa kama vile Platnova yako tayari kuunda upya mustakabali wa fedha.
yo: Bí àwọn okòwò àti àwọn ènìyàn ṣe ń wá àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìṣúná tí ó ní gbèdéke tí ó sì káríayé, awomt ìkànnì bí Platnova ní àbùdá láti ṣe àyípadà sí ọjọ́ iwájú ìṣúná.
zu: Njengoba amabhizinisi nabantu ngokufana befuna izixazululo ezithuthukile, zezezimali zomhlaba wonke, amapulatifomu afana nePlatnova alungele ukubumba kabusha ikusasa lezezimali.

am: የተሸሻለው ፓክሶ ውበት የተንቀሳቃሽ ስልክ መተግበሪያ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ በሺዎች ለሚቈጠሩ የውበት ምርቶችን በቀላል በማግኘት ይደሰቱ።
en: Enjoy Easy Access to Thousands of Beauty Products in Nigeria with the Paxo Beauty Revamped Mobile App
ha: Ji daɗin Sauƙaƙan Samun Dubban Kayayyakin ado a Najeriya tare da gyararriyar manhajar Wayar hannu ta Paxo Beauty
sw: Furahia Ufikiaji Rahisi wa Maelfu ya Bidhaa za Urembo nchini Nigeria ukitumia Paxo Beauty Revamped Mobile App
yo: Gbádùn Àǹfààní ìrọ̀rùn sí Àwọn Ẹ̀gbẹẹgbẹ̀rún Ọjà Ẹwà ní Nigeria pẹ̀lú Paxo Beauty Revamped Mobile App.
zu: Jabulela Ukufinyelela Kalula Ezinkulungwaneni Zemikhiqizo Yobuhle eNigeria ngePaxo Beauty Revamped Mobile App

am: ታዋቂው የናይጄሪያ የውበት ምርት መለያ ፓክሶ ውበት አዲሱን የሞባይል መተግበሪያውን ይፋ ማድረጉን በማሳወቁ ደስተኛ ነው።
en: Leading Nigerian beauty brand, Paxo Beauty, is excited to announce the launch of its new mobile app.
ha: Babban kamfanin kyawun Najeriya, Paxo Beauty, ya yi farin cikin sanar da ƙaddamar da sabuwar manhajar wayar hannu.
sw: Chapa inayoongoza ya urembo ya Nigeria, Paxo Beauty, ina furaha kutangaza uzinduzi wa programu yake mpya ya simu.
yo: Asíwájú ilé-iṣẹ́ ìṣaralóge Nigeria, Paxo Beauty, dunnú láti kéde ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká rẹ̀.
zu: Inkampani yonobuhle ehamba phambili eNigeria, iPaxo Beauty, iyakuthokozela ukumemezela ukwethulwa kohlelo lwayo olusha lweselula.

am: የታደሰው መተግበሪያ ደንበኞች ከልዩ ምርት ጋር የሚገናኙበትን መንገድ ለመለወጥ፣ ለስላሳ የግብይት ተሞክሮ ለማቅረብ እና በመላው ናይጄሪያ የውበት አፍቃሪዎችን ለማጐልበት ተዘጋጅቷል፡፡
en: The redesigned app is set to transform how customers connect with the brand, providing a smooth shopping experience and empowering beauty enthusiasts across Nigeria.
ha: An saita ƙa’idar da aka sake fasalin don canza yadda abokan ciniki ke hulɗa da kayan, samar da sassauƙar sayayya mai sauƙi da ƙarfafa masu sha'awar kayan ado a duk faɗin Najeriya.
sw: Programu iliyoundwa upya imewekwa ili kubadilisha jinsi wateja wanavyoungana na chapa, kutoa uzoefu mzuri wa ununuzi na kuwawezesha wapenda urembo kote nchini Nigeria.
yo: Àtúnṣe ohunt èlò ẹ̀rọ náà ti ṣetán láti ṣe àyípadà sí bí àwọn oníbàárà ṣe ń kàn sí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà, nípa pípèsè ìrírí ìrajà ìrọ̀rùn àti ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ènìyàn tí ìṣaralóge jẹ lógún káàkiri Nigeria.
zu: Uhlelo lokusebenza oluklanywe kabusha lusethelwe ukuguqula indlela amakhasimende asebenzisana ngayo nomkhiqizo, lunikeze ulwazi lokuthenga olushelelayo futhi lunike amandla abathanda ubuhle kulo lonke elaseNigeria.

am: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 1996 የተመሰረተው እንደ ቢ2ቢ የጅምላ ንግድ ፣ ፓክሶ ፋርማሲዩቲካል የተወሰነ - በፓክሶ ግሩፕ ስር ያለ ንዑስ ድርጅት - እራሱን እንደ ታማኝ አቅራቢዎች ለፋርማሲዎች ፣ ለሱፐርማርኬቶች እና በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ አቋቁሟል።
en: Founded in 1996 as a B2B wholesale business, Paxo pharmaceutical limited - a subsidiary under the Paxo Group - established itself as a trusted supplier to pharmacies, supermarkets, and local stores nationwide.
ha: An kafa shi a cikin 1996 a matsayin reshen kamfanin B2B, Paxo Pharmaceutical Limited - wani reshe a ƙarƙashin Rukunin Paxo - ya kafa kansa a matsayin amintaccen mai siyar da magunguna, manyan kantuna, da shagunan gida a duk faɗin ƙasar.
sw: Ilianzishwa mwaka wa 1996 kama biashara ya jumla ya B2B, Paxo pharmaceutical limited - kampuni tanzu chini ya Paxo Group - ilijiimarisha kama muuzaji anayeaminika kwa maduka ya dawa, maduka makubwa na maduka ya ndani kote nchini.
yo: Wọ́n ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní 1996 gẹ́gẹ́ bí okòwò aláràtúntà okòwò sí okòwò, Paxo pharmaceutical limited - ẹ̀ka ilé-iṣẹ́ lábẹ́ Paxo Group - fi ara rẹ̀ kalẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùpèsè fún àwọn ilé ìtajà oògùn, ilé ìtajà ńlá, àti àwọn ilé ìtajà abẹ́lé tí ó ṣe é gbẹ́kẹ̀lé káàkiri orílẹ̀ èdè.
zu: Yasungulwa ngo-1996 njengebhizinisi le-B2B elithengisa izinto eziningi, iPaxo pharmaceutical limited - inkampani engaphansi kwePaxo Group - yazisungula njengomnikezeli onokwethenjelwa emakhemisi, izitolo ezinkulu, kanye nezitolo zasendaweni ezweni lonke.

am: ነገር ግን፣ እንደ ጁሚአ፣ ዴልዴይ፣ ኮንጋ፣ ኬይሙ እና ጂቲቢ የገበያ ቦታ ያሉ የመስመር ላይ የገበያ ቦታዎች ብቅ ሲሉ፣ በእነዚህ መድረኮች ላይ ብቻ መታመን ውስን ሆኗል።
en: However, as online marketplaces like Jumia, Dealdey, Konga, Kaymu, and GTB marketplace emerged, relying solely on these platforms proved limiting.
ha: duk da haka, yayin da kasuwannin kan layi kamar Jumia, Dealdey, Konga, Kaymu, da GTB kasuwa suka bayyana, dogaro da waɗannan dandamali kawai sun tabbatar da iyakancewa.
sw: Ijapokuwa, soko za mtandaoni kama vile Jumia, Dealdey, Konga, Kaymu, na soko la GTB zilizoibuka, kutegemea majukwaa haya kulidhibitiwa.
yo: Àmọ́ sá, bí àwọn ibi ìnájà orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára bí Jumia, Dealdey, Konga, Kaymu, àti ibi ìnájà GTB ṣe dìde, gbígbé ara lé àwọn ìkànnì wọ̀nyí nìkan lè ní ìdènà.
zu: Kodwa-ke, njengoba izimakethe eziku-inthanethi ezifana neJumia, iDealdey, iKonga, iKaymu, kanye nemakethe yeGTB zivela, ukuthembela kuphela kulezi zinkundla kwabonakala kunomkhawulo.

am: ከዲጂታል ፈረቃ ጋር ለመላመድ፣ ፓክሶ ውበት በ 2015 ከፓክሶ ፋርማሲዩቲካልስ ወጥቷል፣ በቀጥታ-ወደ-ደንበኛ (ዲ2ሲ) አቀራረብን ተጠቀሟል።
en: To adapt to the digital shift, Paxo Beauty emerged from Paxo Pharmaceuticals in 2015, adopting a direct-to-customer (D2C) approach.
ha: Don daidaitawa da canjin dijital, Paxo Beauty sun fito daga Paxo Pharmaceuticals a cikin shekarar 2015, yana ɗaukar hanyar kai tsaye zuwa abokin ciniki (D2C).
sw: Ili kukabiliana na mabadiliko ya kidigitali, Paxo Beauty aliibuka kutoka kwa Paxo Pharmaceuticals mwaka wa 2015, akichukua mbinu ya moja kwa moja kwa mteja (D2C).
yo: Láti fara mọ́ àyípadà ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ yìí, Paxo Beauty dìde láti ara Paxo Pharmaceutical ní 2015, ó ń ṣàmúlò ìlànà tààrà sí àwọn oníbàárà (D2C).
zu: Ukuze uzivumelanise noguquko lwedijithali, iPaxo Beauty yavela kuPaxo Pharmaceuticals ngo-2015, isebenzisa indlela eqondile yokuya kumthengi (iD2C).

am: ከዲዛይን ኤጀንሲ ክሬጂታል ጋር በመተባበር፣ ፓክሶ ውበት ከተመልካቾቹ ጋር ለመስማማት የምርት ስያሜውን እና ድህረ ገጹን አሻሽሏል።
en: Partnering with design agency Cregital, Paxo Beauty revamped its branding and website to resonate with its audience.
ha: Haɗin kai tare da hukumar ƙira ta Cregital, Paxo Beauty ta sake sabunta alamar ta da shafi yanar gizon don dacewa da su sauraron ta.
sw: Kwa kushirikiana na wakala wa ubunifu wa Cregital, Paxo Beauty ilisasisha chapa yake na tovuti ili kuwavutia watazamaji wake.
yo: Nínú ṣíṣe ìbádòwòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú àjọ aṣẹ̀dá Cregital, Paxo Beauty ṣe àtúnṣe ọjà àti ojú òpó ìtakùn rẹ̀ láti ṣe déédéé pẹ̀lú àwọn èrò.
zu: Ngokusebenzisana ne-ejensi yokuklama iCregital, iPaxo Beauty iklame kabusha igama layo newebhusayithi ukuze ifane nezithameli eziqondiwe.

am: በ 2016 ኢንስታግራም እና ፌስቡክን ለንግድ በመጠቀም ፓክሶ ውበት ፈጣን እድገት አሳይቷል፣ በወርኀዊ ሽያጮች በግምት 150,000 ናይራ አገኘ፡፡
en: Leveraging Instagram and Facebook for commerce in 2016, Paxo Beauty experienced rapid growth, achieving monthly sales of approximately 150,000 Naira.
ha: Ta hanyar amfani da Instagram da Facebook don kasuwanci a cikin 2016, Paxo Beauty ya sami ci gaba cikin sauri, yana samun siyar da kusan Naira 150,000 kowane wata.
sw: Kwa kutumia Instagram na Facebook kwa ajili ya biashara mwaka wa 2016, Paxo Beauty ilipata ukuaji wa haraka, na kufikia mauzo ya kila mwezi ya takriban Naira 150,000.
yo: Nípa ṣíṣe àmúlò Instagram àti Facebook fún okòwò ní 2016, Paxo Beauty ní ìrírí ìdàgbàsókè ńlá, wọ́n ta ọjà tí ó tó 150, 000 náírà ní oṣooṣù.
zu: Isebenzisa i-Instagram neFacebook ukuze imakethwe ngo-2016, i-Paxo Beauty yakhula ngokushesha, yazuza ukuthengiswa kwanyanga zonke kwe-150,000 Naira.

am: በ 2020 ፓክሶ ውበት ለአይኦኤስ እና ለ አንድሮይድ ለመጠቀም ቀላል የሆነ የሞባይል መተግበሪያ በማስጀመር የደንበኞቹን ተሞክሮ የበለጠ አሻሽሏል፡፡
en: In 2020, Paxo Beauty further enhanced its customer experience by launching an easy-to-use mobile app for iOS and Android.
ha: A cikin 2020, Paxo Beauty ya ƙara haɗaka ƙwarewar abokin ciniki ta hanyar ƙaddamar da aikace-aikacen hannu mai sauƙin amfani don wayoyin iOS da Android.
sw: Mnamo 2020, Paxo Beauty iliboresha zaidi matumizi yake kwa wateja kwa kuzindua programu ya simu ya mkononi iliyo rahisi kutumia ya iOS na Android.
yo: Ní 2020, Paxo Beauty tẹ̀síwájú láti mú àgbéga bá ìrírí àwọn oníbàárà rẹ̀ nípa ṣíṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká tí ó rọrùn láti lò fún iOS àti Android.
zu: Ngo-2020, iPaxo Beauty yathuthukisa ulwazi lwamakhasimende ayo ngokwethula uhlelo lokusebenza lweselula olusebenziseka kalula lwe-iOS ne-Android.

am: የታደሰው መድረክ እንከን የለሽ የግብይት ተሞክሮ፣ ለተጠቃሚ ምቹ የሆነ በይነገጽ፣ የተሻሻለ አሰሳ እና የተለያዩ የምርት አማራጮችን ይሰጣል።
en: The revamped platform offers a seamless shopping experience, a user-friendly interface, improved navigation, and diverse product options.
ha: Dandalin da aka sabunta yana ba da sauƙin siyayya mai kyau, ƙirar mai sauƙin kai, ingantaccen kewayawa, da yalwataccen samfur iri-iri.
sw: Jukwaa lililoboreshwa linatoa uzoefu wa ununuzi usio fumwa, kiolesura kinachofaa mtumiaji, urambazaji ulioboreshwa, na chaguo mbalimbali za bidhaa.
yo: Ìkànnì tí wọ́n ṣàtúnṣe náà pèsè ìrírí ìrajà tí ó rọrùn, ojú òpó tí ó rọrùn láti lò fún àwọn aṣàmúlò, ìtẹ̀síwájú ìyanká, àti àwọn àṣàyàn ọjà onírúurú.
zu: Inkundla ethuthukisiwe inikeza ulwazi lokuthenga olungenazihibe, isixhumi esibonakalayo esisebenziseka kalula, ukuzulazula okuthuthukisiwe, nezinketho zemikhiqizo ehlukahlukene.

am: ደንበኞቻቸው በእያንዳንዱ ግዢ ገንዘብ እንዲያገኙ የሚያስችላቸው የታማኝነት ፕሮግራም ተጀመረ፣ ይህም ለ10 ሚሊዮን ኒያራ ወርሃዊ ገቢ አስደናቂ አስተዋፅዖ አድርጓል።
en: A loyalty program was also introduced, allowing customers to earn money with each purchase, contributing to an impressive monthly revenue of 10 million naira.
ha: An kuma ɓullo da wani shiri na aminci, wanda ya baiwa abokan ciniki damar samun kuɗi a kowane saye, wanda ya ba da gudummawar samun kuɗin shiga mai ban sha'awa na Naira miliyan 10 a kowane wata.
sw: Mpango wa uaminifu pia ulianzishwa, kuruhusu wateja kupata pesa kwa kila ununuzi, na kuchangia mapato ya kila mwezi ya naira milioni 10.
yo: Wọ́n tún ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ètò ìfọkàntán kan, èyí tí ó ń fààyè gba àwọn oníbàárà láti rí owó pẹ̀lú ìrajà kọ̀ọ̀kan, èyí tí ó ń nípa lórí mílíọ̀nù 10 owó tó wọlé ní oṣooṣù.
zu: Kwaphinde kwethulwa uhlelo lokwethembeka, oluvumela amakhasimende ukuthi athole imali ngokuthenga ngakunye, kube nesandla emalini engenayo yanyanga zonke eyi-naira eyizigidi eziyishumi.

am: የመተግበሪያው ዳግም መጀመር ፓክሶ ውበት ለቴክኖሎጂ እና ለፈጠራ ያለውን ቁርጠኝነት ያጎላል።
en: The app's relaunch underscores Paxo Beauty's commitment to technology and innovation.
ha: Sake ƙaddamar da ƙa’idar yana jaddada saɗaukarwar Paxo Beauty ga fasaha da ƙirƙira.
sw: Kuzinduliwa upya kwa programu kunasisitiza kujitolea kwa Paxo Beauty kwa teknolojia na uvumbuzi.
yo: Àtúnfilọ́lẹ̀ ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ yìí jẹ́ ìfarajìn Paxo Beauty fún ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ọ̀tun.
zu: Ukwethulwa kabusha kohlelo lokusebenza kugcizelela ukuzibophezela kuka-Paxo Beauty kwezobuchwepheshe kanye nokusungula izinto ezintsha.

am: የምርት መለያ ገንቢዎች ቡድን፣ የዩኤክስ ዲዛይነሮች፣ የምርት አስተዳዳሪዎች እና የይዘት ባለሙያዎች የደንበኞችን ጉዞ ከፍ ለማድረግ ዲጂታል ስነ-ምህዳር ፈጥረዋል።
en: The brand's team of developers, UX designers, product managers, and content experts created a digital ecosystem to elevate the customer journey.
ha: ƙungiya masu ƙirƙira na kamfanin, da masu tsara UX, manajojin samfur, da ƙwararru akan ƙunshiya sun ƙirƙiri yanayi na dijital don haɗaka balaguron abokin ciniki.
sw: Timu ya wasanidi wa chapa, wabunifu wa UX, wasimamizi wa bidhaa na wataalamu wa maudhui waliunda mfumo ikolojia wa kidigitali ili kuinua safari ya wateja.
yo: Ikọ̀ àwọn olùṣẹ̀dá ilé iṣẹ́ náà, àwọn aṣẹ̀dá UX, àwọn alákòóso ọjà, àti alámọ̀já àtinúdá ṣẹ̀dá àwùjọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ láti mú ìgbéga bá ìrìnàjò oníbàárà.
zu: ithimba lonjiniyela bemikhiqizo, abaklami be-UX, abaphathi bemikhiqizo, nochwepheshe bokuqukethwe badale i-ecosystem yedijithali ukuze kuphakanyiswe uhambo lwamakhasimende.

am: "ፓክሶ ውበት ልዩ ምርቶችን እና ልምዶችን ለማቅረብ ቁርጠኛ ነው" ሲሉ የፓክሶ ውበት ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ጁሞክ ኦሉኮያ ተናግረዋል።
en: "Paxo Beauty is dedicated to delivering exceptional products and experiences," said Jumoke Olukoya, CEO of Paxo Beauty.
ha: Jumoke Olukoya, Shugaba na Paxo Beauty ya ce "An saɗaukar da Paxo Beauty don isar da kayayyaki na musamman da gogewa.".
sw: Jumoke Olukoya, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Paxo Beauty, alisema; "Paxo Beauty imejitolea kutoa bidhaa na uzoefu wa kipekee,".
yo: "Paxo Beauty ní èrò láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àwọn ọjà àti ìrírí tí ó tayọ," ni ọ̀rọ̀ Jumoke Olukoya, Ọ̀gá Àgbà Pátápátá Paxo Beauty.
zu: IPaxo Beauty izinikele ekuletheni imikhiqizo nesipiliyoni esiyingqayizivele, kusho uJumoke Olukoya, oyiCEO yePaxo Beauty.

am: "የተሻሻለው መተግበሪያችን በናይጄሪያ የውበት ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ ያለንን አቋም ለማጠናከር ፍጥነት፣ ምቾት እና ቴክኖሎጂን በማዋሃድ የውበት ግብይት ልምድን ከፍ ያደርገዋል፡፡"
en: "Our revamped app elevates the beauty shopping experience, merging speed, convenience, and technology to solidify our position in the Nigerian beauty industry."
ha: "app ɗinmu da aka sabunta yana haɗaka ƙwarewar sayayya mai kyau, saurin haɗuwa, dacewa, da fasaha don ƙarfafa matsayinmu a masana'antar adon Najeriya."
sw: "Programu yetu iliyoboreshwa inainua hali ya ununuzi wa urembo, kasi ya kuunganisha, urahisi na teknolojia ili kuimarisha msimamo wetu katika tasnia ya urembo ya Nigeria."
yo: "Àtúnṣe ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ wa sẹ ìgbéga fún iriri ìrajà ìṣaralóge, ó ń ṣe ìdàpọ̀ ìyára, ìrọ̀rùn, àti ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ láti fìdí ipò wa múlẹ̀ nínú ilé-iṣẹ́ ìṣaralóge Nigeria.
zu: Uhlelo lwethu lokusebenza oluthuthukisiwe luphakamisa ulwazi lokuthenga ngobuhle, luhlanganise isivinini, ukunethezeka, kanye nobuchwepheshe ukuze siqinise isikhundla sethu embonini yobuhle yaseNigeria.

am: የፓክሶ ውበት መተግበሪያ አሁን በመተግበሪያ መደብር እና በ ጎግል ጨዋታ መደብር ላይ ይገኛል፣ ለናይጄሪያ ሸማቾች የተበጁ ሰፋ ያሉ የውበት እና የቆዳ እንክብካቤ ምርቶችን ያቀርባል።
en: The Paxo Beauty app is now available on the App Store and Google Play Store, offering a wide range of beauty and skincare products tailored for Nigerian consumers.
ha: Yanzu ana samun manhajar Paxo Beauty akan kundin manhaja da kundin Play, tana ba da kayan kwalliya iri-iri da na fata waɗanda aka keɓance don masu amfani da Najeriya.
sw: Programu ya Paxo Beauty sasa inapatikana kwenye App Store na Google Play Store, ikitoa aina mbalimbali za bidhaa za urembo na urembo zinazolenga watumiaji wa Nigeria.
yo: Ohun èlò ẹ̀rọ Paxo Beauty wà lórí App Store àti Google Play Store báyìí, ó ń pèsè àwọn onírúurú ọjà ìṣaralóge àti ìtọ́jú awọ tí a gbé kalẹ̀ fún àwọn oníbàárà Nigeria.
zu: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Paxo Beauty manje seluyatholakala ku-App Store nakuGoogle Play Store, luhlinzeka ngezinhlobonhlobo eziningi zobuhle nemikhiqizo yokunakekelwa kwesikhumba kubathengi baseNigeria.

am: ለበለጠ መረጃ፡ www.paxobeauty.comን ይጎብኙ

yo: Fún àlàyé sí i, ẹ ṣe àbẹ̀wò sí www.paxobeauty.com
zu: Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi, vakashela ku-www.paxobeauty.com
