am: ሮኸልዝ ወደ ማዘርቦርድ ይቀየራል፣ ለሰራተኛ ጥቅማ ጥቅሞች አስተዳደር አዲስ ዘመን ቃል ገብቷል።
en: roHealth Transforms into Motherboard, Promises New Era for Employee Benefits Management
ha: roHealth ya sauya fasali zuwa Motherboard, Ya kuma yi alƙawarin sabon zamani wajen gudanar da harkokin cin gajiyar ma'aikata.
sw: roHealth Inabadilika kuwa Ubao Mama, Inaahidi Enzi Mpya ya Usimamizi kwa Manufaa ya Wafanyakazi
yo: roHealth Yípadà sí Motherboard, Ṣe ìlérí Ìgbà ọ̀tun fún àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ Ṣe Àǹfààní fún àwọn Alákòóso
zu: I-roHealth Transforms Board Yomama, Ithembisa Inkathi Entsha Yokuphathwa Kwezinzuzo Zabasebenzi

am: የሠራተኞች የጤና ጥቅማጥቅሞች መድረክ የሆነው ሮሄልዝ ዛሬ ለአፍሪካ ሁሉን አቀፍ የሠራተኞች ጥቅማጥቅሞች መድረክ በሆነውን ማዘርቦርድ ዳግም ስያሜውን እየቀየረ መሆኑን አስታውቋል።
en: roHealth, the employee health benefits platform, has announced today that it is rebranding to become Motherboard, a comprehensive employee benefits platform for Africa.
ha: roHealth, kamfanin samar da tagomashin da ya shafi lafiya ga ma'aikta, yau ya sanar cewa zai sauya fasali ya koma Motherboard, cikakken tsarin samar da tagomashin lafiya ga ma'aikatan Afirka.
sw: roHealth, jukwaa la manufaa ya afya ya mfanyakazi, limetangaza leo kuwa linabadilisha chapa ili kuwa Ubaomama, jukwaa la kina la manufaa ya mfanyakazi kwa Afrika.
yo: roHealth, ìkànnì àwọn àǹfààní ìlera fún òṣìṣẹ́ ti kéde lónìí pé òun ń ṣe àtúnṣe láti dí Motherboard, ìkànnì àǹfààní tí ó fẹjú fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní Áfríkà.
zu: I-roHealth, inkundla yezinzuzo zezempilo yabasebenzi, imemezele namuhla ukuthi ikhiqiza kabusha igama layo ukuze ibe yi-Motherboard, inkundla yezinzuzo zezisebenzi ephelele kunazo zonke e-Afrika.

am: ከ 2 ዓመታት ስራዎች በኋላ፣ሮኸልዝ ከጤና መድህን በላይ ተጨማሪ የሰራተኞች ጥቅማ ጥቅሞችን ለማካተት አድማሱን እያሰፋ ነው።
en: After 2 years of operations, roHealth is expanding its horizons to include more employee benefits beyond health insurance.
ha: Bayan aiki na shekaru biyu, roHealth yana faɗaɗa ayyukansa don ƙarin shigar ƙarin cin gajiya ga ma'aikata fiye da inshorar lafiya.
sw: Baada ya miaka 2 ya uendeshaji, roHealth inapanua upeo wake ili kujumuisha manufaa zaidi ya wafanyakazi zaidi ya bima ya afya.
yo: Lẹ́yìn àwọn iṣẹ́ ọdún 2, roHealth ń gbòòrò àwọn iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ sí i láti ṣe àfikún àwọn àǹfààní òṣìṣẹ́ sí i tayọ adójútòfo ìlera.
zu: Ngemva kweminyaka engu-2 yokusebenza, i-roHealth inweba umkhathizwe ukuze ifake izinzuzo zezisebenzi ezengeziwe ngale komshwalense wezempilo.

am: ከዚህ መስፋፋት ጋር የኩባንያውን አዲስ አቅጣጫ በተሻለ ሁኔታ ለመወከል አዲስ ስም, አዲስ መልክ እና አዲስ ምርት ይመጣል፡፡
en: With this expansion comes a new name, new look, and a new product to better represent the company’s new direction.
ha: Da wannan sabuwar faɗaɗawar, suka zaɓi sabon suna da sabbin kamanni da kuma sabon kaya don wakiltar kamfanin yadda ya dace a wannan sabon zangon.
sw: Kwa upanuzi huu huja jina jipya, sura mpya, na bidhaa mpya ili kuwakilisha vyema mwelekeo mpya wa kampuni.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìmúgbòòrò yìí ni orúkọ tuntun, ìwò tuntun, àti ọjà tuntun láti ṣojú ibí tí ilé iṣẹ́ náà ń doríkọ dáadáa.
zu: Ngalokhu kunwetshwa kuza igama elisha, ukubukeka okusha, nomkhiqizo omusha ozomela kangcono indlela entsha yenkampani.

am: የማስፋፋቱ ውሳኔ የሮሄልዝ የአፍሪካን ተለዋዋጭ የሰው ሃይል ፍላጎት ለማሟላት ካለው ቁርጠኝነት የመነጨ ነው።
en: The decision to expand stems from roHealth's commitment to cater to the evolving needs of Africa's dynamic workforce.
ha: Wannan hukunci na faɗaɗawa ya biyo bayan jajircewar roHealth wurin kula da buƙatun ma'aikatan Afirka masu yawa da ke ci gaba da haɓaka.
sw: Uamuzi wa kupanua unatokana na kujitolea kwa roHealth kukidhi mahitaji yanayobadilika ya nguvu kazi ya Afrika.
yo: Ìpinnu láti gbòòrò ẹ̀ka wọn dìde láti ara ìfarajìn roHealth láti mójútó àwọn ìṣòro àwùjọ òṣìṣẹ́ ní Áfríkà tí ó ń yípadà.
zu: Isinqumo sokwandisa sisukela ekuzibophezeleni kwe-roHealth ekubhekaneni nezidingo eziguqukayo zabasebenzi base-Afrika abaguquguqukayo.

am: በመላው አፍሪካ የኑሮ ውድነት በጣምእየጨመረ በመምጣቱ ማዘርቦርድ በዛሬው ገበያ ውስጥ ያለውን ወሳኝ ፍላጎት የሚፈታ ወቅታዊ መፍትሄ ሆኖ ይመጣል።
en: With a drastic rise in cost of living across Africa, Motherboard comes as a timely solution, addressing a crucial need in today’s market.
ha: Da mummunar tsadar da rayuwa ke yi a Afirka, Motherboard ya zo a matsayin wata mafita da ta zo a kan lokaci, dake magance wata muhimmiyar buƙata a kasuwar yau.
sw: Kwa kupanda kwa kasi kwa gharama ya maisha barani Afrika, Motherboard inakuja kama suluhu la wakati, kushughulikia hitaji muhimu katika soko la leo.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ọ̀wọ́ngógó tí ó ń pọ̀ sí i nínú ètò ìgbé ayé Áfríkà, Motherboard wá gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí ó bágbàmu, ó ń wá ọ̀nà àbáyọ sí ìṣòro nínú ọjà òde òní.
zu: Ngezindleko eziphakeme zokuphila e-Afrika yonkana, i-Motherboard iza njengesixazululo esifike ngesikhathi, esibhekelela isidingo esibalulekile emakethe yanamuhla.

am: የማዘርቦርድ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ እና የጆብበርማን የቀድሞ ተባባሪ መስራች ሌካን ኦሉዴ ለኩባንያው የወደፊት እጣፈንታ ያለውን ጉጉት ገልጿል።
en: Lekan Olude, Motherboard’s CEO and ex-co-founder of Jobberman, expressed his excitement for the company's future:
ha: Lekan Olude, shugaban Motherboard kuma tsohon wanda aka kafa Jobberman da shi, ya bayyana farin cikinsa game da goben kamfanin.:
sw: Lekan Olude, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Motherboard na mwanzilishi mwenza wa zamani wa Jobberman, alionyesha furaha yake kwa mustakabali wa kampuni:
yo: Lekan Olude, Ọ̀gá Àgbà Pátápátá Motherboard àti olùdásílẹ̀ Jobber man nígbà kan rí, ṣe àfihàn ìdùnnú rẹ̀ nípa ọjọ́ ọ̀la ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.:
zu: ULekan Olude, oyiCEO yeMotherboard nomsunguli weJobberman, uzwakalise injabulo yakhe ngekusasa lenkampani:

am: ሮኸልዝ ለተጠቃሚዎቻችን በሰራተኞች የጤና ጥቅማ ጥቅሞች ላይ ያሳደረውን ተጽእኖ በመጀመሪያ አይተናል።
en: “We have seen first-hand the effects roHealth has had on employee health benefits for our users.
ha: Mun gani a zahiri, tasirin da roHealth ya yi a matsayin mai samar da inshorar lafiya ga ma'aikata.
sw: "Tumeona athari za roHealth kwa manufaa ya afya ya wafanyakazi kwa watumiaji wetu.
yo: A ti rí ojúlówó ipa tí roHealth ni lórí àǹfààní ìlera òṣìṣẹ́ fún àwọn oníbàárà wa.
zu: “Sizibonele mathupha imiphumela i-roHealth ibe nayo ezinzuzweni zezempilo zabasebenzi kubasebenzisi bethu.

am: ሮኸልዝ የሚጠቀሙ አሰሪዎች ለሰራተኞች የተሻለ ልምድ ሲሰጡ ወጪያቸውን እንዴት እንደሚቀንስላቸው ታሪኮችን አካፍለዋል።
en: Employers who use roHealth have shared stories of how it reduces costs for them while providing a better experience for employees.
ha: Ma'aikatun da ke amfani da roHealth sun ba da labaran yadda ya rage musu kashe kuɗi bayan yana samar da kyakkyawar mu'amala ga ma'aikata.
sw: Waajiri wanaotumia roHealth wameshirikisha hadithi kuhusu jinsi inavyowapunguzia gharama huku wakitoa matumizi bora kwa wafanyakazi.
yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń ṣàmúlò roHealth ti ṣe alábàápín àwọn ìtàn bí ó ṣe ṣe àdínkù iyeó fún wọn nígbà tí ó ń pèsè ìrírí tí ó dára fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Abaqashi abasebenzisa i-roHealth babelane ngezindaba zokuthi ibehlisele kanjani izindleko kuyilapho ihlinzeka ngolwazi olungcono kubasebenzi.

am: እና አሁን፣ ይህን ተፅዕኖ ከጤና አጠባበቅ ውጭ እንዴት ማባዛት እንደሚችሉ ጥያቄዎችን እየጠየቁ ነው።
en: And now, they are asking questions about how they can replicate this effect outside healthcare.
ha: Kuma yanzu, suna tambayoyi game da yadda za a ruɗanya wannan tasiri zuwa wajen ayyukan lafiya.
sw: Na sasa, wanauliza maswali kuhusu jinsi wanaweza kuiga athari hii nje ya huduma ya afya.
yo: Bẹ́ẹ̀ nísinsìnyí, wọ́n ń béèrè àwọn ìbéèrè nípa bí wọ́n ṣe lè ṣàmúlò ipa yìí níta ètò ìlera.
zu: Futhi manje, babuza imibuzo mayelana nokuthi bangawuphindaphinda kanjani lo mphumela ngaphandle kokunakekelwa kwezempilo.

am: እነዚህ እኛ ማዘርቦርድ እንደ መልስ የገነባናቸው ጥያቄዎች ናቸው።
en: These are the questions that we built Motherboard as the answer to.
ha: Waɗannan su ne tambayoyin da muka gina motherboard don ya amsa.
sw: Haya ndio maswali ambayo tulimundia Motherboard kama jibu.
yo: Àwọn ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí ni a ṣẹ̀dá Motherboard fún gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìdáhùn.
zu: Lena imibuzo iMotherboard eklanyelwe ukuyiphendula.

am: ይህንን ችግር ለጤና ጥቅማጥቅሞች የመፍታት ችሎታ ነበረን - ያንን እውቀት ወደ ሰፊ ጥቅማጥቅሞች ማስተላለፍ ነበረብን።”
en: We had the expertise of solving this problem for health benefits – we just had to transfer that expertise to a wider range of benefits.”
ha: Muna da ƙwarewa wajen warware wannan matsala don amfanin lafiya kawai muna son juya wannan ƙwarewar izuwa amfani mai faɗi.
sw: Tulikuwa na utaalamu wa kutatua tatizo hili kwa manufaa ya afya - ilitubidi tu kuhamisha utaalamu huo kwa manufaa mbalimbali zaidi."
yo: A ní ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe lórí ọ̀nà àbáyọ fún ìṣòro yìí fún àǹfààní ìlera – a kàn nílò láti gbé ìmọ̀-ọ́nṣe yẹn wọ inú àwọn onírúurú àǹfààní mìíràn."
zu: Sibe nekhono lokuxazulula le nkinga ngezinzuzo zezempilo - bekumele sidlulisele lobo buchwepheshe emihlotsheni ehlukahlukene."

am: ማዘርቦርድ የአፍሪካ ሰራተኞች ላሉት ለማንኛውም ኩባንያ #1 የሰራተኞች ጥቅማ ጥቅሞች መድረክ እንዲሆን ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: Motherboard is set to be the #1 employee benefits platform for any company with African employees.
ha: Motherboard ne zai kasance kamfanin na farko na cin gajiya ga kowanne kamfani mai ɗauke da ma'aikata 'yan Afirka.
sw: Ubaomama imewekwa kuwa jukwaa #1 la manufaa ya mfanyakazi kwa kampuni yoyote iliyo na wafanyakazi Wakiafrika.
yo: Motherboard ti ṣetán láti di ìkànnì #1 fún àǹfààní òṣìṣẹ́ fún ilé-iṣẹ́ èyíkéyìí tí ó ní àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ Áfríkà.
zu: IMotherboard isethwe ukuba ibe inkundla #1 yezinzuzo zabasebenzi yanoma iyiphi inkampani enabasebenzi base-Afrika.

am: በጤና ኢንሹራንስ፣ በምግብ እና በሸቀጣሸቀጥ፣ በትራንስፖርት እና በሌሎች በርካታ ጥቅሞች ጋር ማዘርቦርድ ለሰራተኞች ጥቅማጥቅሞችን ማሻሻል እና ለአሰሪዎች የሠራተኛ ማቆያ ወጪዎችን መቀነስ ይፈልጋል፡፡
en: With benefits across health insurance, food & groceries, transportation, and many more, Motherboard wants to enhance benefits access for employees and reduce employee retention costs for employers.
ha: Da tagomashi a fannonin inshorar lafiya, abinci da kayan abinci, sufuri, da ma wasu da yawa, Motherboard yana so ya inganta damar samun sauƙi cin gajiya ga ma'aikata tare da rage yawan kashe kuɗin riƙe ma'aikata ga masu ɗaukar aiki kansu.
sw: Pamoja na manufaa katika bima ya afya, chakula na mboga, usafiri na mengine mengi, Motherboard inataka kuboresha ufikiaji wa manufaa kwa wafanyakazi na kupunguza gharama za kuhifadhi wafanyakazi kwa waajiri.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àǹfààní káàkiri adójútòfo ìlera, oúnjẹ & èròjà oúnjẹ, ìrìnkèrindò, àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ, Motherboard fẹ́ mú ìgbéga bá níní àǹfààní sí àwọn àǹfààní yìí fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kí wọ́n sì ṣe àdínkù bá iyeó ìgbànisíṣẹ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ fún àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́.
zu: Ngezinzuzo kuwo wonke umshwalense wezempilo, ukudla negrosa, ezokuthutha, nokunye okwengeziwe, iMotherboard ifuna ukuthuthukisa ukufinyelela ezinzuzweni zabasebenzi kanye nezindleko eziphansi zokugcinwa kwezisebenzi kubaqashi.

am: ማዘርቦርድ በመድረኩ ላይ ከ 100 በላይ ነጋዴዎችን( እንደ ሾፕራይትe፣ኢቤአኖ፣ ፊልምሃውስሲኒማዎች እና 15+ ኤችኤምኦዎች ያሉ ተጫዋቾችን ጨምሮ) ያኩራራል፣ ይህም ሠራተኞች የአሰሪዎቻቸው በተመደበው በጀት ውስጥ ልዩ ፍላጎቶቻቸውን ለማሟላት ጥቅሞቻቸውን እንዲያበጁ ያስችላቸዋል፡፡
en: Motherboard boasts over 100 merchants on its platform (including players like Shoprite, Ebeano, FIlmhouse Cinemas, and 15+ HMOs), allowing employees to tailor their benefits to suit their unique needs within their employer's assigned budget.
ha: Motherboard ya bunƙasa fiye da kamfanoni 100 a shafin intanet ɗinsa (da ya haɗa da masu taka rawa irinsu Shoprite, Ebeano, Filmhouse Cinema, da kamfanonin inshorar lafiya sama da 15), wanda zai bawa ma'aikata damar tsara albashinsu daidai da buƙatunsu, a wuraren da waɗanda suka ɗauke su aiki sanya a kasafin kuɗi.
sw: Ubaomama inajivunia zaidi ya wafanyabiashara 100 kwenye jukwaa lake (ikiwa ni pamoja na wachezaji kama Shoprite, Ebeano, Filmhouse Cinemas, na HMO 15+), kuruhusu wafanyakazi kutayarisha manufaa yao ili kukidhi mahitaji yao ya kipekee ndani ya bajeti waliyokabidhiwa na mwajiri wao.
yo: Motherboard ní àwọn oníṣòwò 100 lórí ìkànnì rẹ̀ (tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn akópa bí Shoprite, Ebeano, Filmhouse Cinemas, àti 15+ HMOs), èyí tí ó ń fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ láǹfààní láti ṣẹ̀dá àǹfààní tí wọ́n fẹ́ pẹ̀lú ohun tí wọ́n nílò nínú ìṣúná agbanisíṣẹ́ wọn.
zu: IMotherboard iziqhayisa ngabathengisi abangaphezu kwe-100 endaweni yayo (okuhlanganisa nabadlali abafana noShoprite, i-Ebeano, iFIlmhouse Cinemas, kanye namaHMO angu-15+), evumela abasebenzi ukuba bahlele izinzuzo zabo ukuze zivumelane nezidingo zabo ezihlukile ngaphakathi kwesabelomali esithile umqashi wabo.

am: ስለ ማዘርቦርድ
en: About Motherboard
ha: Game da Motherboard
sw: Kuhusu Motherboard
yo: Nípa Motherboard
zu: Mayelana neMotherboard

am: ቀደም ሲል ሮሄልዝ በመባል የሚታወቀው ማዘርቦርድ በመላው አፍሪካ አሠሪዎችንና ሠራተኞችን የሚያበረታታ አጠቃላይ የሠራተኛ ጥቅማጥቅሞች አስተዳደር መድረክ ነው።
en: Motherboard, formerly known as roHealth, is a comprehensive employee benefit management platform that empowers employers and employees across Africa.
ha: Shafin Motherboard, da a da aka sani da roHealth, cikakken dandalin intanet ne dake samar da tagomashi ƙarfafar masu ɗaukar aiki da ma'aikata a faɗin Afirka.
sw: Motherboard, ambayo hapo awali ilijulikana kama roHealth, ni jukwaa la kina la usimamizi wa manufaa ya mfanyakazi ambalo huwawezesha waajiri na wafanyakazi kote Afrika.
yo: Motherboard, tí a mọ sí roHealth tẹ́lẹ̀, jẹ́ ìkànnì àkóso àwọn àǹfààní fún òṣìṣẹ́ tí ó ń ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́ àti òṣìṣẹ́ káàkiri Afíríkà.
zu: IMotherboard, phambilini eyayaziwa ngokuthi i-roHealth, iyinkundla yokuphatha inzuzo yabasebenzi ebanzi enika abaqashi nabasebenzi amandla e-Afrika yonkana.

am: የጥቅማጥቅሞችን ተደራሽነት እና አከፋፈልን በዝቅተኛ ወጭ ማሳደግ ላይ በማተኮር፣ ማዘርቦርድ የሰራተኛ ጥቅሞች የሚተዳደርበት እና የሚለመድበትን መንገድ ለመቀየር ቁርጠኛ ነው።
en: With a focus on enhancing benefits access and disbursement at lower costs, Motherboard is committed to revolutionizing the way employee benefits are managed and experienced.
ha: Da manufar inganta damar samun tagomashi da kuma rabo a farashi mai rahusa, Motherboard ya shirya sauya fasalin yadda ake samarwa da sarrafa tagomashi ga ma'aikata.
sw: Kwa kulenga kuimarisha ufikiaji na malipo ya manufaa kwa gharama nafuu, Motherboard imejitolea kupindua jinsi manufaa ya wafanyakazi yanavyodhibitiwa na uzoefu.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn láti mú ìgbéga bá níní àǹfààní sí àti ìpínká ní owó kékeré, Motherboard farajìn fún mímú àyípadà bá ọ̀nà tí wọ́n ń gbà ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àti bí àwọn àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ṣe ń ní ìrírí àǹfààní òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Ngokugxila ekuthuthukiseni ukufinyelela kwezinzuzo nezinkokhelo ngezindleko eziphansi, iMotherboard izibophezele ekuguquleni indlela izinzuzo zezisebenzi eziphathwa futhi ezitholwa ngayo.

am: ስለ ዳግም-ስያሜ የበለጠ ማንበብ ወይም ለበለጠ መረጃ የማዘርቦርድ ድህረ ገጽን መመልከት ትችላለህ።
en: You can read more about the rebrand or check out Motherboard’s website for more information.
ha: Kana iya ƙara karatu game da sauya fasalin ko ka ziyarci shafin yanar gizo na Motherboard don ƙarin bayani.
sw: Unaweza kusoma zaidi kuhusu kutengeneza chapa au angalia tovuti ya Motherboard kwa habari zaidi.
yo: Ẹ lè kà sí i nípa àtúnṣe náà tàbí kí ẹ kàn sí ìtakùn ayélujára Motherboard fún àlàyé sí i.
zu: Ungafunda kabanzi mayelana nokuqamba kabusha noma uhlole iwebhusayithi ye-Motherboard ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe.

am: ማዘርቦርድ ሐሙስ፣ ኦገስት 10፣ 2023 ከቀኑ 5 ሰአት ላይ ምንም አይነት ነገር ይጠይቁኝ ክፍለ ጊዜ በማዘጋጀት ላይ ሲሆን በቀጥታ ማሳያ ይሰጣሉ እና ስለ ዳግም ብራንድ አንገብጋቢ ጥያቄዎችን ይመልሳሉ።
en: Motherboard is also hosting an Ask Me Anything Session by 5pm on Thursday, August 10, 2023 where they will give a live demo and answer pressing questions about the rebrand.
ha: Sannan Motherboard na gabatar da shirin Tambaye ni Komai da ƙarfe 5 na yamma ranar Alhamis, 10 ga Agusta 2023, inda za su kwatanta sabon fasalin a zahiri su kuma amsa muhimman tambayoyi game da sauya fasalin.
sw: Motherboard pia inaandaa Kipindi cha Niulize Chochote kufikia saa kumi na moja jioni siku ya Alhamisi, Agosti 10, 2023 ambapo watatoa onyesho la moja kwa moja na kujibu maswali muhimu kuhusu toleo jipya la bidhaa.
yo: Motherboard tún ń gbàlejò Ìpín Béèrè Ohunkóhun lọ́wọ́ mi ní aago 5 ìrọ̀lẹ́ Ọ̀jọ́rú, ọjọ́ 10 Oṣù Kẹjọ, 2023 níbi tí wọn yóò ti ṣe àfihàn ojúkojú tí wọ́n yóò sì dáhùn àwọn ìbéèrè tí ó kọ àwọn èèyàn lóminú nípa àtúnṣe náà.
zu: I-Motherboard iphinde isingathe I-Ask Me Anything Session ngo-5pm ngoLwesine, kuNcwaba 10, 2023 lapho bezonikeza khona idemo ebukhoma futhi baphendule imibuzo ecindezelayo emayelana nokusungula izinto ezintsha.
